item.text: dpala mchog dang po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal go/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis rlabs dang/
dmatshig dang/ mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamA
cad kyi ren po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bskur ba b.res pa/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang
phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de/
sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus bamed pa thams cad kyi rab thams cad yongs su skong ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs
rje ba/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa/ dus gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs
thams cad rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad bzhugs shing bsngags pa/ bstod pa/ nor bu chen po dang rin po ches
smras pa/ kha dogasnatshogs pa'i dril bu btags pa/ daragyi bdan dang/ me tog gi 'phreng ba dang/ rngam dang/ dra ba dang/
drub byed pa dang/ zlabarlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis bar madzes par byas pa'i 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gzhan
'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po gnas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byeb phrag brgyad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub
samos dpa' sems dpa' chen po gan rdodzad ngang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpanapo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag dang/ byang chub
sams dpa bsams dpa' chen ponam mkha'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'tshon po rdo rje khu tshur dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a
sams dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang/ byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor bskor ba dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ponam mkha'i mdzod dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'dzer
panang/ dedag la sogs pa byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po bya ba phrag brgyadadang thabs cigaste/ yongs su bskor cing mdunagyis bltasanas chos ston te/ thog mar dge ga/
bar dudag ba/ tha mar dgal/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang bo/ ma 'dres pa/ yosasu rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byung ba/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo 'di rnam bar
dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di yang dag par ston te/ 'di la rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de na/ 'daltaste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//
'dod chags kyi mda' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnasaso//
sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub soms dpa'i gnas so// thams cad 'dabang phyug dang dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas den/ 'di ltasta/ byang
chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas den/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dgong ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'dalta ste/ byang chub
sems dpa'i gnas so// srid pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas den/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ khasAms pa rnam pa dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
sems dpa'i gnas so// rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas dan/
pe 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ di lta
sta nga byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
soms dang gnas so// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di la ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// re rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad na de ba nyid kyisa rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pago/ badz+dzahU~M/ lag na

rdo rjes la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo 'di rnam par dag pa'i gnas sgrub pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'dalan cig thos na'ang/ de byang chub kyisaMng po'i bar du shes bya'i sgrib po thams cad
dang chod pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song rnams su rnams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ro//

sdig pa'i ng byang ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur ro// su zhig 'dzin pa ma/ nyin re zhing klog pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de tshe 'di nyid 'chos thams cad/
kyimanyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob pas chos thams cad la dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// chos thams cad la dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ mchog tu dag ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tsho bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lagan rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ng/ rdorje dbyings mtha' dag gi sems dpa'i mchog/ khams gsum po mtha' dag na 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa las rnam par
rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa 'dul bar spyod pa/ don thams cad grub pa/ lag na rdo rjematha' yas pa thams cad pa/ dam tshig chen po pa// rdo rje gsang ba'i
sems can chen po du mas g.yog byas pade/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhan ba tu'adzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te/ thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas

rang gi snying khar gtod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzan cing bde ba chen po de dzadon yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho nad kyi snying po 'di smos so// hU~M/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhinag bag
pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khams gsum thams cad nas rjes su mnyes par byas te bkug nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par/
snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste/ dmatshig gis bcings nas dbang du byas te dngos grub thams cad grub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bde ba chen po'i sAmA
pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas bzhugs so// de nas phyag na rdo rjegasang bachen po'i dam tshig

'byung ba dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa chen po zhes bya ba'i

dkyilaM 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// de nyid dang po dam tshig che// rdo rje ni rlabs zhes bya 'o/ grupa tir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang//
khyams rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// 'od zer 'bar rab 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnams dang// sgo khyud kyi mtshams rnams su//
zla ba phyud la rab gnas pa'i// rin chen kun kyis nye bar mdzes// rtsa mo sna tshogs ba dan ni// dra'il bu mchog btags rlung gis bskyod// me tog chun 'phyang so song spras// phyi yi dkyil
'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang du 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad dang mnyam paru// rdo rje thig gis thig gdab pa// rdo rje 'khor lo zhes byar bshad// de yi dbus su rtsig rigs
pa sangs rgyas sku na gzhag bya ste// 'dzum bcas sgrub mdog can la// rdo rje basnyams pa 'dzin pa mchog/ rdo rje'aphrang sogs kyis spras shing/ snatshogs 'bar ba 'khrigs
pa'i 'od// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par ni// lugs ma'am mngon par 'dus byas ba'o/ rang gi snying po kun bzlas te// de tshod kyil 'khor rtag par bya/ jorjesems sogs semA
dpa rnams// snying po nyid kyis yang dag dgod// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bsdus// gzhag gam yang na pra bar bya// phyogs rnams
kun tu ston pa go/ mdun durdo rjesams dpa' ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbu rgyan can// rdorte mtshonan gsar bar brtson// dmar skya dag tu nges par dged// sangs rgyas kyi ni g.yas
lags su// jorjokAmIkAlanaM// yan lag kun gyis yongs 'khyud pa// rdo dzican gazugs nama'i 'od// rgyab tu rdzu 'dod pan// musran gyin Mrgyal mamaMn thogs/ spro skya'amadog can
ci rigs par// blo dang ldan pas gzhag par bya// g.yon du rdo rjebasAms pa ni// bsnyams pa'i rdo rje ganyis kyisani// jo rdzobasamasaM pa gnyis 'dzin pa// btsema'i gsor dang 'dra ba
dgod// sangs rgyas kyi sa mtshams rnams su/ ma rdog 'asogs kyis mtshan cing// thal mo spyi bor legs 'jog pa'i/ mchod pa chen po gzhag par bya// phyi yi
dkyil 'kher mtshams rnams su// lcamo 'tshogs rnams dgod par bya// sgo yi dbus na thams cadradu// gzugs mtshan la sogs bsdus pa dgod// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
can brgyad ni// rdo rje 'dzani sogs bri bar bya/ jorje 'khor lo thams cad du// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kyis bskor/ phyi ya ngakyil 'khor gaMnas rnams su// 'ded pa'i dbang phyug
bribya ste// mdun du 'jig rten gsum rgyal la// 'ded pa tshangs pa zhi byed mchog/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jugapa ga sogs pa'i tsheg rgyas par 'byung ste/ de la dang po sbyor
du ji skad bshad pa'i tshog 'adis zhugs pa 'asob dbon ni de dzachen po'i slob dpon dang/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon dang/ dam tshag thams cad shes pa dang/ chos thams cad
rig pa dang/ las thams cad sgrub pa dang/ dngos grub thams cad grub pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sams dpas byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ dbang bskurab thams cad thob pa dang/ thams
cad shes pa dang ldan pa dang/ mchod pa thams cad dang/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur ba dang/ 'grub par 'gyurab dang/ 'di'i
thul/rgyu thams cad kyang rang nyid kyis bcings pas 'grub par 'gyur ro// dmatshig thams cad kyi lam la zhes pa dang bcas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing byin gyis brlabs par rtog par
'gyuralo/ ma brlabs par yang thams cad shes par 'gyur// mchod la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyug/ mdor bsdus na tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub kyi mchog ji ltar
mngon par 'dod pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyidadwam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ba'i snying la bzhugs gang
don yod pa'i phyir b.lug cing dam tsheg gis bcings la dbang du byas te rjes su mnyes pas bdag nyid slob dpon du gyuranas 'jug cingakhasgrubasan 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas ri'i phyag
rgyabacings la dang po dzo rje bas bltas te/ sIng po lan cig brjod nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par bya'o// de nas rdo rje rnam par sgog pa'i phyag rgyas bzlas brjod lan cig byas l/
phyag byas nas gos dmarapo khyon la me tog gi 'phrang ba thogs tagadong drisakhyags pa dang/ rdo rje thal mos de dzi'i gar byed cing bskor bsasnying khar me tog thogs te bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o//
zhugs nas kyang rnam par sgrog pa dang/ bskor bas gdud cing sAng po yang bzlos brjod bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te/ de bzhin du 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das
bsgrub par bya'o// de nas btsam ldan 'das derje 'dzin pa bdag nyid ngagyis pas mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing sminam bstod la sku thams cad dam yan ga rnams 'gyod cing
kha dog dmar po ra 'gyur ro/ 'od zer gyi rang bzhin gyi zha' lan sa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// ngo bka'adapag tumed pa'i ng ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid khyed
ba stsol lam dngos grub mchog kyang stsol bar 'gyur re 'o/ de nas brtsams te nyin re zhing dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyisami tshugs pa mi sod par gyur
po dngos grub thams cad dang/ phun sum tshogs pa rngams cad dang/ ye shes thams cad dang/ bya ba thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rjes sgrub par mdzad do// de nas des nga dag par
mchor de rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur zhing dang 'a bo'i rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la mnos la/ sI po bzlas nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba stsal nas rang nyidakyis smo 'aces brjod la rang gis blang bar
[“ ]bya'o de nas skad cig de nyid 'ongangos grub mchog yid la 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang nabadag nyid kyis zla ba drug gis pad la 'ded nga 'i dngos grub mchog grub par gyur zhes bcom ldan
'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i ng de bzhin no// de nas byin gyis bairab pa la sogs pa byas nas yang ji ltar 'dod po gyi tshogs bsgrubs la 'byung

sa bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i gsang ba sgrub pa lan cig bya'o// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ de 'ag+ha khor rdo rje slob dpon gyis dang po rab tu dga' ba'i don+da'i phyag skyabacanges la 'jug/
par bya'o// zhugs nas de bzhin du phyag byas la snying pos ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i tshig dang bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pas phyag rgya chen bos bsgrub par bya'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs
pas mtshan ma de nyid 'byung ste/ shosanas phyag rgya chen po 'di 'grub par gyuralo/ dngos grub thamasacad kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/ zhugos pa 'disani rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid de ba zhin du

'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin du rdo rje blang ba la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje slob ma la tshog rgyas pa 'di bzhin du byas te phyag rgyu bcing ba'ang bslab par bya'o/ gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa
thamasacad l sogs pa'i dmatshig la mos pa de rnams la'ang rangagi lhag pa lhaya'ajug pa 'tshog rgyas pa dang// de bzhin duyadi la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//
de nas lhagazhan dag la dad pa rnams la de bzhin du 'jug pa'i chog rgyas par byas nas de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams zas dang/ robcud dang/ gnas
pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par tshim par byas la/ ltar shes pa'i gar dang/ glu dang/ dgodo ba dang/ bu dang/ bu mo dang/ mdza' bshes dang/ zhadudang/ gnyen
mtshamasadang bcas pas kyang mchod par bya'o// de la 'dar stod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams bde ba chen

[P]po rdo rje dam tshig 'di dang/ 'dod pa 'i bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rdoji'i sbyor bas rdo rjechos kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyus rgyas btab pa yin pa'i phyir ro// dkyil 'khor chen po'o//

de nas rnyog 'byung ste/ zla ba nyanas brtsams nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rab tudagar ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/ ji ltar skyo bar ma gyur par dang por byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas
la rdo rjechog gis brjod ci ji sridi zla ba gcig gi bar de srid du bzlas brjod byas n sngon du bstan pa byas par 'gyur// de nas brtsams nas phyugan rdo rje'i bka'aji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub thamA
cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas ngas ris 'dra ba 'am 'drir gzhug par 'dod na/ dang por rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgyas bris la/ de'i 'og khun ci bder bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad du'ang

a de nyid kyis dang por brtsam par bya ste/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das chog ji lta ba bzhin du bri zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis sems dang ba chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o// de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams

'phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ de bzhin du sngon du bsam pa'i tshul ltar ba zlas na zla ba nyapa'i mtshan mo thog thag ji lta ba bzhin du skyo bar m gyur pas phyag rgya ma bkrol bar bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas
da nang par bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum zhing zla ba dang mnyam pa'i mdangs can ma thong ba stsol cing sangs rgyas nyid dang/ rdo rje 'dzin patid la sogs pa'i dngos grub na chog rnams stsol bar/
'gyur ro// chog gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang/ phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
dang rdo rje 'chang ba shAms cad bri bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin du bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad bgrub bo// ngas 'bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bsems
dngabacas par bris la/ de'i spyan sngar dang po'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas te/ 'bum rdzogs na gan rdo rje nyid thob par 'gyuralo// de bzhin gshegs
pa drang 'be gcig pa bris nas ya ngomather 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'i las rnams dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyurab na/
'di lta ste/ dengazhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba'ana'adod chags la sogs pa bde ba thams cad phul bas so// ro 'dzin pa chen pos khengs par bya ba 'a ni rdo rjesams
rab dnga'akhyud cing 'o byed pas so// byang chub samasadapa' thams cad rjes sumachos par bya la dang ga dumadapa'i bzlasapas so// rdo rje thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba nirang gisnying po/
bzlas bsaso/ gzhan srung pa lha 'ab sogs pa sems can smams cad rjes su chags par bya ba lan thams cad du 'bum bzlas pas so/ bdag srung ba 'an yungs kar/bslus basas/ gag
[P/ ]la lan cig bzlas pas so// gzhan srung bal jo bskor bas so// thams cad srung ba lan yid kyis lan cigago mtshams dang/ phyogs dang/ dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing pa la ni/
lta ba 'am yungs kar la sogs pas so// sems can thams cad rengs par bya ba la dbugs mi 'byin par bzlas pas so// sems can thams cad rlugs par byakha la ni rdo rje tsher bas so// sems
pa/ can thams cad rmongs par bya ba la ni mig btsumanas bzlas pas so// thams cad gsad pa lan dza dzapral bas so// sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo mkha' 'grom 'i phyag rgyus so//
snying thams cad 'dren cing 'byin pa la yid kyis bzlos nges so// sems can thams cad za ba 'an ldang zhing myur bar zlog pas so// thams cad basreg par bya ba la ni de rje 'jigs byed kyi phyug/
rgyas so// nor thams cad dgug pa la ni gsar gyi bzlas pas so// nor dang 'bru thams cad dgug pa la ni di tshornal 'byor ma'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pa wang
rdung ba dang bcas pa'i ka ka la'-iglu len pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ thams cad babigs pa dang rjes su chags par bya ba la ni ngo dzomada'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad chags par bya ba lan phyogs thams
cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes pas so// sdug pa'i 'ching ba brtan par bya ba la nasIng brtan pos nges par 'tshang bas so// ma rungs pa rab tu sgrub pa la ni rdo rje sAn nga sa so// rgyun thams cad
ngabrog pa la mi 'bar bltakhas dbrog pas so// thams cad yid tshim pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur snying khar bzhag pas so// mun pa snang bar bya ba ni ngo tsha kha mdu bltas te bskor bas so// lus bde
bar bya ba lanirang gi mtshan bzlas pas so// gzugs thams cad snang bar bya ba lan jo rdzogazugs kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas so// sgra thams cad thos par bya ba la ni rje rje pa lung gis so// dam
bosnatshogs pa'i phyir ni sa'i dbugs 'byin pa'i glu yas so// zas dang/ skom thams cad dang/ bcud thams cad slob lan rdo rjes spro bar bya'o// dbang pa thams cad la ni mnyam pa'i la mo
dang / sa gol dang/ rgyu'i bzlas pas so// thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni bdag nyid gar byed cing babs pas so// thams cad glu len du gzhug pa la ni rtse bskyod cing bzlas so//
thams cad sgyur gzhug pa la ni ro dzamachuyas so// thams cad babs nas naston pa lan rdo rje 'bobs pas so// gdon thams cad 'o sa thar par bya ba lan ngodzam gu'i phyagargyus so/ gsho
thams cad 'dzin du gzhug pa la ni tshogs kyi bdag po rab zhu dga' ba'i khro bos bzlas pas so// rims thams cad 'dzan du gzhug pa lani rdo ri'i rims kyi gdon gyis so rims thams cad
bsal ba la ni ron+da'i lhabs bsal bas so// dug thams cad sbyar ba la ni doji lta bu'idug gis so// dug thams cad gzhig pa 'a ni rma bya'i chun pos so// dug thams
cad bza'ab 'ani jorje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgyas so// bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad barag pa la ni 'khrugs pas dpag tu med par bzlas pas so// ma 'a 'grom 'gadon thams cad
las grol bar bya ba la ni dzorje chen po gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so// phyag rgya thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'phan pas so// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ gdul
ba lanA ro paT ga'i phyag rgya 'dzan pasaso// ma mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ dam tshig dang/ snying po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang/ rig pa dang/ gsang ba gzhag
pa 'an de khro bo'i yi ge sngaT kyis so// ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mangag gzhug par bya ba lan mamo'a gnas su khros pas bzlas brjod 'bus bya'o// bdud thams cad kyi stob+bA
gzhom pa lan rdo rje drag po'i nyag zhes bya ba'i gad rgyas kyis so// gzhan gyi dpungathams cad gzhom pa lani ngo tshal yongs su bzlas la 'phang ngo// 'thab pa thams cad las thar par bya
! ni rdo lngargyalamarnyan gyi phyag rgyas so// thamasacang bting ba la ni gos la mdud pa bya'o// thams cad grol ba la ni yi ge mu yas so// ro langs dang 'khrul 'kher thams cad gzhag
da lan dzo rdzo'ajigs byed kyis so// lcags sgrog thams cad dgrol ba las rdo rjekhab leng gis so// ma yang dag par bsnyad pa lan jo ma shel gyis so// chumed par chuya nga dag par bskyed
pa lani dong chu shel gyis so// nam mkhalas zas dang/ skom dang/ gosadang/ rgyan thams cad la sogs pa yo byad mang po 'byung ba lananam mkha' la lha zhing bzlas parjod 'bum
bya'o nam mkha' la sangs rgyus kyi sku la sogs pagazugs thams cad ston pa la nisangs rgyas rjes su dran pa nam mkhar lha zhing bzlas pas so// nam mkha' las yi ges 'dasapa dang/
ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byang ba'i lung bslob bden par ston pa la ni yi ge a bris la bkrus brjod 'bum byas pas so// phra sa na thams cad las 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar
byung ba'i dung bsko ba bden por ston pa la ni rdo rje pra sa na thams cad dbab pas so// de bzhin du mig gis bden pa thams cad mthong ba ni rang gi mig la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so// rna bas
blos par bya ba la ni rang gi rna ba la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so// snas bsnam par bya ba la ni sna la bzlas pasaso// lces rang nyid smra ba lan lce la bzlas pas so// lus kyis reg par bya ba la
ni lus la bzlas pas so// yid kyisangashes par bya ba lan yid la 'bum bzlas pas so// rmad du byung ba thams cad bstan pa la sangs rgyas kyi sku bsgrubs pas so// sgyu ma thams cad
bstan pa 'a ni rma bya'i sgro'i chun po la 'bum bzlas so// thams cad g.yogs par bya ba 'apa na zhi ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas pas so// thams cad 'ab lan ldan par bya ba la

ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi ngorjes so// rdzu 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rjerdzu 'phrul gyi phyag rgyas so// mo'aphrul thams cad bstan pa la ni de rdzating nge 'dzin kyi phyag rgyus so// rang gi lus 'dra sog
pa dngos po thams cad las sangs rgyas dang rdo rjesams dpa' la sogs pa rgyu ba dang mi rgyuba'i dngos po thams cad bstan pa ni dze ji rdzu 'phrul rnam par brdzub pas so// lha thams cad dbab pa
la ni rje mi bskor bas so// klu thams cad rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la klu'i rgyal po rimatshor bzlas brjod bya'o// gnod sbyin thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba lan ri bka' bsgo bas so/ 'byung
po thams cad gdul ba la ni lha chen po mnan nas khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o// serab thams cad bzlog pa lani ji rjesrid srung gi phug gi phyag rgyas so// grog 'bab pa thams cad bzlog pa lan de wo
gnyer can gyi phyagargyas so// char bab pa la ni klu'imachor bzlos brjod bya'o char gcad pa la ni dri ma med pa'i chu'i sbyin lugasakhya'o// sprin bskyod pa lan klu bris nas bdugapas bdug pa/
bya'o sprin bshig pa lan jo dzi nam mkha'i spyan gyis so// chu med pa'i phyogs su shin tu bsil ba'i chu'i tshogs rtag tu 'byung ba lan rdo rje klu'i phyag rgyas so// gter thams cad shes par bya
khal ni snod du chu blugs par bya'o// gter thams cad bdo ba lan rdo rje'ajor gyis so// gter thams cad rnyed pa lan jo nor gyis so// rgyal srid thams cad thob par bya ba lan rdo rje dbang bskur
ba'i phyag rgyas so// sa'i bdag por bya ba la ni ro rdzasams dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyus so// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa 'jo rdzo 'khor lo'i phyag rgyus so// phyag rgya thams cad sgrub

pa la na bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni rab tu dga' ba'i rje'i phyag rgyas so// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la ni de bsnyems pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag

rgyas so// ma grub pa thams cad grub par ston pa la ni rdo rje grub pa'i phyag rgyas so// rig pa'i dzin pa thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas so// rdo rje thams cad sgrib pa lo ni rdo

thams cad kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas so// byang chub sems dpothams cad sgrub pa lan thugs kyi rdo rjes so// jo tsho'adzan pa nyid sgrub pa la ni rdo rjesems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos so// sangs rgyas nyid/

sgrub pa lanango ye shes kyi phyag rgyas so// bde ba chen po rdo don yod pa'i dam tshig thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ dmatshagachen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje zhe sa bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po
de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snanga mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa zhes bya
! @#// ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsungs te/ rdo rjesra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rdzomanyam pa nyid kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po// don gcig pa da kyi

phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pan byang chub chen po'o// ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na byong chub chen po'o/ thams

cad la rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ lagan rdo rjegang ba la chos mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang/ 'dzan pa

dang klog pa dang/ sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad la spyod kyang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du n gnas ong tha mas cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro// de nas de skad ces bka' stsalanas/
bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzan po don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas tachos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi sAng po 'di gsungs so// sa de nas 'di
gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus par mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rjes mas dang 'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis khugs/
pa dang/ soms dang ba chen po brgyad phyi'i da kyil 'khor du phyogs brgyad du bzhad pa chen pos bzhad cing bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzadi deba'i

gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i da kyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'ing de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen po
dkyil 'khor chen po 'digasungs so// rdo rje sams dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la/ de'i dbus su thig gsum gyi 'khor lo bris nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi thad kar snatshogs par rab tu gnas pa'i de'i 'khor lo 'de ba la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa chen po sa' sogs pa las byas pa gzhagago/ de'i phyogs thams cad
dus la sogs pa las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad gzhag gam sri bar bya'o// de nas tshon gyis thig le rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo labazhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa brab r bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dang/ mtshams rnams su byang chub sems dpa' brgyad ji lta ba bzhin gzhag nas bum pa gang babazhi sgo rnams su
dgod par bya'o// byang chub kyi mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste/ shar nas brtsams te ne'ugasang sa dang bcas pa'i dum bu dang/ dro drug gis yongs su gang zhing dbyig dang/ gsur dang/
nipo che dang/ gos la sogs pas lo ngas su bkang ba'i snod dang/ 'jam zhing shin tubade ba'i stanadang/ sangs rgyas kyis gzugs dgid do// de nas ri bzhin du gos gyen la de bzhin gsheg
pazams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas zhugs na/ bdag nyid slob dpon med par yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par
'gyur ro// de nas brtsams tede bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa dang/ dngos grub thamasacad mi tshugs pa dang/ mi sod pa dang/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur
ngo denas slobama'ang de bzhin du gzhugago/ zhugs nas rdo rje rtse ltapa byin la joming gis dbang bskur ba'ang sbyin par bya'o// de nas dmatshig 'di deg byakhar bsgobar bya'o// sems can kun la
phan phyir dang/ bstan pa thams cad srung ba'i phyir// rnam par mi rtog sbyor ba yis// ci bde ba ni thams cad kyis/ zhes bya'o// de nas tshanam thazhi'abyorapa ji ltabs snya' ba ji ltababazhin
du sbyin par bya'o// dmatshig chen po 'od kyi 'khor ro// de nas sgrubapanangos khatsemaldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'thum pa dang bcasang nga de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi
phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin par bya'o// gzhan thams cad ni dematshig chen po'i dkyil 'kher gyi tshul du byon/ de nas de bzhin du sems dpa' mchog sgrub pa dang/ dngos grub mchog rnams
kyang de bzhin no// gzhan yang ras la bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo gcig pu bris te/ 'dimadun du rdo tshig gis bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas mtshan
mo thog thag bab+hAsan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob cing dngos grub thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'gyural/ de nas de bzhin gshegs bar 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs pas kyang/
dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis las rnams 'grub par 'khyur/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa la ji/ da pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba thams
cad phul bas so// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa ni bdag phul bas so// dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la name tog la sogs pa la bzlas pas so//
sems can thams cad mchod pa lani thams cad la byams pa'i bzlas pas so// chos thams cad bsdub ri'os rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pachog bzhi po gdonapas so// bdud thams cad
'dul ba lan brtan zhing des pa'i bzlas pas so// de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rgyan thams cad dbul zhing rang nyid btsas pas so// chos nyid thams cad

thob pa 'a na rdo rje pad+ma la lta bas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyidi dngos grub thob pa la rdo rje las kyi mchog gis so// sangs rgyas nyid rab tu thob pa lan rdo rje yashes kyi
khu tshur gyi de kho na nyid kyiphyag rgya chen pos so// bde ba chen po de don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'irgyal pochen po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de khon nyid kyi rdodza dam tshig
ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so///denas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs phashAkya thub pas kyang yang chos thams cad kyi

mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa sgrub pa 'di gsungs te/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi
spros pa med pa nyid kyis gtamug gi spros pa med pa nyidid// gtumugagi sbos po yod pa nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lag na rdo rjegang 'a' shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang/ 'dzan pa dang/ klog pa dang/ sgom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams/
gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
denas bcom ldan 'das la gan rdo chos nyid de'i don rgyacher ston cing/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyabacings la/ khreganyer dang bcas
shing smin ma bteg ste 'bar bar blta la pad+ma'i gdeng khro zhingadagod de/ mchab gatsags nas rkang pa g.yas pa bskum pa'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas/ rdo rje hU~Mzhes bya ba'i sing po 'di gsung
so hU~M/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig Nen gsum po thamasacad kyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams yang dag par bkug ste lhungabar mdzad nas dkyil
'khor du becu gnas rnam par rgyal bar mdzad/ bcings te dbang du byas nas btul zhing rjes su btul te bslangs nas yang dam tshig gis bcings nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po chung
ma dang bcas pa zhabasaganyisasuphab nas gzhan pa mdzad do// de nas de rnams kyis 'jig chen gsum po thams cad du sgrachen po bsgrugs te/ kye rdorje 'chang chen po yongs su skyob par mdzod cig/ bdag
cag rnams ma gzir cig/ 'dar khyod la bdag cag skyabs su mchigo/ dam tshig dang bka' bsgo ba'ang bsgrub par bgyi'o/ mtsho thams cad kyang btul zhing dam la btags nas rakyil 'khor/
yang rnam par bashig ste/ phyag rgya thams cad dang/ dam tshig kyang dral zhing rnam par bashig pa dang/ gdon thamecad kyang bzlog cing nad thams cad dang/ rims thams cad dang/ gnod pa dang/
dug dang/ ngan 'gro rnams dral cing rnam par bashigs pas sgra chen po sgrogs gi 'jigs pachen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i tshog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyid la skyabs su song ngo// bcom ldan

'das kyis kyang zhal rnam pa rab zhad pas de rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug ste/ dmatshog gis bcings nas rdo rje chen gyis dbang bskur nas rang gi mtshan ma rnams rdo rjes byin gyis khorlabs te rdo rjemang
ha @#// gis dbang bskur ba'ang rjes su stsal nas sems can ma lus pa'i don du phyi'i rjerdzo'i rigs su rab zhugazhag go/ de nas rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rdzolas phyag na rdo rjadang 'dra pa'i dngos po'i
bdag nyid can/kha dog dang/ rgyan dang/ mtshon cha rnamapa sna tshogs pa bsnams pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje'i mche ba gtsags pa/ tshems kyis sgros gnon pa/ sbyin m mi bzad cing khro gnyerab sAr
ba spyan dang/ dbu skadang/ agatsom lar pa/ zhal 'jigs pa// rdo lcags kyudang/ zhags pa dang/ mchon mda' dang/ dbyig pa dang/ ral gri dang/ kha klog dang/ gri rings
dwang mukri phyag na bsnams pa/ khro bon po daM mdzad las phyung sta/ bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rje dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so// lha la sogs pa de rnams kyang rang
gi dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis brlabs nas phyi'i dokyil 'khor dugazhag go/ gdon la sogs pa de dgakyang dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol na gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa ba thams cad thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyi khro bo'i ri zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khams gsum po mtha' dag las rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba/
dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad byab/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes byas// 'dul bachen po 'dul byed pa'o// dkyil 'khor
ba/ dang bo'i sbyor ba yis// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang gi 'khor lo/ dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dag dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su khro bo che// phyag na rdo rje gzhug par bya// sas/
rgyus 'phrul sogs pas spras// ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// zhalanicung zad ma ba gtsigs// khros bcas bzhad pa'i zhalamanga' ba/ g.yon brkyab yas legs bzhugs//
ngo tshe hUMmadzod bsdus pa 'o// g.yon gyi zhabs kyis 'gasamanan pa// de yi byab dbang phyaganye// g.yas na dka' phrub bzlog pa yi// numa'icung du btu'adzeg/ 'bar 'phrang 'khrigs
pa'i 'od ldan pa// sa sogs bcas pa'i khams rnams kyi// khro bo kun zhugazhag par gyo// 'bar 'phreng 'khrigs pa'i bod ldan pa/ 'khor do yang mkhas pa yis// 'bar 'phreng
'khrigs pa'i 'od can bri// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// phyi yi dkyil 'khoratshogs rnams so// khro bo'amtshan makhazhi pon// gzhu dngamada' dngural gri dang/ 'khor lo ji bzhin
rtse gsum sgreng// sgo rnams kun tu bri bar bya// phyi rol gnas pa'i gdon rnams kyi// snachogs gtor mas bkang ba dang// ba dan sngon po dril btags pa'i ng// rtse mo kha dog sna tshogs
ba'o denas 'dir 'jug pa ni yan lag thams cad ras sngon po zung gis g.yogs shing khros pas rdo rjidamatshigagi phyag rgya dang bcas par 'dzani par gyurapas zhugs na/ bcom ldan
'das kyis rdo rje rigs kyi slob dpon du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// de nas brtsams te sdig pa las rnam par grol zhing mi sod pa dang/ mitshugs pa dang/ mu stegs thams
cad latshar gcod pa dang/ phan 'degs nus shing thams cad las rgyal ba dang/ dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas slobam de bzhin du bcug la snying po byin te dkyil 'khor/

thams cad du'ang bya'o/ de nas rdo rje rnon po rtsa bzhi pa 'bar ba byin la rdo rjeming gidabang bskur bas drab ng bskur nas/ rdzordzobartul zhugs sbyin par bya// 'di ni gdug pa 'dul byed pa'i// phyag
na rdo rjesdodza ste// ma rungs ams cad 'dul ba la// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad// de nas de bzhin du byago/ rdo rje'i dkyilaM 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa ni sa la bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i
dbang phyug byas la/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyang sems dpa' chen po thams cad bya'o/ phyogs thams cad du ni lha lasogs pa dngam mo rnamos khri bar ng sa/ de nas sgrub pa chen
po la 'dod bzhin te/ de bzhin du dngos grub mchog rnams la ni las la bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas/ 'omadun dulag pa gnyis kyis phyag rgyabacings te bzlas brjodi 'bum bya'o/
nga nas yi ge hUMtsam gyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad dang/ de bzhin du thams cad rjes su chags
par yang bya ba dang/ dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ ngagrol ba dang/ dbang dubya ba dang/ lkugs par bya ba dang/ rengs par bya ba dang/ rmongs par bya ba dang/ gnyid med
par bya ba dang/ rgyas gdab pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ brdag pa dang/ gsad pa dang/ gso bar bya ba la sogs pa'i ng lan cig bzlas pas byed par 'gyur// thams cad gsad pa la rdo
khro bo mthar byed kyi sa so// thams cad rgyas gdab pa lan khro bo'i lta ba'i bzlas pas so// thams cad gzhig pa na rdo rje khros pas gzhig par bya'o// thams cad dnges par gnon pa la ni ngo dza
dang khros pas phyogs der brjeg bar bya'o/ gdon thams cad dbug pa la ni rdo rje phra mo 'bigs byed kyis so// thams cad kyi snying 'byin pa na khros pa'i yid kyis dbyung bar bya'o// gdug pa
thams cad tshar gcad pa lan khros pas rdo rjebaskor bar khya'o/ gdug cing khros pa dag pa lan khros pas lcags phyi'i sbyin sreg gis so// bdud thams cad brlag pa la ni ring gi sa bon kyi sbyin sreg

gis so// gnod sbyin thams cad bsladapa la ni ha ha zhes dgod cing bzlas pas so// klu thams cad gdon pa la ni rje sa la rdebacing bzlas pas so// lha rnams ltung bar bya ba la ni lha mo tshe tsho ltung byed
kyis so/ dalha'i bdag po thams cad rab ng du bya ba dang/ 'dul ba dang/ bstan pa dang de gsod pa dang/ dul bar bya ba la ni ngo rje srid pa gsum po gdul bar byed pas so// rnam thos sras
rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni rnam thos srasamanan nas khros pas bzusabarjod bya'o// lus nganapomanan nas dpal dbrog pa la ni rdo rje skyes bus so// 'dod pa'i lha dbang du
bya ba ni 'dod pa lha'i mdun du khros pas bas brjod bya'o/ tshangs pa lhung bar bya ba la ni rdo rjerab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgyas so// khyab 'jugagazhigapa la ni jorje 'khor 'dral bas so// dbang
phyag chen po gdul ba 'a ni jo shA'adra bas so// ma mo thams cad gsad po lan rdzobro tshogs kyi srin mos so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang/ dam tshig dang/ chos dang/
gesang ba'i dngos grub rnam par gtor zhing rnam par 'jig pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gdug pa'i dam tshig 'jigs par byed ng saso// ridang/ shing dang/ khyim dang/ gtsug 'ag khang dang/ grong khyer
dang mchod rten dang/ lhab khang ba dang/ skyes ba dang/ bud med dang/ glang po dang bcas pa ri la sogs pa thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje khro blta bas mig la rag pasaso// ltung ba thams cad
ba bsang ba lan derdzakhro bobasang bas so// thams cad spong ba lan rdo rje khros pa'i rnal 'byor mas so// thams cad dbrog pa ni rdzakhro bo'i khu tshur dang dbrog pas so// 'jigs po thams cad bsad/
ba lan rje khro bo'i lta bas so// dpung thams cad gsad pa na ro bro bo'aganod sbyin mos so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang/ gzhon pa dang/ rmongs par bya ba dang/ long bar bya ba
dang rgyas gdab pa dang/ gsad pa lani rdo rje khro bem rungs pa'i srin mos so// rgyal po la sogs pa ma chen po thams cad gsad pa lan dong ka'i shing la rang gi khrag gis spyin sreg byas pas so////
lha thams cad gzhig pa ni thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan phur khus btab pasaso// lha'i bdag po thams cad sreg pa la ni lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi yam shing gis so// rang gi khrag
gi rgyun 'bab pas sa thams cad nub par bya ba lani rdo rje khro bo sa 'og gi phyag rgyus so// khams gsum thams cad gsad pa la ni ro 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas so// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las
rnam par rgyalagalan 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog gi rdordzag gro bos so// khams gsum thams cad dbab pa dang/ dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ sa
bar gnon pa lan rjesams dpa'i khro bo'i phyag rgyas so// khams gsum po thams cad rjes su chags pa bya ba dang/ dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ rgyus gdab pa dang/
dbang du bya ba dang/ gnon par bya bdang/ sgrub pa lan bde ba chen po'i ro dza dmatshog gi khro bos so/ bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ khams gsum
rnam par rgyal pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de'i da dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas yang chos thams
cad kyimanyam pa nyid spyanuras gzigs dbang phyug gi yi shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs te/ 'ded chags thams cad rnam
bopar dag pa nyid kyis kyang 'jig rtenan zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// drim thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyis 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rtenan sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyura'o// shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rtenana shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa rnam
par dag par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje gang la nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ sgom pa de 'dod chags dang dris thams cad kyi nang na 'dug
kyang pad+mo lta bur 'dod chagasakyinyis pa rnams dang/ drim rnams dang/ globur gyi nyon mongasapa rnams kyis gos rar mi 'gyur te/ myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tum
pa par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur do/ n gnas byang chub sems dang lus ms dang 'chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ren gyi gnas 'di nyid yang rgya chen por ston cing bzhin rab tu'adzum dmul
pad+ma'i 'dabam kha 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i drims mi shes pa la lta zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir pad+ma'i gzugs sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ d+hAhi de nas/
ba 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis pad+machen po las de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba'i ngangs mtshan ma'i gzugs can sa pa byung nas/ bcom
'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rim pa dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos thams cad la gzigs
pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyag g.yishes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyilo 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/
phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba'i nang du gnyis pa ni zur bzhi pa las de bzhin du sgo dang mtshamasu bcas pa bri'o// de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul du thig pa'i thog btab pa latshon mar
pos pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri bar bya'o// de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dgod par bya'o/ de'imadun du bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chen po chags po sku mdog dmar po pad+ma'i gzugs
'dzin pa/ pad+machen po dang/ mda' dang/ gzhubasnams pa/ g.yas su bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chen po'i gtum po dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dzan pa gzhag par bya'o/
rgyab tu pad+ma chen po khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog nag po gzhag par bya'o// g.yon du pad+ma chen pom mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa sku mngog dkar po gzhag par
@#// bya'o g.yas kyi mtshams su par chen pos 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// mtshoms gnyis par pad+ma chen po mchod lha'i gzugs 'dzin ba gzhug par byag/ gsum
bar pad+machen po nyima'i gzugs can gzhag par bya'o// bzhi par pad+machen po rlung gi gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su/ ba hi hUM d+hi lhamo
ba'igazhag par bya ste/ thams cad kyang g.yas na rang gi mtshan ma'adzan pa/ g.yonapa bad+ma'adzan ngar pasU/ sgo rnams sun 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gdaMmug dang/ mya ngan/
las 'dus pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi gzugs dang/ sprul gyi gzugs dang/ phag gi gzugs dang/ pad+ma'igazugs bya'o// de nas gos dkar po
bgos te/ gos dkar pos gdong g.yogasa' pad+ma chen po'i phyag rgya chen po tshe dog dang bcas par bcings te zhugs la me tog dor bar bya ste/ gang dubabs pa de des bsgrub par bya'o//
dran s pad+ma blangs la pad+ma mang gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la 'di skad ces brjod par bya zhing pad+ma'i 'dab ma blta bar bya ste/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po da tshon gyi gso pas mi gos
te[：]dam tsanangan dag pa ltar/ 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs de bzhin// de ltar chos rnams bsgoms na ni// blo ldan nyon mongs bcas gyur kyang/ nyon mongs kun la sa rnam grol nas/
myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug ces mtshan btags so// de nas brtsams te bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad shin tu yongs su dgapa dang/ so shing dngos grub thams cad byang chub kyi snying po' bor du

rjes su myong bar 'gyur zhing myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur to/ slob ma gzhug pa'i chog rgyas pa'i ng de bzhin no// ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor lo// sgrub pa lanodazhin du sras kyi ri yogazhi//
kyis dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang thams cadirjes su chags par bya ba la ni pang la lan stong bzlas te sbyin par bya'o/ thams cad gsad pa lan
pad+ma chen po'i khro bo'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad rmongs par byatho la ni pad+machen po phag gis so// nyonamos pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba lan pa rgya chen po rnam par gzigs
pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so// sa thams cad kyi bdag por bya ba lani sa la skyil mo krung bcas pas bzlas brjod 'thum byas nas mthar mtshan mo thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o/ chu thams
cad dbab pa lan klu bris nas de'i steng du 'dug nas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o// thams cad snang bar bya ba la nimun par nyi ma chen po'i 'od kyis so// rlung thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang//
bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba bzhibang chen porlung gi chog gis go/ bde ba chen po rdo rjedun yod pa'i dam tshig gi sa pa rgyal bon po las/ nyon mongs thams cad rnam
par dag pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so///denas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dba'apos yang de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba las byung ba ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sprinapan khams gsum thams cad kyi
rgyald thob par 'gyulo/ nor sbyin pa ni ri ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos sbyin pa'i ris thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid 'grolo par gyur ro// zang zing sbyin pa'i lus
dang rig dang/ sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying bo bzhin btu'adzus pa dang bcas te rang gomago la rdo rje

rin po chos dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng ba 'ching zhing don yod pa 'od nyidi rgya cher ston to/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dmatshagasan po che zhes bya ba'i sAng po 'di ts+tshis so// hU~M/ de mas 'di gsungs
pa tsam gyisakhacom ldan 'das kyi rin po che de la thams cad dbang bskur ba la sogs pa yo byad dang gter thams cad byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis byang chung
ga “]mas dpa'i gzugs nyid kyis zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po dbang bsar ba thams cad kyi rin po che rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
ngo sam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nor bu ni poche'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khoraM bad gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du byas pa'i
nang du yin bo che zur brgyad pa// rin po che'i ka ba brgyud ' gnas nga/ dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul las srin po che lcag mas yongs su bskor ba rdo rje rin po che'ing ba cog dang/
ma rtog gi 'phreng ba dang/ ba dan dang/ gdugs dang rdzayab kyis nye bar mdzes par bya'o// de'i dbus su btsem na'angs rtagi khri la bzhugs pa dbang bskur ba'i 'phrang ba rang/
'du 'ching bar mdzad cing/ zhala rnam par bzhi d cing chad kyi mdogacan gazhag par bya'o/ de'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskurakha'i ra po
chazhes bya ba'i rdo rje drin 'o tsed nga ma'adzan pa gzhag bar bya'o/ g.yas su rin po che chen po'i nor sbyin bdabyig gi gter 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// rgyab tu chos chen po ni rin po che'i
glegs bam 'dzan pa gzhag par bya'o/ g.yon du rin po che chen po romyong ba thas rang skom thams cad 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o mtshams rnams su mchod pa sil mo rnams rin poche'o
ba// gdugs dang/ rgyalatshan dang/ dang/ srog shing rnams 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// phyi rol gyi mtshams su bum pa gang ba rnams so// sgo rnams su dbang bsku
[° ]b.lasogs pa'i chanam rnams gzhag bar bya'o// bya rol tunaMgadugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba danadang/ blare rnams kyis kun tu khyab par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du rdo rjen
chen gyi phyag rgya 'dzan pas zhugs nas/ de nas brtsams tanor thams cad 'grub pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas zhugs nas kyang dbang bskur ba'i phreng
babacings te rin po che blangs nas rin po che ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la sbyin pa thams cad phulanas slar dbyung bar bya// slob ma gzhug pa'i chog rgyas pa'i ng de bzhin no// rdo rje
in po che 'dakyil 'khor lo/ sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas ma bsgrubs par dbang bskur bo thams cad 'thob pa lani rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng bas
sa so bsam pa thams cad yongasaM su rdzogs pa lan nyin rer zhing zhim 'charakar bzlas brjod dpog tu med pa byas pos so// chos thamasacad kyi don shes pa la ni drim med pa'i nam mkha'
la blta zhing bzlas brjod bya'o// zas dang skom thams cad la sogs pa dang/ de thams cad thob par bya ba la ni nam mkha' las yid la 'dod pa bzhin du nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das
kyibazus bang stong byas pas so// shin tu mthon po thob par bab la ni gdugs bzung nas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o// rnam par rgyal pachen po thob pa na rin chen rgyal mtshan chog
gis so// grags pa dang/ napachen po mchog drang mang thob par bya ba 'di nyin r zhing kha thams cad du bltas nas bzlas pa bya// bdag pochen po thob palan rin po che'i srog shing gi phyag
rgyas so// bde ba chen po rdo rjeden yod pa'i mtshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi don po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtogaba'irgyal pochen bo rdzogs sa lam
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thob pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzanang/ de bzhinagshegs
ba rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa rdo zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni ji bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ga rgya yongs su badzas panachos thamasacad
thob par gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yosaMsu 'dzanipa na ting nge 'dzan thams cad thob par gyu ra'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
byabya/ phyag rgya yongs su'adzanipa lus dang/ ga dang/ sems thams cad rdorjen rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// su la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
'di nyan pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ lung 'bog pa dang/ sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang/ shes pa thams cad dang/ dgos pa
thams cad dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo 'di ngos grub dam pa thob nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar
'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen pod rje khu tshur dmatshigachen po'i do rdzi'i phyog rgya yongs su 'dzin pas don gyi gnas 'di rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing
rdo sra zhing rdo rjesra ba'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// a de nas 'di gsungu pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs
pasems can thams cad bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya thams cad kyis rdo rjesams rab nyid du de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dngos grub mchog gi rgyus rgyas gdab
bo bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis yang sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje thams cad las phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgyathams cad kyi dmatshig soms dang 'phyon gnas kyang
ba dang po'idakyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khu tshur de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi yeshes kyi phyag rgya'i rong zhes bya ba/

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyag rgya thams cad kyi rdo rjedamatshig ces bya ba 'di la 'khor chen po 'dagosungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang po'i sbyor bas bris lanang du rdo rje'i thig gis
'khor lo bri'o/ de bzhin du de'idabus su dkyil 'khor brgyad par thig btab la/ dbus su'acom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur ga gnyis dumatshog gi phyag rgyabatsungos pa zhal rnam par bzhad pa gzhag
go/ degyi mdun du rdo rje sku'i mchog ces bya ba rdo rje basAms par 'dzin pa go/ g.yas su rdo rje lcags zhes bya ba rdo rje lce mchog 'dzin pa'o/ rgyab tuting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ngo

mkhas ba pa la sa 'dzin pa'o// gauyon du rdo rje rdo rje zhes bya babasems par 'dzin pa'o// shar lho'i mtshams su phyag rgya'i khu tshur zhes bya ba dang/ gnyis pa lan nor gyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang/
gsum pa lan chos kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang/ bzhi pa lanabs kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang/ rang gi phyag rgyadang phyagamtshan yang 'dzanapar bya'o/ sgo rnams sunajo bsoms ma la sogs

pa 'i phyag rgyan+d+ri lhamo rnams bro bar bya'o// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung la rang nyid zhugs nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi slob dpon du bgyuralo/ de nas brtsams te dngos grub thams cad
don yod par 'thob par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dbang phyug tuphun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur bar mngon par rdzogs par
po'atshang rkyabar 'gyur ro// der zhugs nas phyag rgyabacing ba bcom ldan 'das la bslab par bya zhing do ming gi dbang bskur bas bskur 'daskad brjod par bya'o/ sku gsung thugs kyi ro
gzugs brnyan lta bur sbyor ba yis// phyag ku zhes bya bar bsgrags// dam tshig dngos grub kun ster ba// slob ma gzhug pa 'ang de bzhizho/ phyag thams cad kyi
dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa dngo dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas ma bsgrubasapa'i las rnams M kyang de bzhin no// phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba sgrub pa ni snying khar rdo rje'i luchu
gyis so// phyag rgya thamaso cung sgrub pa la ni ngo dzachen ngo 'i khu tshur gyis so// dmatshig thams cad sgrub pa la rdo rje 'ded pa'i khu tshur gyis so// sems ni rjes su chags par bya ba la ni
pa chags pa chen po 'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad dbang du bya ba lan jo ji bzhad pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad bcing pa la ni rdo rje basngags pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ thams cad bsngag

par bya ba lani rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi khu tshurakyis so// thamasacad lkugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje zhal zhal gyi khu tshur gyis so// thams cad 'tshir ba la ni ngo ma bsdam pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams/
wa/ cad gsad pa lan rdo rje khro bo'i khutshu gyis so// thams cad bzang ba ni de tsho gnod sbyin gyi khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gzhig pa la ni dzi rdza nges par 'chi ba 'khu tshur gyis so//
thams cad bral ba lan po rje dral kha'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad dbab pa la ni do rdzo'abebs pa pu tshur gyis so// thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi khu tshur gyis so//
thams cad snar gzhug pa la ni jirdzobardung ba'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni de dmigs pa'i khu tshur gyis go/ gdan gyi dbung thams cad skugs pa dang/ 'phyi bo

bya ba la ni rin po'i phyira'i khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba lan dodza thar pa'i khu tshur gyis so// rdo rjemakha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgyagazhig pa la ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi

rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyang bye ba 'a ni hUM mdzad kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa lan di rje khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad rdo rje
bya ba la ni rje rje khu tshur gyis so// thams cad rgyas gdab pa lani de dzim mo'akhu tshur gyis so// thams cad phyi mar bya ba lan jo rdzobazang po'i khu tshur kyis so// thams cad rnam nga ra gzhig
pa la ni rdo rje gadug pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gzhig pa dang rnam par gzhom pa lan dbang po'i de rje khu tshur gyis so// chu'i nang du gnas shing chags pa 'a ni rdo rje ganon po lu tshur
@#// gyis so// gzugs mang bor ston pa lan rdzong sna tshogs pa lnga'i khu tshur gyis so// mi snang ba'i dngos grub mi snang ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// rgyu ba dang rgyu
ba'i dngos po rnams 'byung ba la ni rodzamama'i khu tshur gyis so/ nam mkha' la 'gropa'i de ngos grub lan do rdzobasdams pa'i khu tshur gyi sa go/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub la
la gri khu tshur gyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i dngos grub lan ri rdzolas kyi khu tshur gyis so// thams cad mkhyenang grub pa la rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis so//

nor thams cad kyi dngos grub lan re rje nor gyi khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po de ni rdo rje phyag rgya'i khu tshur gyis so// 'a sa thams cad kyi dngos grung la ni rdo rje mas cad kyi khu
tshur kyis so// dkyil 'khor thams rtsad grub pa la ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khu tshur gyis so// rang nyid 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar gyi dngos grub rnams ston pa la ni de tshe lcags kya
pa mchog gi khu tshurdza gyis so// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'ang 'ani rdo rjegasAms pa'i khu tshur gyis so// sangs rgyas nyid bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so/ 'deb chin
bo'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rnyog rgyal po chen po las/ phyag rgyu thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//
'a ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngobo 'di med pa'i tshul gyis/
chos thams cad stong pa// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di rgya cher ston zhing bzhin 'dzum bzhin du ral gri des de nga zhin
gshegs pa thams cad la bdebs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i chog 'di gsungs so// a donas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus/
pa mdzad nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa chos thams cad ngo bodi med pas sngos pa med pa'il gri zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas/ 'khor lo ltar yige bso ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji ltaba'i nang du 'khor lo bris pa/ a la sogs pa'i ya gi'i 'phreng ba go rim bzhin
du bri bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul gyis thig btab la/ de'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i cha lugs 'chang zhing 'dzul ba dang bcas pa nam mkha'i mdog
can phyagaba'i dang/ la gris de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad [”]la 'debs par gzhag par bya'o/ demadunal sogs par deng zhin gshegs pa'+ris rnams/
gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i mtshams rnams su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi lung ji ltar thob pa bzhin du gzhag par bya'o// sgo rnams su mtshan ma bzhi gnas par bya'o/ 'di ltasti/ ral
gridang mdung dang/ ngapazed dang/ glegs bam rnams so// de nas ral grid/ glegasakham gyi phyag rgya de bzhin du chos kyi slob dpon du byin gyis brlab/ de nas ral griblangs te ral/
gri'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur 'chos bshad par byaste/ ral gri 'di'i rtag zung la// shes rab tshulanadakar smra zhing/ nam mkha' sangs rgyas sbyor ba yis// 'dengasana myur du
'grub par gyur// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung phyir dang/ sems can mang po srung ba'i byis// 'dis bsad sdig par mi 'gyur zhing// bsod nams dag kyang thob par 'gyur// slob rnamA

la'ang de bzhin to// shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa de ngas su rdzogs pa'i dngos grub rnams kyis myur du blunazhed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyal rgyur ro//
chos kyi rakyil 'khor ro// slab pa'i ng de bzhono/ ma bsgrubs par yang de bzhin du lasa rnams 'grub par 'gyurab stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa la ni thams cad nam mkha' bsgoms pas
0/ go mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i ting nge dzin bsgoms pas so// smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa ni smon pa med pa bsgoms pas so// rang
bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'ichos kyi ye shes 'thob pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba basgoms pas so// nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i ngs bsgoms pas so// yi ge thamA
cad kyi nges pa'i chog gi ye shes la ni spros bzhed pa'i ye shes bsgoms pas so// gnas thams cad du yi ges chos kyi bya ba mthong ba la ni sa la sogs pa'i ya gi lo'i za'ade bsgoms pas so//

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub pa thob pa ni dordzural gri'i phyag rgyas so// bde ba chen po don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen bolas/ 'khor lo chen bo ltar yi ge bskor ba'i
dmachig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so////denas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i nang du 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/
ma nga 'khor tshon po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa'i tshul 'di'i shad do/ sdomanyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor la 'jug par gyur/
po[·]don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang chen po'i 'khoral 'jug par 'gyuralo chos thams cad kyi mnyam nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'ichos kyi 'khor
lala'ajug par 'gyurano/ thamasacad kyi mnyam ba nyid la 'jug pa'i 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpasems bskyed ma thag

tuchos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos nyid kyi don 'di rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzu gnas / rdo rje 'khor lo bskor zhing rdo rdzo 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa'i dmatshog ces bya ba'ising po 'di snas
so g+haM de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po can khams gsum du gtogs pa bsems can thams cad dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs nas/
bcom ldan M 'das kyi phyugs las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnams nges par byung nasad kyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro bo 'khor 'bro thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad du'ajug pa'i
dam tshig ces bya ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ nang gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'khor lo bris la/ dbus su rdo rje'i 'khor lo
bskor ba gzhag par bya'o// phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rnam pa thamasacad dudakyil 'khor dang po'i tshul du gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i mtshams rnams su rdo rje'i
ta7/ rags kyi dkyil 'khor bzhi bri bar byago/ sgo rnams su mtshan makhazhi gzhag par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ rdo rjesams dpa'i sku dang/ rdorje khro bo sku dang/ spyanas gzigs dbang phyug gi
sku dang/ nam mkha'i snying po'i sku rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas nyid dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'ad 'grub par 'gyur po
de nas 'khor le blangs la 'khor lo'i mang gsadabang bskur ba nagasang ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi thog btab pa'i gos rnams su 'jug bar bya'o// slob ma gzhug pa'i ng de bzhin ngo 'khor
lo'akyil 'khor// sgrub pa'i ng de bzhin no// ma bslabs par yang dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa las 'khor las gtararang gi kharab tsug lagazhagapar bya'o// dkyi
'khobachen por 'jugapa la'i dri 'khor latshonaposaso/ de bzhin du phyag rgya 'dakyila 'khor du 'jug pa lan de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyus so/ de bzhin du
dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa lan mtshig chen po'i 'khor los so// las kyidakyilawaMkhor du 'jug pa na rdo rje thams cad kyi 'khor los so/ de bzhin du rjes su chags
par bya ba dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ don thob pa dang/ rgyas gdab pa dang/ bcad pa dang/ 'jug pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ gdug pa 'dul las rnams la ni sems dpa' bo
pargyad kyi phyag rgyagayonan 'khor lo dang bcas pa rnams kyis so// bde bachen po'adzi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal bo po las/ dkyil 'khor thams cad/
kyi dordzo'i dam tshig ces byab rtog pa'irgyal po chen po rdzogs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa thams cad kyi chog rgyus nga/
snod kyisamachod pa thamasacad kyi mchogaces bya'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nyidan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lamachod pa'i rtog rgyas
pa'o sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i chog rgyas pa// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pani de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad la mchod pa'i chog rgyas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa yi ger dri ba dang/ yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ rjod pa dang/ ston pa dang/ nyan pa dang//
sems pa dang/ sgom pa dang/ mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i tshog rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dang bsems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de
nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dim tshig ces bya ba'i snying bo 'di smras so// dau0f00 de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' thams cad las mdo
pathams cad kyi chog rgyas pa nam mkha'i khams ma lus par spros par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das mam/khamadzod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor chen po 'di tshul dubazhugs
so de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzodamachod pa thams cad kyi chog rgyas par byin gyisarlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo'i mchod pa mchog don yod
pa'idamatshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// spyi dkyil 'khor ji ltakha de bzhin du nang du rin po che'i ka ba brgyad byas la/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das mtshon sna tshogs 'dzin pa//
zhal 'dzumapa/ sku dang yan lag zla ba'i mdog la sogs pa'i kha dog lnga pa'i mdog can gzhag par bya'o// de'i phyogs thams cad du dam tshag soms dpa' rnams gzhag par bya// 'di lha
ste phyag na rdo rje dang/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po/ byang chub kyis sa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ phyag skyayongs su 'a dzin pa dang/
stong pa nyid smra ba dang/ dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang/ mchod pa thams cad dang/ sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa nikAnamed pa'i mchod pa'i chog rgyas pa phyag na 'dzan pa'i tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin
dugazhag go/ phyi'i mtshamasa rnams su ni me tog la sogs pa rnams dang/ sgo rnams su narabyig dang/ gser dang/ mu tig dang/ rin po ches mtshan ma bzhagazhasaM par bya'o// de nas
de bzhin du rdzoN+Dithams cad kyisamachod pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// zhugs nas sna tshogs rdo rje blangs la/ snatshogs rdo rje'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas
mchod pa rnam pa bzhi bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las thams cad dang/ phyag bya bdang/ ngag dang/ yid dang/ sams kyichos kyidabyings su spros pas mchod pa'i tshig skyes pa thams cad kyis
mchod par bya zhing/ ro dang phyag rgyas mchod pa gcig tubyas pa'o// slob ma rnams kyi gzhug pa'i las kyang de bzhin no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa dang dngos grub dag kyang
de bzhin no// de nas ma bsgrubs par yang byang chub kyi sems kyi mchod pa la ni rang gi snying khar rdo rjebasgoms pas so// ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa la ni thams cad dag por bsgoms pas so//
dbang bskur pa'i mchod pa lani rdzudabang bskur ba snatshogs kyis so// phyag rgya'i mchod pa ni rdo thams cad kyi snatshogs kyis so// stong pa nyid kyi mchod pa la na a la sogs pa'i yi ge
lung bstan pas so// dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa la ni 'khor losnatshogs kyis so// mchod pa thams cad la snachogs rdo rjes so// gdug pa 'dul ba'ag chod pa la ni khro bos so// martog
la sogs pa ror ba la ni bzlas pas so// bde ba chen po rdo rje donayod pa'i dmatshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal pochen po las/ snachogs rdo rje don yod pa'i sdom tshig ces byakha'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
po rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdug pa thams cad 'dul nus pas yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad
'dul ba ye shes kyi sing po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam de do// sems can thams cad dul
ba 'de pas khrob rul ba nyid do// sems can thams cad chos ted pas khro bachos nyid do/ sems can thams cad rdo rjenyid pas khrob rdo rje nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can

thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa 'badud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston tobazhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rodzamatshaba'i phyag rgya dang/ do[R/ ]
gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi rdo rje khro bo'i gang mo zhes bya ba snying po 'di sbas so// ha/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i sams dpa' rnams bcom ldan 'das

ngordza gnod sbyin gyi thugs las byung ste dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rdzoganod sbyin thabs thamaMs cad kyis 'dul ba khro bo rdo rdzozhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gdug pa thams cad 'dul zhing byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshu du ni/phyi yi
'a @#// dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yin ma nyid du// dkyil 'khor bzang bo grub pa// sgo bzhi ba la thig bzhir ldan/ tshon sna lnga yis rnam par gri/ dka ba brgyad na mdun
[P ]gnas par// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor yang drag ldan// de yi dbus su ci rigs par// rdo rje ganod sbyin gazhagabyasu// jorje mchob gags pa dang// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i
'od 'jigs byed kha dog sngo ba dang// haha zhes bzhad gsal ba'i zhal// de yi kun tu ganod sbyin na/ na tu'ajigs ba gzhag par bya// de nyid dang po la sogs mchog phyag na rdo
[” ]sogs mtshan 'chang// phyi yi dkyil 'khor mtshams su na// mche ba'i phyag rgyabri bar bya// sgo yi gnas ni thams cad du// rdo rje'i mtshan ma gzhug par bya// de nas 'jug pa la sogs
phapa byung ste/ rodzamache pa'i phyag rgya dang/ hAg zhes bzhad pa dang bcas pas zhugs nas gdug pa thams cad 'dub nus shing myur du rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de nas zhugs

nas sde dzamachab blangal rdo rdzoming gi dbang bskural rdo rjes rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid bstan no// de nas rdo rjeganod spyin gyi zhalanas hiMha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad srung ba po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po phyag rdo rje gtum por bdag grub pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcang bar bya zhing bsgrub
par bya'o/ de nas mchod pa la de bzhin du ya nga dgu par tshim par byas nas/ shes bkyi phal tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig brjod la slar dbyung bar bya'o/ de bzhin du phyag rgya bcing pa
la sogs pachog rgyas pa ni dang po la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du bya'o// phyaga' dordzi'i dkyil 'khor// sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin te/ ma bsgrubs par yang
dang po ji lta ba bzhin no// gdug pa thams cad 'dul bganadi rje che ba'i phyag rgyas so// sems can thams cad 'dul bon khro bas ha ha zhes dgodatsang zos pas so// nyan thos dang
rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba las ltung bar bya ba lani chos gos dang snam sbyar gyi sbyin sreg gis so// dbang bskur ba thams cad dabrog pa na khams thams cad kyi phyi ma'i sbyin sreg
gas so// thamasacad rgyas gdab pa 'an ji khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad gcod pa lanagazugs bar n byas nas gtubs pas so// marus pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
rnam par gzhig pa la ni rje gzung nas 'jug par bya'o// mchod pa thams cad rnam par gzhag pa lan khros nas bzlas brjod bya'o// thams cad skrag par bya ba la na 'jigs byed kyi lta
bas blta bar bya'o// bde bachen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshag gi rtog pa'i rgyalapo chen po las/ rdo rjedam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pachos thams cad kyig panyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'dibagad/
ngo chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do// thams cad chos nyid pas shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do// thams cad las nyid pas 'das pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjede bzhin gshegs
ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyisazlob pa zhes bya ba'iting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ don yod pa thams cad kyi dmatshag
ces bya ba'i sing po 'di smas so// hU~M de nas bdi gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs las byung ste/ dam tshig gi de kho na nyid
tsA'i dkyil 'khoratshonabodor zhugs par gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la nges par btud de dam tshig chen porakyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil
'khor chen po bris 'dakyil 'khor gyi gnas brgyad du rdo rje khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba 'a sogs la/ dkyil 'khor so sor gzhagago/ de nas bcom ldan das phugan do dam tshog byams

0 cad kyi rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dmatshig thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul duphyi'i dkyil
'khor bris la/ de'i dbus su rdo 'khor lo bris nas/ 'khor lo'i gnas rnams su dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa bri bar bya'o// thams cad kyang dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshig gis bab/
cing sems dpa' chen po gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor du phyi rol gyi ri'i rigs ji ltar rjes su 'thun par bri bar bya'o/ sgo rnams sunarigs rnam pa bzhi'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par

bya'o/de nas dmatshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor gyi tshog thams cad rgyas par bya'o// dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i de khon nyid dam tshig ces bya ba'i
rtog pa'i rgyal bo chen po las/ bde ba thams cad kyi dmatshag ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal bo chen po rdzogs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang

mdzad kyis yang sems can thamasacad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin
yin pas sems can thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying bo can no// thams cad rdo rje'i snyingapos dbang bskur ba nyid pas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i sing po can no// ga thams cad rab
du 'byung bas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying po can// sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pal song bas sems can thamasacad las kyi snying bon+tano// de nas/

phyil gyi rdo'i rigs rnams kyis ca co'i skyo byung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snyingapo thul te/ de nas rdo rjod bang phyug chen po rang gi de khon nyid kyi snying po 'diphul la/ ti de nas
dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ kun s cha yo pa thag gsum pa dkyil 'khor chen po slobazhi pa mtshams rnams sumadung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o// de'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po bri bar
bya'o de'i gos thams cad du chogs brgyud bo bri therabyaste/ 'di lta ste/ nag po chen po dang/ dga' byed dbang phyag dang/ dril chen dang/ gar gyi dbang phyug rnamA
ni phyogs rnams su'o// mtshams su ni thod pa bzang po dang/ gtum po'i dbang phyug dang/ lag na khaTaM ga dang/ b.lang rnaba'i dbang phyug dang/ thig gi mtshams rnams so nam
a mo'atshogs thams cad gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// sgo rnams sudabyig pa'i dbang phyug dang/ mgo'i dbar thug dang/ dril rnadang/ drag khorinapo'o// khyi la tuni'abyungabo
rnams dang/ yi ge rnams bri bar bya'o/ de nas slob dpon thal ba gtsang mas lus bskusanga'i rigs gtsang ma bgos te/ mdung rtse gsum gyi mtshan ma gzhag par bya'o/ zhugs nas byad
snying po bzlas par bya'o// de nas slob ma de bzhin du bcug la lag par mdung rtse gsum pa byin la chos bshad par bya'o// sems can kun la phan phyir dang//bstan ba thams cad srung phyir dang//
'dod kun bdag po nyidi phyir dang// drag mo'i las la gnas par gyis// de nas phyag rgya'i mishes bslabs te gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ de nas brtsams te 'jigs pa med par dngos sgrub
thams cad dang/ phun sumatshogs pa thams cad kyis bde ba dang/ yid bde ba dang/ thams cad rjes su myong nas drag po'i 'jig rten du chod par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen po zhi
ba'imadung thung gamtshan ma zhes bya ba'o de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ dang po mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ gsad pa dang/
sgrub pa'idam tshig ces byabarang gi de khon sing po 'di phul lo// zlo= de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya'o// zur bzhipa byang gi sgo can gyi dkyil 'khor thig btab la/ dbus su/
go po gar byed bzhin pa gzhag par bya'o de'i phyogs dang mtshams thams cad du ma mobargyad bri bar bya'o/ 'di lta ste/ dragamo dang/ tshas pa mo dang/ khyab 'jug mo dang/ gzhano
numo dang/ nag mo dang/ nag mo chen mo dang/ za ba mo dang/ srin mo'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni drag po'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi bri bar bya ste/ zhib mo dang/ boruts+tshe dang/
@#// gtum mo dang/ 'jigs byed ma rnams so// de rnams kyi mtshan ma'i mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ 'khor lo dang/ dril bu dang/ thod pa khrag dang bcas pa//
dang / 'khar gsil dang/ mchab dang/ kha TaM ga'o/ sgo srus rnams kyin yod pa dang/ rus pa'i lu gu rgyud dang/ bya rgod dang/ byi lago/ de nas phyag rgya'i slob dpon chos spyod pa/
gtsang ba/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa thams cad za ma/ thams cad spyod pa la'ang smad pa med de/ zhi ba'i pho ti'i phyag rgyas zhugs lasIngapo bzlas par bya'o/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
rgyunas blochen bo thos par 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad ji ltar 'ongs pa zhugs par 'gyur zhing 'thob par gyur te/ gdug pa'i dmatshaganam gtogs so//
de nas slobam lag na me tog thogs pas nags kyis mig bkab lanagapo chen po'i phyag rgyas bcug ste/ rnam par dam tshig chen posgyu zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas skug nas me tog
ngo de nas gang du lhung ba de lhag pa'i lhar bsgrub par bya'o// gal te lhung bar ma gyur na 'dor du gzhug go/ des 'jigs par byed par zhus shing rnal 'byor yang so sor 'thob par
gyur ro// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol ladakyil 'khorab stan par bya'o// gdug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas mchod nas snying po dang rang rang gi mtshan ma sbyin par bya'o/ de nas dam tshig
[jj]bstan par bya sta/ sems can thams cad rgyas gdab cing// dam tshig sngang rnams bzakhar bya// sngags rnams bstan par mi bya ste// dam tshig rnal 'byor grub ster bya'o// drag po'i
mtshig mdung rtse dang// mamo rnams kyi rgyas 'debs pag/ gal te bdes na khyod kyisnyi// rtag tu 'jig par byed par 'gyur// de nas brtsams te gang sha chen po za bzhi de ri po mi
bar rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur ro/ gang zabar mi 'gyurab de rnal 'byor med do// gal te ramatshig las 'das pa ma gyur na tshogs thams cad kyis kyang mi gsod par gyur ro/
phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya'i garadang mchod pa byas nas gtor ma sbyin zhing bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ longs spyod la sogs pas tsham par byas nas phyir byung bar
bya'o dungos grub thams cad kyi dmatshag ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor go/ de nas sbrang rtsare byed pa la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te mgron
gcig tu rang gi de khon nyid kyi snying bo 'di phul lo/ su de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ zur bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi pog/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yin ng
dudakyil 'khor// gzhu yi dbyibs can bri bar@#// de yi dbus su ming po// mchog gsum dag ni gshag bya ste// sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal byed dang// don kun grub byed ces bya bano
@#// go chaya'adabagos par dang// de bzhin thod pa mtshan ma 'dzin// lha yi gos dang 'phrang ba 'chang// cung zad dgod cing khrob dang// seng ge 'i khri la 'dug pa dang// 'od
byA kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes pa'o// dngos grub kun star dag pa ste// gsum ni srid gsum dag dang mtshungs// sgo dang mtshams ni thams cad du// rdzogs la sogs pa legs par gzhag/
grub dang 'phel chen gnod sbyin dang/ gtum dang khro mchog gsod pa'o/ phyi rol ba dan rtse mol// dril bu'i 'phreng bcas thams cad du// bum pa gang ba la mchog bcas// 'byung po ma
sgyu lus gtor mar bcas/ klu rnams glu ru len pa dang// rol gro rdung bar byed pa dang// de bzhin slob dpon gar byed pas// phyag rgya kun gyis 'jug par bya// zhugs nas spyan lo dad nga
yis/ yang dang yang du bdud bya zhing// me tog kun gyis mchod pa yis// sgrub dang de nyid dag[” ]brjod// 'jig rten gsum bo srid gsum mchog/ ngan song gsum mchod gsum rnam gsum
pa legs ldan smras pas grub pa ni// dngos grub kun la rtag tu go/ de nas snying po lagacig brjod cing phyag rgya thams cad kyi g.yas pa'i mdzubamo lcags skyur byas la dgug par bya'o/ de nas dri/
bu dang bcas pa 'phreng ba rnams g.yogo/ thams cad phab nas de bzhin du gzhug par bya'o// de nas dam tshig 'di brjod par bya ste/ gal te dam tshig 'das gyuran// pha gsod 'gro ba gang
yin dang/ mgasod pa yi 'gro ba gang// 'gro ba derani 'grosar 'gyur// rtag tu dam pa bstan par bya// dam pa min pa yongs su spang// gzhan la de nyid bstan mi bya// rtag tumang po gsum/
bo sgrub 'dani dam tshig go/ de nas glu dang/ gar dang/ rol mo dang/ dgod pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ tha ba dang/ mgu bas mel rtse khya'o/ phyag rgya dang gar gyi rol mo' mchod ba'ang byas
