gtor ba'o// rdo rdzobasdoms pa las/mdzub mo'i nor bu'i bskyang ba'i 'phreng ba// rdo rje ni bo che'i gsum madun dang logs gnyis subacing bar bya'o// rdo rje rin po che'i mdzod spu'i
phyogs su gzhag ste mdzub mo'i rtse mos steng du 'dud pa dar dpyangs kyi tshul dubya'o// mthe bong gnyis brtan pa'i skyil mo krung byas pa mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas mnyam pa'i kha 'bus
pa'i mchog gi lus can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog go/ des spyi bo nas brtsams te/ mdun dang/ g.yasarung/ rgyab dang/ g.yon du bya ba byas nas/ de bzhin
du mdun dang/ rgyab dang/ lags gnyis su slog pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa bkrol ba byas nas/ 'phreng ba bcings pa'i mdud pa bya zhing dar rapyangs kyi tshul du bya ste//
rdo rje sems dpa'idabang bskur ba dang srid pa gsum gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi mchog rdo rjesems dpa' nyid thob pa yin no// rdzordzathams cad kyi rtogs pa thams cad ni gong du ji lta ba/
bzhin no// de nas phyi'i phyag rgya shes par bya ba ni 'di yon to/ phyag rgya chen po na g.yon par kham phor dang g.yas su mda' gtod pa'i phyag rgya'o// dam tshig gi 'jug pa ni mdzub mo
dang gung mo dang/ srin lag mnyam par legs par sbyaral/ rtse gsum par byas la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ni mgon po rnams kyi// ci nas
ltar bzung ba bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// dam tshig na gung mo dang srin lag rdo rje bsdams pas mdzub mo dang/ gung mo dang/ mthe chung dwang/ srin lag mthe bo'i sor mo'i rtsa bar
bsdus pa ni sringamo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// gal te dkyil 'khor brtag par ma nus na de'i tsho 'di bcings pas dkyil 'khor shin tu brtag par 'gyur te dngos grub kyang
shin M tu gsol ba yin no// lhamo rnams 'dunyid kyis spyan drangs par rang 'jug par bya'o// de nas sgyu ma'i 'khor lo ni g.yon pa'i snying du sor mo thams cad shin tu brkyang/ dam
tshig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor losta/ lha ma yin thams cad kyi sgyu ma thams cad don yod par sgrub pa'o// gdengs ka can gyi dbang po'amathe bong gnyis pa rtse mo'i phyi rol tu phyogs pa'i
sor mo brgyad kyis klu thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba'i dum tshag ste/ lto 'phye chen po'i lag pa'o// gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur
po gung mo dang srin lag bzhi pos mdud pa byas la mgu ba'atshel gyis steng du sgrung stobasdus nas mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mos bteg par byas na dug thams cad 'bar ba dang/
dug thams cad bcing ba dang/ kun las bsdus te btag pas dug thams cad 'jig pa'o// 'di nyid kyi dug thams cad za ba dang/ 'pho ba dug med par bya'o// phyi rol

gyi phyag rgya 'tshog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub po'i phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi chog rgyas pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i rdzodzi'i gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rdorje sems
dpas gsungs so// de la sku'i phyag rgya ldan phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i ngachen po'i ngagos 'a'o// dmatshig ga phyag rgyud bzhin gshegs pa'i rogasala'o// rdo rjedaM mdzad n jorje'i dregs pa 'od
pad+ma chen pon pad+ma'i rigs lego/ jorjonor bu chen po ni nor bu'i rigs la'o// de nas gsung gi phyag rgya lnga nas niapa'i rgyu'i yul thams cad kyi tshula rnams nus pa ji lta ba'i rgyu'i rgyun
thams cad n glu blangs te bzlas pan rdo rjesams pa'i 'ogis la rab tu dgar ba'i rdo rje'i ngag go/ lce dang mtshuganyis shan zhugayo ba med cing ngosashin tum 'byar ba dbyangs dang bral ba'i
rdo rje'i de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ste rigs thams cad dgos pago kAsprin gyi 'brug sgra yi ge hUM gi sku phramo dang ldan pa na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ngog rdo rje'i rigs so// ting nge 'dzin
gyi ngag pad+ma'i rigs la ste thams cad dag pa'i pad+ma zhes bya// chos kyi ngag nor bu'i rigs la ste mchod pa nor bu'o// de nas thugs kyi phyag rgya lnga ste/ thams cad bsgrub par bya ba la ni
rdo rjesams dpa'i dngos pos so// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsala'o// bdag gam bdag gi mdun du gsad par bya'os bya ban rje
ring gis la'o// sbyang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o// nam mkha'i thams cad bsgom pas nor bu'i rigs la'o// de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya ldan rdo rje lcamo lnga 'od zer gyi
'phreng bas rtse mo yongs su khyab pa dang bde ba chen po'i ri'i khu tshur gyis rdo rjesams dpa'i rigs la'o// rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyi sde
bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o// 'bar ba'i rab zhin rdo rje rtse bzhi pa rdo rje khro bo khu tshur gyis rdo rje rigs la'o/ pad+ma'i snying gi de bzhin gangshegs pa'i dri ji'i pad+ma'i khu tshur gyis
pad+ma'i rigs la'o// rdo rje phyed pas rdo rje ni bo che nor bu khu tshur gyisanor bu'i rigs la'o// de nas rigs thams cad rtogs pa'i gsang ba thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba'i de kho na nyid
kyis bden pa myur du mchog gi dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa sgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o/ zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod cing thogs pa med bar myur ba mchog gi dngos grub can rdo rjes/
dpas gsungs so// rdo rjesamasadapa'i phyag rgya chen po ni bde ba chen po'i rje rdzogasang ba'i dam tshig go/ gsung gaphyag rgyan song po'o// thugs kyi phyago myan ba'i snying po'o// rdo rje'i phyag
rgyan rdo rjebasAms ma'o// de nas phra molas kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'du yin te/ ma mchu'i sgros so rnams kyis bzung nas rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing thams cad rjes
su chags pa dang/ dbang du byed pa dang/ rol pa dang/ brtan par byed pa'idangos grub skad cig gis so sor nyams su myong ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs khago/ rdo rje phramo'i byin gyis
bslabs te/ dmatshig tsam du blta ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shwa
mthong ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'iyoges su byungabo/ khro gnyer dang bcas pa'i khro khros mi bzad pa'i lta ba bya ba shin tum 'gal bsdams nas thams cad/
ltung pa dang/ dbab pa dang/ rengs pa dang/ nyal du bcugapa dang/ rgyas btab pa dang/ gsod pa dang/ gzhan gyi dpung rmugs pa dang/ thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub
skad cig mas 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ khro bo'i rdo rje khu tshur rugs la'o// btsums pa med pas rdo blta bas mchu mnyam pa ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang pa dang/ srung ba dang/
ting nge 'dzan mngon du gyur pa'i dngos grub 'byung na pad+ma'i rigs la'o// 'barab stobs zhal rnam par bzhad pasadabang bskur ba thams cad dang/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang/
byabya/ mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba sgrub pa ni/ nyin re mngon du lan cig tu// snying po rang nyid sgrub pa ste/
rang gis bcings nas mdor bsdus pa// phyag rgya thams cad grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba grub pa ni/ snying po'i phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i/ sgrub pa 'di ni
du byung// byinus ci 'dod bzlas pa yis// zheba'i snying po gsang ba'o// don yod thogasamed gsang ba dang// rang bzhin grub pa de bzhin du// bsod nams med pa rnams la pa da//
dngosaMgrub kun lagrub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa rnams la// snying po mchog 'di sbyin mi bya// gsang ba'am gsang rgyud dam pa// gal te dngos grub yid 'ong/
'dod/ gang gi khyim du gnas gyur pagi/ phyag rgya sngags 'di dge ba ste// gzhan gyis mi thub ma sod cing// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// sems can thams cad bde
don dang/ sgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir// sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rdo rje mchog 'dzin de la zhus// bde ba chen po rab bosgrub dang// chags pa chen po
rnam dag phyir// rtogs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud// sems dpa' chen po bshad du gsol// rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la// 'dir nirtog pa gang zhig brjod// sang
zhes ni gong bshad pagi/ ye shes rgyud na ji ltar yane// dkyil 'khor zhes n brjod gi der bajug yon tan tsa dang ldan// rigs kyi 'khor lo'i khyad par dang// gzhan yang
sgrub pa ji lta bu/ 'jorjesams dpa' sems dpa' nyid// 'di yang ji ltar de nyid gang// thog ma mtha'am med nyid dang// rab tu dga' ba ji lteltar 'gyur// dang po snying po 'di yi
yin de bzhin nyid nigang zhig yin// hU~Mg gru gang gso gsungs// 'ad yi don ni ji ltar brjod// sems n de nyid dang ni// de bzhin phyag rgya rdo rje nyid// sangs rgyas rnams
ni 'byung ba dang// rigs rnams kyang ni de bzhin du// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa dang// sangs rgyas bdud du ji ltar 'gyur// rtogs pa rnams kyang sgrub pa dang// dang po'i snying
po'i de nyid dang// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i// sgrub pa de bzhin dngos grub rnams/ bsod nams med pas ji ltar 'grub// slob dpon nyid du ji ltar grub// me tog spos
dngamar me dang// dri rnams ni yin ji ltar gyur// mchod pa yang na ji ltar bya// grasang ba'i mchod pa ji ltar yin// kun byed kun za sngago pa can// shin tu sdig can ji ltar grub//
don yod thogs med dngosagrub kyis// de rnams ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// gsang ba de yang gang zhig yin// 'di nyid du gong gis grub// bde ba chen po rab grub dang// chags pa
chen po rnam dag phyir// gsang ba'i de nyid gsang ban// bdag cag rnams la kun bshad gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gsheg
pa thams cad kyisagasol ba btab pa'i tshig gsonanas zhal rab tu bzhad de/ bzhad pa chen po'i dam tshig chen po thams cad kyi de khon nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas rtog
pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma 'di gsungs so// de la rnam par mi rtog pa khyab pa'i rgyud ni/ rnam rtog med pa'i ting 'dzin las// sems can don na yongs su brtag/ des na brtag par/
bshad bya ste// rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro// de la bde ba chen po' rdo rjegasang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyudan 'od yonate/ sa la yang go'i gnas bris nas// bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa//
de yi dam tshig rdo rje ste// snying po thams cad sgrub byed pa'o// de la dkyil 'khor gyi ngoshad pa'i rgyudan[”]jalar gnas dang ji ltar dus// ji ltar 'jig rten ji la bu/ 'khor ni dgod par
paN bya ba ste// de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor bri// de nos dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs pa'i rnam par sminepa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rjesems sogs sems dparaya// 'khor bcas de tsho dkyil 'khor
du zhugs pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba// de ltar bris pa'i ng de dang 'dra// de nas rigs thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i khyad par gyi rgyud ni/ rdo rje 'khor lor brtan pa bzhin// lcags kyi 'khor
lo dam pa ste// 'bar ba 'khor lo bzhin du// pad+ma 'dab brgyad nor bu rtse// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ dkyil 'khor brtag par byas nas mi nang gi rim par
zhugs bya ste// dkyil 'khor bdag la dza/ hU~Mb// go phrad sid d+hu khaMbarjod bya// de nas rdo rjesams dpa' de nyid ni/ sangs rgyasol sogs 'grokun gyis// thams cad bdag nyid bcom ldan
mchog/ soms can 'byung phyir sems dpa' che// rdo rje sems dpa' bcu grags// de nas dmatshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems rapa ni//
rdo rjesems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang bo kun bdag nyid/ 'khor ba mya ngan 'das de bzhin// de nas thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa'i de khon nyid bshad pa'i rgyur ni/ thog mtha' med pa
thams cad ni// nam mkha' 'byung ba chen po'i gnas// nam mkha' skye ba skye med phyir// rdo rje sams dba' de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das btu dga' ba bshad pa'i rgyudani/ kha
tu dga' phyir nyon mongs te// 'dod pa thams cad bde 'dod ba// de la bdeb rnam dag phyir// srid gsum snga srolabcom ldan byung/ de nas dang po'i snying po'i de khon nyid bshad pa'i
rgyudan/ chags pa kun las chags pa che// 'dod ldan thams cad sad par byed// 'dod chags 'bar ba drawa ya// sing si'i phyag rgya rdo rje'o// de nas yi ge hU~M gi rgyu byung ba'irgyud ni/
klu lasachagasapa dga' las 'dod// rab tu dga' las thams cad 'byung// thams cad 'byung par grub pa'i phyir/ bskal pa dang por bcom ldan gsungs// de nas
yi ge hUM gas bzlas pa'i yon gyi sgru bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ myur du thams cad rjesachags pas// rjes su chags par byed mi choganAM// snying po bzlas pa'i don yin no// de nas rdo rje sems rgyud na/
klu rnams ji ltar khro bon// bsdus nas kun khye'ajug pan/ rdo rje thogs ni brtan gyur pa// de bzhin rdo rdzobasdus pa'o// de nas rdo rjesams dpa' 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud na/ thams cad
de nyid sems dpa' ni// bdag gis bdag nyidi la yang gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' dngos su// myur du thams cad du yang zhugs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba shes pa'i
rgyang na/ 'dod chags pas ni dga' sa bde// bde las sdig pa sdig pa sdug/ stag las ting 'dzin shin tu brtan// rdo rje nyid las sangs rgyas 'byung// de nas de bzhin gshegs
po'i rigs la sogs pa 'byung ba'i rgyud ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid dang// de nyid rdo rje rigs chen po// de nyid pad+ma gis dag pa// de nyide nor bu'i rigs mchog bshad/
de nas mngon par byang chub pa'irgyud ni/ rang sems so sor rtog pa na// byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung// rdo rje nyid phyarisangs rgyas nyid// bdag nyid sangs rgyas rab tu sgom//
0/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud nyid du shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rang sems nyid na bdud nyid de// sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yin// rang gsems ni gdul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas bdud nyid
dun 'gyur// de nas rtogs thams cad sgrub par shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rtog pa kun la grub bya gang// rgyabarang na mi rgyu yin// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// de dag thams cad bsgrub par
bya/ de nas dang bo'i snying po sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud na/ bzlos pa'i don shes nus pa yis// rdo rjesaMms dpa'i bab sgrub ste// jisrid 'dod pa'i bzlas pa'i mchog/ dngos grub chen
po'i bde ba ste// de nas snying po dang/ phyag dang/ sngags dang/ rig pa sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud na/ sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang// phyag rgya stags dang rig pa dang//
bzus pa'i don du sems dpa' che// bdag nyid dang na bsgrub bya ste// de nas dos grub shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo sams dpa'i dngos grub che ba'i de bzhin gshegs kun gyis//
byang chub rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// las kun mchog gi dngos grub phyir// de nas bsod nams med pa rnams kyis grub par shes pa'irgyadani/ ci 'dod 'khor lo bris nas ni/
ci yang rung ba'ang thal bas kyang// sems dpa' chen po'azhag byas nas// nyani zhag bzhi ni bsgrubapar bya// de nas slob dpon nyid kyi dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ni/ bde bachen
bya@#// po rdo rjeyi// gsang mchog dam tshig grong khyer ro// ji bzhin rang nyid rab zhugs te// bdud rtsi chus dbang bskur bya// de nas me tog la sogs pa'i machod pa
'bul ba'i shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rjecan la mchod pa kun// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dkar// rdo rje bdag nyid nag po ste// dmar po pad+manor bu ser// de nas 'bul
bshes pa'i rgyu da ni/ rdzogs pa 'am na mtshang ba// yang n dzoltar red pan// rdo rje gar sogs mchod pa ya// rtag tu thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas bdud kyi mchod
pashes pa'i rgyud ni/ drug ldan la sogs snyan pa'i glu/ glu nithams cad tsa 'dod pas// rdo rje 'byed pa la sogs 'grol// mchod pa dag ni rab tu bya// de nas gsangaga'i
mchod pa shes nge 'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje gar bcas mchod pa ni// go rims ji lta ba bzhin du// bzlas pa'i don gyis ma brjod kyang// mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur//
de nas sdig ba chen po byed pa'i ng grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ dkyil 'khor lanam zhugs kyang// tshul khrims b+hAtshal pa la sogs pa// ting nge 'dzani gyi stobs kyis ni// sdig
pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// de nas dngos grub mi 'thob pa nu shes pa'i rgyud ni/ chags pasmad par mi bya ste// rnam dag de bzhin bde ba stor// bcom ldan 'das kyang chags
pache 'dam dag pas 'grub mi 'gyur// de nas mchog gi dngos sgrub shes pa'i rgyud ni/ ji bzhin yul dang ldan rgyur nas// mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par bya// rtog pa kun
las rnal 'byor 'di// tshe 'di nyide la sgrub par byed// bde ba chen po rdo rdzogasang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rin po che chen po las/ rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'atsho ga rgyas
pa'o de nas bcom ldan 'das rtog pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje rin po che/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe ga gzigs pa'i yo shes kyi dbang phyug gi rdo rje'i pad+ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snatshogs pa'i mdzad pas 'phrin las dam pa'i chog rgyas pa'i re
thams cad la khyab pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i rje'i khoms brtan pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par chos kyi dbyangs spro ba thams cad khyab
pa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo mngon par mkhyen pa mdzad nas/ dang po' sIng po'i gsang ba'i de khon nyid kyi rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// ji srid
'khor ba'i gnas la zhugs// de srid sems can gdon par mdzad// mya ngan 'das bzhugs gzi brjid can// sems can don ni nus pa min// de phyir sems dpa' dam pa
rnams// 'khor ba'i srid du 'khor bar bzhugs// sems can don ni mngon par zhen// thams cad dag pa'i mchog chos can// de bzhin gshegs pas mi
po 'dul bas// sems can don mi mdzad pa de// 'dir ni ba grub dngos grub mchog/ dus kun tu ni thams cad du// rdo rje 'chang chen la sogs pa// 'di ltar bsod nams rnam smin
gyis kun la mthong pa la sogs kyang// rang gis las kyis mdzad pa spyod// dkyil 'khor la nam zhugs kyi nga// srid pa 'di la myur 'grub 'gyur// shin tu mthong ba la sog
kun[：]sems can thams cad rab stsal mdzod// kun nas dus kun thams cad la// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol 'gyur// rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen po// srid pa'i debang phyugakun/
gyis so// de phyir bskyab bya 'di bshad bya// dngos grub shin tu dag pa 'o// gang gis srid pa 'di nyid du// shin tu stag pa'i dngos grub thob// lugs ma 'am na brdung ma bas//
ra mo bris pa 'am 'dus byas pagi/ phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs ni// ji bzhina bshad par rab gzhug bya// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub
kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgya'i ye shes kyis slar yang phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'od gsungs so//
nyin re snga srol dus jibazhi// dang po'i rdo rjebade ba che// 'di ni rtagapa thams cad la// phyag rgya thams cad mado bsdus pas// dam tshig yang dgabacings nas grub// phyin s ma bsgrubs
kyang grub 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rjechos kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i sngags sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// langs pa 'am na 'dug pa'i m// gang dang der ni gnas
pa'o thams cad rjes chags rnal 'byor gyis// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud 'di gsungs
so= gsangaba'i gar mchod mchod pa 'am// yang na mchod pa tsa bde bar// byas te mgon po bsgrubs byas nas// mchog gi dngos grub myur du 'thob// de nas rang gi phyag rgyas
bdag nyid sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya chen po mnyam bzhag ste// rang gi sAng pos lan cig sgrub// brtan zhing shin tudagyes kun chags// shin tu dgyas myur bdag po grub//
de nas yi ge hUM gi glu blangs pa'i grub pa'i rgyud ni/ ri b+hi de sogs rgyan dang ldan// ci nus pa dang ci 'dod pa// dri za dang po blangs nas na/yi ge hU~Mgs grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom
ldan 'das tshogs pa chen po dang po'i rje rje sems dpas gsungs so// de khon nyid chen po'i gsang ba'i dengos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud do// rtog pa thamos cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bshad
par bya'o// zhes bya babcom ldan 'das thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa'i 'phrin las kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// shin tu ring ba'i tsho 'phel ban bde ba chen
po po'i tshwa'i chos so// shan tu gzhon pa'i na tshod 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'adzi tsu'i bcud kyis len gyis so// gzugs chen po dang gzi brjid chen po 'phel ban bde ba chen po'i
rdo rje'i gzugs kyi gzi brjid kyis so// 'du byed chen po thams cad 'phel ba bde ba chen po rdo rje 'du byed chen pos so// sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid thams cad srung ba
ni bde bachen po rdo rje srung bas so// phyogs thams cad dung/ mtshams dang/ dkyil 'khor bcas pa na bde ba chen po rdo bskor bas te/ thams cad rdo rje chen po'i
nyid khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rdo rjes kyang 'jugaparaminusangashing mi phyed par 'gyur ro// srid pa thams cad srung ban bdeb chen po'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pas so// bdag nyid kyi
dngos grub thams cad dam gzhan dag rdo rje byed pa bde ba chen pogi chasaso// 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan
gyis so// 'thab mo srub na bde ba chen po'i gzhan gyis ma thub pas so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad bshago pan jo rdzabade ba chen po rdo rje 'dzin pas so// gzhan gyi dpung
nyams pa dang/ ldang ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ gsod pa ni bde ba chen po'i sde gog bskor bas so// mos thams cad la sogs pa'i nad thams cad dang nad chen po zhi bo ni bde ba chen
po rdo rje phrogs pas so// dug thams cad gzhig pa rang dug med par byaphan bde ba chen po'i rje rje 'phrog pas so// phyag rgyagadon thams cad las dgrol ba ni bde pachen po'i
'byung po bskrad pas so// mamo mkha' 'gro dang/ gdon thams cad dgrol ba chen po dang/ gzhom pa dang/ snyingagazhan dbyung ba dang/ shi ba gso ba dang/ tshe 'phel ba de
shin tu srung ba rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rirje'i phyag rgya'i lan gyis so// thams cad dbab pa dang/ g.yo ba dang/ 'chang ba dang/ gar byed du gzhug pa dang/ glu len du gzhug
pa dang/ snga ma 'byung ba so sor bstan pa dang/ rmad du byung ba dang/ tsho'aphrul bstan pa dang/ bde chen thams cad pa thams cad smar gzhug pa dang/ dgrol ba dang/ srung ba dang
sos su bcug pa rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo dbab pos so// sgrub dang ma rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad btsa yid kyis 'dod pa'i pra dbab pa thams cad grub pa ni bde ba chon po
rdo rje pra dbab pas so// rang gi lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid rdo rjes mthong ba dngo/ thos pa dang/ sma ba rang/ ston pa'i shes pa grub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom
@#/// pa'o/ thams cad las 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar byung ba thams cad kyi bka'o mthong ba'i yi ge sna tshogs pa 'am/ dngos po sna tshogs pa/
po thamasacad kyis rnaba'angeshes pa rab tu 'jug pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pas so// glogadang/ char dang/ thog dbab pa thams cad bzlog pa dang/ sprina gzhug pa ni/
bde ba chen po'i rje rje khre bo'i lta bas so// sa'i 'og thams cad 'phas sngar ma byung ba'i 'bru la sogs pa' 'bras bu 'byung khadang/ bar len pa dang/ chu med pa'i gnas las
chu'i dngos po 'byung ba dang/ rna ba 'dren pa dang/ mun pa chen por snang ba chen po bsadapa dang/ nye bar len pa dang/ rlung thams cad la bka' bsgo ba dang/ nye bar len pa dang
nam mkha' thamasaM cad las yid kyis 'dod pa'i dengos po thams cad mthong bar ng/ lhab lenapanabade ba chen po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyugams so// thams cad gzhom
rgyab dang/ rengs pa dang/ dral ba dang/ rmugs pa dang/ gnyid log par bya bar ng/ rgyas gdab pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ rmongs ba dang/ bsad pa dang/ phyir ldog pa bde
chen bo'agadug pa'i rje'i phyag rgyas so// thamasacad rjes su chags pa dang/ dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dong/ dbab pa dang/ bci bar ng/ bkrol ba dang/ dral bar ng/
lhub dang/ ltung ba bsrung ba dang/ 'dren pa dang/ branadu byed pa dang/ mngag gzhug bka'akhasgo ba byed pa dang/ thams cad tshuradrang ba dang/ pharagatang ba dang/ gsad pa dang/ slar
gso ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed pa dang/ dbang dubyed pa'i sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje thams cad sgrub ba na bde ba chen po rdo rje'i thims cad sgrub pas so// gas thamasacad kyi mchog
gi dengos grub la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad dang/ mchog gi deb bskur ba la sogs pa'i thams cad dang/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang/ thams cad rjes su chags
pa la sogs pa'ibade ba dang/ yid bde ba thams cad rab tu gzhug pa dang/ mchod pa chen po thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad myur du grub pa'i tshog rgyas pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i
mchog gi dngos grub kyis so// de la bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi dang po 'a mchog gi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ bde ba chen po'i rje'i sa rdo sems
dpa' mo star ba'o// 'di'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'o// dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar byas/ rtse mo 'od zer byas nas gdong pa yongs su sbyangs te gdong par dgrol bar bya'o/
bdag kun tu baskor nas snying khar dgrol bar bya'o// gtsug tor dang/ phyogs thams cad dang/ dkyil 'khor bskor ba'o// snying khar dang/ yid kyis rgyab dang/ phrag pa dang
spyi bo dang/ dpral bar bzhag la rdo dzikhu tshur gnyis kyis 'phreng bcings la go cha byas te/ mdud pa byas nas rdo rje'i gnas rnams su slar yang 'phreng ba byas pas rgyab tu mdud
pa bya ste dar dpyang sabyago/sung kha dang/ dpral ba dang/ mgrin pa dang/ phyibor gzhag par bya'o/ dbus ma'i der mchog go/ byab pa'i gyen du kha bltas pa'idabugs pa dang 'jigaM
pa'i gdong gis blta bas so// 'bar ba bzhi'i tshul gyis 'dor zhing khros pa'o// rang gisIpa kharab cings te zhi ba'i lta bas rtse mo 'brog par bya'o/ blta bas 'phrog par bya'o// dbab par
myur du dgrol bar bya'o// yongs subaskor nas dpral bar gzhag ste dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo'i rtse moganyis bskyod par byas na ci la bzhin du las byed pa'i snying khar gzhag ste/ dbus ma rdo rje'i las
ni/ 'di lta ste/ sung khor stod pa dang/ bskyed pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ gang byed du bcug pa dang/ mgrin pa bsal ba dang/ rtse mo btsa'i b.rung/ kha 'bus ba dang/ mgrin pa bsal
bdang/ bcings ba myur du dgrol ba dang/ srung bar ng/ byab pa'i las so/ gsing kha kha sbyor bskyod pa'o// nyin re bzhin snga rol du lan cig lus yongs su sbyang ba dang/ mgrinar//
bsal ba'i ngag dang/ snying khar gzhag pa dang/ phyag rgya lhab ste/ nyin re snga rol tu lan cigo dbang po thams cad kun zhubaskor bar bya'o// dbus ma rdo rjes byed pa ni khro bo'i rdo rje'i lta
wa/bas so// dbusam rdorjolas ni 'og nas 'byung ste/ nye bar longs spyod pa dang/ thams cad la dgug par byed pa dang/ dbab pa sbyin pa dang/ 'bar ba'i mi rtag byed pa dang/ nye bar
lenapa dang/ rlung gi tshularang 1 nam mkhar bsgoms pa las dus mgo/ dbus ma'i rdo rje'i lus ni phyag rgyas gzhom pa dang/ rnamo gnyis snying khar btsir ba dang/ sen mo drud
pa dang/ mig loreg pa dang/ btsum pa dang/ sen mo mnyam pos snying khar bteg pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ glod par byed pa dang/ phan tshun rdeg pa dang/ rang gi snying kharar
bzhin du gzhag pa'i las so// dbus ma'i rdo rje las namadapagatod pa dang/ lcags sgrog gnyis kyis dgug pa dang/ g.yon pa la g.yas pa bcug pa dang/ rtse mo bskyod pa dang/
gdu bur bcing bar ng/ myur du dgrol ba dang/ sor mo mnyam por myur du dral ba dang/ ltung ba dang/ 'og nas bteg pa dang/ g.yon pa g.yas pas drang ba dang/ las thams cad
la sbyar bar bya ba dang/ 'og nas bskyod cing gyen du drang ba dang/ tshul dren pa dang/ phar gtad pa dang/ g.yon dang g.yas kyis drag por 'degs pa dang/ rang gi snying khar rtse mo
'dronapa dang/ las thams cad la nges par slobar byed palas dang/ snying khar 'khor lo gzhug ba dang/ dbang bskur ba'i phreng bar ng/ dararabyas 'ching bar byed ba
dang nying khalas dras te bde batshur 'dren pa thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang/ gar gyis blangs te spyi bord grol ba'i las so// khade ba chen po bab grub
dang chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// donayod thogs med snatshogs pa'i// phyag rgyu'i rgyud nib tu bshad// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis/ sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid
kun sems can thams cad myur grub dang/ don yod dngos grub kun stsol ba'o// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa// sdig pa 'akis ni kun dang ldan// de dag kyang naMsgrub
'gyur te// bcings pa tsamatshos sngog byang phyir/ gang zhig le nyid kyis sam// brtson 'grus ldan pa yang tshang la// dkyil 'khor med pa'i sems can gang// slob dpon
nyid byin ma brlabs dang// de dag grub mchog rdo rje che// rdo rje slob dpon nyid du 'gyur// don yod mchog dang sna tshogs pa'i ki/ btsas ba tsam gyis myur grubabyed// bsam
ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// mchog gi dngos grub kun la 'jug/ dang po 'byung ba'i rdo rje mchog/ bde bache la yang dag 'byung// dag cing shin tu grub pa dang/ 'grol
ba thams cad la yang ngo// de nas phyag rgyathams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'irgyudan/ los 'dod thog mar phyag rgya ni// skal ba ji bzhin snying pos sgrub// rang gi bdag nyid nges
sbyar bya// bde ba chen po'i gsang ba'i rtog pa rgyal po las/ bde bachen po' thams cad kyi dam tshig don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i chog rgyas
pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o//gde nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yongs su mthar thug pa med pa'i skudang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje/
thams cad las kyi sbyong ba/ rdo rje'achang bdang bcas pa rnams kyis bde ba chen po'i rje gsang ba'i dam tshig rtog pa 'irgyal po chen po 'ang soms cin gyi khams ma lus pa kun khyab
cing so bdang/ dngos grub thams cad kyi chog rgyas pa srid pa thams cad kyi rtse mo' yongs su mthar m grug pa'i gsung rab yongs su mthar thug pa'i don du/ thog ma dang mtha' ma med
pa'i rosems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa yin no// rdzordzunam mkha' chen po yi// chos kyi dbyings ni spro ba mchog/ rdo rje nam mkha' chen po yi// chos dbyings spro ba'i
dngos grub ster// rtag tusangs rgyas thams cad ni// rdo rje 'chang chen bcas pa dang// rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni// yongs su mthar thuganus pa min// ama'o mngon zhen sems
can dang// le lo can dang las kun dang// thugs rje dam pa'i dzi rje khyod// byang chub sems n blo na med// bde bachen po rab sgrub dang// chags pachen po rnam dag phyir// rtog pa
[51 ]/ @#// 'di ni mthar thug pa// rab tu sgrub phyir mthar thug brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ting nge 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// bde ba chen po bskyab
dwang chags pachen po rnam dag phyir// thams cad dgongs grub don du ni/ yongs su mthar thug byin brlabs pa'o// gang gis tshula mchog bad ninyen 'gyu ra dang/ gong gi
khyim na gsang ba thams cad gnas// bde chen mchog gi rje dza mchog gsang ba'o// dngos grub tshe 'dir de dag rnams la brtan// brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar rang mi byed// sems
can don du rgyal ba las dag phyir// rnam par sbyang bar mdzad pa 'di yin te// rtog pa 'di nabagegs med bdud rnams med// dngos grub 'phal med min par byin gyis brlabs//
bdud dang brtan mang nyid ni bdag mi byed// ban+ta na pa nyid phyir 'dul ba ngam byed// rtog pa chen po 'a mchog 'di gong grub pa// myur du dngos grub mchog phyir bdag brtan 'gyur/
brtan zhing rab dgyes brtan pas rjes su chags// bde ba chen po byed cing shin tu rgyas// nga yi dang po sAng po gang sgrub pa// de la ni rtog tudangos grub ster// de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus pa la mngon par bstod do// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po
zhes mchog tu grub pa yongs su rdzogs so/////de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyagan do bad nyid slar yang ston par mdzad cing
zhal rab tu 'dzum pa dang/ mchog dang po'i dro bde ba chen po rdo rjebasnyams pas gsodran s rang gi thugs kar stod pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing mchog tu gsang zhing mchog tu grub pa don yod cing
thogs pamed pa bde ba chen po rdo donayod pa'i d mchog 'di rtogs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang/ sgrib pa dang/ bdud thams cad 'dul bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang gis ma
grub pa rnams kyang mchog dam par grub par byed pa dang/ mchog tu gsang ba theg ma dang mtha' ma mar pa'i machonam mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i rtog 'irgyal po dbang phyug chen po bzhinapo rgyud
phyi ma gsungs pa// de nas thogama'i gnas nyams dgag/ nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// na chen 'od 'bar rab tu gsal// dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyis brgyan// thur
bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo khyud rnams kyis rab tu brgyan// kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor// rdo rje lha motshogs kyis mchod// zla ba phyed ni rab tu gnas // rdo rje rin chen
@#// 'bar byed pa// rang gis skyod pa'i rtse mo mchog/ dpa' phan dralabu sgra sgrogs pa/ dra ba ma 'phreng rtag me long// me tog chun po' rgyan gyis bskor// bde
po ba chen po rdo che// rdo kun gyis legs sbyar ba// rdo rje sems dang 'bazhugs gnas che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes brten pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyi mchog/
rdzo'adzin pa kun gyi gnas// bde bachen po ngo tsha che// rdo rje rin chen mchog ces bya// rdo rje 'chang chen bzhugs nas ni// bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs// thog mtha' med pa'i
sams dpa' ni// rdo rje sams dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bazadrapo kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsAms tshul bdag gis bdag/ sems can kun gyis soms gang yin//
brtan pa'i phyir ni dpal zhes bya// brtan par bzhag pas ting [“] 'dzanate// nges pa las ni rje rjer gyur// sems dpa' byin rlabs spor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid
du 'gyur/ de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'thun pa// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// byang chub sams rgyas de nyid do// rdo rje drag po
mthar byed nyid// phyag na rdo rje nyid kyang de// de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i ragis// denyid rdo rje rigs chen mo// de nyid pad+ma'i gos dag pa// de 'di nor bu'i rigs bzang
bad// de nyid 'dod chags bral ba nyid// 'dod dang grol bde nyid ni// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste// 'jig rten gsumi mchog khams gsum pa// mi g.yo
thams cad mchog de nyid// brtan pa sra ba nor chen po// rgyub sems kyi 'dus byas pa// thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid// dang po'i sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang/
chub sems dpa' bde bar stsol// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas// pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa dang// btsun mo'i tshogs bcas sna tshogs pa// rdo rje lha mos yongs su
bskor// bde bachen po grub don du// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// ma lus gdul bya'i don du ni// dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir// dam tshig mchog ni ma lus pa//
rgyalabs kyang ni bsrung bar bya/ bsags bcas rdo rdzogasor ba dang// rdo rje bsnyams pa'i tshul 'chang zhing// phyag rgya kun myur grub mngon du// rdo rjesams dpa'i mchog grub
phyi dungos grub kun gyi thabs chen po// bsod nams kun gyis cher mthong ba// ye shes phyag rgya yang dag ldan// snying po chen po dam yin te// gang gis bsod mas mi ldan
l]pa= de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa// don yod thogs pa med mchog 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad red dka' min// bde bachen po rdo rje che// gsang ba mchog gi dem tshig/
khan// dngos po thams cad sgrub pa ster// rtags pa thams cad myur sgrub byed// thog mtha' med phyir dang por 'byung/ mchog dang po zhes bya bar bshad//
tshig kun gyi ni ci 'dod pa/ chags pa kun gyi ci dge bar// rjes su chags par bgyi 'o zhes// ji bzhin 'bab pa'i ye shes 'jug/ nye ba'i snying po bcas snying po// bskal
pa dang por bcom ldan gsungs// hUM denasa'adanagasungasatsam gyis// sangs rgyus thams cad sras bcas pa// rdo rje 'dzin bcas sna tshogs pa// skad cig gis na 'dus par 'dus/
rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mni// yud kyi 'jigarten gsum po 'byung// ji ltar 'gro ba rnab sgrub ces/ bde gshegs rnams kyis dngos grub sa// de rnams kyis na bkaragasanan//
rdo rje'adzanarang grol ba na// 'byin dang stsolab ston pa po// byed pasatshig ni 'di skad gsol// chags bralagyis 'dul 'jig rten rnams// chags bral nyid kyis dag par 'gyur//
'dod chags chen po bde ba che// 'di ni ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// de yi tshig de gsananas// rgyal bar ng nyid kyis gsungs pa// byang chub sems de thog ma lha// khyod ni
thabs chen nyid yin no// ji srid 'khor lo'i gnas su// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyurang 'tsho// de srid mtshungs mer sems can ngon// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// ji srid/
[d]sems can rnam rtog pa// de srid byang chub srade ba che// byang chub sems can la phan phyir// rdo rje can gyis ci bdar gyis// de nas thog ma dang dkyila 'khor// dang po dkyil 'khor byin gyis/
brlab// rdo rjekun gyidamatshig mchog/ ji bzhi ni chogs sgrub pa nyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das de ni// bde ba chen po grub phyir dang// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// gtso bo mgon
lagasol ba btab// bcom ldan 'das lagasol ni/ 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// snying po 'di ni rtog pa mchog/ bde chen myur du grub pa'o// de rnams kyi ni bka' gsananas/
ro rje sems dpa' bde chen po// bde chen po de che// dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal to// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// bde ba chen po rdo rje/
mchog/ gsang ba mal zhes bshad do// thog mar dam tshig gsum thob pa'i// rdo rje slob dpon rang phyag rgyas// 'khor la kun gyi chog la// rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang bya// rtog
pa thams cad yang dag 'bebs// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin// dam tshagache gsum zhes bya ba// rgya 'di thams cad sgrub byed yin// dngos grub cho ga thams cad la//
rdo rjedril bu rab bskul ba// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang/ 'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// mchog gi dang po mthal yasam tshog
bla med cing mnyam med pa// nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas/ mchog ste yi ge dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyang byas la// de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin//
dngos grub byin rlabs cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor de ni grub par bya/ glu dang rolomo'atshig dang/ ma tog spos sogs mchod pa yang// tu rnyed pa dong 'dod par/ mchogadang por
bar bya// mchog gi dngaporamathayas mchog/ ban med cing dpa med ngo// nam mkha'akun la rab gnas// grong khyer dag ni mi 'gyur mchog/ thog ma med mchog brtag pa 'phyid//
sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang rab tu zhugs// kun mchog mnyam pa nyid chen pas// lhag dang mtsha med kun gang// mtha' dang dbus mnam mkha' na// 'di ni dbu mar rnam brtag pas
phyag rgya skyor ba ting nge 'dzin gyis// de yi dbu mar rnam dag 'ad// de yade dus su bapa'i gzugs// yul bcas pa rab zhuganag/ snatshogs pad+mas yang dag khebs// thams cad dag
pa'i gan de yin/ de nas srad bu nyis 'gyur du// byas pa'i thig ni gdab byas// nam mkha' kun gyi tshod yin par/ gdul bya'i blon mtha' yas bas// tshad ni tshad med pa yin no//
mnyam med pas zur bzhi ba// dran dang rab ng po'i sgo bzhi ste// bsam gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi// ting 'dzin khams su bshad pa yin// khyams lan pa'i rdo rje'i bdag//
gzugs rnams lhamos mchod pa'o/ rgyan rnams kun gyis bkrakhani// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa// gdul bas skyod pa sna tshogs mchog/ dam chos mchog ste kun tu 'gro//
rlung gis skyod pa sna tshogs pa'i/ bdan rab tagasadril sgra sgrogs// ma long ye shes rtagam tog/ byang chub yan lag me tog 'phreng// drab ma long me togache// me tog 'phreng ba'i
rgyan gyis bskor// kun grub mi 'gyur bde ba ni// bde ba chen po zhes bshad do// bde bachen po'i gzhal yas khang// dang po'a gnas de bri bar bya// thar pachen po'i grong khyer mchog/
kun mchog de ni legs bris nas// thog ma mthabam med pa 'debangs// phyogs kun manyam pa nyid du bsam// phyi yi dkyil 'khor ro// de yanang gi 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad
ba lta bu yin// nim thar brgyad po ste// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba ster// byang sems theg pa chen po yi// mdo sde'i 'khor lo rab bskor// rdo thag gis yongs
bskor ba// rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag gro/ de na snachogs pad+macher// rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya// lugs ma'am yang na brkos pa la// byas pa'i m yang n bris pa ste//
'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la// dmar zhing sna tshogs bod ba rab// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang sogs dang/ rgyan dang na bza'i sna tshogs pa// sems dpa'i skyil krung dag
gis bzhugs// rdo rje basnyam satshuchang ba'i mchog/ su ra stsa zhes brjod cing// yang subos kyang gazhag par bya// de yi phyogasanasmims cad du// tshon
po nam de bzhin phyi ma las// go rims dag ni dzibazhin du/ rdo rje lhago yang dag briso/ sdorje mchod bstod la brtson bya// 'jo chags ma mdun du bri// lhamo rdo rje rol pa// rdo rje
can larab tu 'khyud// rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma// chusngon rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'adod pa'i dbang phyug ma// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bsnyams/ de nas 'di rnams dgod pa'i
phyag rgya ni/ dza badzradusam ke ma TayaM/ o badz+dzalakA li hU~M/ paMbadzra ts+tshis raraT/ hobadzrakA me shAri hU~M/ mtshams su rdzordzasoms ma sogs// dus kyi mchod pa yang dgag bri/ rdo
sbrang rtsi ma dang sprin// ston dang dgun ni roljom// me tog bdugaM pa mar me che// dri de spyi bor thal sbyar ba// rdo rje rgyal po'i lha mo ste// de nas phyag rgya rab bshad bya// om drubadzihUM/
g+haM/ o badzra g+ha gu lu gu lu/ ord badzra o o/ oM badzra Ta rihU~MhU~M/ sgog mi bzhi d ma klu chen mo// gar mdzad pa yi lha mo'i tshogs// rdorje rol mo 'di dog gi phyi ldelaM
gyi ni mtshams su bya// der ti badzrame g+ha ba la si naM/ tra ha/ her ti badzran khyabe ba be ba/ sgo yi gnas ni thams cad du// gsol ka bani bzhi po ste// rdo lcags kyu zhags pa
[j]dang = lcags sgrog de bzhin dril bu ma'i// badzra aM ku sha dza badzra pA ThAhU~M/ badzra shrI la le yaM/ badzra g+han+d+haho// dmatshiga mchog ni thams cad kyi// dgongs shing brtag pa nyid du/
'gyur// rdo rje zla mo la sogs pa// dngos grub kun la 'byung bar 'gyuraM/ gsol ka ba ni g.yogs mo ya// gtso bo dang/ phota dang/ branamo dang/ de nas sku mchogal sogs pa
mngon bris yang dag bsgrub par bya// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas su// dza hU~MpaM ho zhes brjod bya// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ rdo rje spun gyi spyan sngar 'dug/
bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog/ bdag po lan cig yang dag ragug/ saMmagasu kha badzraso// ya hikr-igaM/ mahA su kha badzra amo g+ha sa/ anu pA lA ya/ badzra su ru ta hU~M a nu rako mig+ha
ba u tshom b+ha/ su po Shayom b+ha wa/ b+hagab+haM na nar ni sa satwaM/ sam+basid+d+himapra ya ts+tshA/ a gtam tri' Ale sha yas cho yer ba/ ba shA derma[”]ya maramu dA pAni dza
yUbaM ho/ 'di yis bcom ldan 'das rtag par// dkyil 'khor du ni rang nyi dgashegasaM/ bkug cing bcug lang ni tu brtan/ dbang du gyur na ba t+tathub// ces bcom ldan 'das
dam tshagachen pos gsungs so// sngoslob dpon yang lhani// 'od zer kun tu ston la sogs// mtshan ma rnam pa mang po// ngo mtshar gyur pa mthong bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje mtshon
yin no/ rod+dathal mo khadape dbul// bum pa gang dag yod pa'i/ me tog sogs kyis yang dag mchod// bar n rtse mor dril btags pa// mtshams kyi chu ni
[P ]gzhag par bya// bum pa spos chus gang ba la// de nas rdo rjemachod yon ni// lhag ma phani yongs su bkrus/ de labade ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi chur sgrub pan 'di yin te/

hUMmahAsu kha badzraa mo g+has ma yo das dad a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sarma su kha so ma na sa rud da ku ru ku ru/ dza/ hU~M bi ho/ 'ad lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas la bdag nyid la rdo rjes dbangabaskur
bya'i bsang gtor bya ba dang/ 'thungs pas kyang sdug bsngal thams cad bsal ba dang/ bde ba thams cad 'gal bar 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
so/ de nas 'khor ler ma zhugs kyang// rang nyid thoge marabyang zhugs shing// rdo rje kun gyi slob dpon che// rdo rje can gyis rang bani slob// de nas rdo rje 'dzani sob dpon// rang nyid khrus
ya byas dris legs byugs// tsared pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan// shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgo zhing// me tog 'phreng btags kha dris bsgo// nam sgag dga' ba'i rdo rje dang// rdo gar gyis
sbyor ba yis// spyi bor me tog thal sbyar nas// gnas de mgon la phyag bya ko/ zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de la ni// bskor ba dag na lan gsum bya// de nas mdun du 'dug nas ni//
de kho na nyid lan cigabarjod// 'dod chags chen po bde bse// rdo rje chen po nog che ba// ye shes chen po babasachen po// dedugardosems grub brjod// de nas me tog sil ma ni// mgon
gtor te cho ga bzhin// dang po/ Ta pa la sogs// bstod pa'i klu ru lan cig blangs// de nas bcom ldan sakyis bstod pa'i rgyal bon brgya rtsa brgyad po de kho na nyid chen po na 'di
yonate/ dpal mchog dang bo sems dpa' che// dga' ba chen po'i dga' ba che// kun tu bzangapo'akun bdag nyid// jo rdzobasAmasatshul bdag po'athadag/ sems rang sems dpa'i
ting 'dzin mchog/ rdo rdo rje mchog chen po// kun tu bazang po'i spyod pa mchog/ bdud dngabadud ni ba 'jomasal// thams cad du ni byang chub 'i// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas skyes
mchogaskyes// rdo rje hA mdzad ya gehUM// 'jig rten dbang phyag nor rab gsal// 'dod chags chen po bde ba nyid// 'dod dang thar pa noratshib// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum
pa= 'jig rten gsum mchog khamosagsum l/ brtan par rang byung gsal ba ste// rab phra sbomarang 'degs bsags// rgyu ba rab mchog thob mdzad pa// srid pa 'khor bar stong
mdzad pa// thog mtha' med cing thog mtha' can// mdangs ldan dang por thams cad gnas// snying po phyag rgya sbyoradam tshig/ de nyidi bden pa mchog pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'idos[I]
grub che// chos dang las na khams chen po// dam pachos te las mchog bdag/ byang chub sems sku rob sbyong mdzad// rdo rje khro bokhrothomo//dusamatha ltar bar 'dul
ba po 'dula mdzad chen po gdug pa'i mchog/ drag po drag nyid zad mdzad pa// thams cad dag pa pad+ma che// shes rab thabs to tshul chen po// 'dod chags dag pa ting 'dzin mchog/
sna tshogs chags pa dbang phyug che// nam mkha' mtha' yas brtag pa'i den// 'byung bo thams cad gnasa chen po// 'byor pa pon thams cad gnas// 'byor pa dpal dang gtso bo rgyal//
bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// phyag 'tshal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo// dad pas khyed la bdag rten bgyid// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub
mdzod// gang zhig bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di/ nyin renang par rjod byed dam// chos kyi tshig gis lan cig brjod// dngos grubashin tu myur bar 'gyur// gal te 'di'i grub mi 'dod na//
dang por nyin re dus gsum du// bsod na sdig pa las nges grolag dazhing dag pan grub par byed// rtag tu sdug bsngal thams cad solaM// lan cig rab tu brjod pa yis// dngos grub/
thams cad skal bzang byed// phun sum tshogs dpal 'phel bar byed// kun grub don yod yon tan can// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'o// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pas na// thab tu
dga' khas mgon la mchod// rang gi phyag rgya lan cig ni// rang gi phyag rgyas bcings te grub// de nas lha yi chu dang ni// de bzhin sku mchog gis dbang bskur// rang gi snying pordo rje

phyag/ snying po 'dzin byung bar bya// de la rdo rjesams dpar dbang bskur ba'asIng po 'di yin te/ daMmahasu kha badzrasatAab+hike ke na hU~M/ a b+hi TI maM/ sarba badzra a d+hipa des dri b+hom b+ha ba mi
d+ha nAm ma ste b+ha ga bAn/ mahAbadzra d+har su ra tan+taM/ mahAbadzrasatA/ oM b+ha bswA/ de nas rdor dbang bskur ba// phyag na rdo rje mi 'dzan pa// rdo rje 'dzan chen slob dpon du// 'di nyid du
nib grub 'gyur// de nas kyang ni ci 'dod par// choga'i rim pa bsgrubs nas ni// rdo gar gyis mchod pa yis// legs par mchod la phyir phyung bya// de nas brtsams te rdo rje'i
bdag/ rdo rje kun gyis gsang rab 'dzan// rdo rje thams cad 'dzin slob dpon// dngos grubathams cad grub par 'gyur// rdo rjesems dpa'i dngos grub che// phyag rgya kun bdag dbang
phyag che// d+hi/ thams cad mkhyenapa'iri dzi// las rnams thams cad nus brtag/ mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa// kun byed dngos grub thams cad ster// sems can kun gyi
rgyal po che// tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs nus// thams cad rjes chags byed kun mchog/ kun rigs pa dang kun gyi bdag/ 'dod pa thams cad la rab sbyor// phun tshogs kun gyi
dbang phyug che// lha lasogs pa risems can kun// bsgo ba thams cad rtag tu byed// rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu mthong// tsho ba de nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// de nyin/
kyisan 'dod par ldan// dgor zhing rang nyid de bdag por// rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur ba yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams dpas gsungs so// bde ba chen po rdo rje slob dpon
byin gyis rlobacing 'jugapa'i tshog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// rdo slobam 'jug pa'i tshog rgyas pa'i rgyud rjes su bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams rapas gsudA
so/ ro tshomachod yonas nig khar bskor// bcings nas bsam g.yos bzhin gyis// mgo bos yang dge phyag byab// dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed yin// dkyil 'khor du ni rabo
zhugs la// skor ba lan gsum byas nas ni// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// 'gro ba kun las gruba mdzad brjod// de nas dus kyi mchod pa yis// bde ba chen po yang dag mchod//
y+Ya de bzhin du ni dbang bskur bar// rdo rje gasang ba'i slob ma gzhug/ de nas ji bzhin brgyan nas ni// sproslob dpon gyis rlab gzhug/ slob ma'i tshogs rnams bcug nas ni// ci
'dod pa yi dngos grub thob// de nas slob ma bcug gsani// dga' chen pon brjod par bya// grab dgyes rab bde bstan pa ya// rdo rje sems bdag 'di grub mdzod// de nas mi rtog 'phrang
bani spyi bo nas ni myur du dor// gang du me tog babs gyurd// lhag pa'i lhar ni bsgrub 'gyur// de nas lha yi chu yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa dang dbang bskur// rdo rje chen po rdo rjelnga//

phyin l jo rdzobadz+hakhirjod// omahAsu kha badzra/ badzraa b+hi khe e nan+taM/ a b+hi Shinyami/ mahA badza?d+hu na/ hekhadzinam sad+d+hi ni ma/ gangal rdo rje mang gang 'ge yin pa de lakye zhes bya b.ris dang
sbyar bar bya'o/ de nas sAng po byin la// phyag rgya bcib brlabs nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa grub par bya'o/ rdo rjesams dpa'i chog 'am// gang 'dod rang gi grub pa la//
de nyid kyis ni dam tshig nyid// 'jug la sogs pa'i tshig bshad// 'jig rten pa nas chogs dang/ de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa yang// thams cad rang ga de bon/ rgyus
par bsgrubs na rab grub// bad le rab tu'ajug tsam gyis// mi tshugs pa dang mi ldog pa/ gnyid du rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur zhing// bde chen rab tugrub pa ltar// de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob
dpon mda' na mang du bsgrags nasakyang// de nyid chos dang dam tshig/ rang nyid dang na gzhan gyis brlab// de la 'dazhimanagrub pa'i rdo dzachus dbang bskun s brjod par bya'o// 'di
ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig srung na 'grub par 'gyur// dngos grub rdo rje bdud rtsi chu// de nyid chos dang dam tshagin// gal te dkyil 'kho
ma mthong sma// kye 'o 'dug n gnas pa 'am// dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur// del 'di ni de khon nyid dang dmatshig gi gsang ba'i cho ga rab tu smin pa yin te//
pe thog mtha'amadapalisamasadapa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' bache/ d kun tu bazang po kun bdag 'de// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po 'badag/ de khon nyid mchog gi gsang ba'i
lnga'i de khon nyid chen por bshad par brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan de nyid chos kyi mchog bka' stsal par mdzad// srid pa ngod kyis dag/ ngo bo 'di kyis srid bralabyas// rang bzhin/
dag pa'i sems dpa'i mchog/ srid pa mchog ni byed pa yin// de la srid pa rnam par dag pa'i thabs rtogs pa thams cad kyi gsang bas chogadam tshig chen po bstan pa rabya ban bad yon te/
sradi pa'i bde ba shin tuchung// sngagabasngalachen po ngag bya'i phyir// shin tubade ba dam pa'i thabs// dam tshig rtag tubarten par bya// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// ci 'dod par
ni bstan bzhin du// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas// bdag dang gzhan la mchod pa// de la rtog pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mchog gi dam tshig chen po 'di brjod par bya ste/ ji srid
'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i// de srid mtshungs med sems can don// myang n ma 'da' byed par nus// gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig zabs// bsod/
namasabyin rlabs sgrathabyed pa// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug mchog/ rgyun du sems can don byed pa'o// de ltar sems na ba dang rdo rjenyid du gyis// rang gi dam tshig mi bzad bde bskyed/
snyan par gyis// de ni 'grol myur du bde ba sangs rgyas thamaMs cad dang// rab tu mtshungs shing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur// de nas khyed kyis bcud dang/ khazas dang/ gnas
dang = gludang/ ri'i mo la sogs pa'i chod pa rnams legs par stobs pas bdag nyid gang la sred pas kyang rdo rje slob dpon chen po mchod par bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon me tog sogs//
ci 'dod pa na legs mchod cing// rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis// yang dag par ni mchod de byung// de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon// gar gyi mchod pas mchod nas ni// rdo rje thal
mo spor ba yis// slob ma kun gyis rab tumachod// ro dang kha zas gnas pa dang// glu dang rol mo ci 'dod pa// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin bdag/ yang dag mchod nas phyir byung bya//
dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba'o// de nas sgrub pa bshad bya ba// dngos grub 'an tu rtog pa ste// gang ga srid pa'i 'di nyid la// dngos grub rtag pa
mchog grubapa/ de ltar byang chub spyod sogs pas// dge ba'i tshul gyis gzhan gyis kyang// sangs rgyas kun sogs thob mi 'gyur// gal bya min pa bsod nams
med sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pan// rnam pa kun tu mthong sogasakyis// sems can don byed minus so// de bas rgyud chen las grubapa// sangs rgyas lam ni nordzabadzan/ bkab
la sogs pas sems can don// nam mkha' mnyam par byed pa yin// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// srid pa'i nges po dra ma med// nam mkha' mtha' sa sems can rten/ ma
ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin// dkyil 'khor dag stul zhugs pa// bsod nams med pa'i m le lo ca// de yang kun mchog grub pa yi// tsho'anyid la 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bco
ldan 'das don yod grub pa rdo rjesams dpas gsungs so/ de nas do yodapa thogs pa med pa myur du sgrub pa'i mchog rjes su bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems rabs
gsungs so// lugs ma 'amani brkos pa 'am// byas pa'i m na bros pa yani/ dang ba'asomos pa'i rtogasanas ni/ mdun du de bslabapar bya// nyin re zhing dang po ru// de bzhin
yul dang ldan rgyur pas// dang bo'i gsang mchog gis bkug ste// phyag rgya chen por rab byin brlab// rdo rje mig gis de bzhin bolas// rdo rje bsgoms tshul bdag po rang// ngo
h+phanaglur blangs pas// rdo rjesams rab basgrub pa bya/ der rjesacha lugs ji zhan du// mchog gi deng bor rab dgyes pas// gzugs brnyan la sogs dngapor ni/ da dod
bar naMrab tu sgrub// 'di yis 'dod pa kun dbang phyug/ 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro'ong lding// dngos grub kun gyi deb phyug grub// kun mchog dang po'iribang phyug yin// phun
chogs kun bdag thams cad pa// 'dod chags chon po bde bache// thams cad kun mdzad snatshogs pa// rtag bar kun tu 'dul ba po// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba mchog/ phyag rgya
kun bdag dbang phyug yin// rdo rje kun gyi dngos grubache// thams cad mkhyen pa'i byung gnas che// mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa// thamasacad byed cingekun gyis gnas// khams
gsum las rgyal stsatshogs pa// tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa// kun la rjes chags kun gyi mchog/ kun ragis dngos grub thams cad ster// rang gi rnam 'phrul rab ston
byed kun mchog dngos grub chen poste// dbang phyug chen pos rab phyugache/ gzugs dang tshe stobs rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje sems dang po gnyis pa bzhin// 'grob rnams kyis
mchod cing rjod// rang gi gnyen rnams kyis brten pa// rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen ltar// rga dang 'chibamed par 'gyur// gal te rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// sangs rgyas byang chub
sems nyid 'do/ dngos grub dziltar 'dod pa nyid// cho' de nyid la 'grub par gyur// phyis 'am 'jig rtenapa'i m// rtog pa kun bshadachog 'am/ rang
nyid kyis mdzad kyis rtag tu// dngos grub thams cad grub 'gyur zheg/ bcom ldan rdo rje dngos grub kyis// dbang phyug bde ba chen po// rdo rje 'chang ba chen rgyal po// kun
mchog sa yi dbang pos gsungs// de la ji ltag na rang gi phyag rgyasgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhen/ phyag rgyan bo mnyamakhazhag la// rang gso de po lan cages// dzaM b+hA su to lasanal lta/
su bo sad+d+hA ta la gu/ de la ji ltar yagi hUM/ klu blang ba yi rgyud yin zhe ni/ rid+d+hi ti sogs kyis brgyan ldan/ cinus pa dang ci dga' dang// g+haN+Dalo sogs glu blangs bgi
yi ge hU~Mgs 'grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi// mchog de sgrub pachud bshad de// gal te phyag rgya sgrub 'don// de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur bas// rang nyid
kyisan rgyabacis la// yongs su mi skyo'i bar du bsgrub// de la ji ltar na dmatshigathogasacad grub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ dam tshig phyag rgyabacings nas niaM/ sam ya hU~M zhes brjod la//
rang ging khar rim bzhin du// phyag rgya'i mchog de bsgrub par bya// de nas las kyi phyag rgya yi// mchog sgrub pa ni rgyud du ni// jo rjegar gyis mchod pa yis// yongs su ma skyobs/
[z ]bsgrubasan// mchod pa kun sogs lasa rnams// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje chang chen nyidadang ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid dang/ gzhan yang dngos grub
thams cang na// dam par gyur du 'grub par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad sgrub pachen po don bod par grub pa'i tshig rgyas pa'i rgyud go/ de nas rtogs pa thams cad sgrub pa'i
dngos grubakyi rgyud ni nyin re zhing dang bor lan cig phyag rgya sgrub pa don yod pa dengos grub thogs pa med pa bshad par 'o/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// thams cad rjes su skyes
parabyang dang/ dgug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dang du bya ba bsgrubapal ni bde ba chen po rdo rje lta bas so// bde ba dang/ yid bde ba dang/ phun sumatshogs pa dang/ dngos grub thams
d mngon par 'phel bar bya ba ni bde ba chen po rdordzas so/ tshe dang/ lang tsho dang/ gzugs dang/ gabri brjid chen po mngon par 'al bar bya ba ni dang bo'i rje tshe bcud kyis/
len gyis so/ dpal chen bo dang/ skal ba bzang bo dang/ grags pa dang/ snyan pa 'phel bar bya ba lan dang po'i rdo rjegrubabs so// stobs chen bo dang/ ye shes dang//
chos dang/ las bsgrub par bya ba la nadang po'adzi snying stobs che bas so// rdzu 'phrul dang/ cho'aphruladang/ rmad du byung ba dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston pa la nadang
po'ajo'i rnam par 'phrul pasaso// thams cad du ya go dang/ gzugs kyis bden pa thams cad matho ba dang/ thos pa dang/ sa bdang/ 'drib grub pa
par bya ba la 'dang po'i rdo rjodon yod pa'i bden pas so// dbang po thams cad kyis bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang/ thos ba dang/ sba ba dang/ zil gyis gnon par bya ba la dang bo'i
donayod pa'i bden pas so// sgyu ma thams cad dang/ bde ba'i mchogarang/ lungabasgo ba dang/ lan thob pa grub pa la dang bo'i rdo rje rmad du byung bas so// gter thams cad dbyung
bdang/ noradabrog pa dang/ rgyal srid thob pa dang/ sa la nye bar longs spyod pa lanadang bo'adzad bang bskurabs so// yul thams cad dang/ skye bo dang/ grong khyer dang/ nags dang
chu bor zhabar longs spyod sprul pa lan dang po'i ro grub pas so// thams cad las mngon ma byung ba'i lha yuladung/ nibo chodang/ kha zas dang/ btung ba dang/ g.yog 'khongasha'i
tubazang po la sogs po yulo de nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sprul pas so// skadatsog gis sa gzhi thams cad 'bru lasogs pa smin par bskyod ba dang/ chu'i phung po chen po
byung ba dang/ snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang/ rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba le ni deng po'i jorjod byings kyi dbang phyug gis so// rgyud mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bza'i bdang/ btung bdang/
rang rtsor gzhug pa dang/ las thams cad 'ab sbyab na dang po la rje don yod pa'i thams cad dbang du byed pas so/ dngos grub thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang/
chub sems dpa' dang/ rdorje'adzazhipa dang/ rdo rje la sogs mthong ba la ni dang po'i rdo bsAms pas so// rang gibadag nyid rdo rjesems dang 'a la sogs pa'i gzugs thamasacad/
sprulatsang ston pa mi snang ba dang/ nam mkhar 'gro ba grub pa dang/ shin tu phrakhadang/ spom pa dang/ dumar ston pa lan dang po'i rdzordzogazugs sna tshogs bas so// 'jig rten gsu/
kyi bdag por gyur pa thamasacad dbab pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ las thams cad la sbyarab lan dang po'i hU~M mdzad kyis so// lha thams cad dbab pa dang/ bcingab dang/
dbang du bya ba dang/ las thams cad la nges par sbyarab lan dang po'i rdo rje lha'i bdag pos so// klu thams cad gdon pa dang/ 'dul ba dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ las thams
cad la ngos par smarab nirang po'i rje 'bar ba'i rjes so// gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ las thamasacad langes par sbyar bar bya ba
dang/ sag par bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rdzogadon 'dul bas so// dkyilo 'khor thams cad brtag pa dang/ 'jug pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ sgrub pa dang/ sa thams cad la ngos/
par sbyar bar bya ba lan dang po'i dordzo 'khor los so// phyag rgya thams cad dgug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ brtan pa bya ba sgrub pa lan dang po'i
rdo rje phyag rgyas grub pas so// dam chag thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ sgrub pa la ni dang po'i de rje dmatshig gi mchog gis so// las thomasacad rab tu sgrub
pa la rnam par mi 'jigs par bya ba dang/ brtan par bya ba dang/ grags pa chen porab tu bsgrags pa lani deng bo'i rdo rje las kyis so// rdo rje thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug po
dang bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la ni dang po'i rirjes so// sems dpa' chen po thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la nadang
po' rdo rje sems dpas so// de bzhinaMgshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba sgrub pa wan dang po'i de bzhin gshegs pas so//
rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgug pa dang/ bcang ba dang/ dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pas so zhwakyang gasus go/dal 'khor gtum zhugs pa ma/sdig pa thams cad byas pa ma/
rang gisnyid po ma bsgrubs pa'i m dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur/ ma bsgrubs par thams cad 'grub pa/ don yod par grub pa/ phyag rgya mchog tu grubaba'o// de nas dang
po'iing po mkhasgrubs pa'i thams cad don yod pa// thogs pa med pa/ las thams cad kyi rgya skad cig sgab parjes su bshad par bya'o/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thams cad kyi
snachogos pasi'aphrin las rdorje 'chang chen posagasungs so// don yod pa thogs pa med pa/ [”]bdag[”]'der gshegs lhan cig tu// las kyi rab 'byams 'di dag/ dngos
grub skad cig gis sgrub byed// 'diltasta/ thams cad ngashin tubasrung ba dang/ yongs subs bdang/ zhibadang/ bde legs su bya ba dang/ tsha'aphel bar byab lan rerdzog gyi
sems dpa'i tshulagatsug gtor gyi phyag rgyas so// dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshams dang/ phyogs dang/ dmatshig dang/ dngos grub cing shing srung b.lan ji gang gyi so sor 'brang
chepos so// nyin gsum pa dang/ nyin bzhi pa dang/ slar zlos pa dang/ rtag pa can dang/ khyab 'jug gi rigs thams cad gsal ba la rdzoga'agyi nad med pas so// gdung
bathams cad dang da gnod byed dang/ nad dang/ rgyun dang 2 sdug bsngal thams cad gazhag pa la ni rdo rjegar gyi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'o// dug dang sbyar ba'i dug la sogs nye bar
tharapa dang/ dbab pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ bza' bdang/ bdud rtsir bya ba lan di rdzogar gyi nye ba'i dug gis so// gdon thams cad dbab pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dmatshug
[E ]chu gya dgu rgyur/ du gzhug pa dang/ rab tugadul ba dang/ srung ba lan rdo rje gar gyi gdon las thar pa'o// thams cad la bcing ba dang/ thar pa dang/ dral bdang/ ltung ba dang/
ljang ga lan rdo gar gyi rinapo'akhro zos so// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgyagazhig pa dang/ gdon las thar bar bya ba dang/ shi babasrung ba dang/ tsho mngonipa'i phel
bar ng/ shin tu srung ba ni dordzagar gyi phyag rgya'ilan gyis so// sgrib pa thams cad dang/ sdig pa thams cad dang 2 rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ byuragazhig pa la
ni rje rdzogar gyi zhi bas so// thams cad dbab pa dang/ bskyod pa dang/ gar byed du gzhug pa dang/ thams cad bden par s+sara gzhug pa dang/ pra sa thams cad sgrub pa la ni de
gar gyi thams cad 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang/ gsad pa dang/ lhung bar bya ba dang/ bsangab dang/ slar gso b.lan din yod grub pa'i rdo rdzogar
gyi mkha' 'gro ma chen mos so// thams cad rengs par bya ba dang/ rmos par bya ba dang/ gnyid log par bya ba dang/ gsad pa dang/ bza' bar bya ba la ni rdo rdzogar gyi gdug
pa'i srin pos so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag bar bya ba dang/ gzhag par bya ba dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ lhung bar bya ba dang/ gsad par bya za lani ro tshog r gyi gsher byed
kyis so// khro be thams cad bsal ba dang/ bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang/ rtsod pa las rgyal pa dang/ 'jigs pa las thar pa dang/ g.yul 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i rgyal ba
sgrub pa la ni rdo rdzogar gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so// sngon thams cad yang dag par gzung zhing mi g.yo bar bya ba dang/ char chen po dbab pa dang/ rlung dang/ char dang/ glog
dang ser babazlog pa dang/ drob dang/ grang ba bsal ba la ni rdo rjegar gyi dbang po'i rdo rjes so// gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya thams cad shin tu grub pa la ni
rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyag gis so// rgyu ba dang mi rgyub thams cad rjes su chags pa dang/ dgug pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ rtse ba dang/ las thams cad la nges par
sbyar ba la ni ro rjegar gyi dngosagrub thams cad kyis so// lho thams cad dbab pa dang/ klu thams cad dbang du bya ba dang/ gnod spyin dang/ 'byung bo dang/ ma mo thams cad
las la nges par sbyar ba lan rdzordzogar gyi rdo rje glu'i mchog gis so// rnam thos sras mnon nas dpal drang bdang/ lha'i bu mo thams cad rab tungabrog pa dang/ lha dang lham yin
kyi bud med thams cad rtsa ba dang/ 'jig rten gosum ma lus pa las rgyal ba dang/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad las rgyal ba dang/ dbang phyug chepo thams cad dbrog pa
'an rdordzig gyi skyes bu byed pa chen ngos so// mchod pa thams cad sgrub pa dang/ thams cad rdo rjer bya ba dang/ bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang//
phyag rgya thams cad bcingab dang/ dngos grub kyi mchog la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad las kyi rgyu myur du grub par bya ba las rdo rje gar gyi don yod cingathog
tshub med pa myur ba'i las snachogs kyi dngos grub kyis so// de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrubapa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// nyin re dngawaM lanacig/ 'brug rgyas thams cad rab sgrub byed
sI nga mchog lon cig bzlas nasagi/ phyag rgya chen porab sgrub bya// de yi rjes la nyesnying po// las rnams ky-in la nges sbyar bas// don yod grub pas las rnams ni// kun la/
shin tu grub par 'gyur// phyag thams cad rab byin rob// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgyan// dkyil 'khor dag kyang mthong ba la// ma bshad pa la'ang rab sgrub 'gyur// rtog 'dir
'jig pa yod min te// 'khor lo chod pa'i brgya byin la// gang phyir bdag la byin rlob pas// nga sras rgyunibagyur ba yin// sdig pa chen po byed pa lagang// bsam pa
shes nas sbyin par bya// 'di dag bcings tsam nyidi dag byed// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur[” ]/dpel mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po bde ba chen po'adz+dzatshe
don yod pa'i dmatshigag ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa'o////de nas ston pa rdo rje'adzan// 'byin pa byed pa bde ba che// bde chen can dubastan phyir dang// sems can thams
cad rnam dag phyir// khams kun dang mnyamazad pa med// kun gyi bdag nyidi la zhugs te// mnyam pa'i de ngos grub mchog spros nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gis phyung
ngo mtha' yas pa yi zhing thams cad// 'jig rtenakun gyi khams bcas bas// de tshosangs rgyas thams cad kyis// til gyi gang bu bzhin myur gang// 'jig rten khoms
mi thams cad du// sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs// sems can thams cad ma dag pas// lung rig las kyis dag ma gyur// de tshe semaMs can khams rnams ni/
rang bzhin gyis na gso dka' phyir// rang gi las ni sbyang don du// btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjecan M// sems dpa' chen po bde ba che//
byang chub chen por thugs brtan pas// skad cig gis ni yang dag bskul// sems can la phan bsod nams tshog/ byang chub sems ni brtan pa dag/ sems can khams
ni rgud 'gyur bas// shin tu btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi thabs/
byang chub sems mchog khyod smos shig/ de nas ston ba rdo rje'anaM// de tshe kun nas byin gyisabarlabs// bde bachen podon/ dkyil 'khe che bo dam pa yin//
khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgya khyonagyi/ khakhoralatshon bo gdod nas byung// de yis khams gsum gnas pa yis// sems can thams cad yang dag bsgrubs// sangs rgyas kun/
sogs dngos sgrub la/ de dag ba 'grubakha'agyur// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad la// 'dus nas gsol ba'adebs mdzad pa// de bzhin gtogs pa'i rin po che/ sangs
rgyus kun mchog bshad du gsol// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs la yang dag gnas// sku gsung thugs rdo rje la// yang dag spros te 'di gsungs so//
o rgyu khaM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas// bdud bcom la sogs mdzad nas nii// byang chub snying bor byin kyis brlabs// de nas ston pa
rdzowadzinaM/ dkyil 'khor gyin chog gsungs pa// sems3la nibade don phyir// rtog pa kun gyi bde smano// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste//
dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol mchog/ rdordzo 'khor lo yang dag bri// kho la[B]bar sangs rgyas nyid// 'dzum pa rnams nas snang ba// sur tasamaya n+taM// o sats+tsha A zhes
[z]brjod dgod// mdun du bdud las rnam par rgyal// mdzad ba'i sangs rgyas yang dag gi g.yas sukhyachub sems dbang gi/ no nabosadir bskur// rkyab tubyanubusebs/
dpa' dang// mnyam du chos kyi 'khorakhaskog/ g.yon du 'gopar rnams dregasal/ sdigab bsdus par 'phyin pa'o/ de nas 'di rnams kyisang bogi badzrasatA/ badzragata/
badza?d+ha/ badzrakarma/ de nas phyag rgya rnams te/ satAbadzra/ badzrar/ badzrakhere/ bi shu 'dza/ mtshamaMs kyi cha nordorjod ng// zhichen sdong bu nor bu bri'o/ mtshams rnams su
nalha mo ste// lcags kyu la sogs sgo rnams su// de bzhin snga ma ji lta bar// 'khor la de'i rtog par bya// mchod pa'i thal mo snying khar bcings// g.yon du de bzhin bskor bar bya//
me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyidamatshigarim/[”]me tog bcas te snying khar bcing// bsam pa g.yos pas gdud par bya// mgon la mgo bos phyagabyas
la skor ba lan gsum byas nas ni// zhugs nas me tog dor bar kyu// shin tu gsang ba yang dag dgug/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang/ dbang dubya
ba dang/ dgug pa dang/ bsgrub par bya ba'i sAng po 'di yin te/ o a kA ro mu khaM sarbad+hamaN+NaM/ A ru nAhabanan twAta/ de nas chog ji bzhin du// ston la ma tog sal ma dor//
bya@#// sangs rgyas byang chub rab grubaphyir/ 'gro ba'i mgon la de nyid brjod// de yi kun nas sangs rgyas na// thams cad 'dus pa nyid du 'gyur// thams cad mi/
migs sbyor ba yis// dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad// dkyil 'khor der zhugs pa la ni// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma
mchog snyachogs pa'i ba byung bar 'gyur// de nas de bzhin tshog ni// rgyas pas slob ma mchog gdu zhugs// mchod pa'i thal mos 'khor lo// mchod nas slar ni dbyung bar
bya sgrub pa byas nas dngos grub kyang// chog ji bzhin rab bshad bya// rdzas la bcom ldan bdud la sogs// rnam par rgyal bamanyes par bre'i/ sgrung 'di lan cig tsam gyis ni//
bde 'dra'i sgrub pas 'grub par 'gyur// sku gzugs sogs mdun yang dag par// ye shes khu tshur yongs gzung ba// rdo rje'atshog gi chog bzhin// bat+thus brjod stong phrag brgya
bya'o mdor na 'bumanardzogis pan// ci 'dod dngos grub thams cad dang// tsho mchog 'dal sangs rgyas nyid// thob 'gyur 'di la the tsoma med// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa=
phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya gang rung gcig bcangasanas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgoms// phyag rgya chen po' dngos grub che// brtan par myur du thob/
par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ snying khar rdordzogazugs bzhag ste// sa ma ya hU~M zhes brjod la// bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrubs nas ni// dngos grub
thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ bdud las rgyal ba'i mchog btungs te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// mtshungs med sems
can don byas la// las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu 'grub// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub pa'i tshego rgyas pa'i rgyud
do de nas ma bsgrubs dngos grub mchog/ las rnams rab 'byams dag pa ste// sdig pa kun sel snatshogs pa// go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya// 'di
ltaste = nad thams cad dang/ mya ngan dang/ gnod pa dang/ gnod byed dang/ dug thams cad dang/ sbyar ba'i dug dang/ gshed byed dang/ g.yeng byed dang/ ro langs dang//
sngags dang/ sAnadang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/ sdig pa dang/ smolam ngan pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'chib dang/ rims dang/ gdon dang/ mkha' 'gro ma
dang nyebar 'tsho ba dang/ 'go ba'i nad dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bashag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa/
thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bzog bar byed pas so// tshe dang/ latshod/ gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ gzi bachen po dang/ mdangs dang/ stobs dang//
[>slob dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ dpaMl drang/ skal ba bzang po dang/ bsod nams dang/ ming dang/ sAnapa dang/ grags pa dang/ dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ brnyan pa dang/
gas pa dang/ stobs dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ phung po dang/ 'du byed dang/ skudang/ gsung dang/ thugs 'phel ba la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen pos
so de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ babyed pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ ye shes dang//
stobs dang/ thabs dang/ rdorjod/ sgrub pa dang/ gzungs dang/ sa dang/ spyod pa dang/ so so yang dag par ga pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang/ chos
dang las dang/ sna tshogs pa'i bya ba dang/ sems can gyi don dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don dang/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs grub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi dengos grub thams cad kyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sims bskyed pa dang/ kun tu bzang po'i chog spyod pa rdzogs par bya
ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ 'pho ba dang/ skye ba'i nges dang/ gzhonanu' ba pa ston pa dang/ mngon par byang bdang/ dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang/ byang chub
kyi snying por gshegs pa dang/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang/ byang chub chen bor mngon par byang chub pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskorab dang/ mu stegs thams cad tshar gcod pa
dang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang/ lhalasababs pa dang/ 'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba dang/ 'dul ba
la rab tu gzhag pa dang/ ngan 'gro thams cad las 'don pa dang/ mdo sde thams cad ston par madzodapa dang/ rtog pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ dngos grub thams cad
sbyin dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skadang/ gsung dang/ thugs las dmigs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul sgrub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshog
kyi rdo rjes so// ji ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis// byang chub sems la mngon rten pa// de ltar byang chub spyodachogs kyi// byang chub dam pa thob mi 'gyur// don yod bsod nams
dam pa yis// lasakyi rab 'byams sgrub byed pa// tshog ma grub pa rnams grub// sas rgyas chos ni rab ster byed// rnam pa kun tu dad ldan pa'i// sems can kun la sbyin/
par bya// dkyil 'khor dag tum zhugs pa// skad cig gis nasbyor bar byed// dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
bo byang chub rdo rje byin gyis brlabapa'i rje dzo rtog pa rgyas pa'o// de nas sna tshogs lasachen po// khyab bdag rdo rdzo'adzanichen po// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog/
sogasatan kun la rjes ston mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa gis bskyod cing// gang phyis byas kyis gdug pagi/ rang gar ngasams spyod pa yis// zhi bas sems can kun gyi
rma don gdul bar rab tu slab minus// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrubabya ba'i// 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad yin// gang tshobader gshegos sems can don// dam pa mdzad par ma
spyod pa// detsho nyid kyis dngos po kun// gtso bos rdo rdzogasol ba btab// sems can thams cad 'dul mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab// ut+tiSh+Thas ma ya kro d+hani
sum labadza?hU~M/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// phyag na rdo rje rang nyid gtso// sku gsung thugs kyi ro rdzolas// sur byung nas ni mdun na gnas// khro chen rgyal po'i sku yis
ni/ saMmasadapa'i skyil krung gas legs bzhugs// 'bar ba'i 'phrang 'od kyis gsal bas// srog pa'i bskal ba bzhin 'dreb/ gagayon pa'i jo bsAms pa che/ dadrag tu
gso bas bskyod mdzad cing// 'thapa'i sdong 'bar ba// rnam par 'phros pas sreg pa yang// 'bar ba chen bos gsod pa ni// bsalaya'i zla yi phung po 'dra// dang po'i rje/
khro gnyer bcas// rdo rdzo mchog 'dzin pas gsungs pa// de la rdo rjem dang nyim ltar// 'bar ba zhes bya'i snying bo 'dayin te// hUM/ dezhas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sdig pa kun
gyi bud shing zad// 'jige ste na khams kyi 'go rten gsum// thams cad g.yos shing 'dul bar 'gyur// lha chen la sogs lha rnams ni// g.yo ba med cing rmongs par 'gyur
ngorje'abar ba 'khrug pa kun// de bzhin 'jig pa lta bur 'gyur// nyan thos dang rang rgyal rnams// mya ngan 'das pa nye bar 'gro/ lha la sogs pa'i srid gsum kun// demo
kun tu rmongs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub yang bstan mdzad// sems dpa' kun gyi thabs chen po// dam pa yang ni thugs su chud//
de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i mechog/ 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba 'khrug pa'i 'od// rjemachab gatsugs pa'i zhal// zhal las khrod bcas pa yis// g.yon brkyang bas legs par bzhugs//
spyan 'bar 'jigs su rung ba ste// dbu skra gyen du brjes shing g.yo// kun nas 'khyil cinge 'barab che// jo rdzogasang ba'i rnal 'byor che// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi yul can rnams//
khyung nas kun tu 'gro ba rnams// thams cad dun 'bab 'khrug/ rlung bskyodabaskal pa'im ltar bur// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs// 'jig rten kham/
ma lus na// sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa// yang dag bzhugs pa legasakhoskul te// 'jig rten thams cad yongs su bskor// bkug nas sems can kun don
dang brtan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum dag de rnams dang// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sems med byas// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// kun mchog lha yi dbang
pon de rnams la ni thugs rjeyos/ 'chibar slar gso ban por gsungs/ gao ut+ti mahUM ad+hi pa ti badzatsin+d+hagi g+haM ud thApA ya hU~M/ rgyu ba dang mi rgyub thams cad bsrung bar
bya'o de nas sa gsum byung ban// thams cad du ni shi bo gso// sangs rgyas dpa' bos btul gyur cing// rdo dzacan gyis kyang rjes btul// de nas rdo rje'adzan khro bas//
'bar ba'i rirje gsor byed cing// nga yi dmatshig la gnas zhes// sna tshogs pa mkhaka' rab bsgo// de rnams kyis gsol pa/ 'di su zhig lags/ bcom ldan skun zhi ba la//
gnod sbyin gzugs can gang lags gsungs// khyed kyi dam tshig ci 'drab/ zhus pa bde ba'itshig tu gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas
rnam grol ba// gdod sas rdo rjeganod spyin tshe/ dkona mchog gsum dang de bzhin du// ngal skyabs su 'gro bar gyis// 'jig rten gsum gyis 'di thos nas// chogs bdag chog/
kyi dbang phyug bcas// bskal pa'i modapung lta bu ya// 'bar ba'i mtshon gyis 'thab par brtsams// de rnams kyis sbas pa/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyus rigs// rdo rje gnod
spyin shes ma yin// bdag cag 'jig rten gsum po gcig/ gnod sbyin bsgo bas ci zhig bya// denus rdo rje 'dzin khros nas// khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus te gnas// de nas
khroganyer thams cad na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rjes su spyod// g.yon ba bsnyems pa rgya bcas pas// sminam spyan bsdus pas rgod cing// nam mkha' khyab pa'i dbyangs kyis
ni ga tukhros bcas pas smras so// de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'anyobaAbo sems can lus rgyal ba la'od yin te// hi/ de nas snying po 'di byung
bas= nges rgyuwa bcu gcig bcings pa dang// dam tshig brtan pa 'dzin du bcug/ rdo rjeming gis dbang bskur nas// lagar rdo rje 'dzin mchog byas// rdo rje tshang na
byin nas su// 'jig rten gsum bo ting 'dzin bzhag/ de nas rdo rje chen po mchog/ mgon po yis nagasol btabab// sems can kun la rjes ston pas// rtog pa dano
bshad du gsol// rdo rje'adzan pas gsungs pa yi// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol du// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo yang dgabri// de yi dbus su gzhag bya ba//
sngon po 'bar ba gzugs bzang la// zhal gyi mchab cung zad gtsags// zhalan khrod bcas pas bzhud// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs// bsams bcasangashas
cher 'bar ba la// 'od zer 'bar ba'akhrugs pa yi// rdo rjegasor ba mdzad la brtson/ de yadengosan thams cad du// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs// jo mtshon cha mdung chen dang//
la gri zhags pa mtshon 'dzin pa// mtshams su mda' dang kha TaMg 'khor lab dan sna tshogs 'dzani// rdo rje'i gosanasna tshogs// 'barab 'i 'khor los yongs su bskor//
dkyil 'khor dgod par bya ba ni/thigebadun gyiso ni yang dag tu// dang po rdo phyag rgyagadag/ gnyis pa sngags kyi lha mo ste// gsum pardo rjergyal po ni// ro tsho lha mos yang dag
bskor// rdo rjechen mo sgeg mo// bzhi pa glu mkhan ma la sogs// rgyal rigs gsol ka bran rnams kyis// khrobo rnams ni ldab 'gas// drug par rdo rje pho nya mchog/ gnod
sbyin srin po kang kar// dbang phyug dam pa dragalo sogs// gtum bo chen po 'dul bar mdzad// phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbyibs rnams su// mdor na ming po gsum la sogs//
lhal sogs pa'i tshogs thamasacad// legs par bri'am gzhag par bya// mtshams su lha mo rab bshad pa// de rnams kyi ni sgo dbus su'ag/ lcags kyu la sogs de bzhin du//
dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshulagyis// go rams dag ni ji bzhin du// tshogs bzhin bya// khros pas rdordzogasor ba dang// khro gnyer 'dzum dang bcas pas 'dud// de nas khro zhing
slob dpon che// rdo rje can mchog rab zhugs la// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis sdigs mdzub// hA mdzad rab tu sbyar bar bya// sems dang bcas pas rgyas btab nyid// de bzhin khro bsagadul
ba la rdo rje 'chang chen rgyas pa yis// gdug pa nyid la rab tu dgyes// de nas me togablangs nas ni// khres pas bdag poche lagator// rdo rje 'bar ba'ilcags kyu ches// yang
dgupar yang dgug par bya// o mahAbadzra dzA la yA na wAs ya hi dza/ sarba badzra ku la pra be sha yahU~M/ sarba mu droganAnabanad+han traT/ sajas ma yaM sA d+ha ya phaT/ sarba duSh+Tha nad ha pa tsa
b+hasmi ku ru mahAkod+ha ag+hi badzoNahU~MyaT/ a a aa/ de nas bcom ldan khro bo yis// rgyal bo bstan pa che byon 'gyur// rdo rje rigs la sogs pa kun// dngos grub thams
cad gsol bar mdzad// de nas hU~M mdzod la sogs sgras// mtshan ma rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te slob ma la sogs la// snying khar dbab pa phra ba skyed// de nas
bya// rdo hA mdzad kyis// phyag rgyas slob m gzhug par bya// bcug nas dang bo'i sems dpa' yi// rang ga snying po brjod par bya// hU~MhUMbadzra pra har Tiphatra/ hUMbadzra
po A la yA shrani tri ta/ ma ta/ sahU~M badzra ko NInAhaM/ oM badzraam la pA she ma Ta/ jo tshe 'gugs pa dang/ rdo rje mdung dang/ rdo rje ral gri dang/ rdo rje zhags pa ste/ rdo rje khro be'i sring
ba'o de nas 'di rnams kyi phyagergya rdo don yod thogs pa med pa shin tu grub pa/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa rnams sems can mngon par rgyas gdab pa nus pa rnams bskul bar/
bya'o oM badzragu byasid+hi pa ram yo gshAri haM/ hUMbadzotsat+taho khaNAg mahAbadzaka pA la yam ku ste/ ru lu rulud+d+hihUMbadzanArA ya na ji/ hU~MbasngaT ka ji/ dorje khro bo'i mkha' 'gro
ma lan cig bzlas te dgod pa 'am bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'dis de khon nyid kyi song pos bzhugs su gsol// dngos grub thams cad la don yod pa'i dngos grub 'grub
par 'gyur ro// de nas dmachig brjod par bya ste/sems can thams cad bde phyir dang// bstan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// gdug pa 'dul ba bsod nams/ 'gyur
zhes rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das hUM mdzad kyis phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo sbyar bar bya'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad dang/ bdud
thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yang dag par 'dul ba nyid du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// de nas dbang bskur ba rgyas pa la sogs pa de bzhin du byas lardo rje khro bo'i 'os bzhi
