pa bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya rnams kyis sems can rnams rgyas gdab pa dang/ phyag rgya g.yog pa dang/ gsad pa dang/ srar 'tsho bar bya'o// gangal phyagargyasgyur bas 'chi bar 'gyur ba
de ni gdug pa yin par shes par bya'o// de nas 'tsho bar byed pa'i phyag rgyas 'tsho bar byas langashin tu srung ba rab tu sbyar ba byason shanitu srung ba yin pa'i phyir gdug pa rnams slar yang
gnod par mi byed do// de nas brtsams te slob ma bzang// dkyil 'khoratshogs ni kun gyis kyang// mi tshugs pa dang mi sod par/ tshe'adi nyidi la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas 'di sgrub
bshad bya ste// bzhin snyan dege 'dun du// rdo rje gsor zhing dang po ni// bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya ba go/ 'bum tshang nas ni sems dpa' che// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam mchogo/
rdo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog/ rgas dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// gdug pa rnams ni rjes 'dul zhing// sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod par// 'jig rten gsum du legs snang zhing//
cis kyang 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// de nas de khon nyid kyi sing po sgrub pa naM/ 'agling ngam yang na 'dug pa 'am// 'gro ba 'am nyal bar byed pa na// ji ltar de ltar 'bum
bzlas na// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// 'di yis 'dod pa'i dbang phyug kun// 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong ldang// dngos grub kun gyis dbang phyug grub// [}]
sa dang 'tshib med par 'gyur// 'gro ba rnams kyis mchod pa dang// rang gi nye du rnams kyis brten// gdug pa thams cad rjes 'dul zhing// gang la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur//
bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gsungs so// de nas phyag rgya'i dam pa spyab pa yin// ji bzhin dus su phyag rgya bcas// bdag nyid nye bar bsregs nas ni/ srid 'di
nyid du khro chen po'i// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig sgrub pa ni// bdag ni thams cad gsad bya zhes// brjod mi phyag na rdo rje yis// dam tshig
phyag rgya bcingasanas ni// bkrus na rdo rje 'dzin 'grub 'gyur// de nas las rnams sgrub pa ni// las rnams dam pa sgrub pa ni// rnam pa bzhi ni rab byed cing// thams cad bde
ba'i phyir bros na// rdo las nyid thob par 'gyur// sgrob pa chen po 'tshog rgyas pa'-i rgyud do// de nas dngos grub sgrub pa ni// rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po ya/ dalas
kyi rgyun ni dam pa rnams// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// 'di lta ste/ thams cad sreg pa dang/ bsad pa dang/ gzhig bdang/ rengs par byed pa dang/ gnyid log par bya ba
dang rgyas gdab pa dang/ rmongs pa dang/ gzhig pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ gzir ba dang/ dral ba dang/ rdeg pa dang/ 'bar ba dang/ bsgyel ba dang/ btso ba dang/ gcad pa dang/
dbug pa dang/ phyi mar bya ba dang/ gtor ba dang/ rnam par gzhom pa dang/ rims dang/ dug dang/ gdon gyis zin du gzhug pa dang/ sbyor bar bya ba dang/ gsad par bya ba la ji dzihUM
mdzad kyis so// thams cad 'dug par bya ba dang/ nges par bkod pa dang/ bskyod pa dang/ gar byed du gzhug pa dang/ glu len du gzhug pa dang/ brgyal du gzhug pa dang/ rtse gzhug pa dang/
gaha zhes dgod du gzhug pa dang/ 'khor ba dang/ drang ba dang/ 'ong du gzhug pa dang/ sgom pa dang/nub par bya ba dang/ dbyong ba dang/ 'phang ba dang/ 'bar ldeg par bya ba dang/ bskur ba
dang nga ro 'donapa ba dang/ dur gzhug par bya ba dang/ rang nyid brdeg par bya ba dang/ 'ching bar bya ba dang/ sku 'bal bar bya ba dang/ zhe 'gras pa bya ba dang/ gos bshu ba dang/ ldeb bar
bar bya ba la ni khro bo'agodan gyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ dbab pa dang/ pra sen sgrub pa dang/ bden pa smra bar brjod pa dang/ sgyu ma ston cing lan ston pa dang/
dus tshigs kyi 'khor lo yongs su bzlog pa dang/ dus ma yin par shing las me tog 'bras bu smin par byed par ston pa dang/ 'bru thams cad yang dag par ston pa dang/ mas dang/
[7 ]@#// sbyar ba'i dug dang/ gdon dang/ dug dang/ mkha' 'grem las thar par bya ba dang/ g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad las thar par bya ba dang/ gzhan gyi dpung gnom pa dang/
phyogs dang/ mtshams dang/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang/ na tu srung ba dang/ yongs su skyob par bya ba dang/ thar par byab dang/ bsrung ba dang ngangang du bya ba la ni khrobachen po sna tshogs grub
pas so// lha la sogs pa thams cad ltungabar bya ba dang/ klu 'don par bya ba dang/ gnod sbyin rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang/ srin po sbug pa dang/ mkha' h+phagros la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad dang/
bdud kyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang/ ma mo rnams gdul bdong/ gdug pa'i tshogs rnam par gtor ba dang/ gdug pa rnams tshar gcod pa dang/ 'das pa dang/ 'jigs pa med par yang dag par

bskyod pa dang nor bu bzang po dbang du bya ba dang/ nor sbyin las nor thams cad dbrog pa dang/ rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba rang/ lha'i bu mo gzher num thams cad dang rtse 'arje bya ba dang/

brgya byin manan nas bde tsog ma dbrog pa dang/ skem byed tshar gcad pa dang/ tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba dang/ khyab 'jug 'dul ba dang/ dbang phyug chen po las rnam par rgyal ba dang/ 'dod pa'i dbang
phyag mnan nas dga' ba mo 'brog pa dang/ rdo rje sgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrubai pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang/ dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/
rumatshag bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ sgrub pa lan rirje khro bochen po rgyal po dam pa'i dengos grub kyis so zhes kyang gasungs so/ lan cig bzlas pas mchog grub pa// thog ma'i
snying bzang lan cig/ de yi 'og tu khro gnyer gyis// bsgrub bya thams cad grub pa yin// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ doN+Dim dang nyim ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i rtog pa'i
tshog rgyas pa'o// de nas ting 'dzin thams cad na// rnam dag mchog gi chos nyid las// spyan dras gzigs dbang chen pon// rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso chen yi// gdug pa
thams cad 'dul don du// gang rigasachen bo chen bskyed// sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo'i// thabs med pas ni spobs yin no// 'dod chags la sogs kun bsags pas// ma dag sems can
khams ragan// de rnams lan rab spyod par// skyes bu mchog na rnam par mkhyen// mchog tu mi 'dul ba nyid kyis// sangs rgyas kyang ni mnga' mdzad// 'jig rten kun n 'jig rten
mchog/ dang snying bzang ba la snyoms zhugs// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes/
kyi rdzong zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ gangal gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyag thams cad kyi thugs su chud par gyur pa'o// bsAms
sa @da nga sa paju g.yos pa na// bzung ste 'dabam 'byed mdzad pas// dunas pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// rang bzhin gyis na gzigs par mdzod// jigyur pang dmar po 'di/ tshon/
po gyis nyes ra sa mi shes pa// gnas kyi nyes pa sna tshogs pa'i/ khams gsum pa ni de bzhin dag/ 'di la gzigs pa la sogs pas// rgyal ba rnams n dbangapor 'gyur// de yis rdo rje
sems dpa' ni// spyan ras gakhrigs kyi dbang phyug gyur// de bsabasgoms pa 'i snying bo 'ad// dag par bsgoms pas sgom par gi/ rdo rje 'chang ba chen po ni// pad+ma chen po 'chang
bar 'gyur// gser sbyangs pa yi dbang po ste// rgyal po chen po dang mnyam pa/ bswAms pa g.yon pa'i med mchog gis// tshul gyis 'dul ba mdzad pa na// pad+ma'i rigs mchog
ston pa'i phyir// rgyal po rnams kyis gsol ba btab// de nas thams cad 'dul mdzad cing// nyan khyudakar ba'i chos 'dzin pa// rdo rje chos te rang rgyal po// 'jig rten dbang pos
bka' stsal pa// phyi ni dkyil 'khor chen po la// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyud pa bri// de yi dbus su spyan 'dzum pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug dgod par bya// gser sbyangs lta bu'i pad+ma ni/
g.yon bsums tshul gyis gzigs mdzad pa// rgyalamachon kun gyis rnam par spras// sangs rgyas sku mchog spyi bor bzhugs// de ya ngos ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku ni/
brgyad po bri// rang gi 'dzin pa pad+machesri/ ting nge 'dzin la rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten dbang po'i gzugs 'gas su// sangs rgyas la sogs gos kyi lha// zhi ba sred med bumos
pa 'dod pa'i gzugs nipad+macan/spyi bor 'tsher bzhing mgrin 'degs pa// mgrin lcags kyu bcings nas ni// chos kyi tshigags spyan drang bya// de nas pad+ma'i sAng po ni// sarba ta thA ga

tapa dza/ hUMbadzrapad+ma he pad+ma/ pad+ma paM/ ho pad+ma nA rA dza/ de nas mtshams rnams sunaM/ hU~Mpad+metsit+tagrwarahU~M/ hamahAbashwa pad+ma tsAr Nasid+d+hihU~M/ maTahi pad+mapad+mo/ hU~Ma hopad+ma a shA/
kram kra ma hUM dzi/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// chog rgyas par byas nas ni// pad+mochen po me tog bcas// ma yengs yod kyis phyag bya'o// dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ting nge 'dzani/
las byung gzungs 'di brjod par bya// obashod+ha ya/ man sanang+ge'adz+dzAmahAsatA/ d+hA tus ma yasatA/ rwagadIpany+tsaye/ tsat+tims=d+ha me badri tsit+tims d+hame shu yin/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya
gsan nas ni// dgyes pas pad+ma 'dzin pa ni// de nas mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing// chos kyi tshig gis legs spyan drangs/ oM sarba tathA ga taa ba le ko'u ra pad+mahasta/ ya gi 'aglomam badzra

mu dra akra shas be sa ma yer bar bingashi ki mo/ dza/ hU~MpaMho/ sho d+ha ya sam+basAd+ha ya pa ma me/ mahA badzrad+ha ra hU~M/ de nas/ 'jig rten 'dzin pa rang nyid byon/ 'jig rten kun mchog grub 'gyur
bya@#// pa/ ting 'dzin cho ga nges par mdzad// de nas de bzhin slobam rnams// gzhug pa'i tshig rgyas pa ni// dngos grub thams cad spen pa yis// ye shes dag ni bslab par
po bya ting 'dzin sAng bo 'di yi ni// sgrub pa chen po gdod nas 'byung// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// bud med rnams kyi nang zhugs pa 'am// gajug pa
a kun gyi nang chud pa 'am// gang yang rungo bar 'dug nas ni pachen po yongs su gzung// dus dang stobs noji bzhin du// ltaring ci nus bsgrub par bya// chog 'di yi tshe 'di la// myur mchog
ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'dod chags kun gyis bde myur ba// 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding/ 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// rgya dang ribamed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sem
dpa' nyid// phyag na rdo rje nyid dang ni// dngos grub kun gyi mtha' yas mchog/ tsho'adi nyid la thob par 'gyur// de nas phyago rgya sgrub pan// phyag rgya bcings te ting 'dzin gnas// dngos grub
chen po nyide thobago// dam tshig dmatshiga mchog gas te/ las kyi las mchog phyag rgyas so// sgrub pa chen po' tshog lirgyud do// de nas dngos grub ma grub pa'i// ting 'dzin
lasan 'dres pa dag/ dang po'i ting 'dzin grub pa ni// go rims bzhin ngu ba bshad bya// 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa thams cad dang/ sdig pa thams cad dang/ rmi lam napa dang/ ltas ngan
pa dang/ yams dang/ 'tshob dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ stug pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'brab pa dang/ byis nga 'a gdon
dang dmu rgod dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ ngal dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ dbul ba dang/ rgyugs pa dang/ reganam bde ba dang/ skal ba ngan pa dang/ nad
med pas yin pa dang/ nor ga pa rnams la ni pad+ma chen po zhi bas so// rlung dang/ mkhris pa dang/ khrag dang/ bad kan dang/ 'dus pa dang/ ma zhu ba dang/ rims dang/ sbyar ba'i dug
dang dug rang/ mdzodang/ 'brum bu phra mo dang/ g.yan pa dang 2 rkangashu dang/ skrun dang/ chu'adamu rdzing dang/ mtshan bar rdol ba dang/ sha bkra dang/ grang byeng dang/ khrag zad pa dang/
khu ba zad pa dang/ nad thams cad dang/ gnod pa dang/ gnod byed dang/ gdon dang/ 'bram n rnams gso ba phani pad+ma chen po sman gyi phyag rgya 'dzan pas so// thams cad rdo rjer byas pa dang/
chos dang/ go chadang/ gtsug tor dang/ gtsug phud dang/ mtshams dang/ phyogs dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ sa dang/ nam mkha' dang/ rdo rje'i gdan dang/ khang pa chen po dang/ rdo rje
ra bdang/ me 'bar ba dang/ thal ba'i ra ba dang/ ro rje dang/ ri bodonayod pa la sogs pa dang/ srad bus yongs su bskor ba dang/ phur bus gdab pa dang/ thas rung/ btung ba dang/ gos
dang/ rgyan dang/ phyag rgya dang/ srung ba la ni pad+machen po thams cad srung bas so// tshothams cad dang/ stobs dang/ kha dog dang/ gzibarjid dang/ mdangs dang/ lang tsho
[° ]dang brtson 'grus drang/ spro ba dang/ nad med pa dang/ dpal dang/ skul ba bzang po dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ dbang phyug dang/ 'byor pa dang/ dngos grub dang/ bladang/ red pa dang/
bkra shis pa dang/ ming dang/ grags pa dang/ snyan pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dam pa 'grub pa lan pad+ma chen po mchog grub pas so// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i
rgyalapo las/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa yongashos kyi rdo rje'i tshig rgyas pa'o////de nas rgyal po rdo rje'adzani// thams cad mi 'gyur nam mkha' che// thams cad dbang/
bsur kun gyi don// kun dbang rin chen thams cad 'dzin// ting nge 'dzin gyis rab byin rla// bdag po chen po rab sad mdzad// chos rnams la ninam gzigs pas/ kun don dbang phyug
gdod nas byung// zla dang ni gza' skar can// nam mkha' nyid du 'gyur ba yin// de nas rin chen ting 'dzan ni// nges par rdo rje can du brjod// de nas nam mkha' rdo rje nyid// ljong/
sngonabai DUrlamaMnyam mdangs// rdo rje rin chen rnams dge ba// nam mkha'i sing por yang dag gyur// de nas bcom ldan thog ma nyid/ mdzod spu kun gyi gnas na bzhugs// ting nge 'dzin
la rnam gzigs pas// 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag po nyid// sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas dang// de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/ rdo rje ne chen de yis// kun rigs kun gyi pang
bskur phyir// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i phyir// kun mchog kun la dbang bskur nas// shes pa brjod pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarlabadzrasatA a d+hipa titaM a g+ho Don ma b+hud+d+hA
bas/ de nas bzang pos 'di gsungs shing// legs par shasabarjod dbang bskur bas// rdo rje ni chen chede las// chos kyi geco bor byung bar gyur// byung nas 'gro ba thams cad ni/
ci rigs par ni kun dbang bskur// rdo rje kun gyis dbang bskur nas// slar yong dkyil 'khoratshul gyis bzhugs// bde gshogs kun gyis byin brlabs pa// rdo rje rin chen
banamed// shin tudabang phyug chen po'a mchog/ dngos grub gsol ba'i rtog pa gsungs// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol// nam mkha'i 'khor lo nam mkha'i mdog/ nyim/
zla bas mdang// gza' rnams kyis ni brgyan pa bri// de dbus nam mkha'i snying po ni// bdag nyid thams cad dgyes par gzhag/ dag pa'i pho rlamadog 'dra/ 'od zer 'bar ba sna
tshogs 'khrug/ g.yon pa rin chen thugs kar bstod// g.yas pas nor chen rab stsol ba// de yi ngos su sems dpa'i mchog/ bzhi po gzugs bcas dam pa yin// dbang bskur
bar ng gter nyid dang// nor bu chen po bla med dang// 'byor pa dpal ni phun sum tshogs// rang nyid mtshan mas mchod pa ni// de la de dag gi snying po bad yin te/ 'dza
bo satAdza badzranatAhU~M/ badza mkhaM/ badzakarmaho/ de nas gzungs rnams kyi sAng po bshad de/ o pra ti badzra phaT/ oM badzrapra ti hi hi/ o tsanam [7 ]oM badzra mahAmashA/ spyi
'khor chen po'i khu tshur gyis/ tshog rgyas pa ji bzhin bri// nor bu'i khu tshur gyis bzhugs pa// mkha'agyas las namagos phyag bya// bzhugs nas nam mkha' na khas pa ya/ sa
dam pa brjod par bya// khyed ni nam mkha' las byungabali/ thams cad kyis ni lta pa yin// o a sid+d+ha b+han+d+hab sid+d+haM/ sid+d+hasu/ sid+d+hamagyuratwA/ bab Na Ta hU~M/ 'di na babrus pa skyes
ni mkha' snying dngos grub thams cad dang// phun tshogs kun la shin tun// 'grub 'gyur 'di la thetshom mid/ gces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen bla na med pas gsungs so/
denas nior bu khu tshur can gyis lcags kyus dgug par bya'o/ o b+hu rA ya hIdaM/ b+hu ba pra be shahU~MswA/ grwahAkhaM bab Da Na sid+d+ha hotaM/ de nas bcom ldan myur du// byon nas dngos grub
thams cad ni// 'byor pa shin tu g.yo ba la// don ni rab tu 'grub por 'gyur// de nas slob mi phyag rgya ni// me tog btsas pa mchog gis gzhug/ bcu gnas de nyid mchog sung po
[d bden pa lan cig brjod du gzhug/ de nas 'byor pa'i mchog bcug pa// dpal gyi phun tshogs mchod pache// 'jig rten mchog ga de ngos grub rnams// bde bar gshegs pa bzhin du 'thob//
de nas de phyir sgrub pa bshad/ @#/de na rdo rdzu rin chen rgyal mchog gis// dpag med zlos pas bsgrub bya zhing// 'di yis skyes mchog 'di nyid la// 'dod chags 'gro dang 'ong bar 'gyur/ 'dzin

chen kun gyi dbang phyugargyal// rgyad pa'i chibamed par 'gyur// dngos grub kyidam pa thams cad kyang de bzhinano// phyag rgya sgrub pa'i dga' ba nyidakyis so// dam ga gaphyag rgya sgrub pa ni dam tshig
gi khu tshur gyis so// de bzhin du las sgrub pa ni dngos grub bla na med pa yin no// phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa nyid de'i rgyud do///de nas de phyir las rnams kyi// rab 'byams rgyun dam
pa dang// dngos grub chen po kun bsgrubs pa// go rims ji bzhin rab bshad bya// 'di ltaste/ 'byor pa thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/
dbrog pa dang/ bsags pa dang/ linapa dang/ 'dren pa dang/ 'gugs pa dang/ gtod pa dang/ gzhag pa dang/ 'phen pa dang/ 'degs pa dang/ 'bebs pa dang/ brdeg pa dang/
sbyang ba dang/ red par ng/ rtobadang/ btsong ba dang/ kun tu 'gyed pa dang/ zhe bar dgod pa dang/ bstan par bya ba dang/ rdo rjer bya ba dang/ 'byor pa thams cad grub pa dang/ 'byor pa
[n ]@#// thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa lani rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur bas so// dpal thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ dgros//
rgyapo pa dang/ bsags pa dang/ len pa dang/ 'dren pa dang/ 'gugs pa dang/ gtod pa dang/ gzhig pa dang/ 'phen pa dang/ 'degs pa dang/ phebs pa dang/ brdeg pa dang/
srung ba dang/ rnyed pa dang/ lhab dang/ btsong bdang/ kun tu 'gyed pa dang/ 'bar dgodapa dang/ brtan par byakha rang/ rdo rjer bya ba dang/ 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang/ 'byor pa
thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje nachen dpal gyis so// phunasum chogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ dbrog pa dang/ bsags/
pa dang/ len pa dang/ 'dren pa dang/ 'gugs pa dang/ gtod pa dang/ gzhag pa dang/ 'phan pa dang/ 'degs pa dang/ 'bebs pa dang/ brdeg pa dang/ srung ba dang/ red pa/
dang zhob dang/ btsong bdang/ kun tu 'gyed pa dang/ nye bar dgod pa dang/ brtan par bya ba dang/ rtsoN+Dir bya ba dang/ 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang/ 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog/
sgrub nga lan rdodza ni chen phun sum tshogs pas so// mchod pa thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ dbrog pa dang/ bsags pa dang/ len pa/
dang 'dren pa dang/ 'gugs pa dang/ gtod pa dang/ gzhig pa dang/ 'phen pa dang/ 'degs pa dang/ 'bebs pa dang/ brdeg pa dang/ sbyang ba dang/ rlud pa dang/
pa dang/ btsong ba dang/ kun tu 'gyed pa dang/ 'bar dgod pa dang/ brtan par bya ba dang/ rdo rjer bya ba dang/ 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang/ 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la
na dodza nachen gyi mchod pa sgrub pas so zhes kyang gsungs so// soms can thams cad bde don du// rdo rje sems dpa' noratshe ba// rang gi rgyal mchog lan cig sgrub/ yi ge hrin sgyur
bar bya// dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa rdo rje rin chen gyi rtog pa'i chog rgyas pa'o/[']denas rgyal ba rdo rje'adzin//
'jig rten gsum po khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum bdag thams cad la// 'jig rten gsum mchog 'dul mdzad pa// chog bzhin du sgom 'gyur zhing// sems can don phyir/
tshogs bzhugs// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// rtag tu rnam par gnas pa yin// mamanyam pa yis rten gyur na// dug nyid du na nye bar 'gro// bdud rtsir nyid du'ang 'gyur
ba yin// 'dod chags tshangs pa mchog 'byin pa// zhe sdang drag po'i ting 'dzin gyis// gtimug khyab 'jug brtan mdzad nas// 'jig rten gsum pa byin gyis brlabs//
'dod chags zhe sdang gtimug rnams/ rtag tu gnas pas srid gsum gnas/ chos kyi rten nas gsum mchog ste// chos min rten pas ngan song gsum/ 'dod
chags sbrang rtsir byed par bshad// zhe sdang rgyal bar byed par bshad// gti mug don sgrub byed ces// kun tu gasang ba'among yin no// ngan 'jig rten gcig pu nyid// 'jig rten gsum
du rab tu bshad// ngani 'dod pa gcig pu nyid// tshangs pa drag po g.yu drung yin// de nas gsum po 'di yis mchog/ sbyang phyir rdo rje sbyang 'dzin pa// gzugs ni gsum po 'di dag de//
bdag nyid khon byung ba yin// gang phyir 'jigarten 'di dag ni// rtag tuyang ni 'di skad smra// tshangs sogs kyis 'dul yang dag pagi/ sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin// de rnams sbyang
phyir bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje 'chang chen rang nyid ni// gzugs na gsum pa 'di mdzad nas// phyis ni sangs rgyas nyidam 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa la sogs lha/ 'jig rten gsum
mchog dbang phyag che// dkyil 'khor der ni gsang snying po'o// rang gi ra grub phyirarab phul// o b+har b+hubasdu/ zur bzho nga la sgo bzhi de// sgo srungs bzhis na reb srung ba// kha khyer
gyis ni legs bskor ba// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yanang ma nyid dang// dkyil 'khor ga'u yi byibs can la// sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal nyid byed// sgrub pa thams cad sgrung
pa ni go rims dag ni ji bzhin du// legs par bri ba'am gzhag par bya// pus mo gnyis kyis zhugs la der// rtse gsum d mchog gis mtshan pas// zhugs te dmatshig bcings nas/
ni yang dag par ni dgug par bya// o b+ha ba su/ srasI nA ma swAhA/ nyingashu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// thams cad thams cad kyis bskor ba// thams cad grub phyir 'ongs pa la/ de
nyid pa yi gtor ma sbyin// slob dpon ba tshu zhugs pa yi// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// de nyid gsang ba brjod nas// dam tshig mchog na sbyin par bya// gal te khyod kyis skye
gsum bcag/ sIpo snod sman la sbas sam// jiskad smras pa'i chos rnams ni// gal te 'dir ma sbyang dam// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa nyid// tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung ste/
ming bo gsum po bad nyid ni// nam yang b.rus pa mi bya// gang zhig 'di rnams sgom pa slob/ yong dang yang du zhugs nas ni// dkyil 'khor mchod par byed pa dang// dngos
grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya bslabs nas ni// de la gar gyi mchod pa dang// 'dod yon dam pa lnga rnams kyis// rtag tudakyil 'khor mchod par bya// 'jig rten
gsum 'byin pa'i rgyud do/// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sems can kun rje ston mdzad pa// 'gi rten gsum byung don grub tu// slar yang srin mo rnams 'byin mdzad//
kun tu chags dang zhe sdang rmos// brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yin no// dga' dang phrag dog bud med ni// rab tu grags pa'i grub kun// gang zhig 'jig rten kun tu
bshad// tshogs kun gyis mchod lhamo rnams// zhidang 'jigs ma de bzhin gsal// grub pa dang ni zhi bar bshad// phyi rol sems can phan phyir dang// rtogs don khong du chud bya'i phyir//
de rnams kyi ni snying po dang//dkyil 'khor de bzhin dam tshig bshad// 'dihArab desha/ dkyil 'khor chen po bzhi pa ni// srad bu gsum gyi dkyil 'khor bya// mtshams kyi thig ni kib mo// bzhi
po dgagi rim pa bzhin// de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor ni// bzhi po dag gi de bzhin bya// rang gi snying po bzhi po// rang gi sgor na phyogs pa gzhag/ skal bzang lag na rang ga mngon//
sring mo phub can zhi bam// phag mo lag na gter nyid de// grub pa mo nabasems dang bcas// de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor du/ dkun s de bzhin bzhugs nas ni// sring mo rnams/
kyis rang gi rgyas// go rims dugan ji bzhin du// zhugs nas de bzhin cho ga bya// sbyos sogs pas mchod par bya// de nyid gsang ba rab bsgrub pas// kun nas dgug nga
dag tu bya// oM su b+ha gar tingam ya hI/ rakA sa mA tim ya b+hur ba/ba rihA a mir+ya tAm ya sAhA/ sid+d+hi ke sid+d+hi sa ma ya hi AmAmi mu dra b+hi/ hU~M/ hU~M d+hA'i rgyo/ de nas lus na thimA
cad kyis// de bzhin du legs bzhugs la// de nas phyag rgyabacas brtan te// gsang ba mchog 'di brjod par bya// gal te gsang nyid ma gsungasan// gang zhig sems can don
bzhugs dang// gang yang dkyil 'khor sgrub byed pa// de rnams khyed kyis bsad par 'gyur// chos dang ldan la bdud rtsi nyid// chos min pas na dug bas lhag/ ci red pa dang dus ji
bzhin// yul rnams 'bar bstan pa dang// phyag rgya gar gyis bshad pa yis// ci bdo ba ni ga tu mchod// sring mo bzhi'i rgyud do// de nas ston pa rdo rje'adzan//
sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gtimug che// sgrub pa dag ni reb sgrub nyid// 'dod chags sogs duge gzhig phyir dang// kun nas bdud rtsi nyid bya'i phyir/
zhe sdang las byung klayi ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur// de la snying po 'di yin te// wu zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// srad bu thams cad yang dag bro// sgo/
khyad klu yi gdos kA mchog/ mtshams kyi rtsi mchogi mjug ma mdud// de yi dbus su klu rgyal ni// mtha' yas gdengs ka bcas pa na// klu yi rigs ni brgyad po dag/ shes
rabo can gyis kun tu bri// de nas khros dang zhugs nas ni// rgyu 'dzin pa shugs kyis// zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du// sbrul gyi gdongs kas dgug par bya//
o hU~M/ anIl tshab be ga phra thostond khengasha ya hi phu/ sam+b+hanA ga ku lA man phu/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya phu/ sarban sarnyaya phu/ ta tas sam+b+hanag pu Ta ka phu/ de
ltar byas nalegs bar bzhugs shing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ de nas slob dpon gyis dug med porab sam par bya'o// de nas brtsams te dug thams cad khros pas kyang bdud rtsir 'gyug
nor rgyas par brtse bar byed do// dug thams cad spang ba dang gzhig pa nus par 'gyur ro// de nas mna' snying po sbyin par bya ste/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ 'jig
rten 'di gsum dug/ gal te bden pa las 'dus nas// 'di dag gis ni rtag gsod 'gyur// khyed kyis glog la bar s mi bya// ser ba bzlog par mi bya zhing// gal
dngos grub la dag na// ri nas sbalan gsad mi bya// klu'i dkyil 'khor ro/ [“]de nas ston pa rdo rje'adzani// sdug bsngal thams cad sol ba'i mchog/ sem
can kun bde ba'i phyir// gdon gyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba yi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gtimuga rnams// nyes byas kyani duganyid 'gyur// gdon dang rims dang sdig pa dang//
dmyal bar yang 'gyur ba yin// de nas gdug pa'i snying po ni// haM / zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// gdon gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu bri// de dbus dang por gdon la sogs// chog rgyas
par dgod par bya// de nas bshad pa bzhin zhugs nas// dgod cing myur du dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'dzin pa zhugs nas ni// khros pasazhung g.yon pas mnye// de nas gdon dang ris sdig
kun/ dmyal ba thams cad rtag tun// sdig pa chen po byed pa yang// rdordzas rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams dpas gsus so// sdug bsngal thams cad
'don pa'i rgyud do//// de nas ston pa rdor 'dzin// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis// sems can kun don rab sgrub phyir// dkyil 'khor thams cad gsungs pa yin//
de la sAng po 'di yin te/ oM A/hU~M/hritaM/ de nas 'don gsungs tsam gyis// kwan mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin// gabrugs kun gyisan kun mchog// dbang phyug dam pa mdzad pa
yin gsang bachen po lnga yis/ gang tsho 'dul bar ma gyur pa// de tshe sna tshogs cher mdzad pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam pa yin// dam pa yang dag bshad bya ste/ kun mchog sna
chogs rnam par rgyal// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas ni// de yi dbus su tsho ba bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab bzhag la// rdo rje lcamo tshogs
rakyil 'khor// de yi ngesani thams cad du// kun mchog bdag po sku rnams so// rdo rje mchog bcas mtshan ma ni// rangag rigasakyis bskor ba gzhag/ rkyal po rdo rje sred med bu'i
@#// gzugs 'dzin 'khor lo rnam bar b// khyab bdag rdoN+Dican ro// gtum dbang rdo rjem dung bsags pa// rdo rjepad 'byung pad+ma 'byung// rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs pa'i gzug
nam mkha'i snying po'adod ba'agazugs// rdorjed nga bcas me tog mtshon// dkyil 'khor gyi na mtshams rnams su// rigs kyi lha mo blo bor bya// rdo rje dpalamo dkar mo dang// rdo rje sgrol
mas khab rdo// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'damasakyi snying bo bshad khar bya ste/ obadzran rAyaNatsA dpra ti han badzra tsakri tsaho/ b+ha ga bA badz+dzata shAg ta/ dzahU~Mbi ho/ badzangar taM/

badzAtathAg ta hU~M badzrakhrod+hamahAyogazhig gar/ mahAbadzrakulogra pa ho/ b+hagabA badzratsani shA rA ya/ hahahaha b+haM badzraparlob+ha ba ho/ lhagalaMbalokeshA re/ mahApa me sid rgyu/ o h+phur blobs/

sAsti nam/ sAhA/ hebadzrakusu mA luglu/ sarba kAmame sAd+maya ho b+hag pAbadzraA kAngag gan+d+ha/ kha ba Ta Ta hU~M/ badzraA kAngab gan+d+haa khaM murA/ na mo ye na sang+gen/ b+ha ga ba te pradz+nyA pIr yaM tAyud+ha/

ts+tshan+tabadzratitsakr-i Natenas rkyenapa pakAn/ o d+hing+garishutits+tsaM tib dzeye swAhA/ namo yin/ o badz+dzagor ma hA ba de klokya pa dzaye shA ri badzakro d+ha agis ma ye/ badzrad+ma rin mo stus+sa 2 tar wA/ o hil mi

lo/ le la tAlakhadzamukaye swAhA/ badzra sam ya/ namo ya na sAng+gen b+ha ga ba te/ bud+d+habu d+ma rgyur/ badzad+harmapa yo gin/ tenas te na sing+g+halaM/ o tAre tut+ta re tureswAhA/ badzrad+hamo da/ o kA ma

badzItisid+d+ha bishud+d+ha sa rlu bag/ gag mod+ma de yi ge na sing+galaM pa ra ka sde/ tangaShA/ ga gnaTishud d+he/ sats+tsham pra ya pa ri pA NisAhA/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// rdo rje 'dzan/
parab sbyod gnas// lha dbang dang ni mo mo nyide// 'jig rten skyong rnams dgod par bya// tshogs kyi dbang phyug rdo rjeyi// rolamo che bcu rdung byed pa// phyi yi dkyil 'khor kha khyer la/
sgo dang mtshams su'ang 'di bri'o// sgo rnams kun tu 'jug pa ni// rang gi phyag rgyas rab tu gzhug/ dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga par ni// dang po'i sbyor bas 'jug par bya'o// de nas
dbus su 'dug nas ni/ 'dangapo lcags kyu chebanyid// snying po 'di ni rjod byed cing// 'gugs pa 'dano brjod par bya// o mahA su kha badzra satA sid+d+hihUM/ sam+batathAg tAn sa ma yaA/

karAya dza/badzraku la dA paM dam ye dpra be sha ya b+haM/ sam+b+halokeshwaraM pra be sha ya sa maya bam na khaM/ sam yasam+b+harata dA paM maham NirAdzAnaM/ ba shIku ruho hUM a/ hUMhitwaM/ de nas gsang
chen bo ya'i sungapo bzang po 'di brjod pas// rdo rje 'chang chen rgyal pon// 'kho'i lo thams cad dang bcas pas/ bkug cing rab tu bcug pa dang// bdin pas bcings te/
dbang du byas// dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog thams cad// dngos grub kun gyi sgrub par 'gyur// de nas go rims ji bzhin du// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa dang//
dngos grubade rnams nyid kyang na// thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya// bde ba thams cad mi 'gyur gnas// bde ba chen po zhes brjod do// rdo rje 'dan sgrub lasogs//
'di ni tshe'adir 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar sna tshogs pa'i don sbyang ba'i don gyis chog 'gro ba dpag tu med pa 'dul bamatha' med cing sna tshogs pas mnyam pa med cing phul du phyung ba/ de bzhin
gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad 'dzin pa'i bde ba'a mchog byed pa/ rgyal pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa srid pa'i bde ba'i chog byed pa gsungs pa yin no// dpal
mchog dang bo'i rtog pa'i rgyal bo las// rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun gyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog rgyas pa rdzogs so//
sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// dam tshig mchog gi sgrub pa dang// bde ba chen po gzhal yas khang// dngos grub kun gyi lus byas pa// de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi// na
chen rgyal ba sogasakyi brgyan// bde ba chen po'i chags pa che// glu dang rol mo rjes chags pa// bla med dga' ba chen po yaki/ mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod// dpa' ba chen po
dpal gyi gnas// rang gabazhugs gnas mchog de la// rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po mchog/ mi 'gyura mchog tu yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid// rab tu
dgatsatha mi 'gyur mchog/ kun tu bzang po 'khor ba dang// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ rdo rjebasnyams pa'i bdag po'abadag/
kun mchog chagos pa chen po yi// dngos grub dbang phyug rjes grubapa/ glu dang rol mo thog mtha' med// mchog bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ haM/ de nas 'di na gsungs
ma gyis// jo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni// gsang bo lnga yi de nyid che// phyag rgya'i lha mo byung bar gyur// rtag tu chags dang dngos grub che// rnam rgyal dbang phyug lhag pa'i lha//
phyag rgya dam pa bzhi pa ste// sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku// de nas de rnams kyi sing po ni 'di yin te/ sku mchog so sor rtog pa dang// dngos grub kun gyis bde ba'i
mchog/ kun mchog rnam rgyal mthong ba dang// thams cad dbangaphyug mchod pa che// dngos grub rnams dang phun tshogs dang// dga' ba dag dang bdag po rnams// rdo rje lha mo thog mtha'/
mad rdo rje sems dpa' sku yi mchog/ ces bya'o/ de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i mi rnams ni dga' bachen po dpal don yod dga' ba'i dam tshig 'dod pa'i rdo rjem dang/ dga' ba chen po/
dpal don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig gi rdo tsA kA li kA dang/ dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshag rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rjem dang/ dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje
bya@#// don yod la chags pa'i dmatshig rdo rje don pa'i rebang phyag ma'o// 'di rnams gsang ba'i mtshan dga'// mkhas pas gang zhig dad pas brjod// de ni phyag rgya thams cad
bo kyi dngos po kun bdag bdag bod rgyur// zhes byab bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams dpa' mchog tugasang bas gsungs pa yin no// de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ba// dngos grub shin tu brtag
pa sta sdig pa che las dga' ba dang// sgrub pa gang zhig ma grub kyang// jo rje sems dpas gsus pa bzhin// de dag kyang nimar du 'grub// nyin re 'aman zla re 'am// de bzhin 'a
nar rol// ri mngon mngon 'dod bsgrub par bya// tsared pa dang mi bde bas// ras la bcom ldan bri bar bya// kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ste// gang zhig bris par gyur nas//
mchog tu lhag pa'i thar pa thob// bzhad pa dang bcas zla ba'a'ad// snachogs pad+ma'i 'od 'bar ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur sogs// sna tshogs rgyan dang na bzi ldan//
sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rdo rjebasems pa'i mchog 'chang ba// g.yon pa dril bu mchog bsnyems pa// rdo rjesems dpa'i rab tu brtag/ de yi logs na bzhugs pa
rnams// de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brten// rab tu dga' ba bde ba'i sku// gsang bachen po dgod par bya// dang po pang ltar dkar dmar// gzhan ni nga la sha ltar dkar// gzhan ni
ut+pal 'dab ltar so/ 'jo rjebasnyems ma ser po 'dzin// dang po dang ni gnyis pa dag/ g.yas kyi logs la brten pa ste// gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa dag/ g.yon gyi logs su bzhi pa yayin/
rdo rje kI lakI lam// dbus kyi rang lha dgyes par spro// de yi logs la rdo rjeche// mda' na gsor ba la brtson pa// bsams pa'i phyag gis yongs 'khyud pa'i/ chu srin rgyal mtshan bsgreng
dang bcas// de yi gsan bzhud dang bcas// mchod pasabadag po la blta ba// sangs rgyas yin chen dbang bskur mtshan// thams cad spyan gyi phyagargya gzigs// rang la bdag gi
thugs gtad pa// zur du lta zhing bzhugs pa go/ ngasaris 'di ni mthong ba yis// rtag pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur// mchod pa dang ni brtag ba yis// mchog tu dga' ba'i
thar pa thob// ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams dpas gsungs so// de ltar mchog turaga' ba rab tu 'dod pan// mchog tu dga' ba dam pa'i dengos grub 'gyur// gsal zhing rgyal
ba'i ras ris chen po 'dra// thams cad gzigs rnams mchod pa chen po depal 'das rol// 'khor la de ni brtag byas nas// mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khon// rnam par dben
pa'i khang par ram// yang na spyod mos tshal sogs su// de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po ya// ras ris rgyal bo sogs kyis brgyan/ dril bu dang bcas yid dga' ba'i/ pur phul
bas mchogagyur pagi/ jorje glu yi mchod tshogs dang// glu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul ba/ me tog spos sogs rab sbyor// mar me'i sbyor bas yang dag mchod/ khang
tsa pa gsum brtsegs dkyil 'khor du// mchog gi gsang ba bsgrub par bya// yang na bdag nyid kho na mchog/ rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgom bya// de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang// rang nyid
kyis ni rtag zhugs nas// rdordzakun 'chang slob dpon ni// dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur// rang nyid khrus byas dri zhim bsgos// cirId rgyan dang gos dang ldan// sna tshogs gos kyis
yang dag klubs// 'phreng bcas khazhwa dri zhim pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// mo tog spos dang dra snod bcus// rdo rje glu na 'od deg gis// gar byed grong khyer 'jug par bya//
de la mchog tu gsang ba'i dpal dam tshig gsum 'jug la mchog tugasangoba'i rgyu'amachod pa mchog tugrub pa 'di yin te/ dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' bgi/ thar pa'i grong du
[= ]bcom ldan bde chen 'jug/ mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis// dza hU~Mbi horab tshugrub par mdzod// rab tu zhugs te g.yon pa yis// rdo rje mig gis mgon la 'dud// g.yon
pa bsams ba cung zad bzhad/ bstod cing mdzes pa'i mig gis btsums pa de la mchog tugasang ba dam pa dang la dmatshig gsum gyi phyag 'tshal ba'i mi tog gi sil ma dor ba'i mchog tu
gsang ba rdo rje'i ga'amachodapa mchog tugrub pa 'di yin te/ mchog tu bde ba'i sems ni rol par ldan/ sgog pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud// dza IpaMho hi haha ho hi/ mgon
po sum pa'i me tog bzhes su gsol// de nas me tog sil ma ra/ rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur bas// rdo rjel bu'i phyag rgya dang// ldan pa'i 'od gsol sbyin par bya// de la
mchog tugasang bdam pa'i dpal dmatshig gsum gyi rdo rjesams ranga'i dbang bskur ba'i mchog tugasang ba'i rdo gi glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ o sangs rgyas kun ldan
rin chen mchog gis brgyan// lha yi cod pan dang bcas khyod la 'dud// rdo rje'achang bdag rin chen dbang bskur bas// sems dang bsam ya sIhUM// de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung//
chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// dmatshigagis ni phyag rgya cher// byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas// rdo rdzol sogs thob bzung bas// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnyis pa 'dra/ rdo rje
thams cad 'dzani rgyal bo// rdzoN+Nan+tanagyis byin gyisabarlabs// 'gyur zhes bya bamatshog tu gsab dam pa dpal dam tshig gsum gyis bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa
gcig bu'i chog mchog tugrub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas 'di'i grub bshad bya ba// dngos gruban tu brtag pa yang// gang gis sgrub pa dam pa
dang/ sngagachen byed pa rnams kyang ni// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin// ma grub rnams kyang grub par 'gyur// lugs ma bam ni brdungs pa 'am// 'dus
[° ]byas pa'i m bris pa 'am// dang po'asams dpa'i bzhugs gsol nas// de yi mdun du chog bzhin// rtag turo rje dril 'chang zhing// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// thams
cad dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag byin rlab sogs sgrub rnams su// de la ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad dgug pa'i rgyudan 'ad yan
te rang ga ltaya spor ba las// thams cad 'gug pa'i sbyor ba las// yan lag mchog gi lo'abacas pas// gar bya zhinge na dgug par bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub mchog tu gsang ba'i dmatshigag gru'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ dza mchog dang po'i ri rje 'chang pa rdo rjes mas dpa' bde rtog rlab tu dga' ba khyod bdag sangs
rgyus so sor rtogs// hUM mchog rdo rje lasani mchog tu thad med srid pa mi 'gyur bde dang yid bde dmatshig bdag la de grub mdzod// baM mchog bdag gi sku 'dzin rnal 'byor thams cad rnam rgyal
bslang ba rab mchog dag pa bde bar 'gyur ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal po kyi// he rab mchogaM ni mchog gi dngos grub dam pa thams cad dbang phyug dam par bdag gyur cigaM/ rtag par bdag 'phel rnam
mkhasnying po khyed// chu lu hu lu'i sgrub bas dpo ba rar mdzod// dam tshig chen pos yang dag dgug pa khyod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dam tshig ste// rab tu dga' ba mchog dang po//
de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpale dmatshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'itsheg ji ltar yin/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du// mchod pa kun mchog sku
rnams kyis// rol mo'a rnam 'phrul gyis rjes mchod// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog gi dngos grub kyi mchod pa chen po' tshog 'i mchog tu gsang ba'i deb tshagagi ro
rje'aglu'i mchod pa bod yin/ thoms cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin// bde ba chen po gsala mthong bdag labartan gyur
cig/ myur du so sor mkhyen nas rab tu 'dod pa bsgrubs// de la mchog tu gsang bdam ba'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad byin gyis bar bas kyis sgrub pa chen po rje
ltar yin/ rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du// phyag tsho kun gyis byin brlabs pas// de nyid chen po'i mchog gsan// rang nyidi bsgrubs te snying po ba// de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gi rdob glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa/'di yin te/ o/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/
thog ma mched pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rjeche rang bzhin// rdo rjesams dpa' rocherang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// kun mchog dngos grub/
po chen po ste// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// ro dzu'adzan pa kun gyi rgyal// mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod// nyes pa sna mang rtag pa khyod// 'dod chags kyis na rjes chags pa//
'dod pa chen po dga' ba che// bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod// gshin tudag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bazang po kun bdag nyid// byang/
chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog/ grub pa'i dedzacher bstod pas// rdo rje bswems bdag bdagamadzod cig/
dpal mchog dang po'i btses ldan khyod// gang gis don dang glu yis bstod// de ni dngos grub kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po nyid grub 'gyur// zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyis
mchog tu gsang ba'i gruchen po mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so// dngos grub tshog 'di yiso// rdo rdzusems dpa' yang dag rtogs// kun mchog dngos grub
chen po yi// dbang phyug nyidin bsgrub pago/ kun nas 'od zer ston sogs dang// so sor ston pa'i rmad byung rnams// rdordzatshig gis rang lha las// ngo mtshar gyur rnams mthong bar
gyur rtog pa kun gyis sna tshogs che// dngos grub dbang phyug bde rnams kyis// myuradurang gis byin brlabs pas// rdo rjeslob dpon gyis thob bo// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'adus/
rdo rje sems dpa' mchog dang pos gsungs so// de la mchogo rtagasang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gi lha thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ji ltar yin/
rang lharnal 'byor ji bzhin du// lha kun bdag nyid sku rnams kyis// rang lharnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis// rang lhag lha nyidi bsgrub par bya// de nas M mchog tugasang ba dam pa'i
dpal dam tshig gsum gyi kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa' dengos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tum 'gyurab dam pa bla na med pa'i
dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba bde ba dam pa dang/ yid bde ba thaMms cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du//
rdo rje kun mchog sku rnams kyis// glu dang rol mo'i tshog ni// rdordzanyid kyis rjes chags 'gyur// rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du// dbyangs kyi rtsa ba rnams sad pas// glu
dang rol mo'i tsheg no// dril bu nyidakyis rjes su brjod// rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag po mchog/ glu dang rol mo'i tshe ga gi/ dam tshag gis ni rjes
bsgrub bya// de yi rtog pa thams cad la// rdo'abebs pa rab sad nas// rang gi lha yi dam tshig ni// thams cad gzhi 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur// mchog tu gsang
po ba dam pa'i dpal dmag gsum gyi klu chen po dang rol mo'i tshog mchog tu gsang ba mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams dpas gsungs so// de nas de rjes gnas ji bzhin//
parnyed pa ci bde bas/ me tog spos kyis mchod nas ni// khang pa 'am skyed mos tshal sogs su// bdag nyid rtsi 'o dod ra ba bsgrubs nas// nirId rgyan dang gos dang ldan// sna tshog
gos kyis yang dag klubs/ me tog 'phreng bcas kha dri zhim// lugs ma 'am na brdungs pa 'am// 'dus pa 'am ni 'khor bri// dang po'i 'khor la demadun du// tshog bzhin du
bzhugs gsol nas// rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du// rdo rje dril bu rab sad pas// thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag byin rlab sogs bsgrub par bya// sngon du lan
cig bsgrubs byas nas// de nas de rjes ci 'dod pa/ ci 'dod du spyod ci smos pa// thams cad bza' zhing thams cad byed// langs pa 'amana'i dug pa ma// rab tung god
[>dam sna bo 'am// ji bzhin de bzhin de dang der// ci 'dod par ni ji bzhin bzhag/ gsang ba mchog gi 'khor lo// me tog sogs kyis mchod nas ni// ji bzhin du na rjes
bsgrub bya/ 'dis ni 'dod pa kun dbang phyug/ 'gro dang 'ong dang 'dod na 'phur// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'khrub// gshamad pa'i gabor 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i
grub chen po// phyag rgya kun gyis dbang phyug bdag/ rdo rdzokun 'dzani rgyal po// rdordzo mtshon cha thams cad 'dzani/ mi thub pa dang mi sod cing// thams cad byed cing kun gyi rten//
sems can kun gyi rgyal po che// tshar gcod rjes su bzung ba nus// kun mchog rjes su chags pache// 'dod pa grub pa bde ba mchog/ kun las rnam rgyal grub 'gyur te/ kun
mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin// dngos grub chen bo kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po'i go 'phang nas// rgyal po rdo rjekun 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad bral 'grub 'gyur//
de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' pha pad+ma'i ra ba che// mchog tugasang ba grub pa'i blo named pa'i dngos grub stsol// mchog gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas gang zhig rjes su bstan pa/
ste Da mchog gi dngos grub dbang phyug chen po 'di res nyams myong ba// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems drapas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las/ gsang ba chen
po dam pa'idapal dam tshig gsum dang/ dngos grub thams cad dgug pa dang/ mchod pa chen po dang/ bdag la byin gyis brlabapa la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i chog rgyas pa'o//
pa/ @#/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa dang// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes bsten pa// rdo rjesams ranga' rang gi gnas// grags cad bdag nyid rtag tubazhugs// thegamatha'
pemed pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' bache// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo bsnyams tshul bdag po'i bdag/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// lhag/
pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid// ces bya ba grub par 'gyur ro// de ltar mchogacu rjes chags dga' ba pad+maram// mchog tu bsngags pa bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol/ mchog gi
rgyal mtshan bsgong ba gang zhig rjes su bstan pa ste// mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po de des nyams myong ba// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
dpal mchog dang po las/ dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi yang phyag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam
rtsa tshig gi dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba'i yongs su rdzogs so////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i slob ma'i tsheg rgyas pa rjes su bzung
ba bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la dang por kho nar re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i sngags 'dis/
cig brjod pas sems bskyed du bcug ste/ oM sarbayo ga tsat+taMud pa du yumi/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing ldog pa dang/ bdud thams/
cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyag rgya byang chub sems dwapa'i chen po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du'ang rtogs par bya'o zhes bas gsungs so// byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ mchog tu bsnyen
par byas nas ni// byang chub sems ni bzhag sa na// su ra ta sa ma ya hUM ho/ 'di yis rdo rje bskul ba na// 'dod pa kun las 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid bskul ba'i myur dun//
byang chub sems ni bla med pa// kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i phyir// rdo rjesems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpasaM gsungasaM so//
gar byas spyi bor thal mo sbyar// gos kyis gdong na g.yogs pa rnams// ci 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// ci 'dod dngos grub sems
pa yis/u0f7c/ slob ma me tog dor du gzhug/ phyag rgyagang la de bcas pa'o// de de'i lha mo bsgrub par bya// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol byas la// rnam pa kun gyi yon blangs
nas sangs rgyas zhi chen dbang bskur gyis// dam tshig gsum na gsal bar sbyin// de la rdo rjechen po gna'i chus dbang bskur te 'di ltar brjod par bya'o/ 'di na khyod kyi
dmyal ba nus// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungasan dngos grubani// rdo rjebadud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgyan// gal
[S ]tadakyil 'khor ma mthong sgras// skye bo 'dus pa'i nang na gnas// dad pa med pas bzhad gad mod// ces bya bas mna' bsag go/ de la sangs rgyas kyi rin po che'i dbang bas
ba'i mchogan 'di yin te/ dodzachu yis dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisa'i mchog dbang bskur ba'a gnas su bzhag ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahAs ma ya a d+hi
pa ti si a b+hi b+hIny+tsamimahAbadzrapA ra zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis rdo rdzolag tusbyin par bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje 'chang gi rdo rje ste/ rdo rje 'chang gi brtul zhugs/
khyod kyis kya ni rtag tu bzung// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog gi sems chen po yongs su ma spang bar rtag tu sgrub pa shin tugasang ba de 'di yon to/

obadzra karmapAd+hang+ge'abadzranAm sid d+hi sa ma ya saM b+hur b+hu paH swagang la rdorje'iyonge btags pa de la kye'i sgra dang por sbyar bar bya'o// de'i ming de'ang ji srid byang chub snying po mthar thug pa'i/
bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang sing du 'gyur ro// de la mchog tugasang ba dam pa'i dpal dmatshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te/ thog mtha'amed pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo tshu sems
dang 'a dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das dang la mchog dang po'i skyes bu mchog gide khon nyid kyi
gsang ga lnga'i de khon nyid bshad par byas nas rdo rje spyin par bya'o// 'di bcom ldan 'das srid pa'i bdag po dam pa kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug gi rim pa de bzhin gshegs pa de
nyid chos kyi mchog gi bka' yang dag par mdzad pa ni/ srid pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni dag/ rang bzhin gyis ni srid bral bas// rang bzhin dag pa'i soms dpa'i mchog/ srid pa'i mchog
ni mdzad pa yin// mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'debs pa ni dril bu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya ba 'am lha sgrub pa dgrel par bya'o// de nas chos thams
cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu sad pa'i phab pa rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa yin no// rdo rje thams cad 'bebs par byed pa dang/ rab 'asgrub par byed pa dang/
dbang du byed pa dang/ rab tu dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba sgrub par 'gyur// de nas srid pa dag pa'i thebs kyi mchog rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po dam tshig la rtag tu brten
par bya'ozhes bya ba'o// de la 'di ni deng khyod kyi// srid bde shin tu rgyur pa na// sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir// shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thebs// dmatshag 'di ni rtag
tubaskyod// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// ci 'dod pa ni nyin bzhin du// rang ga lhayi sbyor ba yis// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// de bzhin
@# gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i yang chen po dam tshig ga sbyor ba ni bcom ldan 'das dam tshag go/ 'dalhar/ de bzhin gshegs pa
ba kun gyis kyang// 'da' ba ru na mi mdzad pas// phyag rgya'i dam tshag ces na bsgrags// yid kyi skun brtan phyir// zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
dpas gsungs so/ 'de la 'di brjod par bya ste/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su na// mkhas mchogo 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// jisrid mtshungs med sems can don/ 'am na
mi 'dra'i byed par nus// gsang ba dam pa dam tshig thabs// bsod nams byan gyis brlabs bsgrubs pa// rtog tudangos grub kun dbang phyug/ sems can donani byed pa yi/
dam tshig 'dris ni bdag sgrub cing// ci bde bar na sgrub byed pa// nyes pa spyad kyang sdig kun gyis// rnam pa kun gnod mi 'gyur// 'dod pa chen po sgrub par 'gyur// kun
bdag dam tshig dbang phyug dang// thams car rdo 'dzin rgyal po// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o/ las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis// ma lus bsgrubs pas 'grub par
'gyur// bdag gzhan thams cad rgyas batab pas/ yang na bsgrub bya kun la yang// don yod mchog tu grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor thams cad rjes sgrub byed// dpal ldan
sdug bsngal kun 'phrog byed// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'aba'o// zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das dang la rdo rjesams dpas gsungs so// rdo rje la sogs thob
'dzin pas// dngos po kun gyi bde ba kun// bab pas rdo rje slob ma yis// dkyil 'khor du ni nyems su myong// de nas thams cad gzengs bstod pas// sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag
nyid dngos// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs na lung bstan bya// de la de bzhinogshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig 'di yin te// sas
rgyas kun gyis bstan pa che// gzengs bstod pa yisagang lung bstan/ de ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rjeming gis dbang bskur ba'o// so/ 'di ni nges khyod lung bstan te// rje/
sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// srid pa shan tu grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i rten 'gro las khyod bton// de badzramAm/ rta thug tasid+d+his ma ya saM b+hur glu bswagang la gzengs bstod pa 'di dang/
phyag rgya chen pos lung bstana mchog tu gsang ba'i tshogs byas pa de la rdo rjesems dang ba la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ ri rdzo'achang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems
@#// dang 'dakyil 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon rnams dad mgrin gcig tub na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu lung bstan par mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ gzengs bstod pa 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po dang/ mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyi byin gyis brlabs pa 'di deng/ sngags kyi stobs las
dad par bya'o// denAji lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa rnams l de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'am
dang bcas pa ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gang yan pa de dag thams cad rang gi dmatshag la rjes su chags pa'i di dgug pa dang/ rab tu zhugs pa dang/ rab ng du bya/
pa dang/ sgrub pa dang/ rjes su sgrub pa rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbyibs thams cad bstan par 'gyur ba nyid kyis 'du brnyan nga la 'gyur ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun tu khyab pa nyid kyis zhugs
pa nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyis rgya che nyid kyis 'dir rab tu bzhugs ngashing ga sa par rab tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de dang de dag re bzhin gshegs pa thamu
cad kyirangagi dam tshig la rag las pa'i ri bzhin gshegs pa nyid la lhag par dmigasanas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slobadapon de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di

yin no zhes bya ba byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon gyis/ dmatshigagis mgrin gcig du khyed rnam las dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pa yin tedad par bya'o// de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tugasang ba'idabugs dbyung ba 'di yin te/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'kher dam pa na// mthong ba dang ni zhugs pas kyang// sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing//
khyed rnams 'dir na legs par gnas// bde chen theg pa 'di la ni// slar 'chibani yod min te// mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas// sa kyang ma 'jigs rol bar gyis// srid pa'i sdug
bsngal ldog pa// srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// ston pa mchog tu gyur pa khyod// srid pa shin tu grub pa yin// dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di// khyod kyis rtag tubasrung bar bya//
sangs rgyas kun gyis 'thun par gsungs// dam pa brtag pa'i bka' yin no/ gang zhig bskyod pa tsam gyis// sangs rgyas nyid du degs med pa'i// byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya//
phyag rgya rdo rje ga yin pa'o/ dam pa'i chos na mi smad cing/ nam yang gtang bar mi bya'o mishes pa dang rmongs pa yis// des na smad par mi bya'o// rang gi bdag nyid yongs spangs
nas 3dka' thub rnams kyis gdung ma bya// cibadebar ni bde bar gzung// 'di nim byon rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams// nam yang yongs su spang mi bya//
@#/// slob dpon smad par mi bya ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bya ma ya// slob dpon la na gang spyod pa// des ni sangs rgyus kun smad
po pas// rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te// las dang dug dang sbyar dug dang// mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtsos pa dang// gdon dang log 'dren gtum pa yis// bsad nas sems can dmyal
bar lhung// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ jorje slob dpon blo gros che// dge ba rab tum spyoms pa// nam yang smad par mi bya'o/ blam lan gus bcas yon// rjes 'thun
khyod kyis sbyin par bya// des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams// phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rang gi dam gi slob dpon ni// sbyin ma'i bu dang chung ma dang// rang srog gis rtag
bstan ban dalongs spyod g.yo ba smos ci dgos// gang gis bskal pa bye ba ni// grangs med par yang rnyed dka' ba// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rtsod ldan la// rma'adi 'odi la ster
al bar byed// rtag tu rang gi dam tshig srung// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod// rtag tu bla ma la yang mchod// 'di nas nigs rgyas kun dang 'dra// de byin sangs rgyas thams
cad la// rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur// de phyin bsod nams tshogs yin te// tshogs las dngos grub mchog tub gyur// de phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas// deng khyod su
0 ba 'bras khu bcas// rang byung dam tshig lha dang mnyam// deng khyod gyur pa the tshom med// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas la// kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas// khams
gsum gyi ni rgyal po che// rgyal po bdag por bstan pa yin// de na bdud las rnam rgyal te// grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs// khyed rnams kyis na sangs rgyas nyid// deng
'dir thob pa thetshom med// ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rdo rje'achang dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan
'das rdo rjesams dpa' mchog tu bdon pas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dpal rang gi dam
tshig gi slob dpon dang/ slob ma'i tshogs rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba ni 'di yin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyayis// byang chub sems dpa' lhan cig bskyed// sangs
rgyas nyid ni rtogs bya ste// zhes bya ba'o// de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na/ gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyis bdag nyid thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sams chen po bskyed pa tsam gyi mthu nyid
kyis phyir ldog par 'gyurakha yin no// phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi phyir nges pa'i phung bo la rnam par gnas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa nyid
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par rjes su rtogs par bya'o zhes bya'o// de nas thams cad kyi dang la dam tshig gi
slob dpon gyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' dag sbyor ba// rnal 'byor kun dang rjes sbyor ldan// sangs rgyas nyid du rtogs bya ste/ mkhas pa
mchog turtag pa'o// zhes bya'o// de'i gang yin zhin/ gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyis bdag nyid thams cad 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig yongs su gzung ba
gdon mi za bra nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dang
rang gi dam tshag rjesasu sgrub pa mchog gi dngos grub rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ched du de dag rtogs par bya'o// de'i phyir gnas skabs thams cad du'ang cinus pas sdug bsngal
dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa khyed rnams kyis rang gi bdag nyid thams cad khe narjes su srung zhing gsad par mi bya'o/ ci med pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad
kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsangab bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig gi sbyor bo yang dag par mchod la/ bde bar gzung ba dang yang dag par 'phel bar bya'o//
0 bdag nyid la ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par brtson pa de bzhin du gzhan rnams la na tshod bskyod pa yin no// lta ba log pa dang/ phyi rol du mu stegs pa dang/ nyan thos thams cad dang//
rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung bas 'di shin tugasang ba yin no// ngag ni shin tu smra bas so// sems ni shin tu 'gag pas so// gang gis kyang khyod kyis lus ngag yid gsum gyi rdo rje rnamA
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dpal rang giram tshag blo na med pa'i dngos grub mchog tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes bya ba yang gsungs so// 'dod pa khengs
spyod thams cad kyis/ nyisakyang mi 'jigs sos par gyis// dam tshig 'di'i 'da' dka' ste// sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
mchog tu bden pas gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs la dgongs pa yanano// de ltar yid ni
rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis// rang gi dam tshig mi bzod bde ster bstan par gyis// deng na 'gro la myur ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang// rab tumanyam zhing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par gyis// de nas
ro dang bza' ba spyod pa glu// rol mo'i mchod sogs kyis ni mgon mchod la/ rdo rje bla ma chen po bde phul nas// rang dang gzhan dag ci 'dod mchod par gyis// myos byed myos bral btung
bani ci 'dod pas na bsten pa yis// glu dang rol mo'i tshog sogs// ji bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bya// rang gsangartogs blangs pa yi// glu dang rol mo gar/
po rnams kyis// sna chogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang// rdo rje sems dpa' la mo sogs// bud med sogs dang ldan pa 'am// rang gi slob ma dang bcas pa// tu 'dod pa longs spyod kun//
mchod pa byas pas myur du 'grub// ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesems dpas gsungs so// de la gsang zhiga'i khyadabang ni da lo'i tahUM bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i
rdo rje sems dang ba'o// a de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi// hi pal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'o// oM pad+ma'i snying po'ibo// hanaMm mkha'i sAng po ste byang chub sems
dpa' chen po'i rgyal po nam mkha'i snying po yin no zhes bya ba gsungs so// rang gsang snying po'akhyudag// yige lnga pos bya ba ste// rang gsang chogs blangs pa 'di// mchog tu gshegs
pa kun gyi yin/ de nas mchog rtagasang ba rdo rjegru ya mchod pa ni/ rdo rje dral phu mnyam sogs bcas// rnam par dben par ril mo dkrol// rang gsang chogs glu blangs pa// gsang
pa ba'i rol mo rab tu sgrub// de nas mchog tu shan tsugasang ba'i rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa ni/ 'dzan pa dang bcas bzung ba che// bgyi ba rab tubyas nas kyang// dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gar
[7]byas nas// yongs su bskor bas 'bumachod bya// de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i// rtog pa thams cad rnam 'phrul
ba gtam rgyad pag mtshan phyag rgyayas// gang zhig gar de la tho yani// gsar 'am yang na dngul dang ni// de bzhin dang las byas pa yi// rang gi lha ya gdong rnams kyis//
grub pa'i phyag rgyas gar rnams bya// dkyil 'khor gang dang gang brten pa// phyag rgya sna tshogs mchod pa yis// slob ma'i tshogs ni de dang de// bzla zhing thams cad mchog tu gzhug/

sna tshogs chog 'di yis ni// sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur// bsod nams kun kyang 'phel 'gyur te// rtag tu srung bar 'gyurab yin// rims dang gdon dang dug dang nad//cha[︽ --- ,。---. ]'aham akhams ra tabyung bar rab las khams dang bar nad ngang garsongs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis/

bdud dang gsad par byed pa rnams// 'di ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dngos grub dag ni phun sum tshogs// dga' ba de bzhin bdag po rnams///rnal 'byor dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bya ba shani tu gsang ba'abcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas phyag
rgya snatshogs pa'i mchod pa'i chog rgyas pa/ lhag pa'i lha thams cad re re'i mchog gsang ba 'jug pa'i rdo rjegru'i mchod pa'i chog rgyas pa mngon par brjod nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis byas pa 'am//
de las gzhan ci 'dod pa'i glu rol mo rnams kyis rtog pa thams cad kyi snachogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchog tu grub pa zhes bya bste/ de re zhig thog ma kho nar bcom ldan
bo 'das dpal mchog dang po'i rdzadz+dzasems dpa' tshugasang ba'i dem tshig gi 'ojug pa'i rgyu'amachod pa'i thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs// rdo rjesems dpa' khyod
ni rab dga' dam tshig ste// bde bachen po brtan zhing mtho ba gsal gyur cig/ so sor rtogs nas mngon du phyogs shing myur du bdag sgrubs shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi dges kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dmatshig gi 'jug pa'i ngo rdzogru'amachod pa na/ rdo rjesams dang 'basdus pas na/ 'jo rin chen bAn med// rdo rje tshes na glur blangs pas// rdo rje las
na byed par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje grags thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba dem tshig gis 'jug pa'i de rdzi glu'i mchod pa ni/ b+haM / rdomada' gzhu dang bcas khyod la 'dud// rdo rjechug
pa'i nga mchog dpal khyod 'dud// kha TaM 'jigs dus rdo rje khyod la 'dud// rdo rje dril bu skyed pa'i dpal khyod 'dud// de nas pad+mo'i rigs thams cad mchog tugasang ba'i dam rmig
gi 'jug pa 'i de klu'i mchod pa ni/ kaM laraskye bo ma rungs pa ya srog 'phrog byed ngazhin tu drag po'i sku// la lar 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i sku 1
la lar pad+ma'i gdan gyi shin tu zhi ba'i sku ste 'gyur bamed pa ste// la lar shin tu bar ba'adod pa'i dam tshig pad+ma'i rgyal po bdag sgrubs shig/ de nas nor bu'i rigs thams cad kyi/
mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa rdo rje gru'imachod pa ni/ rab ng bskur thams cad dbang phyug dam pa las// yang dag bsgrubs shing mi zad gar gyi mchog/ kun mchog rgyal mtshan
rnam rgyal sgrung ba las// rdo rdzu nan dpal dog legs mchod 'gyur// de nas rang mi gsum gyi ni b+har b+ha ba/ sAdenaso sri mo bzhi rnams kyis kr-ihA'i b+ho/ de nas sku'i gos
thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi niphu/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi snga dpon chen po lagan rdo rdzobasdigs pa thams cod kyi dokyil 'khor gyi rdo rje gru'i mchod pa ni/ sam+bo maM ga maN+Dal mi daM badzrad+ha
ra kral ba mdza b+hikaM dza b+hikaM ra b+ha ud sAd ya/ ngashaya/ han ra ha/ pa cob+ha siM ku ru kro d+ha hU~M ka ra maN/ de nas thams cad kyi mchog dbangaphyag dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'a mchog
tugasang ba'i dam tshigs de rdzagu'i mchod pa// la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong gi 'od kyi sku nin+nam par mdzes// la lar 'jig dus nyi ma 'char ka byed pa'i 'od zer chogs
ni 'jigs chen 'bar/ lalar mdangs dang 'od zer dang ldan bde zhing zhi bo'i rgyal po'i sku 'dzin pa// la larani tumadzes pa'i gzugs 'chang mchog gi mda' dang bcas pa'i
gzhu 'dzin pa// la lar gdul bya rnam par sbyang phyir brtson pa'i rje rje sems khyod mkha' bzhin bzhugs// ma lus 'dul ba mkhas pa'i bde ba dam pa nyid phyir
[>bdag la 'grub gyur cig/ de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i tshog dam pa'i gsang ba'i mchog dpal dam tshig gsum gyi bajug pa'i rdo rje thu'i mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te/ dngos grub
kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' bgi/ thar pa'i grong khyer bcos ldan bde chen 'jug/ mchog tubade badram pa'i dngos grub kyis// dzad M bi hot+taMrab tu grub par mdzod// de nas shani tu
mchog tu gsang ba'i tsheg mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i dam pa'i dpal dam tshag bla na med pa'i mchog shin tugasang ba'i rdo rje'iglu mchod po mchog tu shin tu grub ba zhes bya ba mngon par
brjod nas/ shin tu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi re lnga'i mchod pa'i glu dang/ gar dang/ tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs nas so sor rjes su bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa thams cad kyi mcho gzhungashin tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rtog ba thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa yin no zhes bya bar yang gsungs so//
sna tshogs tshog 'di yis ni// rdo rje sems dpA bsdus pa yin// kun mchog sna tshogs chen po yi// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu grub// ces bya ba shin tu gsang ba bcom ldan sa
rdorjesems dpas gsungs so// de ltar dpal mchog dang po 'i rtog pa'i chog rgyas pa gtamargyud sna tshogs can/ mchog tu gsang ba'i rolamo bla na med pa'i dngos grub nyams dang ldan
pa ste/ gang gis sna tshogs pa'i rgyal mtshan mthon po dang ldan pa kun tu rjes su bsnyen pa mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po nyid naM/ de yis yang dag nyams su myong// don yod mchod
mchog tubasod nams ldan// chog mchog tu brtag pa ste// kun mchog gsang ba chen po na// dngos grub thams cad mar sgrub byed// gang zhig grong mchog rab dgyed par// zhugs
tasgrub par byed pa ni// shin tu mchog gi 'dod pa yi// dngos grub dbang phyag bde des thob// gang gis dngos grub ma thob na// bsod nams phun tshogs khyen pa rnams// dkyil
'khor mchog tu rab zhugs na// sgrub po 'daren rab grub 'gyur// gal te jorje sems dpa' mchog/ lta ba'i snying po bsgrubs byas kyang// ma grub 'dir zhugs thub par
'gyur// dpal mchog dngapo'i rtse rgyud du// de bzhin myur du grub pamin// ji ltar dang po'i khyim zhugs nas// rdo 'od kyil 'khor grub pa ltar// dkyil 'khor thams
cad sgrub pa yis// de ltar thams cad grub pa min// ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba yi// khang bzangs dam pa mthong ba yis// dam tshig rnams las nyams pa dang// sgrib pa
nyer bzhi rgyud/kun gyis bsgribs pa dang// bdud sogs gdon gyis reg pa yang// rtag pa'i thar pa thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'i m/ yang na dkyil
'khor ma grub pa// slar yang mchog tu rab zhugs na// de dag myur du 'grub par 'gyur// sgrub min 'di nicung zad med// dngos grub las dang bde de bzhin// dngos grub thams cad
bzhin 'gyur du// rtog pa kun las bsgrub par bya// zhes khyab botsem ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshig shin tugasang ba rdzogs so///de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi dam tshig mchog gi gsang
ba'i tshig ni 'di yin te// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dmachigachen po gsum 'di yin// byang chub sems dpa' mchog 'dzan pa// ngas la dkon mchogagsum bri bya/
go cha dang bcas rdo rjegachog/ go cha sogs kyis legs pa brgyun// rdo rje mtshonacha brjod pa dang// pad+ma rin chen 'chang ba 'o// 'khor lo de ni btags nas su// gsang ba'i dkyil
'khor dam pa 'o// ci rigs par ni bsgrubs byas nas// sum 'gyur dun 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshag chen po zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gi dngos
grub ma lus pa myur ba 'di yin te 2 o b+hakhaM/ khyim mam yang nags tshal lam// sngam bzhin du brgyan nas ni// mtshonan mchog gi chog yis// thams cad byas la da brjod bya//
de nyid kyis ni bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// lta na rnams la phan pa'i phyir// 'di dag mya ngan 'das pa ston// ma lus 'dul ba la brtson pas// bstan
zhing sa ba'i cho ga dgos// shin tu srid pa la gnas mchog/ tshog la sogs dgos pa yin// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun zhes// dkon mchog gsum du 'gyur ba yin// srid
pa shin tu grub pa yis// rnam par dag pa'i depal mdzad mchog/ ces bya ban de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'o// de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi dril
bu nithams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis// kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal// zhes bya ba ni
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de nas dam tshig chen po gsum gyi sdom pa zhes bya bani/ longs spyod kun la longos spyod pa// rang lha bdag nyid kyis bsnyenan// dkon mchog gsum
la mchod pa'i mchog/ bdag gis bya zhes brjod cing mchod// ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor sgrub pa'o// thabs kyi tshogo 'di yis ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams
@#// kyang bza' min pa yang bza' byas na// rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig chen/
po gsum mo// de ltar ba rjod nas snying po byin la/ phyag rgya btang ba slob tu bcug nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod par bsgrub par bya'o/ de nas/ rdorje 'dzani pa slob dpon gyis// rdo rjemachod
bas mchodanas ni// ci 'dod pa mchod pa yis// slob ma thams cad mchod du gzhug/ longs spyod kun la longs spyod kyang// dkon mchog gsum po la phul bas// 'dod
pas bdag kyang gzhan rnams la// mchod pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang po las/ mchog tu gsang ba'i tshog// de nas rdo rjechen po khro bo'i rgyal
po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i chogani/ ngas la bcom ldan bra bya ste/ 'jo'i rigs kun bdag po ni// rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bag/ cho ga ji bzhine mchog cu go/ de yapad 'dab gcig
bzhugs pa// de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rten// gsang ba'i rdzordzalinel 'byor che'i/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams legs la gi/ dang bor dmar dang dkar po dang// gzhan ni thal ba
ltar dkar ba// gsum pa dkar dang lho ba dang/ bzhi pa gser ltar dri med pa'o// rdo rjegatum pa'i dbang phyug grub// rdo rjekha TaM bsgrungs dang bcas// rdo rje 'dod pa me ltar
[d]/ 'bar// de yi logs la mtshan ma btod// rdo rje khyab 'jugam rdo rdzogi/ 'khor lo bstod pa de bzhin gzhan// rdo dril du ba dan nam// de yi logs na g.yon bsnyems ma/
cung zad mche ba gtsags pa yis// khro dang bcas pas zhal bzhad pa// rang bdag lan thugs gtad cing// sku ni zur gyi phyogs la bzhugs// de nas 'di yo snying po na// b+haM d+hare
nas cha ba'i sIng po// rdo rjadril sogs lhan cig tu// rnam dbyen rolamo brdungs pa yis// hayos glu dang rol mo ni// brdung zhing zur bzhirab t+tasgrub// ces bya ba ni bod
bzlas pa'i chogago/ 'khor la de ni brtag byas nas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa na// mchon cha mchog gi tshog yis// tshog thams cad rgyas pa go/ de nas de kho na nyidi
dang chos dang dam tshig chog sbyin pa ni/ rtag tuchags pa las byung khro/ rdo rje mi yi phung po'i sku// 'bar ba'i rdo rje khro bo tsho/ rab 'bar ba ya tshogs kyi sku// rdo rje 'bar ba'i rnal
'byor che// mkha' 'gro ma rnams kun tu 'bar// zhes bya ba ni ri rjego/ de nas chos ni/ thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyidi med// nam mkha'
dang mnyam rnal khyor pas// thams cad myur ba nyid du sgrub// nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis// thams cad nam mkha' zhes brjod cing// rdo rje phyag rgyas rgyas btab pA/
'gorten gsum yang za bar byed/ ces bya ba ni rdo rje rnal 'byor kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dmatshig go/ chog bad yis thams cad du// mnyas
par bzhag pas bsgrub par bya// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yiso// las kyi tshogs rnams ma zad pago/ zhes bya bgo/ de nas ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs
rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pa byas nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ dpal mchog dang po las rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'o// de nas mchog tu phra ba dang shin tu
bzang ba'i rdo rje// thub mchog gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// mkha' 'grom ya 'khor lor bshad// grong khyer skyed mos tshal sogasan// ji lta ba bzhin rgyas byas nas//
rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis// ji zhan du na reb sgrub pa// yid 'ong bzhi dang lhan cig tu// rang gis phyag rgyas me tog stod// ji lta ba bzhin grong khyer 'jug/ g.yon
pa kha gyen du bstod// rdo rje drag bo bzhad chen po// sgra sgrog mchog gi phyag rgya yis// 'jug ste mgon la phyag 'tshal bya// de la phyag na 'o da yon te// o zhes bya ba brjod
pa byas la// shin tu dga' ba'adebugs rlung gis// ru lu ru lu s+saM/ drug ldan par ma b.ru lu ru lu m+mo ste/ 'di ni de rje drag po phyag 'tshal ba'i sgra sgrog pa'i mchog ces bya ba 'dir
[z/]rdo rje phyag rgya phyag rgya ste/ phyag rgya thams cad dang/ gzhan rmongs pa dang/ thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang/ las thams cad la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o//
zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang bas bad gsungs so// de nas yid 'ong dam bcas pas/ me tog sale ga dor nas// rdo rdzopats+tsha'i dbang bskur gyi'og
dam tshig gsum na gsal bar spyani// de la rdo rjesems dpa' phyag rgya 'di yon te/ pad+ma'i thod pa la bya ste/ de'ang rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pas na rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba'o// de nas bdare
phyag rgya bcing ba na/ sor mo thams cad phan tshun sbyar// kun mchog rtse mo dang bcas pa// mthe bong de tshabakab pa ni// rdo rje pad+ma zhes grub go/ rdoNipad+ma'i phyag rgyal dis// rdo rje
sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i sbyor ba dang/ rje pad+ma'i rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bar bya'o// 'dis dbang bskur pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyisangashin tu gdug pa
dang drag pa dang/ rab tu gtum pa dang/ ma rungs pa'i sems can thal bar brlags/ khams gsum ma lus pa'i stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i de bzhin
pa gshegs pa thams cad ces bya bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba dang/ mchog tu brtag pa'i srung bar yang 'gyur ro zhes mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
@#// so de nyid kyisan rdo rje gzung// chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o// dam tshig gsan phyag rgyatshe// byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla// rdo rje la sogs thobapar
po bzung// rdo rjesems dpa' gnyis pa bar// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug gru// rdo rje can gyis byin brlabs 'gyur// bud med rnams kyang 'bebs gyur nas// ston pa 'dzertsi phab pa
yis rdo rjedungabacas phyagamtshan 'dzini rnal 'byoram rnams rab tu 'gyur// de la thog mar re zhig rdo rdzonyim me ltar 'bar ba chen po thal bar rab tu rlog pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo tshe chen po'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i bdag bo mchog dang po yang dag par 'bebs par byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i thebs kyis 'kho

du 'dzin pa'i khro bo'ame 'bar ba'i rjesdodang bcas pa'i kha TaM ga'i rgyal mtshan dang nges par sbyor ba/ ba dan dang bcas pa'i le'u 'cha nga ba/ rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po ngashin tu khro ba khebA
pas sgog pa dang bcas pa'i smon mtshams kyi khro gnyer shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'i spyanaser po dang ldan pago/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs par
pa byed pa'i spyan gyis blta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis stong phrag brgya bzlas pas 'grub par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad rjes su chags pa dang/ dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/
bang du bya ba dang/ 'bebs par nus so// thams cad nam mkha'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang na cig brjod pa tsam gyis khams gsum ma lus pa'i rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i
bdud thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud pa dang/ drag por rab tu gtum pa dang/ ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams dang/ mkha' 'gro ma drag po thams
can dang/ gang zhig nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams te/ de dag kyang thal bar rlog par 'gyuran/ dgra bo la sogs pa gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ don yod cing thogs
a med pa dang/ dngos grub thams cad dang/ las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i thabs shin tu drag po'i
man ngag gi bzlas pa ni/ sna'adabugs phra ba nyid kyis bden pa'i rdo rje tshig gi grub pa'i yid kyi 'dod pa las tham cad kyi dngos grub kyi tshogs rnams la dam pa mchog tu grub pa'o//
hU~M/ de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i ngodzarnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma lha chen mo rnams kyis bshad par bya ste/ de la thog mar re zhig rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen
mo rdo rje gzhu dang/ mda' bstod pa'i spyan g.yon pa ste/ rdo rje spyan gyi lta ba'i phyag rgya 'das thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa dang/ sgog pa dang bcas shing g.yo ba'i spyan gyi zur gyis
gzigs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa dang/ donayod cing thogs pa med pa dngos po thams cad dang las kyi tshogs rnamA
la ragongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o// de bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i rdo rje phra mo'i g.yon pa'i khro bo'abis pa ni yid kyi 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs rnams las
mchog tu grub pa'o// hi gnyis pa'i rdo rjechen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba'i dam tshag ga lan zhes bya ba'i lha mo ste/ dbus su rang gi lhag pa'i lha bstod pa'i zhal 'dzum pa'i spyan cung
zhig 'dzumasangashing dga' ba chen po'i rdo rje'i lta ba'i phyag rgyas 'das thams cad grub par mdzad pa dang/ tsum bdang/ 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i rig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa tsam
gyis thams cad la rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa dang/ phyag rgya thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa dang thams cad kyis gsod par mdzad pa dang/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa//
dngos grub thams cad dang/ las kyi tshogs rnams las dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i bya rog gi mgrin pa'i dbyangs kyis rdo rje dag gi
khro bo'i bzlas pa na yid kyi 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs rnams la mchog tu grub pa// hU~M/ gsum pa na rdo rje chen po'i 'dod pa'i mo 'khar ba thal bar rlog
pa zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo chen po dang/ kha TaM ga'i rgyal mtshan 'chang ba dang/ sgog pa dang bcas pa'i bzhad pa smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi khro bo'i

spyan to/ rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i ki loki la khro bo'i spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya'adiso thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa'o// badzra zhes bya ba dang/ ru lu ru lu ru lu hu zhes bya ba tsam gyis bdun
thams cad 'dzoms pa dang/ don yod nying thogs pamed par dngos grub thams cad dang/ los kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o// hi bzhi pa na rdo rje chen po
'dod pa'i mi 'bar ba thal bar rlog pa'i mige slong zhes bya ba g.yon bsams pa g.yas pas rang gi spyi bor rdodil bu skyod par mdzad pa/ sgog pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gyi shin tu gdA
ba ste/ rdo rje rgyal po dran gyi spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgyas thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa/ thal lcag la sogs pa dang/ bzhad gad dang/ brdeg pa dang/ phyag rgyas rgyas btab
pa'i 'chib thams cad slong bar mdzad pa/ don yod rung thogs pamadopa/ dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan bs
yum 'di'i dril bu'i dubyangs kyi sdorje khro bo'i bzlas pan yid kyis 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad kyi tshogs thams cad mchog tu grub pa'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/
chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pas// nam mkha'i khams ltar grangs med cing// nam mkha' kun gyis gnas skabs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'di la rab zhug
pa pho rje mchog gi rnal 'byor gyi// dbang phyug ma lus kun nas 'bebs// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor pa ston pa des rnal 'byor pa rang gi logs dag tudagod pa yin te/ zla chos dkyil
'khor rnam pa yi// dkyil 'khor du ni degod par bya// bkod nas thams cad kun mchogag/ dngos grub dam pa bsgrub par bya// thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag ni rlab
gsogs sgrub pa yis// shin tu gsang ba'i dekyil 'khor de// brtag pa dang ni bsgrubs nas kyang// rdo rje 'dzani kun slob dpon gyis// rdo rjeslob ma rnams gzhug bya// de la re zhigathog
ma kho nar slob dpon gyis bcug ste tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du dam tshig gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams logos dag tu bzhag nas/ skyes pa rnams kyang/
gzhug cing byang chub kyi sems kyis rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i rim tshig dang sdom pa dag len du gzhug par bya'o// khye'u dang bu mo rnams rab tugazhag latshogs dang bcas pa'i rang nyid kyis zhugs
te bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ smra ba thams cad bya'o// de nas 'dir slob ma gzhug pa'i tshig rgyas pa ni/ byang chub sems ni bla med pa// mchog tu bskyod par byas nas ni//
gar byas spyi bor thal sbyar mchod// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya/ ma 'dod pa ya dengos grub bskyod// slobam me tog dor du gzhug/ rnal 'byor mgang babs// de dang
de yi lha mo 'grub// donas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas// rnam pa kun tu yon blangasanas// rdo rjapad+ma'adabang bskur gyis// dam tshig gsum n gosal bar sbyin// 'daregana'
bsgrag ba dang dbang bskur ba ni de nyid do// de la 'dire dmatshagi gsum sbyin pan 'od yone to/ mi byed pa dang so sor rtogos// gdug ba thams cad gnon ba dang// sangs rgyas kun
dngos rdo rjes// byang chub sems na che zhing bstan// mtshon chade narkyelaM kun gyis// kun tu bzang bo'i lag tu spyin// bstan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir// de phyir phyag na rdordzayani//
denas rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i mchog tu gsang ba ni/ rtagatumags pa las phyung khro/ rdo rjesems dpa'i gdul bya'i phyir// jo dzam ltar 'bar// mchog tu 'jigs par
