mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus dngos grub thams cad do// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bdud thams cad la sogs pa'i gdug pa 'dul pa'i de nyid kyi mthe po'i rdo rje btabapas thams cad rnyed pa'o// de nyid
kyi mthe bong gnyis bcug pa'i gtsug tor rdo rjes thams cad srung ba'i mthe bongaro ldan ng du bcug pa de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i si mas can rjes su chags pa dang/ dgug nga/
dang dbang du byed pa sgrub pa'o// mthe'u chung rdo rje sor mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyis legs par bzung bas mthe bong dpal dgug pa dang dbang du byed ra 'o// rdo rje ganor
sbyin gyi rgyal mo de nyid kyis nor thams cad dang dpal dbrog pa'o// de nyid kyi dbus ma gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mo yongs su btsarabs bdud la sogs pa'i garon las grol ba dang
dbang du byas nas las thams cad la sbyorab 'o// rab zhu dga' ba'i rdo rjes yul thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa'o// de nas gsang ba'iphyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'o// sems
dba' mnan nas rdo rje lha mo rol du gzhug pa'o// de'ang rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje chen pos rgyas btab pasaM so// rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje las so// de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi chags pa dang bral ba'i 'khor los so/ mdzubamodang/ dbus ma dang/ srin lag gi 'khor lobasgrung bar byas la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung mnyam la bral bar bya ste//
rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sgrub pa de khon nyid kyis rgyus btab cing sgrub par 'gyur ro// btsar bas 'dod pa thams cad rab tusgrub par byed pa'o// mdzub mo lcags kyus 'dod pa thams
cad kyi bde ba dgug go/ mdzub mo phrag dog la sogs pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab zhuzhi bgo/ rtag tsubaskyod pas rab cu dga' ba 'bebs shing de nas sgrub pa//
skye gnas g.yo bsarud med dang skyes pa dag gisarab tu dga' ba la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod pa thamasacad kyi bde ba chen po ni nyamatha'ags pa'o// kha sgo'abatsar bas ji srid
'tsho'abar du 'dus pa dang bral ba'ang ngo// rtags kyi sen mo g.yon pa'i mthil drud pas shin tubartan pa'i 'dod pa la chags pa nyid du 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi 'dod pa la mi blta zhing
gzhan la mi 'gro bar shin tu bde ba de yid nga de ba ster ba'i bung med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// skye gnas kyis semamo dud pas skyes bu rnams so// de nas thams/
cad kyi bdag nyid kyi gsang ra'aphyag rgyabcu ste/ de la lus thams cad kyi phyag rgyani ro rdzakhu tshur gnyis kyis 'khur lam mchu so rnams kyis bzung ste/ rmongs pas bde ba ster du gzhug/ sgrub
bas rab tu dga' ba'i dngos grub kyi ngordzasaMms dpa' nyin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// mchog dang po'i dngos grub kyis su ra ta hU~M zhes bcom ldan 'das 'a brjod cing de khon nyid bskul bas
grub par 'gyur// rab turaga' ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad sgrub pa rto/ lag pa g.yon pa'i gsang ba khutshur na thams cad sgrub pa'o/ bde ba chen po rdo rje las byung ba'iro rdzas
bo'i blta bsaM thams cad grub pa'o// smin ma gyen du btog pas lhing ba slong ba'o// rang gi ma maru nang du myang bas skal ba bzang po chen po sgrub pa'o// rang gi lcebaskyod pas rang nyid
kyis ban pa thams cad rang de kho na nyid gsa' zhing mi sabar smra ba'o// rang gi lus la 'bebs pas gzugs thams cad yongs su ngasbyar ba ste/ rdo rje sems dbar bar d
spyi sangs rgyas su 'byur ba yin no// rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje bsgomasapas nam mkha' 'gro ba'o// de nas dang po'i las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcu ni/ rdo rje thal mo kha TaM gas so/
dngos grub thams cad rdo rje khu tshur dag gis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur dag gis dngos grub thams cad do// thams cad gsod pa na khro bo khu tshur dag gis so// thams
cad sbyar ban pad+ma'i khu tshur dag gis so// nor thams cad dbrog pa nor bu'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad 'babs pa na thams cad 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gar
byed du gzhug pa na kha TaM ga gtor ba'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams cad sgyur gzhug bzhimadzub mo mnyam pa'i lce khu tshur dgags so//thams cad bskyod ban bon pa'i khu tshur dag gis//
thams cad gzhug cing don yod par sgrub pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i khu tshur gyis so// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis tu'adod pa'i lag pa'i sor mo'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ don yod cing thogs
bar med pa skad cig mas myur du grub por byed pa 'di lta ste/ ba wang dang/ gling budang/ rje rngarang/ mu kuN+Dadang/ chalangadang/ rdzabo che dang/ jazlum dang/ rdzapa' hadang 2 guny+tsa
dang/ timo las/ 'dawims kyis rgyas btaban thams cad du rjes su chags pa dang/ dbang du byed pa dang/ 'bebs pa dang/ rigs dang/ dug dang/ spyir dug dang/ gdono
las grol ba dang/ gsod pa dang/ 'thab mo las rnam par rgyal bo dang/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa yan no zhes bya ba gsungs so// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir//
rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yin/ phyag rgya'o rtog pa ba dubartags// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang la// rtogs tsam gyis ni skad
cig gis// don yod kun grub bde bar gsol// zhes bya'o// dpal mchog dang po las/ mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyu'i rgyud rdzogs so///denas mchog
tumakhas shing mtha' las 'das pa/ tshad med cing gzhal du med ba/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchog dngos grub chen po'i bdage nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyis
lasakyi chogs mchog tu dam pa'i grub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje gar las byung ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya song bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
phyag rgya chen po mnyam bzha gnas // sgeg bcas mdzubasogs wikrol ba yis// las kyi phyag rgya chen po rgya// thams cad gar gyis bsgrub par bya// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ni
lcags kyus khyad par du las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ste/ brgya phrag dang po mchog tubasgrubs te rdo rje dam tshig lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ rdo rdzobasngams pa bcas nas// kha sbyoranang
du gsal ba ste// mchog dang po yi gsang chen gyis// las kyi phyag rgya brgyagazhan yin// zhes bya ba rdo rje lha mo gsang ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya/ rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa chekaM
[s ]thal chos spyi bor bzung nas ni/ las kyi phyag rgyagrub pas na dbang po rnams dang sbyar bar bya// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgyago/ rdo rje
bsams sa gar bya zhing// sgog bcasamathe'u chung sogs bkol bas/ 'di nyid bcings nas gas bya zhing// sa 'dzin 'byung bayan// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi las
donayod pa'i dam tshig grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgyabargya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam bzhag nas// thamasacad kyis ni bsgrub par bya// mchog dang bo yalasachengo'i
phyag rgya mchog na gzhan yin no// zhes khyob rgyal mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya/ mdang lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya bde ba brgya// rab tu dga' mchog yabakrol bas/
bde ba 'di du mngon par sgyur// zhes bya ba rdo rjethams cad kyi mchog rtagasang ba'i 'dod pa mi'i ga rgya'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// ji bzhin phyag rgya mchog spyor bas/
las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs brgyu// mchog dang bo ni rab tubartag/ ces bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lha mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje lha motshob rig/ lus kun gyis
nigar bya zhing rdo gar mchog rgyu blang zhing// dang bo'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'o// ji ltar gong du brgya gsungs pa// rolatshog g gi phyag rgya'i tshogs// rol mo brdung
glu len pa// phyag rgya kun gyi gsalab brgyu// zhes byakha rdorje thams cad kyi lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis phyag bya ste/ phyag rgya stong mchog tu grub pa'o// de la sogs pa
mtha' yas mchog chos dbyingasamanyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'imatha'i ltar grangs med pa'-i/ phyag rgya'i rgyal mo grub mchog ster// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi//
dbang phyag chen po'i mchog grub phyir// nam mkha' kun gyi go skabs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rab tu zhugs// dam pa mchog khugrub par byed// mchog gi dam pa rgyud chen po//
dam pa mochog gi dngos grub skor/ rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la// phyag rgya kun gyi tshul 'di ni// bstan par bya ste gzhan la min// de ltar mchog
tum 'gyur dam pa'i dngos grub bde ba yi/ mchog tu rnam dag rdo rje bde grub mtha' yas 'bras bur ldan// dpal mchog dang po'agesal ba'i de 'di mchog gi sku'i tshul go d mchog tu
rtag pa'i tshul 'di yongs su mthar thug pa'o// dang la mchog dang po las/ dam pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so////de nas sems
dpa' chen bo kun// rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas pa'i mchog/ rdo rje 'chang chen gtso bo ni// mgon la bdegshegs rnams kyis gsol// kun mchog nam mkha' chen po yaM/ 'dangos
0 grubadabang phyug rab grub phyig/ rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i// de nyid sems dpa' chen pos gsungs// rnam rtog med pa'iros rnams la// rtog pa'i don 'di gang brjod b//
gang gis spyod 'di phyi ma la// dang bo'i gnas mchogajiltar lags// de bzhin jorjesams dpa' nyid// bdag nyid dang bzang ba nyid// rdo bsAmasabadag ji ltar lags//
sems dpa' sems dbating nge 'dzin// de bzhin rdorje rdo 'dzag/ rdo rjecha chen nyid dang// byang chub spyod pa ji ltar lags// bdu dang bdud las rgyal bad byachub
sangs rgyas ji ltar lags// rdo rdzogatumakho mthar byed nyid// phyag na rdo rje ltar lags// jiltar dang po'i gos byungadang// 'dod pa tharapa ji ltar lags/ ji ltar magonakho
rnam gsum dang// khyod na ji ltar thams cad nyid// dang bo'isnying po ji ltar lags// de ci'i snying ji ltar lags// bde chen rdo rjechen bo la// don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags/
dkyil 'khor zhes bya jiskad gsungs// de yi rnamasmin ji lta bu// thig gdab pa dang brtag pa yis// dngos grubadzaltar gasungs pa lags// gsang ba lngaya de bde ba// dzaltar
byur ba lta bu// dkyila 'khor bdag po rnams dan// rigs rnams gsal ba ji ltar lags// thams cad dbang bskur denyididang// phyag mtshan tshogs kyi ri nyid dang// thams/
@#// cad dgug gzhug mchod pa che// bdag byin barlabs sogs sgrub pache// de ni de nyid gsang bdang// don yod pa ni mchog nyid de// mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir//
thams cad bdag cag rnams la gsungs// zhes bya babcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog gi mdo gsungs so// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// rtog pa kun gyi
bdag bon// thechom tshogs rnams gsan nas su// 'di yi lan ni gsungs pa yin// de la rtog pa'i don gyi rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na// rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams las// sems
can don ni yongs brtags pas// des na rtogs par gsungs pa ste// rtog pa yongs su dgaphyir ro// de nas rgyad pha ma ji ltar yin zhe na/ rgyadani rgyun zhes bya bar bshad// phyi ma sngar dang
yang dag byung// de nyid gsang ba'i gsang ba dang// phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod// de la dang po gnas zhes bya ba'i rgyud ji ltar yin zhen/ saMm mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// rdo rje kun
mchog rang bzhin mchog/ bde ba chen bo dgabab chagi grong khyer der ni mi 'gyura mchog/ ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas rtog pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid
ces bya ba 'di gsungs so// de la thogam thamayod pa'i do sems dpa' ji ltar yin na/ nam mkha' skya ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma thom med pa'i mchog/ sems dang ba rdo rje che nang
bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de gang yin zhen/ kun mchogadangos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug che bo lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgya'ag[%]
rab tshu dga' bami 'gyur mchog/ de la bcos ldan 'das dga' khachen po nyid ji ltar yin zhen/ nyes pa med cing 'di tu rtag/ 'dod chagos kun gyis rjes chags// de nyid 'di yis
gsang ba 'di// 'dod chags chen po'i dga' ba che// de la kun tu bazang po nyid yiltar yan zhen/ shin tungs pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu
bzang po kun bdag nyid/ byang chub sems dpa'i chog mchog de la rdo rje bsgoms pa 'bcom ldan 'das ji ltar yin zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yis// dbang phyug chepo'i
byag rgya'i mchog/ jo dbang phyag tshor bstod bas// rdo rdzobasams pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba na'icom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// mchog dang po ya di nyid 'di//
rdorjesems dpalagang gang bad// dngos grub kun gyi 'byor pa rnams// de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bya ba mchog gi de khon nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesems
dpas gsungs so// de nas de'i 'og tu las kyi bya bas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchogo nyid du bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis sems can ji ltar yin zhen/ bsam gyis mi khyab rgya che ba// zab dngos kun bde gi 'gyur ba// thams cad khyab cingadrim che ba/
byang chub sems ni bdag partan pa// de nas 'di las khyad par ni// sems nyid brtan pa nyeng sems pas// ting 'dzin de la mnyam par bzhag d+hA rnam shes las ni rdo rje kun// rdo tsho
lasan 'dzin rgyur to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'adzin ji ltar yin zhen/ sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor bas// bdag la byin brlabs mchog sgrub pa// nyin 'i sgrub par byed na des// rdo rje
sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das kun khyabazang po'i spyod pa ji ltar yin zhen/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang// gang phyir sems tsanangon gyur pas// de phyir
nga kun tu bazang// byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug mgo/ de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud nyid dang 'dul bas rgyal ba ji ltar yin zhe na/ sems nyid kho na bdud nyid de// sems
nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o// nga sems gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag ni bdud nyid gyur pa yin// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub dang sangs rgyas
yani zhen/ rang sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir/// byang chub sems mchog rdordzanyid// de phyir de nyidasas rgyas nyid// bdag byin brlabs mchog grub rjer ro// de la ji ltar
bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rjeyanazhen/ mi phyed so sor rtogs pa dang// gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon/ sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rjes// byang chub sems ni brtan pa bdag/
kun tu bzang po'i lag cun// mtshon chade ni rgyal bas byin// brtan bathams cad grub pa'i phyir// des na phyag na rdo rjades// de la ji ltar dang bo'i rigs las byung ba shes pa rgyud
yin zhe na/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa yum// yaban thebs la mkhas pa ste/ 'jo tshosams dang 'gadul bya'i phyir// bags rnams rab tu bya ba'o// de la ji lto'abcom ldan
'das 'dod pa thar pa yin zhen/ bcom ldan 'dasan chags pa che// dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir// dngos grub thams cad ga 'gyur med bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa'o//
de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum pa yin zhen/ bdagan dus gsum mtha' yas phyir// nasrid gsum gdul bya'i sa// gsumi mchog 'jig rten gsum kun phyir//
'jig rten gsum nga khams gsum nga// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin zhes ni brtan pa thams cad bde// bsod nams kun mchog che ba'i phyir// g.yo ba sems
kyis 'dus byas phyir// sgyum thams cad nga yin no// zhes bya ba rang gi las kyi bya ba'i de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar dang bo'i rgyu byung ba shes pa yin
zhe na srid pa shin thub pa 'di'i dbang phyug chen po mchogagrub phyir// gabri can sems can don mdzad phyir// bskal pa thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal la/
gsungs// de nas de gang yin zhen/ 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// rab tudagab pa mi 'gyura mchog/ gsang ba'i phyir na snying po brjod/ yi ge hUMn mi 'grub mchog/ de nas
tab snying po yi// de kho na nyid shes pa na/ de nying gsang zhing gsang ba dang/ sing po rab tu brjod par bya// snying po'arjes su sgrub par 'grub// nye ba'i snying po nyid du brjod/[）]
de la ji ltar ba de ba chen po'i rjedzaden yod pa'i dim tshig gi bshar nga 'i rgyud yin zhe na/ dngos grub kun gyi mi 'gyur bde// bde ba chen po zhes brjod do// rdo rje de nyid don yod grub//
dam tshig 'da' thar dka' ba'o// zhes bya ba'i mchog gi dam pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo sams rapas gsungs so// de la ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi dbangashes pa yin zhe na/ ji/
lta gnas dang 'khor lo dang// ji ltar dgod par 'gro ba dang// 'khor dang bcas pa ragod pa gang// de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gso sprul// de nas snum par shes pa ni/
sems sogs lha rnams kyis// 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba yis// rtag pa'i thesod nams ci 'dra ba// phyir na bris na'ang de bzhin no// de nas thig gdab pa'i cho ga ni
ba00 shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor gris// phyogs kun manyam pa nyid dmigasal// shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor// thig bzhi btab pasarakyila 'khor brgyad// rdo rjethig gis
yongs bskor bar// ka ba brgyad kyis nyeramadzes shing// sgo bzhi re babs kha khyer dang// dra ba dra phyed la sogs brgyan// der bdag po yi don shesan// rdzorje sems dpa' ji
lta bu zhe na/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rjeche rang bzhin// dpal mchog dang po zhes byas brjod// de nas bcom ldan
'das 'das gang na// kun mchog dngos grub che bo yi// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin b kun gyi rgyag/ rab tudagarab mi 'gyura mchog ces btsem
ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de nas spyanas gabrigs dbang gas// pad+marAg dang mtshungs pa// thams cad dag pa blun med// rong sems dpa' rang bdag
nyid spyan ras gzigs kyi nAbang phyug nyid// de nas pad+ma'i gos kyi de kho na nyidan/ dodzit shes rab sgrub phyir// sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir// pad+machen bo'i
rigs dag pa// ting 'dzin ye shes kun nas bsdus// zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar nam mkha' snyingabo yin zhen/ thams cad nam mkha'i bcom ldan 'das// sems
can bsod nams mthong zhing che// nam mkha'i snying po sems dpa' dang// de nas nor bu'i rigs kyis ni// dbang bskur ba dang gter dang// rdo rje rgyal mtshan
mchod pa// nor bu chen po'i rigs grub pa// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'o// zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi de kho na nyid chen po brnyes ldan 'das rdo rje se/
dpas gsungs so/ rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed// rdo rje rin chen rdo rjel// spyan ras gzigs la rdo rje sku nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa'i
denas mag dang po'i phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyidi nge// kun mchog dngos grub chen po ya/ dbang phyug chen po bgon mche// gsang ge lnga yi de nyidache// rje rtse lngazhes brjod de//
rjes rigs thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi re khen nyid ces panaM sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas nyid// snachogs bya ba rdo rje can// 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rjechos// robun
bubasags pa go/ zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs go// de la ji ltar thams cad dgug pa'i
rgyudayin zhen/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis// rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas// bkug sta de nas rjes sgrub pa// dril bu da kyi bya ba yin// ji ltar mchod pha thams
cad kyi tshig yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi// rab tu dga' bsamachod nas na// rgyu dang rol mo rnams 'phrul bas// mchod de slar yang rnal 'byor mchod// de la ji/
ltar dangos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i de khon nyid yin zhen/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi// phyag rgyu kun gyis legs byin brlabs// dam tshage chen po'-i
'di nyidi kyiso// rang nyid bsgrubs nas snying bo bzlas// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa ni// rdo rjesems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rdzobasnyoms
pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba'i mchog dang bo'i skyes bu'o// de la jiltar rang lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin zhe na/ brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang// rtog
pa kun las bsgrub bya gang// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i rgyudan/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzani rgyur
nas rdo rje dril bus rab sad cing// rtog pa thams cad rjes sgrub pas// mtshig dang la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ ngolo ji ltar 'bad pa med pa thams cad sgrub
pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ bsgrub bya ci 'dod bsgrubs nas ni// phyi nas ji ltar 'dod pa yis// ci 'dod spyod pa la spyodacing// thams cad byed cing thams cad bza'/
langs pa kham ni 'dug pa 'am// gang dang de ru'achag pa 'o// dgod pa dang ni ba ma// gangadar ci bzhin de bzhin no// dbang po gang dang gang la 'gyur/
po de dang de yi ngo bor bya// mnyam par bzha gnas rnal 'byor gyis// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bya// de ni rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas kun
dngos thams cad ni// rtag tu mthong zhing grub par 'gyur// dmatshig chen po de nyid ni mkhas pa gang zhig dang pas klog/ de ni sdug kun dang brel bas// dngos grub kun
gyis dbang phyug 'gyur// zhes bya ba dmatshig chen po'i de kho na nyid do// de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i tshig ma nyams mchog gi blam gsal// mchog gsang ba sgrub pa'i cho ga
bde mchog tsher du grub phyir gsol/ 'jo rdza mchog 'dzan rang bcas bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyis byin brlabs pa/ 'bade chen dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dga' chen mchog gis de
gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tugasang ba'i tshig/ de nas ston pa rdo rje'adzan// mkha' ltar thug med kun tu 'gro// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod nas na//
rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsungs so// bdag gisIng bo dang 'da mchog chen po'o// bde chen mchog gi mchog dang rjes su chags pa che// kun mtsheg sems dpa' rnams kyi
0/ rtag tu 'byung gnas ni// kun mchog 'a byor pa'i dbang thug gso ba yin// mtha2yas pa dang thog med mthar thug med pa ni/ mtshon bya chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po
nam mkha'i rang mtshungs mchog gi dngos 'phel gsol// de na sus kyang mthar thug byed par nus pa min// sems can rnams ni dman la zhen cing nyang la dga'// dang pa med
cing slakha byed la ma sbyangs pa// rtag tu rjes su chags shing chags bral la chags pa// de rnams la ni phan phyir 'don mthar thug pa 'o// gang gi khyim n 'ang gnas gang gisab
tusgrub pa 'am// yang na ji bzhin gsungs pa rtag ngu ba'i sgrub byed// so sor nyams su myong ba'i mthu yis thams cad du// bdud kyi la sogs rnams kyis de na gnod mi nus/
ngordzo'achang sogs sku na gang gis sgrub byed pa// gzugs brnyan la sogs thams cad 'dir ni ji bzhin gsungs// des na thams cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan//
bdud kyi lasogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus// gang zhig rdo rjel sogs gzugs brnyan lasogs pa// ji ltar 'dod pa 'di dag thams cad sgrub par byed// rab tu
'ded pas yi ge hUM las bris nas na// 'dod pa 'i dngos grub de yis ster zhing thog bza 'argyu ra// rgyal po rnams kyis rnam par sbyangs par mdzad pa ni// gang 'a don kun dag
phyir mdzad par ma 'gyur min// 'di ni bgegs byed bdud rnams kyang n yod ma yin// rtogs pas dngos grub 'phal zhing byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ gang
ni bdud nyir ma 'gyur brtan med nyid mi 'gyur// brtan pa nyid phyir dang ni brtan par mdzad pa yin// rtag pa 'di ni mchogachen gang gis sgrub byed pa// de 'a ngan dngos grub myur
du sgrub par byed// dngos grub chen po la thams cad du rjes su chags shing shin tu mnyes pa dang/ shin tubartan pa dang/ shin tu rgyas pa dang/ rtag tu rgya che bar 'gyur gro
yin no// gang zhig mchog gi rgyal bo'i snying po sgrub byed ba// rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyalab dgyes par mdzad// de dag grags pa chen po thob nas bde ba'ang thob// de
phyir 'di la dad cingagus par bya ba yin// de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 'phags so zhes bya ba byin te/ yab mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs// sras
mchog sangs rgyas sras na legs so legs// rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje 'byung ba legs// jam pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs// sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag
byin brlabs pa// rtag tu ma 'gyur don yod grub pache// ji ltar dang po'i grub pa de bzhin du// phyis nas kyang ni de bzhin grub par 'gyur// de ltar ngag chan gsungs nas ni//
sras dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdortsisams pa'i chen po yi// gsung la rjes su yi rang mdzad// dpala mchog dang po las/ rtog pa rgyal po thams cad kyi mchog rdzog
thugs dam sa'i snying po sbe pang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Ditamakhas pa chen po man+ta ka la sha dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi le tsa ba lha btsan po dge slong bla ma zhi ba'i 'od kyi
zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus tegatan la phab pa// la tsachen po rin chen bzang po yi// dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di bsgyur ba la//bar bar dpe mard pas ma 'gyur nas// bdag
gis 'bad pas [”]dpa btsal rod pas bsgyur//ka// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradzApA ra mi tan yasha tapany+tsadangasha ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags
ngashes grab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul ba lnga bcu pa/ bcom ldan 'angs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal rjen/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcos
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mas cad kyi mkhyen pa'i brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bcu
rdzogs ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyim/ thams cad mkhyen pa yongashes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag
rgyachos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa sna tshogs kyis bya ba mdzad de/ ma lus pan sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad
yongs su bskyang ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa khams gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs thams
cad rdo rjer bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas// 'dod pa'i khams thams cad na nor bu rin po[K]chen pos rab tu sprus pa dang/ ba dan kha dog sna
tshogs dril bu brgyus pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang/ me tog gi 'phreng ba dang/ rngam dang/ rgyun 'phrang dang/ chun 'phyang dang/ zla ba lta bu s mdzos par byas pa/ de bzhin gshig
pa thams cad bzhugs par shes pa bstod pa na/ byang chub sems dang 'a bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs cig t+tabazhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
lagan rdo rjedung/ sban ras gzigs dbang phyag dang/ nam mkha'i sing po dang/ rdo rje khu tshur dang/ 'dzem dpal dang/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khe lo bskor ba
dadang nam mkha' mdzod dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi bstobs thams cad rab tu 'dzems pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'/
byib phrag brgyadang thas cig ste/ yongs subaskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo
zhes bya ba/ thog ma dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston
to 'di ltar rab tudag ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 'dod chags kyi mda' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'dri
lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dang 'i gnas so// sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i
gnas pano/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// thams cad 'ab dbang phyug dang dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
gnas so// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam par rig pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
sems dpa'i gnas so// srid pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snyoms pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de na/ 'di lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// yid tshil par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i
gnas de ni/ 'di la su/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snang ba rnam par dag pa' gnas de na/ 'di lta sta/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lus bde ba rnam par dag
pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta sA/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sgra rnam par ngag pa'i
gnas de ni/ 'di lta sku/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas so// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas de na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dang 'i gnas so/ ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di
lta ste/ byang chub sems dang 'i gnas so// theg rnam par dag pa'i gnas de// 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad
ni ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par ngag pa ste/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa go/ lag na rdo rje su 'pha chos thams cad kyi bye

ba nying rnam par dag pa'i sgo sgrub pa'i shes rab kyi pha sngol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig thos na'ang/ de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad dang/ chod pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i
tha 0 sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang/ las kyi sgribapachen po bsags kyang/ sems can ragal ba la sogs pa na song dunams kyang skya bar mi 'gyur/ sdig pa'i ng byas ma thag tusdug
bsngal med par byung bar 'gyur ro// su zhig 'dzin pa dang/ nyin re bzhin klog pa dang/ kha hon byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de tshe 'di nyidi lachos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas/ chos thams cad la dbang bar 'gyu rA'o// chos thams cad la dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ mchog tu gabab myong bar brgyu daro// byang chub sems
dpa' chen po'i tsho bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa/ theg pa chen po
mngon par rtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdo rje 'dzin mtha' dag gi sems can gyi mchog khams gsum ma lus pa dag/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal
ba sems can gyi khams lus med pa 'dul ba/ don thams cad grub pa/ dam tshigachen po la rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can du mas g.yog byas pa'i nge shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
tshul gyi den 'di ston te/ bzhani rab tu'adzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te/ thog ma'i sde tsho chen po gsoranas/ rang gi snying khar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzan tsho+ud/ bde
bzhenapo rdo rjodon yod ba'idam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snyingapo 'dismras so// daM de nas bcom ldan 'das de baTin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis/
po lung re bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa ni maTon par rdzogs par byang chub par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ rdo rje srab nyid kyi
par rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ na gtsag pa'i phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs ra ra byang chub pa na byang chub chen po'o//
ngogonyidi rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// thams cad la gabar mi rtog pa'i phyir thams cad mnyam pa nyid
mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po'i// phag na rdo rjesu la 'ang chos mngon par sgrub nga bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang/ 'dzani pa dang/ klog pa dang/ sgog pa
de sdig pa thams cad spyodakyang/ byang chub kyisnying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan song thamasacad las yang dgo par badas par 'gyura'o// myur du blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan das ye shesakyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzan pa don gyi gnas da
nyid rgya cheraston cing/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ chos thamasacad kyi mnyam pa nyidakyisIng po 'di rab tasas so// a4 de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gags pa shAkya thub pas kyang/ yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rnamakhar rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di bshad de/ 'dod
chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis so// zhesdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyidakyis/ gti mug gi sbos pa med pa nyid de// gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyi tshe
chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o// lag na rdo rje su la shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'dachen pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ sgom ba des 'dul ba'i dbang gis khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du
'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du blanamed pa yang dgabar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyurayo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos 'di'i don rgya chen
po ston te/ 'jig rtenagasum las rnam par rgyalaTha'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyabacings nas/ khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg ste 'bar bar lta la pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/
mche ba gtsigasanas rkang pa g.yon pa brgya ba'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas/ rdo rje h+phazhes bya ba'i snying bo 'di smos so// dzaM/ de nas b.rom ldan 'das de bzhin/
bogshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas/ yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yi ngashisakyi phyag rgya zhes byagaM shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i/
tshula'ang bshad de/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyura'o// dra mo thams cad rnam par dag bas/ 'jig rten
na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rtenanasems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// shesang thams cad
rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ lag na rdo tshigul langashes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bad nyen pa dang/ 'a pa dang/
klog pa dang/ sgom pa de 'dod chags dang dra ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang/ pad+ma lta bu l 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang/ dramo rnams dang/ glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa phal ba
rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a
chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ron gyi gnas 'od nyid rgyacher ston cing/ bzhani rab tu 'dzum dmul te pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas/ 'dod chags la sogs pa dri mas mi
gos pa la lta zhing/ pagazugasaM sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi sAnge po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bar de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum
thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro// nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur//chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur// zang
zing gi sbyin pa na lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i sIng po bzhin 'og tu 'dzum ste/

rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng ba 'ching zhingaden 'di nyid rgya che raston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig ni bo che zhes bya ba'asnying po 'di smras so// hU~M/
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas ]
yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shesakyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyuro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ chos thams cad
thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ ting nge 'dzazhi thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzani ba na/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i ngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
'di nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ lung 'bogs pa dang/ sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang/ shes pa thams cad dad/
dgos pa thams cad dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems thams cad rdo rjes rdo rje dngos grub dam pa thob nas/ blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs/
pa glu par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam tshag chen po'i ngo rje'i phyag rgya yos su 'dzin pas don gyi gnas 'di rgya cher ston to/
de bzhin rab tu 'dzul zhing rdo rjesrang 'dangos grub thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// A de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin
gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi snga rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo 'di med pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa'o//
mtshan ma med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te 1 bzhani rab tu 'dzum bzhin du/
bdag ga la ga res de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying lo'a mchog 'di smras so// de nas btsem ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
pa thams cad kyi 'khor der 'dus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha lo tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdo rdzomanyam pa nyid
la 'jug pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor tshol 'jug bar 'gyur ro// don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po'i
bya@#// 'khor la 'jug par 'gyur/chos thamasacad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ dam pa chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad mnyam pa
nyid la 'jug pa ni// 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyulo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor bskor ba/ chos
mnyam pa nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing bzhin 'dzum nas/ rdo rje 'khor lo bskor zhing rdo rje 'khor le thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sAng po bad smras so/ haM de nas bcol ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i snod kyis mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces byab/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub
kyisams bskyed pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgya chab go/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
la mchod pa'i chog rgyas pa'o// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i mig rgyas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger
'dra ba 'ag/ yi ger 'dra'i 'jug pa dang/ 'dzan pa dang/ klog pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ ston pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ sems pa dang/ sgom pa dang/ mchod pa byed pa na/debazhi
gshegs pa thams cung lamachod pa'i tshog rgyus pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de ni rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las mA
car don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i sAng po bad smras so// o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad 'dul nus pas yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs
su 'dzani pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying bo zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi ba la tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// sems can thams cad mnyam ba nyid pas/ khro bo mnyam
pa shing de// sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas/ khro bo 'dul ba nyid do// sems can thams cad chos nyid pas/ khro bo chos nyid do// sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid bas/
khro bo rdorje nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba na byang chub// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa den
de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rdzogachab 'i phyag rgya dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i sAng po 'ad smras so// ha de nas bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thamams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi parol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/
thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// thams cad don nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do//
thams cad chos nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do// thams cad las nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du ga par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs nas/
kha don yodapa thams cad kyi dam rig ces bya ba'i snying po bad smras so// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can
byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin
pas sems can thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no// thams cad snying rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas/ sems can thams cad na ron+da'i snying po can
ngag thams cad rab tu byang bas/ sems can thams cad na ris kyi sung po can no// sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas/ sems can thams cad ni
las kyi snying po can no// de nas pha rol gyi rjerigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra byung nas chos nyid kyi den rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gar
khana'i snying po 'di phul lo// de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te// mgran gcig du thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzud pa dang/ gzhig
pa dang/ sgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang ga de khona'i snying po 'ad phulale// b+he/ de nas sbrang rtsir byed 'a sogs pa mang po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/
mgrinagacig tu rang gi de kho na'i song po 'dasmras so// sa/ de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/rang ga de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo// gaM/ de nas bcom
'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas la mthar thug cingamu med pa'i ris dang ldan pas yang g 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/chos thams cad kyi mnyam
pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyis brlabs pa jo rdzoshes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyade do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid bas/ rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyade do// shes rab kyi pha rol
tuphyin pa du ma nyid pas/ chos thams cad du ma nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thar thug pa med pa nyid pas/ chos thams cad mthar thug pa med/
[>panyid yin no// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ ston pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ sgom pa de sangs rgyas/
dang byang chub sems dpab spyod pa thug pa'i med pa'i mthar phyin te/ sgrib pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gsheg
pa thams cad dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod ba dang/ thogs pa med pa ra myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ 'a gan rdo rje la 'gas so zhes bya ba byin no// sems can
chen po legs so legs// bde ba chen po legs so legs// theg pa chen po legs so legs// blo gros chen po legs so legs// tshe ga 'di ni legs par smras//
sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzan kun gyis// 'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog/ ro mdo sde byin gyis brlabs/ cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med// gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa na//
pa sku bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis// de dag mi sod mi tshugs so// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang// sangs rgyas kun gyis
gsungs pa bzhin// ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur// de skad gsus nas sngags grub phyir// rdo rjecan gyis bshad pa la// kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhos bcas
pa thams cad kyis ni mngon par bastod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid/
brnyes pa chos thams cad spros pa med pas/ yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mchog dang po thog ma dwang/ tha mdang
dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'dod chags chen po dngos grub dam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen
po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos/
grub chen po grub pa dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam pa ni/ bdud chen
po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'dzems pa dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa
dngos grub dam pa ni/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dunges grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi kha/
gsum thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ ma lus pa na semos can gyi khams 'dus pa med po yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgya'i phyir/ 'khor
la'ang gas shing brtson 'grus che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma lus pa na// sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa dang/ sa mA
can thamasacad la phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ mchog tu shin tu bde bachen po dngos grubam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen ji srade 'khor ba'igonas su// mkhas
mchog 'dug par gyur pa'e re// de srid mtshungs med sems can don// ma nas 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang/ ye shes gnas su
bsgrubs pas na// chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par gyur// chags la sogs pas 'dul ni 'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang
'jig rten sdig byed de sbyang phyir// 'khor ba srid du bdag nyid 'dul// ji ltar pad+marab 'bar yang// tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa// de bzhin gnas pa'i nyis pa
00 yis 'gro phan rnams la ma gos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag/ bde ba che zhing nor re la// khams gsum dbang phyag thob pas na// sems can don rnamA
brtan par byed// lagan rdo rje su la lan par langs nas mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'du sa zhing 'don pa dang/ nyan pa dang/
'dzani pa dang/ klog pa dang/ sgom pa de yid bde ba dang/ bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo don yod pa'i dem tshag dngos grub kyi mchogakyang
tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchogakyang grub ste/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi chen po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs par
'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba'i bdag po lags rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i sngag
kyi tshig na nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnams so/ o byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ o kun tu bazang po'i spyod pa/ o yade bzhin gyi nor bu/ o 'gog pa med pa/ oM skye ba zlog
pa o rnam bar shes pa thams cad/ o 'ded chags dang bral ba'i chos nyidi chen po/ o brtson 'grus kyi go cha/ o kun tu 'gro ba/ o rdo rje sra ba'i saMyA/
'ad @#// hUM phaT o de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ o ngo bo de rnam par dag nga/ oM chos nyid shes pa rnam par dag pa// oM las rnam par srong ba/ hU~MlaM/
penges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can/ hUMphaT phyogs 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa// oM sngong ba'i rje tshu can/ oM hUM thams cad 'dul ba/ o hU~M/ oM a zhes bya ba'asgo/ so shesaM
kyi pha rol tuphyin pa/ ApaM so aM/ o re bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi skra'a mchog/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag nga/ o de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje kaH oM a sdig pa 'ching ba thams chud tshems shig/ nasong gi rgyud thams cud las thar par rgyusangag/ o dam tshag thams ca
kyi rdo hUMtAT/ sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ dngos grub dam pa rdo rje 'dzin chen podang/ de bzhin gshegs/
bar 'gyu'o// 'a gan rdo rje 'dano sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyod pa rnams kyi lag tu thob par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis/
pa mnyan pa'i m/ yi ger 'dra ba 'am/ yi ge'-ipa gzhug pa'i m/ bkrug pa 'am/ 'chang ba ma/ bsgom pa 'am/ bsti stang du bya ba 'am/ ri mor bya ba 'am
0//mchod par mi nus so// gang drag gsanga shes rab kyi b.rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'dra le sa than yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na'ang/ sems can de dag na gzhan/
na sangs rgyas mang po larage ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa yanan mtha' dag rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ lagan rdo rjegang la la dag sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gdaklong brgyad cu'i bye ma la bkur sti
ma byas pa dang/ bla maram byas pa dang/ bsti stangam byas pa dang/ mchod par ma byas pa de dag gisashes grakyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
par ma nus so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang la spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/ glegs bam la
bris te spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag byab gnas su 'gyur ni// de bskal pa bye bamang por slob dran par 'gyur ro// de la bdud sdig to can bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro//
rgyalapo chen bobs dang/ lhagazhan rnams kyang de la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang 2 sba ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// yang bam spangs par 'di
'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der skye'o/ de ltar
shes rab kyil rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'achos kyi rnam grangs 'di phan yon mang mod kyis/ ngas phyogs tsam zhig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis/
bo de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang/
lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pat+ti tshul brgya lngabcu pa rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/ bri badzra mats+tshaa laM kA sa nAmam hAt+tAnArA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal
gyu rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po tshe dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dem ga
glu gas ye shes rnam pa sna tshog sangashing khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi napo che'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal
ba0 por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de rje dam tshig gi ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasad kyis shes kyi
phyag rgyabarnyes paM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud cing las snatshogs mdzad pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i
sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i las mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa dus gsum du
gnas pa'i sku dang/ gsungadang/ thugs rdo rje de bzhashegshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan cing bsngags pa'i zhir bu rin po che chen po dang ldan
pa kha dog rnam pa stsatshogs pa'i dril bubatags pa// rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar gyi 'phan dang/ me tog gi chun po dang/ dra ba dang dra ba spyad pas klubasashing nye bar
mdzes pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad legs par yongs su dag pa/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi khang bzas ro mtha' yas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtsug
lag khang la la me tog gi 'khri shing mchog gi snying po'i rkyen gyis bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho rab tu bkram pa'i sprin mamakha'i khams yongs su
khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyisabarlabs pa/ mtha' las 'das pa drisangs rgyas 'khrungs pa'i dbus/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po
bo 'od gsal ba'i gzhal med khang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rdo rje snying po'i rgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje/ de/
bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrungs mi 'gog 'geg par mi 'gyur pa'i yon lag gi spyod yul yang dag pa'i matha'i gsal ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul/ chos/
kyi dbyings kyisapo' khang bzangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sAng po sa chen po'i dem pa la
bzhugs so// de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar te chos ston par mdzad pa ni thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma
'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul yongs su dag pa'i sgo ston par mdzad do// de nas yang bcom ldan
0 ras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi ye shes kyi nyim/ rnamakhargya'abadimatshig 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ rgya mtsho ltar
thabar/ las snatshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i yo shes thib pa/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rjenam mkha' lta bu/ sku chen po rdo rje'i sku/ mtha' was 'das pa'i sku/
sku'an po che chos kyi sku/ sprul pa'i sku/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sku/ byang chub kyi sems/ donayod pa// yongs su bsdus pa/ dege ba 'phel ba/ rgyal po chen po/
snang ba'i tog bzhad pa bo/ chos dang ljon pa/ shes rab kyi 'khor la/ skad thams cad pa/ sna tshogs pa can/ srung ba po/ gnod spyin can/ mtshams
sbyor ba/ yang dag pa'i gter/ gtsug tor du gyur pa/ mchog ldan/ rdo rjecan 1 'khor lo can/ ye shes can/ khyab 'jug chen lo/ sku dang/ gsung
dang thugs rdo rje/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du legs par bzhugs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bgrod pa/ rdo rje'i dbyingos thams
cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i byin rlabs kyi ye shes snying po/ ngebazhin
po gshegs pa thams cad kyi bran med pa'i rdo rje ni po che'i dbang bskur ba chen po'i dam tshig nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes
pas mngon par byang chub par gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thoms cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa nam mkha' thams
cad la khyab pa bo/ gzugs thams cad yongs su mthong ba'i ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can 'dul pa'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gsheg
pa thams cad don yod pa'i bka' lung mdzad pas sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyade bla na med pa'i las sna tshogs pa can/ rnam snang mi 'gyur mi bskyod pa// rin chen
tog ste 'od byed pa// 'od dpag med pa rgyal ba mgon// don yod pa ni las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la rab tu gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa
brnyes pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes yang dag par rjes su thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/
chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su med cing mnyam nyid dmags pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa mthar
phyin pa la gnas pa/ stong pa nyid dang/ de bzhin nyid rung/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ mtshan ma med pa rung/ smon pa med pa dang/ rmongs pa'i gnas bzhi po dag
gis sangs rgyas kyi yeshes kyi yul du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyidi la dmigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug nyid
la byin gyis brlabs nas 1 phyogs dang mtshams rnams la rnam par gnas so// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa laM bka'
stsal pa// 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ 'jam
dpal gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur bachen po rab cudagyes pa'i zhal ras kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drang ba'i don du rdo rje se gol/
brdabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsdus pa chen po'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa/ bud+d+hA sa mA dzo ahaM/ oMhU~M badzes ma dza/ de nas de skad/
[>ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rdo rje 'dzan pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud rab 'byams
rgya mtsho smin khyab par mthong ngo// de nas yang 'jam dang ' gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dung
lhan cig tu mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje blo gros kyis ye shes yongs su bskyod de gnas thams cad du rnam par gnas so// dunas bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis
brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor los
sbyar bachen po risnying po bdag la yod de ngas bshad par bya'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlobs shig/ b+haM de nas/ mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs
pa dang// rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs// dre bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med// don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams dang lhan cigad bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dpal gyi ba la rab tu zhugs te/ zhugs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba
chen po thams cad kyi phyir byin gyis brlab par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhi'i gyur te/ zhal bzhi bo rnams las chos kyi dbyings
dang nam mkha'i khams mtha' med pa sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi yul chos kyi tshul dbyangs gcig gis chedadu brjod pa 'di lta ste/ rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas
gang yin pa de na 'ad ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam
bar dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnasaso/ srid pa rnam bar dag pa'i gnasagang yin pa de ni 'od ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
so 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de na 'di ltar
byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i
gnas gang yin pa de na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// mi khom pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//
yid sim pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de na 'di ltar byang chub sems da pa'i gnas so// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de na 'di ltar byang chub sems/
dpa'i gnas so// lus rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ngag rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i
[“ ]gnas so// yid rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de na bad ltar byang chub semA
dpa'i gnas so// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yan pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas ga yan pa de ni 'daltar byang chub soms
dpa' gnas so/ ri rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yan pa de na 'di ltar byang chub sems
ba 7dpa'i gnas so/ dngos bo thams cad rnam par dag pasis gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'ad ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhi/
gyi sa rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par rag bas/ shes ba kyi ba la tu phyin pa khongs su dag pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal
sa/ chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gsang sngags thams cad kyi 'dren pa'o// sngags thams cad kyi bla mar gyurab/ thams cad gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba brtan pa/ rje/
ba med pa/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ b+haM / 'jam dpal gang la las chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bsdus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying bo 'di lan
cag tsam yang thosan de'i byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad chod pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa chen
bo thams car dbar bsags kya nganams kyang dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ gzhan yang sdig pa rnams byas na'ang sdug bsngal med cung zad bar
'gyur ro// gang gis 'di 'chang ba dang/ nyi ma re re 'don ba dang/ ston pa dang/ rgyun mchad par yid la byed pa de na skyo ba 'di nyid la tshos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting
rebazhi sosor thob nas chos thams cad kyidabang phug tu'agyuro/ chos thams cad la dgag zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po skye ba/
bcu drug na/ de bzhin gshegs panyid dam rdo rje 'dzanipa nyid thob par 'gyur go/ hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ slar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin
pa'i tshul de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'achos nyid mngon par bang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang/ rang bsgrub pa 'di ston par mdzad do// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i

byang chub chen po'i rdo rje lta bur sra ba dang don gcig pa nyid kyis don mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i rang bzhin mngon par bzhin rnam par dag pas/ chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mngon par byung nug
ba'i byeng chub chen po dang/ rnam par rtog par ng/ rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis thamasacad mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pas byang chub chen pos/ 'jam dpal gang ba las chos kyi gnas
bzhi po 'di thos nas nyan pa dang/ 'dzan pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ sgom par byed na/ sridi byang chub/ri bo la thug gi bar du sdig pa thams cad yang dag par ldan pa'i ng sdig pa
thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing/ myur du na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub par 'gyur ro// u0f00 de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gdug pa
thams cad 'dul bde bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal bas bsdus pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nges par sgrub pa bka'
stsalapa/ 'dod chagasakyi spros pa med pa'i phyir/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'o/ zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'i phyir/ zhe sdang gi spros pa med pago/ gtilug gasmos pa med pa'i phyir
gtilug gispros pa med pa'o/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi lo rel tu phyin pa spos pa mad pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o/ 'jam dpal gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la kog par byed na/ des 'dul ba'i dbang bar bzung nas
khams gsum du skyes pa'i sims can rnams bsad par gyurakyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro// hU~M/ de nas bcom
ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ sur yang tshes thams cad rnam par gabags pa'i debang phyug ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyiwa
ro phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten gyi 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ yul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no// 'jig rten gyi zhe sdang thams cad rnam par
dag pa'i phyir/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no// 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa 'di yin no//
'jig rten du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa nyid yin no// 'jig rten gyi shes bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i
phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid yin// 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dathis nas nyan par byed cing 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na/ de 'do

pa thams cad kyi nang na gnas kyang bats+tshalta bur 'dod chags kyi skyon globur ba'i dri mas gos par ma 'gyur zhing/ myur du blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par
'gyur ro// hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum thams cad pabadag po de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskaba'i'abyung gnas ye shes
snying po zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ dbang bskur byin pas 'jig rtenagasum po thams cad kyi rgyal po yongs su thob par 'gyur ro// don gyi sbyin pas
thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi sbyin pas chos thamasacad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur// zang zing gi sbyin pas thams cad kyi lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid

tsa bdeb thob par 'gyur ro/ t+taM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg ba tham cad kyi ya shakyi phyag rgya rnyed pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'chang ba de bzhin gshegru pa brtags pas/ sur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi yi shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i nge shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgyayongs su bzung bas de bzhin gsheg

ba thams cad nyid du gyur ba dang/ gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas chos thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang/ thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas ting nge 'dzani thams cad thob pa'i don du
'gyur dang/ ngorje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs thams cad rdo rjemag tu 'grub pa'i don du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la 'chad cing sgom par byed na/ des dngos grub thams cad dang/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang/ ye shes thams cad dang/ lasazas
cad dang/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rjesams dpa'i mchog gdengos grub thams cad so sor yongs su thob par 'gyur zhing/ myur du bla na med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'akhon
bar rdzogs por byang chub par 'gyur// A/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas de slar yang rdo rje'iyig yongs su bsgyur ba zhes ba
[z/ ]@#// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin patshulabakabastsal pa/cad bazhinayod pa sbyor ba'iphyir/ chos thams cad stong ba nyid dang/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par nye bar bzung
[°/ ]ba 'i/ chos thams cad mtshan mas dbenapa dang/ smonapa lasanye bar grol ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir//
chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsalaba'o/ aM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa longs su chud pa de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang
'dus pa chen por 'jug pa zhes bya ba'ange shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshulabaka' stsal pa/ rdo rdzomanyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'dus par 'jug
par 'gyur ba dang/ don mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'a'i dus par 'gyur ba dang/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas dam pa'i chos kyis
a 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang/ las mnyam pa nyid la zhugs par 'dus pa thams cad du 'jug bar gyur ba dang/ hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi mchod patshog rgyas pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs bas/ sur yang de bzhani gshegs pa thams cad machod pa dam pa zhes bya ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
tshulabaka' stsal pa// byang chub kya sams bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i tshig rgyas pa dang 2 sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i tsho ga rgyas pa dang/ chos thams cad yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang/ shes rab kyi
pha rol phyin pa 'dra ba dang/ 'dra'i 'jug pa dang/ 'dzanib dang/ 'don pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ sgom pa mngon du 'gro ba'i las kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi mchod pa'i tshig rgyas bgo/ tsho de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'ajus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul
baya shes snying po zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ms panyid pas khre ba mnyam pa nyid dang/ sems can 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba
'dul ba nyid dang/ sems can thams cad chos nyidi nyid pas khre ba chos de nyid dang/ sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid bas khro brdo rjed de//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems
can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste/ ha / de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad manyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang chos thams cad las
pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin patshul 'di bka' stsal pa/thams cad nyams nags shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smA mnyam pa nyid dang/ thams cad
bo kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de nyid dang/ chos nyid thams cad manyam pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang/ thams cad kyi bya ba nyid pas
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ibya ba nyid du 'gebar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis/
rdzob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di boka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bazang po bdag nyid thams cad pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
kyisang po dang/ rdo'idobang bskur bas sems can thams cad rdorje'i snying po dang/ ni po che thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rin po che'i phung po dang/ ngag
thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi songe po dang/ las thams cad byed pa'i sbyor bas sems tshan thams cad las kyi snying po'o/ de nas bcom
ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i tshos lami gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bas/ slar yang chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas pas byin gyis
brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa mtha' med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/
mtha' med pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad med pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyire/
chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal
gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas nyan par byed 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na/ de na deg cing mthar byed pa'i byang chub saMms dpa'i spyod pa la nges
para gnas nas sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzan pa nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ gany+nyo de nas bcom ldan zhes
rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsaba'achos nyadi brnyes pa// chos thams cad spros pa med pas/ slar yang bder chon
po rdodzadon yod ba dam tshagaces byab rdo rjechos mnyam pa nyidangashes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i sgo dam pa thog ma dang/ tha ma dang/ dbus las grol ba pa'i mchog 'di bka'i
sal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po mchog tugrub pas bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems/
dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po mchog tu thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dar la chen po rnams
kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog tugrub pas bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pas mchog grub par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub pas 'jig ste na gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' po rnams kyi 'jig
nagasum mtha' dag gis dbang phyug mchog grub pas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i
mchogangashin tubade ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur te/ saM / de ci'i phyir zhen/ jisrid 'khor ba'i gnas su// mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa// de
sridamanyam med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// yongashes byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub// las thamA
cad rnamadag pas// srid pa dag par 'gyur phyir ro// chags sogs rab ldan 'jig rten na// kun nas srid par sdig byed pa// de dag rnam par sbyang don du//
de rnams 'a dod chagasachen po 'dzin// ji ltar pad+malegs dmar ba// dmar po'i skyon gyis ma gos ltar// bag chags skyon gyis srid pa ru// rtag tu 'gro phan gos
mi 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po rnam dug ba// bde bachen po nor chen po// khams gsum dbang phyag thob nas su// de dag donan brtan par byed// ha'adzam
dpalagangal las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs du nyen re bzhin dunang par las te/ gang 'don pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ 'dzan pa
dang rjod par byed na/ sa bde ba dang yid bde bathams cad thob par 'gyur zhi bde ba chen po sdodon yod pa'i dam tshag gi dngos grub mchog tugyur pa skyo ba 'dra nyid
la thob par 'gyur ro// hU~M/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di
dag ni nges pa shes rab kyi waM rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo ste/ 'di lta ste/ on ma 7 sarba bud+d+ha bo ng+hi satAnaM/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta badzra/ oM saman+ta b+ha dra tsAred+hi/
o tsan+tim Ni/ o an red+ha/ odzathu b+ha te/ oM dzA ti pa ri wa ra te/ ma hAr ga d+harma te/ oM bi ka wa tse/ os gamin/ obadz+dzaTika
po wa ci te hUMphaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga te/ oM swab+hA ba ba b+hUt+taM/ o pradz+nyA pA mi tAdzAnaba'aT+The/ okAmabangeshed+hi'i hUM/ oM ni su byu badzra tihUMphaT/ o k+kAranA ge/ o badzra/
hA badzra/ o sawarAm+maTi/ o hi/ oM a kA ro mu kho/ o pradz+nyA bA ram tio ho/ yaM hA o o/ o sapatabago dkAya a gro/ oM saMr ta thA ga tabag badzra/ oM sarba ta
b+hog tu tsit+ta badze a/ o spo Ta ya sarba A pa ya brgyu nipramo kA ya/ sarba a pA yA ga ta sarba sa ma ya badzra hUM phaT/ sdig pa dang bral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// debad
pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang pho mchog gi dngos grub rdo rdzo'adzan pa 'amo/ de de bzhin gshogs pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di dege ba'artse/
bas bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grags par ma 'gyur zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can gyis bris pa dang/ bkrug pa dang/ brjod pa dang/
ma gro bye ba dang/ bla mar bya ba dang/ rjed par bya ba dang/ mchod par bya ba'ang nus pa ma yin no// gzhan du na gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu bzhi pa'i tshul gyison/
0/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chung ngu na/ yi ge gcig yang thos na sems can de sangs rgyas mang sho 'al dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun bar 'ge par bya na/ slar yang mtha' dag ma lus par rdzogs
pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpalasems can gang la lag klung gi bye ma brgyad cu sAd kyisangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la phyag byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod
par byas pa nas rjes shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa'i tshul 'a de nyan par nus so// sa khams gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de mchod rten du gyur ba ste phyag bya
ba'i gnas so// gang tshos kyi rnam grangs 'di yod labazungab 'am/ glegs bam du bris par gyur na de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro//
de la bdud sdig to can gyis bar du ma gcod do// rgyal po chen po bzhi bo rnams dang// gzhan yang lha rnams kyis phyi bzhin rjes bu 'brang ste/ de la srung ba dang/ skyab pa
dang sbod par byed par 'agyur zhingatshul ma yin pas dus byed par ma 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro//
mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang de la 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyor ro// 'jam dang ba 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje snying po thams cad kyi rgyan theg pa chen po mngon par
partogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po mchog gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rjidabyas kyi dbang phyug dam pa 'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzhis yongs
su bskor ba rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo// mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'o// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i phyir/
la chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// spros pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'o// thams cad kyis sems gsal ba'i mtshan
nyid kyi phyir/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyis yongs su rgyas pa'o// A/ hU~M hU~M hi/ hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje yi ge'i tshig 'di brjod pa tsam gyis
chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pas sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad shin tugasalebs snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi slar yang bsdu bas byonanas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'abakod pa zhes bya ba'i
0 ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ro rjesnying bo rgyan ces bya
ba bshad par byas nyon cig/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gyis shig bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos/ 'jamadapal
gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes la zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cud kyi sung po
chen po lo dro pa'i byin gyis brlabs byos shig/ de nas yang 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'dus rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ byin gyis brlabs nas de las 'thon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar rnam par
gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje sAng po'i rkyen byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi rdo rje chen po snying po'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de na
yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje snying po gsang chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun ldan dge/ rdo rje snying po dngamatshudas pa// khams/
po rnams thams cad rnam par sprul// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsidang/ 'gazhan yang bcud len dang mtshungs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang// rdo rjen gyi rang bzhin grong
[E/ ]gruba'ipa la sgo bzhi pa// rtobabs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog chun pos sras// gra yi ni thams cad dang// sgo 'gram dngan mtshams/
rnams su// rdo rje ni chen rnams kyis spras// nang gi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// de yi phyi rol du bya ba// dkyil 'khor yang ni rnam pa bdun// sgo khyud du na saMni chen ni/ mchog turmad
byang gzhag par bya// rdo rje srad bu dgadang ldan// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan// rdo tshaka ba'i mdun bzhag pa// bum pa la sogs dag gis spus/ tshad mdzes pa yi snying po
tsho rdo rje 'khorale sogs pas brgyan// rab ra ba chen pon// ra bo gnyis kyi phyi rol tu// sngags pas kun nas yongs bskor ba/ khyad par ji bzhin bri bar bya// nang gidakyil

yug 'khor phyogs kyi cha// dkyil 'khor dag ni rnam bzhi'i bya/ gruba' pa dang blum po dang// gru gsum rnam pa las byung dang// zla ba phyed pa'i tshul dra ba/ 'dakyil 'khor yang na bzhi pa'o// de yi nang
tham/ ga lani/ pad+ma lag brgyad pa bri/ de ltar shes rab chen po ya// slob dpon rdo rje'abyang bsabri 'de yarjes su lha rnams kyi// go rims ji bzhin bri bar bya// gdugs dkar rgyalaba'agatsug
tor dang// gzi brjidi drab rnam par rgyal// dmatshig mchogagi rnam pa bzhi// slar yang 'dab ma'i mtshams su bra// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// dkyil 'khor dag na bzhi po ru// mibaskyod
lasogs rnam pa bzhi/ rdo rjernal 'byor dbang phyagagri/ mkhaskyod payi dkyil 'khor ni// zla bod lta bu'i mdog tu bya// de ni rje rjesams dpa' sogs// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug
rnams// rdo rje slob dpon stobs po tsho// shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// rdo rje ni chen sogs gang ba'i// rin chen 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor yin// rdo rje chos sogs gsang bo
yi= drakyil 'khor tshodapagamed pa'i 'o// rdo rdzolas la sogs ldan pa// don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor lo/ 'do shugs kyis song nas dkyil 'khor gsum pa bri bar@#//
rnam gzigs la sogs sangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor der ni bri ba yani// rdo rjesnying po rgyal po tshe/ khyab bdag gsang ba'i dbang phyug gtso// 'dod pa'i don kun grub pa'i phyir//
'bad pa yis ni bro bar bya// blo gros rgya mtsho mo zad blo/ byams pa bdag nyid chen po dang/ nam mkha'i snying bo grags chen bo// kun tu bzang po nyidi dag dang/ phyagan rdo rje badaganyidi
kun s 'bar ba'i 'khrigs pa'i 'od// 'jam pa'i dbyas na rigs kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bzang drama med// sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel// de nang
[° ]sa yape Ang bo mchog/ nam mkha' mdzod ni mdzod dam pa// lag na gzhi chen bla na med// mi phan pa kun 'joms pa// drab can gyi 'od ces bya// dpa' bo 'di dag gsang bache/ dkyil 'khor/
'di dag bri bar bya// 'khor lo rin de nas ni// blo gros ldan pas phyir song su// shar dusangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya go rims bzhin du dgod// 'khor la mdzes pa ni/
dge legs bri// rdo rjedapal be'upad cesabya// gtsug tor rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rdo rje pad+mas rnam par brgyan// lhung bzed dang ni 'khar gsalo dang// chos gos kyang 'akhyud
ba par du// 'di dag shAkya seng ge yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tugasungs// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas// de rnams blo ldan brtan par bre// byang du 'jig rten dbang phyag gi/
phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de bzhin te// pad+ma ut+palanyid dang// spyi blugs pags pa'i g.yang gzhi dang// dbyug gu'i shing n mkhas pa yis// mamyos pa ru bubeb// sar yang lha kyisong nas
ani phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// phyag rgya 'bar ra/sa bri bar bya// de paN+Dig dang/ 'dril bu rab tu mdzes pa dang/ 'dabyug gu dang ni tho ba dang/ dbyug pa/
[n/ ]rdo rje samtshan pa dang// lcags sgrog dang ni rtse gsum yang// 'di dag dpa' thob phyog rgyago dkyil 'khor nub tu song nas ni// 'jam pa'i ribyangs ni blo gros kyi// gsang gratshos na dem pa'i
