mchog/ brtson 'grus chen po'i phyag rgyab// ut+pal 'khor la rdo dang// ral gri yang na khyad par du// byed pa dang na dgra sta dang// rma bya dang ni sang genyid// phyag rgya 'di rnams brtson 'grus/
cha// mkhas pa yis ni degod par bya// 'khor lo'i grwa legs gnas par// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs gri/ phyi ya 'khor le'agrwa ngu na// rdo rje bdug pa zhes bya sogs// 'badag nyidi
chen po 'bad pa yis// mchod pa 'di dag bri bar bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// gzugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya sogs/ gzugs sgra de bzhin dri deng na// khyad par du ni re dang yang//
reg dang chos kyi dbyangesarangan// mkhas pa yis na dgod par bya// skyo yanang ni thams cad du// sgo skyong ban dgod par bya// de bzhin dkyil 'khor gzhan pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyis song
nas ni// go rims bzhin dusas rgyas kyi// yum rnams 'bad pas bri bar bya// nam mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba dang// shes rab pha rol phyin ma dang// phyag rgya
kun dang yang dag ldan// jisrid de bzhin gshegs rigam// thams cad shar du dgod par bya// de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// byang gi phyogs su song nas ni// gos dkar las gnas sgrol ma
[ai ]@#// che/ khro gnyer can dang grags 'dzanam// khyad par dun dpal bdun dang// mda'abadun dang na dbyangs can ma// de la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// bran dang bran mor yang
dag ldan// de bzhin pho nya pho nyamo// gsang ba'i phyag rgya lhan cigabri// rdo rje shugs kyis song ba na/ we ya phyogs su rab phyin la/ yum kAdang lcags sgrog dang// khab rtse rdo rje mtshan ma
mchog/ de ltar bs nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogs su song nas/ deran na nas shes ldan gyis// skra can stobs chen bri bar bya// de bzhin 'dam bu mda' rgyudang/ wA
mo zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra// lha mo 'ba'i sku can ma// bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// rab bkra nor gyi blo gros dang// 'gugs byed pho nya lnga dang ldan// grwayacharu bri byab// rdo rje mdung rtse
zhes bya sogs// sgo yi nang na thams cad du// sgo skyong ba ni rnam par gi/ gzhan gyis mthub lha mo che// de bzhin ral pa gcig ma mchog/ rdo rje dregs ma lha mo ni// rdo rje spyi
yang dag bri// de nas blo ldan dkyil 'a khor no// thams cad las ni 'thon nas su// shar gyi tshan thams cad du// sngags pa rnam par gzhag pa yis// khrotshan gzhan gyis shug
pa de bzhin mi g.yo zhes bya dang// khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po ni/ mnga' bdag brgya phrag lnga yis bskor// de ltar bris nas sngags pa yis// de nas byang gi char song ste
09mgrin khro bo chen po dang//skar ma'i spyan ni khyad par du'o// khraganyer ma pa rnamabasgyings pa// khro bo blo ldan brtson 'grus che// pho nya bran rnams thams cad dang// mkho stong gso yos
bskor bar// 'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal to// de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// lho yi phyogs su song nas ni// der ni phyin te brtson chen po// khro bo chen po stobs poche/
man pas legs mtshan pa// shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// khro bo zla ba'i thig le dang// de bzhin khro chen rdo rje 'chang// sgra gcan khro bo stobs po che// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang//
rdorjes 'og sa 'og dang// de bzhin 'jigs pa'i mog can dang// rkang bas bsnun pa rdo rje mchog/ gsang dang rab gsang rjes 'gro dang// bran dang pho nya khro be// stong phrag gsum dang khyad
kyis bskol/ de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis/ nub kyi phyogs su phyin nas ni// der naso ste brtson chen po// gshin rjematha' byed ces bya ba// gdong drug pa la lag drug pa// khro bo
yi ge bdun zhes bgyi// khro bo'i gtso bo stong phragan// bdun dgags na yongs bskor bgo/ dkyil 'khor cha ni thams cad du// khro bo gtum po thams cad bri// de nas blo ldan 'os
nas su// rang rgyal rgyal ba thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor kun tu bro'i bya/de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ni// rgyalab nyan thos bri bar bya/ deyo phyi ru tshangs sogs lha/ dkyil 'khor
byabya/ kun tu rnam par bri// dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang// zla ba nyim zhes bya dang// gza' brgyad dngan 'jig rten skyong// rgyal chen ris ni bzhi po dang// de bzhin sum cu
rtsa gsum rang// 'thab brala rnams dang dga' ldan dang// 'phrul dga'i gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang// tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa rnams// tshangs chen rnams dang// 'od chung rnams
dang tshad med 'od rnams dang/ 'od gsal rnams dang/ dge chung rnams dang/ chadamed dge rnams dang/ dge rgyas rnams dang// sprin med rnams dang/ bsod nams skyas rnams
dang 'bras bu che ba rnams dung/ mtshab rnams dang/ mi gdung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba rnams dang/ shin tu mthong ba rnams dang/ 'og man rnams dang/ dag pa'i gnas rnams
[p]dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mtshams su dgod par bya'o// de nas dbang ldan du dbang ldan dang/ dpang por dbang po dang/ mar me lhadang/ gshin rje gshani rje dang/ bden bral du bden
bral dang/ chur tshulha dang/ rlung du rlung lha dang/ lus ngan du lus ngan rnams dang/ phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o/ lhor

'jigs byed kaM spyan gyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// nub tu khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o byang du rtamagrin gyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par dgod/

par bya'o// phyi rol dung ba dag nang du rgya mtsho na po ban god par bya'o// de'i phyi rol tu 'gro ba lnga po gzhag par bya'o// de lta bu gru bzhape/ sgo bzhi pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po dar dang/ me togagachun
po dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan sgrengab/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas klubs pa/ de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris la bsgom par bya'o/ de bzhin du dbus su ri'i rgyal po lhun

bo'i tshod du dbagatshad brgya stong phrag du mar rgyas pa de'i stang du rdo tshu seng ge 'i khri la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par bsams nas nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis tshogs mchod
lamanyes par byas te/ mad pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ byin gyis brlabs pas spyob dang bsdu ba la sogs pa byas pas/ nam mkha'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya
chen bo rnam par bsams nas spyan drangs te bcug la bcings nas dam tshig la rnam par gzhago ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sams pa'i sku mdog nyidi rnam
par snang mdzad yin no snyam du snyoms pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas snying rje dang byams pa'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' las 'das pa thams cad khyab pa'i rgya
mtsho'i sprin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sngon gyis kun nas bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim pa mchog gis rdo rje sems dpa' hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya rang gi lus la zhugs nas//
phyogs thams cad hU~Mgi ya ge'i sgra brjod cing bsnan pa bzhis rol pa dang bcas pas phyag byas la bzlas pa byas te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la/ chog bzhin du rdo rje
slob dpon gyis bkug nas bcug ste bcingos la dam tshig la bzhag po byas nas/ rdo rje sagol gyi sbyor ba dang kun nas 'babs pa'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab ste/ snying po 'da bzhi s rel
pa dang bcas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs so snyam du bsam par bya'o/de la de'i snying po ni/ a A oM bdagabyin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas//
brjod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs pa yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i sa gol gtogs nas snying po bas

tshe sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o// de la snying po na'od yon te/ hUM hU~MhIhU~M/ badresamA dza/ A gats+tsha A gats+tshonu sarba tathA ga ta sarba bo d+hi sata pa ra pra to pratug gte swAhA/oMbadzras/
mA dzaAgatsAA gtsusadra de thug tabadzra yo gA shA rasatAn yes hAa a/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad
yongs su rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang/ rgyud dang/ gzungs rnams dang lhan cigadakyil 'khor du 'dusanas 'byon par 'gyur ro/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyiphyagargya chen po bdag nyid rnam par bsgomasasaming brgyartsa brgyad pa bton la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byas nas sgo bzhapo rnams
kyis rdo rje lcags kyu sogs pa las byas te/ las chen po dam pa'i phyagargyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs par byas te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ su ra ta badzra badzras rwadza[%]paM hes
d+hatiSh+Tha nasarba ta thA ga tam hAm laM/ de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya sta/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsol ba 'debs lags kyis/ sas rgyas dang byang chub sem dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi don
mdzad du gsol/ bdag la dngos grub thams cad stsal du gsol/ ji ltar bdag gas de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rab 'byams rgyamacho'i spun rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi
mthos klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul kun nas bkang ste byin gyis brlab par bagyi// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas 'di
rdo rje snying po'i rgyan chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa'i tshig rgyas par 'gyur ba ni/ de nas gos dmar po phrag par gzar te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngags 'dis phyag
[z]bya// tshalab 'amo sbyar nas/ sngags 'dis snyan gsanadabab par bya ste/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya hU~M/ sa ma ya badzraa b+hin+d+heme ku'u maM/ sarba ta thA ga tas ma ye tam a d+haM/

hiSh+Tha nasarba bud+d+hanaMpra be sha yanu/ sarbatathAgo tabadzramats+tshal a laM kA remahAbadzramaN+Dale pra tib la yanA maM swAdzAny+tsame pra yats+tshan+tu/ nas slob dpon gyis de'i thal sor mo me tog dkar po'i 'phreng ba sngagasal/

btagasaMnas nang du me tog bzhi dang/ sor mo'i rtse mor ma tog re re bcug la/ de nas sngags 'di brjod cinge gzhug par bya'o// hU~MhU~M hU~M/ kru thu dzub kaHpra khrodri'i u0f97haM/ oM a d+hitiSh+ThalaM/ sarba tathA ga ta/
sa ma ya satu pra bi shAmi/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g.yogs bcings la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i khams rab tu
khyab pasbyorabs de bcug la/ sngags 'dis me tog gtor bar bya'o/ sngagasan/ sa ma yo hos ma ya swA sa ma ya b+haM/ gang la me tog rnams lhung ba de nyid de'i ltar byin bar bya'o// de nas tshe
gabazhin du sngags 'das dbab par bya'o// sa ma yo hos maya hU~M/ sam ya hU~M/ na maHsarba tathA ga te b+hata Ta taT/ d+hamad+hum/ badzra hU~M/ bi kr-i ta ba cu/ dzIhAdur dAn+tad ma ka/ hasI ta
lawo da ra/ ka ha ka ra// tsu lu tsu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ aT+TaTA has da ra bda'/ badzrab dzra/ brjod gti/ badzrani tra/ badza?'o tra/ badzra g+hA Ni/ badza?dewany+tsi la ya sa pra ba ga 'dza

0 tsahrir ya/banAbi g+hAts+tshag+hAN/ pUpA/ g+haNapa ya g+hAts+tshapa ya/ b+hu ma ya b+humaya/ pA ta ya mo Ta ya/ A be sha ya/ dzam+badzawa/ dzam+b+ha dzaya/ largyu lag+ha/ sarba ta thA ga tAdzA ka ra
bar/ d+ham+malats+tso bi dza ya he ho badzra dzikA rab+ho hasAhA dbab pa'i dam tshig go/ de ltar babs nas kye khyod kyis gang dge ba'am tshadage ba mthongo nga zhes 'go/ de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa'i m/ rdo rje'adzal bam/ dge ba 'am/ mdege ba bdag gis 'di lta bu mthong ngo zhes smra bar 'gyur/ de nas slob dpon gyis de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi ro rje'i rang bzhin du yongs su gzhag la mig bcings pa bkrol la dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor grwabazhi pa byas la/ de dbus su kha dog thams cad kyis pad+ma chen po 'dab
mabargyad pa yid du 'ong ba 'am sengaga' khri rang nyid kyis bris te/ de nas de la dar gyi bgo ba dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa la sogs ba rnams kyis mchod pa khyad par du gzugs dang/ sgra dang/
sridang/ rodrang/ reg pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba danadang dung rung/ rdzad ng/ rdzabotshe dang/ dung la sogs pa rang/ gar dang/ rgyu rnams kyis legs par mchod nas
cod pan lnga'i dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdorje slob dpon gyi go 'phang la rab tu bzhag pa rigs dang rjes su 'thun pa'i ming du byas nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par
byasu/ osarba tathA ga ta badzo a b+hiSh+Thahe o badzrasatAab+hiny+tsa/ obadzar/a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badzra pad+ma ab+hik+kA/ oM badzraa b+hik+Shi/ spyi bo dang/ phral ba dang/ mgrin
sha pa dang/ snying kha dang/ lteb dang/ rked pa nas/ rje ngar gyi bar du yi ge'i phyag rgyabakod la/ rang gi lha gzugs kyi sbyobs byin gyis brlab par bya// de nas rdo rje'i tshig rnams
bslab bar byas te/ de la rdo rje'a gnas tshog sa rnams ni 'di dag ste/ rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rang gi lus rje rjesamasadapa'i gnas te/ ro ' gnas 'das lta ba'athibs po
thams nyung nges par 'joms par 'gyur ro// ma rig pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi rig pa la 'jug pas/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i dngos po yongs su shes pa la 'jug par 'gyur/
g+haM d+ha mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyi'i mtshams med pa'i mtha' rdo la gnas 'dis lta ba thams cad du gyur pa'i sems nges par ng ga par 'gyur ro// o/ 'dedachags kyi mtha' zhib/
phyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdorje'i gnas 'dis 'dod chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ha/ zhe sbyang gi mtha' na ba'i phyir byams pa'i mtha' de rtsa'i gnas te/
rdo'i gnas 'dis skyon thams cad kun tu badral bar 'gyur ro aM/ gti mug gi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir shes rab kyi sgron ma rdo rje'i mtha' ste/ rdo rje'i mtha' 'dis mun pa bsal byed bar 'gyur
ro laM/ sems can thams cad sems can gcig ba ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems can manyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i don dang sems can gyi rang bzhin rtogs pa don du 'gyur ro// hi/
sems can thams cad sems can gcige ba ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems can nges pa la 'jug pa'i don dang/ sams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba mngon par rtogs pa'i don du gyur ro/
a sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ste/ rdorje gnas 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug 'din dang/ mnyam pa nyid kyi yoshes rjes su rtogs pa'i yo
du 'gyur ro// u0f00/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rdo rje'agonas 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su rtogos par 'jug pa'i don dang/ rdodza lta bu'i ting ngo 'dzani rjes su
rtogs pa'i don du 'gyura'o// / bdud kyi las thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis las thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang/ las thams cad las
yongs su 'das pa'i don du 'gyur ro// ngag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungaste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sgra ji bshan pa thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug ba'i din dang/ bad
ba las 'das ba'i chos rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// thaM / chos thams cad ma skyes paste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'chi 'bo chod pa la 'jug pa'i don dang/ skye ba dang/ rgyab rang/
na ba dang/ 'chiba'ilatsha lasa'4ba'i don du 'gyur ro// maM/ chos thams cad ma byang bste/ rdo gnas 'dis 'gog pa med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang/ chos tham
car 'gog pa med pa'i don du 'gyur ro// khaM / 'di la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa// bdagagade nyid rab rtogos te// bdag gis de na de rab brtags nas// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyama med
'gyur// de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang/ gter thams cad dang/ khor lo thams cad dang/ rdo rje thams cad dang/ ral gri
dang yid bzhin nor bu dang/ dngul chudang/ bcud len rnams dang/ gyen du 'gro ba dang/ rkang 'og nang/ mi snang ba dang/ go pa'i dzan pa dang/ 'khor lo sbyar ba nyid dang/ brgya byin
nyir dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams des myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ hU~M/ yid ni rtse gcig gyur pa yo/ sangs rgyas rjes dran
bsgoms nas ni// nyame'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bsgom par bya// sbyor ba'i yi bka' drin gyis// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur// zla ba'adekyil
'khor dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab gsalaba'i// kun tu [é]zang po phyag rgyam// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// len phyed kyi sbyor ba yis// kun tu bazad po 'dra bar
ma gyur// rdo rje ni chen phyag rgya che// legasab mnyam pa bzhag pas so// rgyal po 'dibang bskur nyidadam na// yan dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/ rdorjechos kyi phyag rgya che// de nas rang gis brtan/
bo bsgom/ 'jigarten kun gyi dbang phyug kyang// thob nadangos grub gzhan smos// rdordzolas kyi phyag rgyagang/ de bzhin nyid kyi dogasalab/ 'i sbyor bas de bsgoms pas/ rdoN+Di'i la 'byor
brtan por 'gyur// de lta bu'i chub kyi sems kyi mchog sgom ba phyag rgya chabo'i yi shes nyidayin no// 'khor lo sgyur ba'aphyag che// legs par mnyamapar bzhag pas bsgom// phyag rgya
kun gyi bdag nyidakyis// dam bdin nyid thob par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dra ba phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don dubasgom par bya// gsang ba'i rgyal po thob 'gyugan/ dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhige smos/
gdugs dkar gtsug tor chen po// dam pa'i don du bsgom pa bya// gtsug tor yo shes thog 'gyun// dngos grub gzhan lta ci gi smos// rgyal khagatsug hor ga rgya che// den yang dang yang du sgol/
chos kyi rgyal po rnam rgyal nyid// mdor bsdus pa thob par 'gyug/ rnam rgyal gtsug tor phyag rgyayi// dam pa'i yi ge yo bsgom par bya// legs par rab gnas
'od zer can// dngos sgrub ye shesathob par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dabanges mnyam dngam mnyam pa// gtsug tor rnams kyis legs bshad b// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyin mag/
de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms// lhag pa'i lha gcig pu nyid// thog mtham meng zhig/ rang byung mchog tum 'gyu rab// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang

[G ]phyagago 'phang mchog/ sangs rgyas ye shes dri ma med// bdag nyid chen pothob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams so// da de bzhin gshegs

po thams cad kyi tshes kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes de la bslab par bya'o/ zhes bya ba'i rnam par spyod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo shes par bya'o// sa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ma skyes
pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad par bya'o// oM A oM a a/ pa zhes bya ba'i tshesaM thams cad kyi sgo ste/ don dam par chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzog
par blta bar bya'o// opaM/ na zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi ming dang/ gzugs dang/ shes rab dang/ chos dang bcas pa yongs su shes pa'i debang du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor

za bshad do// on/dazhes bya ban de dul ba dang zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor brjod do// oM daM 3sa zhes bya ban thogs pa med pa 'dus yang dag pa
'das shang yongs su nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par spong ba dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang/ khams dang/ sku mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i bden pa la

mkha gnas te mi dmigs pa'i phyi'i/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ o hU~M/ tazhes bya ba de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba chos kyi dbyangs la 'jug ba'aphyi'i/ chos thamasacad kyi sgor rnam par

blta'o/ o taM kazhes bya ni lasakyi rnam par smin rnam pa bgrod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi skor gsal ba bya'o// oM kaM / ma zhes byabanasgyu ma lta bu nyid dran ng medatsangesnying rje meb dang shes rab no/
ba las byung ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyisgo gsal bar bshad// oM maM/ gzhis bya bzhi zebamo la spyod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ o gaM/ dza zhes bya ba na skyo ba dang/
nab dang/ 'chib las yongs su rgyab rang bzhanem phyed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// o jo3 d+ma zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyas yongs su mi byed pa'i rdo rje yongs su rdzogs/
ra chos thams cad kyi sgorab ltakhar bya'o/ og+haM/ sha zhes bya ban shog nas dang lhag mthong yos su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ odapahaM/ 9zhes bya ba na gang zag
dang chos kyi bdag med pa nam kha ltagasal zhing chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor dam par gzhagago/ o Ta/ klu zhes bya ba'ageyo ba skye ba med pas
mi zad pa'i yo shes so sor dmigs te chos thams cad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ tshes thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya// okaM / ngazhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi'ang yul ma yin
ma @#// pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM raM/ thazhes byab ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa lamakhas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyong ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi

sgo blta bar bya'o/ oMshrI/ ltazhes bya ban sgribapa thams cad rab tu spangs pas zad pa'i shes mi skya zhing mthar thug pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// ot+taM/ dzAzhes bya ba/
myur du 'chib med pa rjes su dmigs pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ odzI/ kazhes byab na lus rnam par spyod pa na 'dod chags dang bral bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te
rdordzising po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ oM kaM / A zhes bya ba na sems rnam par spyod pon nyes pa dang/ rmongs pa dang/ bag la nyal brlab tu spangs
nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsalaba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM hUM! gzhes bya ba ningag rnam par spyod pa ni ngag gis spos pa chos kyi dbyings rnam
bar dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM thaM/ tsha zhes bya ba nagrob mam dmigs shang rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i phyir/ chos thoms cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// o tshog+ha

zhes khyab ni gcig tu 'dres ba ma dmigs pa 'don dam par ganyis su med par gyur pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM hUM/ Ta zhes bya ba ni ca co dang bral ba'i ro rdzosAng po 'dzin pa'i
mkhaphyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// owaM/ pha zhes bya ba na tshis thams cad dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i yi shes gsal ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi skor bshad de//
oM yaM Da zhes bya ba na dgra chen po las grol bzhimamakha' las 'gro ba grub pas so sor thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bltabar bya'o// o Ta/ zhes bya ban mo sgom dmigs pa'i
phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// o TaM / u zhes bya ba na chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ oM hUM / ya zhes bya ba ni rgyun
du byed pa ni nges par 'byung ba'i don du 'gas pa' lam yan lag brgyad lazhe bar gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM yaM dazhes bya ba ni de khon nyid ni spros po
thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi skor rnam par gzhag go oM taM hu zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi
sgor bshad do/ ots+tshA/ swazhes bya bzhi yongs su bzung ba med pan 'thab pa dang rtsod pa spangs pa 'a chos nyid yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya// o haM kun nas nyon mongs
ba med pa ni mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oka kha ga g+ha nga/ rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid bzung ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi skor gnas
so otsatshadzats+tshanya/ snaban gsal shang 'bar ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// o Ta khaT lhaN/ sgom pa mos thams cad gnyis su ma gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams
cad kyi sgo// o ta thad d+han/ gzhi med pa natshesaMthams cad ma 'dres pa phyir/ chos thams cad kyi skor rnam par gzhag go/ o ba tha ba b+ha ma/ byang chub ni chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i 'i/chos
thams cad kyi sgo blta bar bya'o// o ya ra la wa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni glo bur ba thams cad nges par dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings sosor thob cing mngon pa shes pa lnga dang/ ye shes
mkhyen bas sangs rgyas kyis yongs su thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bltabar bya'o// o shakhas ha/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yongashes rnam par
dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par ngesapa'o// de nas rig pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'acho ga rgyas par gyur pa na/ sngon bzhin nges par byas nas// phyog
kun mnyam pa nyid bsgoms nas// ri rab chen po gru bzhi pa// ni chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi steng du rdo rjeche// de yi steng du pad+magazhag/ 'dab ma brgyad pa cher bkra ba// rnal rgyu
ston zhes rnam par bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya che// 'od zer gsal ba'i bkyil 'kher can// dbang pogazhas na snyoms 'jugapa/ yo ngas su rdzogs par bdag nyid kyis//
/ rnala'abyo thams cad bsgom par bya// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// sas rgyas kun bdag bsgoms na// bskal mthar yang ning gnas 'gyur// b+ha ga chen po rnal 'byor che//
rnal 'byor pa gnas mi bzad pa// sangs rgyas kun bdagabasgoms na// sas rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur// khams gsum pa ya rgyal srid che// sems can kun la thams
cad du// gang tshornal 'byor pas bsgoms na// de tsho dngos grubalagan gnas// rang bzhin gyis na 'od gsal ches/ gdod nas dag cing ma 'dres ba// gang tshe ye shes mthong ba na//
de yitshon dag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mdor bsdus pa// snatshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// sna tshogs las ni byed par 'gyur/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgyan po'i yo shes so// 'khor lo skyar rgyal bo che// kun mchog sa ya dbang phyugan// dzo rje spor bas bsgoms na ni//
mnyam rmad 'khor lo sgyur ba mtshungs// gzibarjid 'phreng ba phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// 'bar bas 'phreng bas b.lugs shing mdzes// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs
pa 'od/ 'jon+da' sbyor bas bsgoms// rang bzhin gzi brjid 'phrengabar 'gyur// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nani// 'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor ba
0/ yis/ sems can dag pa nyid du 'gyur// rnam par gsal ba'i gtsug tor rgya// jal rgya 'bar ba'i bod kyis 'khrugs// brag pa med pa sbyor ba yis// mnyam med
[>gsal ba'i gtsug tor mtshus// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya ni// legs par mnyam par bzhagapas bsgom// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sbyor ba yis// de yis rnam pa'i spyod yul 'gyur// rdo rje
dmatshig ye shes che// legs par mnyan par bzhag pas bsgom/ kun tu bzang po dam pa'i gzugs/ mnyam med rdo rje soms dang mtshungs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa//
rdordzasams dang 'a sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dang mtshungs pa'i do// gtsug tor lnga ldan stobs po che// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur/
rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// de yi don du bsgoms nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par
bzhag pas bsgom// skye dgu thams cad chags 'gyur na// bud med gzhan lta smos cad gos/ rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// legs so ba na ba
gsol bas// bud med thoms cad tshim par bya// byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya'i yashes so// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od//
ba dbral ba'i phyogs su gnas pa bsgom// de yi dar thod dbang bskur thob// jo rdzogazi brjid phyag rgya che// nyima'i dkyil 'khor mtshus pa'o// seng khar gnas pa bsgomapar bya// kun mkhyen ye
shes stabar byed/ rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// sbyin pa'i pha rol napa mchog/ sgrub po dam pas rdzogs bar byed// rdocha bzhad pas phyag rgya che//
legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rdo rje bzhad pa ltar gyur te// de nas dgu dga' byed 'gyur// dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i yo shes so// bad+mayani pad+ma che// dag pa'i
chos mnyam bzhag pas// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// mnyam med rdo chos dang mtshungs// shes rab ye shes rdo dzano// bsgoms pas de ni ridzachang/ shes rab pha rol phyin rag
paN stong nyid sbyor bas bsgoms nas// dam pa'i don du bsgom bya de// mnyam med 'jam dbyangs dang na mtshungs// rdo tshargyu yi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag bsgoms nas//
chos kyi 'khor lo na mchog rtse// mdor bsdus nas ni de yis bskor// rdo rje smra ba'i phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms nas ni/ rdo rje bzlas pa'i nus pa yis// ldem po'i ngag ni de yis 'chad
chos kyi phyag rgya ba yi shes so// sangoji las kyi phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms nas ni// kun nas kun nas rang nyidikyis// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje srung ba bya/
tha @/ bam rochos zhes grags pa ste// chos kyi spobs bsgoms nani// rdo rjesrung ba dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rdzoganod sbyin brtson 'grus che// khro bo chen po stobs po che/

dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya/ rdo rje gnod sbyin dang mtshungs 'gyuraM/ rdzordzakhu tshur phyag rgya che// lus ngag yid kyi de bzhin du// rdo 'i sbyor bas bsgomasazhagi/ rdo rje khu tshur 'dzazhi par
'gyur// lasakyig rgya yi shes so/// sgeg mosaM mngon par dga' ba ster// 'brang ba yang na debang 'gyurag grums mdzes pa'i sgra dbyas byed// gar mas rdzu 'phrul
thob par 'gyur// mis bzang po'i dri yin te// me tog byang chub yan lag nyid// sgrol mas mtha' dag gsal ba'o// bdug pa 'dug pa dag la brtson/ lcags kyus dbang phyug 'gugs byed na//
skye bo gzhan lta smos kyi regos// zhags pas dbang pobang 'tshong 'gyu ran// gdug pa'i sems na smos ci dgos// lcags sgrog gsan 'phrog byed dang/ tshangs sogs dbong gachen po'ang/
tshang/ 'bebs ngas thams cadu 'bebs gyur na// dman pa' ma deg smos ci degos// 'di 'od kyi ni sbyor ba yis// chos kyi yi ge dang ldan pa// phyag rgya'i ye shes dang bcas pas// de dag
thams cad myur du 'grub/ 'di yi sbyor ba shes par bya// phyag rgya ba kho la khyad par bya// spyi gtsu gnas ni rkang pa'i ther// yi ge yis ni yongs gang bar// gzugs brnyan gcig gis go 'phang
tha 'gyur// sems natsA gtsage 'gyur bar bsam// sal ba gnas pad+ma// dbang chen gyi ni gnas zhes bshad// dbang po gnyis na chatshus ma bas/ dbang phyug kyang na bsgrubabar bya/
dbang chen drag ni gru bzhi pa// dbang chen dag gi las su bshad// chu zlum por shes par bya// pad+ma'i 'dab mas rnam par mtshan// zhi bor byed pa'i las dang ldan M// zhiba'idon du de bshar
do/ 3me ni gru gsum ngashes par bya// bzhi mdo yi ni gnas su bshad// dbang du bya ba sgrub don du// pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba do// mngon spyod lan brtson 'grus che// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dam/
ba ste/ jal gri ya ni phyag rgya'i ngabyibs// dbyar gyi spun dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// soredang dkar dang de bzhin dmar/ nag po yang ni khyad par du// dang po'i dkyil 'khor nas sbyangs te//
thama'i bar du rab tu brtag/ dang bo rdo rje rab tu gzhag/ de yi rjes su ban chen te// pad+ma dngan lasarnal 'byor// grub pa'i go 'phang rimapa bshad// phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes so// 4
de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyal yongashes bka' stsalal/ gnyis dang gnyis sumed pas yongs su dag pas/ chos thams cad rnam par grol ba'i
phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rtag pa dang tshan pa yongs su dag pas/ chos thams cad zhi ba dang/ mtha' rang/ mtha'amed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// khyad pa'i sgo dang/ zod ba'i/
mtha'arang/ zad bamur thug pa dang ldan pas/ chos thams cad zad pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyagargyas rgyas btang ba'o// mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha'i rnam par dag/
[>pas/ chos thams cad la skur pa ma 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas rtag pa'o//mig lngalas yang dag par 'das pas/ chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sems can thams
cad nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad nam mkha'areng bzhin gyi ga rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings yongs su khyab pas/ chos thams cad dbyer
mi byed pa'i phyagargyas rgyas btab pa'o/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi sams dang tham dad pas/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btabapa'o/ chos kyi dbyings mi phreng//
mtshan nyid yin pas/ chos thams cad kyi tshes kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// ngo bo 'di med pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyog rgyus rgyas btab pa'o// 'tsho ba med pas/
chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skad cig ma nyid pas/ chos thams cad ma rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skya bdang/ rga bdang/ na ba dang// 'chi ba'agegan
dang ldan pas/ chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'ametha' de bzhin nyid pas/ chos thams cad de bzhin nyidekyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa//
gdod ma nas yongs su dag pas/ chos thams cad yang dag mtha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas gnyam pa nyid pas/ chos thams cad stong ba nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas
btab pa'o// spros ba'i dmigs pa rnam par bral bas/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa' phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa go/ re ba thams cad las rnam par grol bas/ chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i phyag/
rgyas rgyas btab pa'o dngos po yod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyisan/ chos thams cad oM rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// phung po lnga yosasu 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyisazha/ chos thams
cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pago/ rang bzhin gyis bdagamed pas/ chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pago/ shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad zhi ba'akhrig
rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// don dam pa'i bden pas yongs su khyab pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tshob rnam pa'i ka gnas bar/ chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i
phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// shan tugadonami za bar gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'khrug ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bcad pa'i phyi'i/ chos
thams cad ji lta ba bzhinagyi phyag rgyas rgyas batab pa'o mang rnams kyigazhi gzhi med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pago/ byed pa pos byas pa'i
grubya// phyir/ chos thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ rang bzhin gyisam byung ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'byung bamed ra 'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang
bzhin gyis ma smyos pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab
pa'o rnam par sbyod pa kun tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gzugs rnam par lta ba med pa'i phyir/ chos thams
cad mtshan nyid med po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gnas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad lha bar spyor ba med pa phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mi mthun pa'i phyog
na bar ma dmags pa'i phyor/ chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa bo phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad las kyi
rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skye ba dang gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ nam mkha'
dang khyad par med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes
dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas batab pa'o// sAng po yod pa phyir/ chos thams cad phung po'i phyag rgyus rgyas btaba'o// snying bo dang bcas pa ched paphyi'i
chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas/ chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab/
ba'o mtha' gcig tu 'ag rten gyi lam rnam par dag pa 'phur/ chos thams cad 'phags pa'ibaden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab rago/ lha'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir/ chos thams
cad phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad kyi las sna tshogs byed
pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad dmatshug thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs
rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu[@]gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab ba'o// chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas
btab pa dang/ theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ gsang sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab bo dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas rgyas
tha @#// btab pa dang/ mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ ye shes thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab ba dang/ thams cad
mkhyen pa'i ye shesakyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ me long lta bu'i ye shesakyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ so sor rtog pa'i ye
shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yongashes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya'o// mu 'jam dpal phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag mi mnyam pa dang mnyam bayongashes kyi tshig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
byin gyis brlabs pa tsheg/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yoshes yos su rdzogs par byed pa theg pa chen po'i tshog ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sams kyi rgyud kyi phyag rgya'i tshig rnams la 'das ba
dang ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khrakhezhi stong dang/ byang chub kyang byung ba yin no/ sa oM aA/ sngags pas phyag rgya 'das rgyas btab
na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyog rgyayang dag par 'dugo/ hU~M myur dum skyes pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur/ khaM/ de nas da 'di bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba thams
cad kyigasang ba chen po'i phyag rgyaye shesasugyur pa'i snying gi dbus su rtag tu sgom// khrub dkyil 'khor dbus son pas// bad+ma'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'id// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad
pa 'bar ba' 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// de yi steng du rtag sgom pa/ yi ga yin gtsobo mchog/ thog mtha mald zhib// kha ba bamo'i da bar bod// dpa' bo kun da bla ltar dakar// ga'i
dkyil 'khor ltar 'od gsal// zhi ba'i tshes kyi rang bzhin sku// kun mkhyen ye shes kyis gang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa gnas kyi gsang// ras ya na dang mtshungs mchog/ kha yig
mkha'i 'drar shes par bya// thig le nA das rnams par spras/[” ]/gsang ba chen po mchog tu mdzes// thog ma tha ma med pa'i de dag/ de yi steng du rdo sngotshe// rtse mo lnga dang yang dag ldan// de yi
stong du sgron mche// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs ba'i 'od// de yi steng du rtag bsams pa// yige mchog gu ge 'phang ngo// man ngag mchog las shes bya ste// gzhan du na ni nga mi smra//
sangs rgyas makhas pa thams cad kyis// mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungs so// rnam par grol ba gsum thob nas// thob 'gyur 'di ni gzhan du mni// lcen kon la sbyar bar bya// sna yi rtse mor
yi ge hUM// dbang po gnyis nasnyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya'i go 'phang tshig gis ni// shes rab ldan pas rang sems sgom// snang ba med cing spros med pa// nyani tu mchog tu phra' shes bya//
khyababadagabasod nams ye shes dngos// bsam byabasam gtan gcig bya ste// mig dang sgron ma'i 'od bzhin du// kun tu 'bar ba dang ldan pa/ mgrin bod pas bcug nas
ni dkar bosar po sngon po 'od// dmar po ya ngan thoms cad du// 'bar ba 'di dag bod pa yis// sgrub po dam pas mtshon par bya// snying khar gsal bar byas nasasu// de bzhin
thams cad spyi bor song// gnas de la 'thon nas kyang// dbang po thamasacud dga' bar 'gyur// de la 'thon nas 'jig rtenan// mtshungs par kun nas thams cad du// slar yang de ru
'tsha 'ongs nas ni// de ni 'jug par ba tu bsam// yad kyis de ltar bsgoms nan// rang nyid 'khor lo sgyur lta bu// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas
bsgom// dbang po lngas ni dmigs nas yang// ma rnams lus ni dag par 'gyur// ja snyad bud modo yon tan dang// ldan ba kun tu gnas pa ni// bkug nas bcug ste bcings nas su//
dbang du bya ste bsgrub par bya// de rnams lhan cig yongs bstan nas// sngags pas mgagi dngos grub thob// gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na/ shes rab pha rol phyin ba che// zhi ba'as kyi
[“]3 mi pani// shin tumanyam par bzhagalas bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che// de 'grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// mchog ni rtag pa shes par bya// bar mas phun sumatshogs
0 pa sbe stongs dang mtshan med mchog/ smon pa med pa zhes su grags// chos kun bdag med pa ya mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs par byed// sa bcu yan stobs dag gis//
rol phyin pa thams cad thob// rdo rjesams dpa' mchog bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// de nyidi 'dazhi bcud kyis len// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ thegachen/
mchog tuyid 'ong ba// stong 'di sgom pa'i bdag nyidi can// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ gangagis rtag tu sgom byed na// de yang jo rdzo'adzin rgyal po// yon tan mchog las skyes par
'gyur// bud med gang zhig sngo bsangs ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// lus ngag yid kyi sbyor ba yis// yongs rig A lange gtsum bas// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
bud yong kha dog ljang khugang// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de tsherinaM sngags pas te/ dmanyam med gsang ba'ayongashes mtshungs// budamed gang zhig kha dog dkar// pad+ma'i'ib
ma 'dra ba'i 'od// de dang lhan cig sngags pas bsdad// dam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar/ u la yi rgyan 'chang ma// sngags pas de dang lhan
cig gnas// shes rab pha rol phyin mtshungs 'gyur// bud med in+danA la mtshungs// gsang ba jodzornal 'byor gyis// sngags pa chog shes pas bstan// rig 'dzin rnams kyi stob//
chen 'gyur// gsang chen maraka ta mtshungs// gang gis rtag tu bstan pa/// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// myur du gsang ba'i dam pa 'gyur// bud med pad+ma rA
ga badra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dbang po gnyis na snyoms 'jug pas// drordzi 'dzan ma lta bu sgrub// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
mchog/ gang gis rtag tu sgom pan// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// mchog gi gnas kyi bsgoms pa na// rnal 'byor mchog gis mi ring
bar rdo rje 'dzazhi pa lta bur 'gyur/ yang dag myong ba rnam pa bzhi// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// dbang po gnyis na snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam mad 'jig rten
dbang phyag mtshungs// so sor yang dag rig pa bzhi// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni// zhen med rdo rje sangs rgyus mtshungs// mnyam med 'jam pa'i mchog dang 'dra// 'jigs
pa ni rnam pabazhi/ 'bo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis na snyoms 'jug pas// do rdzo'adzin pa lta bu ste// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rkang pa bzhi/ ngashin tu mnyam bzhag bsgom san//

[” ]dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// tshangs pa yazhi gnas bzhi pa// tshad med pa ya sems kyis gi/ rdo rje sbyorab 'abadag bsgoms/na// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu
'grub// sbyor ba'i bdag nyidadabang po lnga// dam pa'i don gyis bsgoms na ni/ dbang po gnyis snyoms 'jug pas// mnyama med rdo rje sangs rgyag mtshungs// dzad kyi stobs/ rnam pa lnga//
no dumanyamo bzhag bsgogs gi 'khor loskya'ababatsun khrusache// stobs 'dzin ltakhunyid du 'gyus/ byang chub lagin chen bdun// gsang sngags bsgoms pas bsgomasanan//
rtog pa'i yi shes spor bas sa// khyab bdag chos kyon 'dzanipar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi lam// kun mkhyenaye shes rdzogasabyed pa// de bsgoms pa/ tsamachis na// 'jig rten
bzhes las rab tu bdo'// rjes su dran pa rnam pa drug/ bdag nyid rtse gcig gisabasgoms na/sngags rdo 'dzapa ru// sngags pa dus mang bar 'gyur//stobs bcu bo ni yang dag bsgoms// sbomasab la
'byor de nyid kyi/bsod nams yi shes yongs rdzogs te// rtag tu stobs bcu'i dam par 'gyur// pha rol phyin bcu yongs su rdzogs// stobs rnams dang 'debang rnams dang// sa mA
kun n nges bsudanas// chu dumtshan ma dag par 'gyur// bud mang nu ma shin tu bsnun// rjedar rje ngar de bzhin du// mchuyasamamu ni yongs su bzung// 'bad pas dam du A lang ga
rnam grol gos kyis bsgribasaM nas su// byang chub sems nabasgom par bya// de tshaye shes brtson 'grus che// ngo dzodabyings su bdag bstan pas// rnam pa sna tshogs kangan/ 1
rnal 'byor shis pa de bsnyen bya// sngar bzhin thams cad byas nas su// bud med rnams kyi dam tshig sgrub/ jorjesams dang mtshungs par 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi zheng nas
bsnum ling ga myur du gang bar gyur// sbyor ba 'dazhimkhyen pa yis// stobs chen sangs rgyas rab tuphrug/ gsang ba 'odi nidem pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o/ gsang ba 'dayo sbyor
bayis// ya le dmaM ba 'grub par bcug/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i// chos su grags pa gang yin pa// de rnams sgom byed gtso bo ni// dngos grub thams cad rab rdzogs pa/
ma 'dres pa yi chos bco brgyad// sangs rgyas chos su grags pa ste// de rnams sgom pa dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed// bsam gtan bzhi po thob nasagi/ gzug
mang ba yi rtag par yang// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa po// byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// chos ni mchog tud byung ba// de rnams sgom pa
dang ldan pas// byang chub sems dpa'i skyob pa'o// sngags rnams thams cad rab 'grub cing// sbyor ba thams cad thams cad du'o// de nas 'bad pa thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas chos nyid
bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam// ye shes rin chen rab snyed dag/ mchod dang dbang bskur byin brlabs pas// rnyed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// zhu 'ang
gsol ba gdab pa dang// bdag nyid dbus pa de bzhin/ sangs rgyas sogs la ya rang bzhi// de bzhin yongs subasngo ba dang// byang chub sems yang dag bskyed// khyad par du nadus kun tu /
gom bgrang byamaredad// ltabazhin du rjes sgoms pas// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgrub bya rgyu// 'di la tsom yodam yin/ 'grob sems kyi spro ba/ brtan pa bsAri bo legs par bashar/ stong
nyid de bzhin nyid las byung rdo sems dpa' de ba bshad do// 'gro bathams cad bku gnas su/ sangs rgyas byang chub sgyur bar bya// don yod ye shesadag ba ste// rjergyal bo mchog ces bad//
dordzachags pasachags tshul nas//rang bzhin gyis brtan par 'gyur// 'gro ba ma lus lus med pa// de yi sems na chegs par bshad// chos rnams kun rang bzhin gyis// rnam par dben zhing/
gnyis su med/ gang tshadag pa bdag nyid mthong// de tshe dordzalegs bar bshad// jorjesams dpa' bzhi bo yis// ming dang brdan sbyar ba'o/ sas rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//
sdom pa mdog tu dam pa'o// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// chogs gnyis rdzogs par byas pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin mchog gtso// rdo rjidabang bskur las byung// de bzhin gsheg
kun ye shes te// rtog lamed cing yi ge med// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzabada mchog/ brtan pa rtag bdi du 'gyur// nam mkha'adzod midzodamago chos rnams thamaMs cad 'gas gsar/
yid bzhin nor bu rdo rjeche// rdo rjernyogani glog med// yoshes snang ba ni che che/ yongs su skyob yos su blta/ de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba na// rdo rdzo bzhi d pa zhes su
@# bad/ chos kyi bdagamangalas khub/ gnyis su med pa' yongashes mchog @#/chos nyide dam pathasam rumad/rdzordzachos zhes rab tu grags// rdo blo gros snang ba che// shes rab ye shes
drida mchog/ zag med shes rab chen po pa// de ni rdo rje rnon por bshad// sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'khol// gnyis su medalas byung bar mtshon/ yan lag bcu gnyis sten 'brelaming//
rdo rje rgya zhes nges par bshad// dgongs pa'i skad ni spros pa mchog/ yul rnams kyis ni bshad pa de// sangs rgyas kun gyi bzlos pa che// de ni rdzong sna bar bshad// sems can kun
gyi donol sbyar// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// gared nas dag pa'i rnala'abyoratshe// den ri rdzolas su bshad// bla na med pa'i byams pa che/ khasrungaba'i bya ba gong ma med/ dga'
ba'i chos nabartson chen po// rdo rjesrung ba zhes su grags// shes rab thabs kyi klob che// sangs rgyas kun dang rjes 'thun pa// nyon mongs thams cad ze ba che// de gnod sbyin chen po
brjod// lus ngag yarin yang ngag sbyor// sgrib pa med cing yi gi bral// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang/ de ni rdo rje'atshams sbyor bshad// rdzordzal shes rnal 'byor che//
sas rgyas kun gyi stobs po che// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// ga pa mchog ces bya bar bshad// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ron+da'irgyus/

de bzhin gshegs bathamasacad legs bar mchod nas glur blangs pa/ os bud+d+hAb ra meshar bu rgyu 'ad+hu/ lal hos gsu ra tam hAm pasA d+him hA bo d+hi bud+d+ha bud+d+hayo gAdeshAr tathAgatud+d+ha bi kA tam ka
phrug ha/ byang chub sems bskyed las 'khrungs// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'i chos// gdod nas zhi ba la phyag 'tshal// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa po// rdo rje
can kun la phyag 'tshalag/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che// sangs rgyas byang chub la phyag 'tshal// ma dmagos go 'phang la gnas pa// mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal// 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs
bon shug lo lo ma lus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa mtha' dag dang// shin tuyongs su mya ngan 'da'// 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon bzang po// rdo rje ye shes dri ma med/ rnam par dag par rdo rje
mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab gsol byed// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi mchog/ dus gsum bsam pa dbang gyur pa// sems can rnams la phan don du// khyab ba khyod la phyag 'tshog
dud// rdzordzisUbo rgyan las/ dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur nas de bzhin
'a@#// gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje'i snying po'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgyu'i din zhu ba zhus pa//
de nas yang dag bshad bya// dkyil 'khor chen bo dam pa ste/ 'jo rje sange po zhes grags pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa 'o// grubazhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rtababs bzhis rnam par mdzes//
sgo khyud rdo rje'i gzugs bar n dang// phyagargyadang rab tu mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yid bus su ni// 'khor leganyis reb khyu gnas // chunges brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs// rnam par dbye
ba legs par brtag/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor nang gi ni/ dale pa'i gnas su legs brtag po// pad+machen po 'dab brgyad pa// ga sar gtams pas rab tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dus/
su ni khyab bdag rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// rnam par snang mdzad brtson chen po// sems can rnams kyi rjes brtse bas// de yi nye 'khor kun tu // de bzhin gshegs pa brgyud
rnams dgod// shar du dgod bya 'khorol can// gtsug der dkar po nub tus/ gzi brjid phung po lho ru 'o/ rnam par rgyal ba byang du gnas// dbang ldan rnam par gsal bar
mar na steng du dgod par bya// steng 'grochen po bden bral du/ rang du rgyal po chen po gnas// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa yi// rnal 'byor ldan pa 'di de ga bri// mi
sa bskyod pa mi'am dudagod// lho ni chen 'byung ldan no// nub tu 'od dpag med par 'gyur// byang du don yod grub pa'i ming// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'o// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsam
nas// rdordzasams dpa' la sogs bri// thams cad zla bdakyil 'khor gnas// 'khor rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lago/ 'phreng ba rnam par dgod bya ba// rang gi phyag rgya'od zer
'bar/ rdorjesgragam la sogs pa'i/ lha mo 'bad pas dgod par bya/ 'jordzobadug pa la sogs bri// de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa// sgo srus 'bad pas
grib ga/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// kun tu bazung sogs ma bshan bragi/ rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor rnams dang// pho nya yani 'khor dag dang// khre bo rnams dang mngag pa dang// de bzhin
tho nya phog/ rgyamachoyanadakyil 'khor// 'od kyidakyil 'khor gsal ba go/ phyi ru phyi'il rdzoyang ming// dkyil 'khor lan 'bad pas dra// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas su//
'jig rten skyong ba brgyad bogi/ tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen man/ dbang po la sogs lha thams cad// mamo kun dang srinamo rnams// rgyalachen rnams dang klu dang bcas/ de bzhin lha rnams
thams cad dang/ brtson 'grus chen bonam mkha' lding// 'bad pa yis na bro'i rabya// de lta'adakyil 'khor bris nas su// khyad par dun chod par bya// me tog bdug sposarol mo dang
'a / khaza ba dang ston mo sogs/ 'phreng pa'i rgyan na sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi tshig yas/ mchod pa kun gyi sa thams cad
nas/ 'khor lo kun gyi chog yas// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// de nas slob ma thams cad gzhug/ yongs su dag pa khyad par du// byang chub sems ni bskyod nas su// byang
chub basub pa rjes spyod pa// chog shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug/ 'dren pa rnams la mchog tu gzhug/ rdzo'i dbang bskur sbyor ba yas// dbang bskur ban de nas sbyin// seng ge 'i khri
yi steng du// dar dang me tog chun pos spras// dkar po'i gdugArang rani ches che// bla re rgyatshe'abar bdang// de yi g.yas kyi drung du ni/ mkhas pa yis na gzhag par bya// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs
dang// snatshogs dus las yang dag sprul// g.yon gyi drung du thams cad nas// 'bad pa yisun gzhag par bya// rin chen sman kun gyis gang bgi/ bum pa legs par gzhagabya sta// rdo rje chu sog
bang bskur gyis// de la rang gis dbang bsgo ba/ rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba// mkhas pa yis ni su yang bya// kun gyis cod pan dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur ba/ chos kyi cod pan

bang bskur dang// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'i// sna tshogs las kyi dbang bskur spyan// chos kyi dbyangs dang mnyama mtshungs pa'o/ chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sgron ma'i spyani//
[o]de ltar slob dbabaskur ba// khyad bar dun sngags pas byas// de la dam tshagachog yis// sngags dang phyag rgyas spyin par bya// slob dpon khams bami bya zhing// sgrub po kun la smad mig/ sdug
kyispyod pathams cad la/ 'dacharam byasmad mi bya/ 'jig rten pa yaMlha rnams dang// grub mtha' ges pa thams cad la// smad par mi bya blang mi bya// de la mngon par dga' ba spangs
sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs shing// de bzhin bsod nams thams cad bsdu/ bza'adang ston mo du ma la// bza' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'dod pas bcom ldan sems dapa'i ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi
sras bdag skyes// thog ma thama med zhi po// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad chags las 'khrungs// de bzhin zhe sdang rmongs las 'khrungs// mnyam dang yamanyamatshes kun
dang// dbu ma'i gomasal gnas nas sug/ de nyid dmatshag shes nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub yongs mi spong// lus can kun la tshem bya// khyod kyis sa snum byas// phrag dog bya bar mi bya'o/
dam pahAtshos ni spong// byang chub sems mchog tu bde// chang gi btung ba srung byas// pha rol bud med rnam par spang// thams cad mkhyen pa yongs mi dor// rtag tu srogachags gsad mi
bya/ sems can rnams la snying rje dang// byams pa yang ni rnam par bsgom// sems can rnams la phan pa na// yang dang yang du yongs su bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes skyob pa// dmatshaga'adi
nying bad degagi slob ma rnams la rjes brtsa bas// mkhas pa pas na bstan par bya// de nas phyag rjesabanges pa/ go misabazhin du bsam par bya// phyag rgya bdadeg khyad par
po mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// ma togazum pa'i tshul bzhin du// thal mo legs par bsam par bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// pad+ma'ithol mo zhes su bsgrags// sems dpa'
mchogan legs brkyangs// bad+ma'i phyag rgya gsubarjod// re re'i mtshams su ngosabacinges pa// de ni rdo rje thelamor btags// sor mo thams cad de bsdams pa// rdoN+Dibasdams pas legs bcings pa//
sor mo bskyang snya steng du bstan// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// khu tshur nang du byas nas ni// gnyis ka sbyar bas yongs su brtag/ 'khor lo sgyur sogs phyag rgya 'o// dam paspyin pa yin
par bshad// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// dmatshag phyag rgya 'di yin no// ming yodanang bcug khu tshur gyis// kun gyis gtsomor yongs su bgo/ rdo rdzo'i rnam par legs par sbyar//
rdo rjechen po zhes su bsgrags// mthe'u chung sA lag khu tshur las// gung mo legs par bskyang nas su// mdzub mos mthe bong yongs su sbyar// 'khor los sgyur ba nyid gsol byed// brkyang
ba'i rtse mo sbyar ba ni gdugs dkar zhes n reb tu grags// srin lag dang mthe bong sbyar// gung mo gnyis na brtag par bya// gzi brjid 'phrang ba phyag rgya che// gab+baM ban+dade 'phrang ba nyid gsol
byed de da ral gri lta bur gyur// rnam par rgyal ba zhes su grags/ de nyid rgyal ba zhes bya ba// rdo rjeldan pa de bzhin gshegs// khutshur gang bo ldan byas pas// gtsug tor rnam bgyi'abyung gnas
hit+taM thub dka' sas rgyas thams cad kyi// steng du 'gro bzhes su bshad// jorje bsdams pa yongs su sbyar// dam tshig kun gyi 'byung gnas te// gu mo rnamo mchog tu gyur// mthe'u chung dang/
mthe bongo brkyang// lcags kyu mda' yi sbyor ba yis// legs so bzhi sbyar bar bya/ gumo rdo rje ni chen rtse/ phyobagazi brjida mchog gamago/ rgyalamtshan gnas su nges bar sbyar// bzhad pa'i gnas su
sbyar bar bya// rdo rjechos kyi phyag rgya che// dbu ma pad+ma lha bubaskug/ rala'i sa 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'khor lo sgyur 'khor lo 'dra// kha ru pheba'athag rgya che// rdo rje skya ba nyid du 'gyur//
las kyi di'i phyag rgya ni/ ga mtshungs ro tshosnatshogs can/ tshesaM yos sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/rdo rje srung bar brtag par bya// mche ba gnyis ni rnam par gtsigs// jorjeganod sbyin zhes su bshad//

khu tshur bcangs pa khu tshur gyis/ rdo rje thal mo snying khar gzhag rdordzasgrog mo zhes su grags// yongs su sbyar ba spyi bor gzhag/ rdoja'aphrang ba zhes su brjod// thal mo sbyar ba gdeng du dgol/
rdo rje glu mar rjes su bsgrags// 'byed cing bdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// de ni ngordzagaramarab shad// badz+dzA'i thal mo gdong du dbye// spyi bor yongs su spyal gzhag/ snying khor mthe bong gnyis po
byabya// las// gdengs legs par brkyang bar bya// lag pa stong du yongs bskyang ba// gzugs kyi phyag rgyad du 'gyur/ lag gnyis rna lam du gzhag/ sgra yi phyag rgya nyid
du bshad// drazhi byug pa'i sbyor ba yis// dri yi phyag rgya zhes su bshad/ gdong dusIm pa phye ba na/ ro yi phyag rgya zhes su bsgrags// mkhas gyur ba'i sbyor ba yis// ngegapaleg pa shes su
bshad// mthe'u chung gnyis na yongs su sbyar// mdzub mo lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// de nyade zhags pa'i dbyibs dang na// lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par brtag/ bzhi ba rje dril bu zhes// rdo rje'abebs bar ma
par brtag/ phyag rgya kun dang nye ba'i rgyu// blo gros ldan pa rang gas brtag/ thalatsho longs su sbyar la bsdams/ mdzub mo gnyis bo bskums nas gi/ na po ya rnam par bcing/ kun tu bazang po
bloldan gyis// de las rtsa mo lci mo bskum// sems kyis byams pa bsgoms nas su// mdzub mosbyar la bcug nas ni// thal gri'i rnam pa brtag pa ste// 'di'o zhim mkha'is po yi// phyag rgyar

mkhagatsog gam pa sogs/ brag rgya'am 'gog pa// thams cad kyis yongs su brjod// haM ni sngad pa'i sbyor bas//sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags// de nas ral gri mtshon cha// rnam pa du nyar gnas pa// phyag rgya 'di ni rnam 'gog pa// thams cad kyi
dordzothal mo rab tu brkyang/ pad+ma ltabur rnam par brtag/ pad+malag pa blo ldan gyis/ de nyid me togazumatshul dang// ula rnamakha lta mdzes pa// bdanobang sgrol ba'irgyu// pad+ma'i mgon po
zhes su grags/ mtshabagatsagisawad ldan pa/ kho dang 'drab r legs par brtag/ 'di'i rta mgrin phyag rgya[W]// kha yi phyogs su lab tsu brtag/ pad+matholatshodapral ba yin// khroganyer du rin
bar gyur// rdorjes latsho'abebasam mo// dpal gyi snying bo'ane chen ldan/ yid bzhin nor bu rnam bzug/ thal mo legs bam dbatubaskyag/ mazad blo gros phyag rgyas// sas rgyas kun
gyis lob tubartag/ gas nasdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// mi chen rdo rjesIng khar gzhag/ namamakhamadzod kyi phyag rgya ste// nam mkha'i mdzod nyid ste bar byed// rdo rjechen po legs par btang// mkhyen
chu bong nges par bcib[“ ]lagabaganyisan nges par brtag/ blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// rdo thal mo stong du bsgru/ mdzub mo gnyis posbyar bar bya// 'di ni derje snying po'i rgyu//
rongosnying pos bka' stsal to// khu tshunang du byas nasasu// mdzub mo gnyis lortsomo sbyar// 'di na 'jamadapal phyag rgya ste/ rdordzal gri zhes su brtag/ de nyidashaka hi ma gi 'gaM
'dabyangs blo ldan gyi go/ gshAni rje mthar byed mdung rtser 'gyur// mdung rtse chen po rab tubartag mdzub mo bskum par byas nas ni// gung mo'i snying du yongs sugazhag/ zhags pa'i
parab ldan pa'i/ gshin rje yang ni 'jigs par byed// de nyid ral grir byas pa na// skra can gyi ru rab tu bshad// khu tshur thams cad ngesabatsas te// mdzub chog cig na bskum par bya/ dza
mi nyapa'iskacan rgyur/ 'jam pa'i dbyas kyis bka' stsal to// jo rdzobasdams pa stong bcings te// dbu ma gnyis ninam pa slas/ mdzub mo khrom pa
@# bya mthe'u chung dang nimah+phakhong brkyang// 'di dordzo'adzinachen po'o// phyag rgya donan sgrub byed yin/ mdzub mo mthe bong bsdams pa ni mAm niyos su bshad/ mdzub mo
lcags sgrog rnam pa las// gung mo'i dbu ma rdzoN+Dabya// 'di'angocha lcags sgrog rgya/ rdo rje lta bur yongs su bshad/ ron po rtse lnga pa/ khro khogazigs mar ma ba bshad//
mchog gi rtse mo rtsa gag bya// jo rjertsa mo nyid kyi thad// lag nan na phyag rgyan/ lag gnyis legs bar brkyang bar bya/ so mo pad+ma'i dbyibs su bya// skul byed lha mor yos
su bshad// zal mo yos su sbyar ba las/ mdzub mo dang ma'i bod dag mig gi tshul du gyur bar bya// sas rgyas spyan gyi'i rnam par bshad// bkra shas kyi ni la kung bca'//
rnala'abyom yig pasalungasangs// lag gnyis lhung bzo'adzan la 'drab/ bsam gtan phyag rgyab tu bshad// 'ani ma par snang mdzad rgyu/ sas rgyas kun gyi don mdzad mi
bskyod nga yi sa la reg/ chen tog gi mchod sbyin bod// bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od dpagamod// ngo bo nyid kyi don rtogs byed// don yod gzigs pa'i phyag rgya/ mi'i rigs pa ni da ba
sbyin/ blo ldan rnal 'byor skyil krung gnas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag mnyam ' bzhi g pas phyag rgyu kun/ 'ching bam ching du gzhug 'jig rten pa yi phyag rgyal//
lag pa gcig brkyangs// dbang ldan gyi nirtsi gsum kha many+dzi bo mthe'u mnan par bya/ yi dbangabo'i rdo rje'agyur/ lag pa g.yas pas btog par bya/ mi yi oM yig lag
pa dag mthe bod gung mo nyid la gzhag/ gshin rje'i rdo dbyug pa ste// mdzubamo dang mthe bong sbyar/ de nyid khyab 'jug 'khor los/ 'khor ma'iyi ga dgod par g/ lag pa gcig
gis bod pa nI ma mo rnams kyis mang dag ba da/ sor mo gnyis bslang yal grini srin po'abadag nyidan po'i// mdzub mo mtho bong sbyar pa'i// nu'i zhags pa nyid dub gang//
mdzub mo dang ni bu mo dag/ rgyal mtshan lta bura pa legs par brkyang/ rlung lha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya// lag pa gnyis kyis rab tu brtag/ dbu ma gtsog pulegs brkyang ba/ brgyug
'phug rgyar rab tu bshad// gnodasbyin kun gyi yang phyagami/ lus bdag da chen po'o mchod phyir thogs kyi phyag rgyani// tshangs pa yin legs par bshad// drag po'i samayanang
shes bya ste/ lha mo'i pa'i[“]ru brjod// tshog sakhadag gi ni sna nu bshad// zla ba'i bdud 'idakyila'akho/ nyima'od zer stong phragami mag pa gnyis kyis brtan par bya/ bod kyi
'khor sbyor ba yis/ dbang po rdo mtshon cha ltar 'din lha rnams kun gyi rgya/ dmar kun gyisab tu gnas // drizo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// klu lenalta bur rab tu
bsgrags// dga' byed dbangaphyug phyag rgya ma/ rdza rnga'i sgra dbyas rab tu 'bar/ sas rgyas thamasacad bamachod yi don chen pos rab tu brtags// ting tring tsag 'dzin sbyor ba As//
dri ba rnams kyi rab tu bsgrags// pi wang bsgreng pa'i sbyor ba yis// dbyangs can gyi ni rnam par bkur// rta dun du bu sgrog pa/ rig pa 'dzan pa rnams kyi'i brjod// lag gnyis
gdangs ka'i tshul byas pa/ klu rnams kyis nilegs par bshad/ gar sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'gyed da pa'i dudapa'i de bzhinano// lag pa zhags pas bcings pa// ngani phyag rgyar ba tu
bkang// 'di mas dmatshig phyag rgya ru// de bzhin gshegs rnams legs par gsungs// las kyi sbyor ba'abad ba yis// 'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgyar bshad/ phyag rgyu do nas sams kyi ni//
rinaNan yang duyang dubasam// rnam par rtog med gdod nas zhi// chos dbyings mnyamazhing mi mnyam pa/ stong ba mkha'a'adrar shes nas su/ mkhas pa yas bsgom par bya//
ba 'di dag thams cad ma skyes shing// milam lta bur rab tu gnas// dri za'i grong khyer lta bur snang// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang// mig 'phrul lta bur shin tu ni// 'gro ba thams
cang rab zhugs m// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa ru// srid paThams cad mdor bsdus pa// bdag med pa zhes mthong nas mi/ sangs rgyas kun dang dpa' bo yas// sgyu ma smig rgyu
brag cha dang// lhu ba chu yi chubur dang/ gzugs brnyanalta bu 'ajig rten na// de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgos// khams cad mgal me'i 'khor ltar// zo chun khyud mo phabazhin du//
gar gyi gnas kyi tshula'adrab// zla ba gnyis dang mtshungs par blta// rtag tu glog gi 'phrang ba 'dra// sbrang bu'i sgra dnga mtshungs par bshad/ 'khor bshin tu mang ba ste// rgod ma'il dang 'dra/
bar gnas// 'di ltar shes shing rtogs nas// sgom pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis// soms legs sgrub rnala'abyor pa// de la phyag rgyu rab tu bshad// stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang//
smon pa med pa'i rang bzhalas/ lus dang dga' yid kyis// dam tshig gsum ni brtags pa'o/ phyag rgya sogs dang mnyid dang// de nyid gsum na reb tugs bdag nyid grol ba'i rnam
'byor gyis// mtshan nyid gcig tu rnam par gnas/ de 'di dam pa'i phyag rgyaru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal to/ phyag rgya yi go bral ba ste// rnam pa med cing snang bsta/ dngos po med/
pa'i tshogs rnams la/ dngos po nying nyid du bshad// dngos med dngos po'i ring bzhin yin// dngos med nyid kyang dngos po yin// dngos dang dngos mang rnam par grol/ rnam 'byor ya sa mchog
gtu bde// rtog ge med ci snang ba mang// 'khrul pa med cing gi ga med// stong pa nam mkha' mtshungs pa ri soms/ gang tsho de ltar nyiba'agyur ba// de tsho phyag rgya rnams dang sngags//

wanyid du yang rab tu brtag/ sngags las phyag rgyam mthong zhing// phyag las kyang sdugs minazhing// ranganyidalha yi rnal 'byor ni// gnyis zhesngags dang phyag rgyar brtags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyis rdordzasnying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yaparangs par gyur te/de
ba'in gagashigs pa thams cad kyi 'khor losgyur ba chen po ro'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyod pa mdzad du gsol/ danas bcom ldan
'das shAkya thub pa de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig rtse bar gsan nas/ 'og min gyi gnas nas byon te dgatsastan gyi gnas su bzhugs nas/ dga' ldan gyi las kyi lha'i bu rnams la chos bstan nas zas
gtsang gi rigs la mngon par gzigs te mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub kyi snying bo dag la bar gnas nas nye bar 'khod do/ bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal bar bstan nas byang chub kyi snying po

la bzhugs par gyurd/ bzhugs nas kyang kun nas 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzan sngon du 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin khyab brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs nas kyang da bzhin
ba gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gol kyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad stsam dran cing gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzras mAdza A kar yasarba ta thA ga tAn hU~M/
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams legs par byon te/chos kyi dbyingasu smos nas phyogs bcu mumad pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams car khyab pa'i
rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams bkang ste/nam mkha'i khams na gnas pa thams cad til gyi gang bu ltar 'dzam bu'i gling du 'khodapar gyurato// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdorje rnal 'byor gyidabang phyug gis bkug
cing bcug ste bcings nas dbang du mad do/ de nyid kyi thugs kar rab tu bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi bang phyug chen pos gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas byin gyis
brlabs te/ sngags 'dis rang gi sems so sor rtogs bar mdzad do// otsat+ti pra tibo d+haM laM/de'i rjes thogasanyid la sangs rgyas thams tsod kyis khacom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugA
kar los spyod rdzogs pa dang/ sbrul pa'i sku las chos sku rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bsems nipo chings pa 'byung ste spos par mdzad do// de nyid sems 'od gsal ba/ thugs rje chen pos khyab
pa= de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rig pa spangs pa/ nam mkha' ltar gdodanas zhi ba de las thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas nas/
sems can gyi khams thams cud la wa par gzigs te shes pas rga ba dang 'chi bas rnam bar khyab par 'jig rtenam gzigs nas/slar yang sngags 'dis byang chub kyi sems
chu bar bskyod pa bstan pa// oM bo d+hi tsit+tiud pA ra yA mi/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de'i thugs karasams 'od gsal ba de yongs su
rdzogs kho'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar rnam par gzhag go/ legs par rnam par dag pa'i nam mkhatsa ltar dri ma med pa/
spros pa thams cad spangs pa// ma long lta bur bstan par byas nas gnas te byang chub kyi sems chen po la sngags 'di brjod do// o tsA naras pa sra dza/hU~M/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la 'od zer rnam pa
sna tshogs pa zla ba dkyil 'khor las rnam par phyung ngo// de phyung nas kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du zhugs ta/ shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gsol bar byas nas sems can thams cad
kyisams kyi ri bo'i rtse mo bsnyil ta rab zhu rtogs por byas nas gog 'dres te/ N+Di'i sku chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rjes su zhugs nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
rab tu gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'di byin gyis bslabs so// o ti badzra pa rar glu ya pany+tsamu rgyu/ slar yang sngags 'dis spros pa//
oM sA ra badzra/ slar yang sngags 'dis bsdus so// oM saMhar badzra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yeshes rdo 'isade po 'di rtsod du brjod pa/ oM dz+nyAn badzra/ de nas bcom ldan
mdas rdo tsharnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen posaM sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM sarba to b+ha ga ta dz+nyA na badz+dzahUM/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs ma
pa nyid mnyes pas sngags 'di byin gyisabarlabs pa/ oM badzra At+makoDahaM de nas de bzhinag shegs pa thams cad brtan pa nyid du bar gyurato// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
kyis de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs gzagasanas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par mdzad do// oM ya lhasarba ta thA ga tas wA a ham pa/n gnas bcom ldan/
'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skusaMms can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i rgyu sas rgyas thams cad gyis[”]sku kharaganyisamathan gyi khams thams cad du nges par bstanato// ngas brgya byin dang/
tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas/lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa zhes sgra bsgrags so/ de nas tshangs pas gsol
ba btab sta/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor nas de dang das 'dul ba'i skya bo btul te gang gis slar ldog pa med pa nyid du gyur to// 'di mas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sgom pa'im pa'o////
@#// donas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting nge 'dzin de las bzhos nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bstan te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa nyo bar
bsgrubs nas dathugs ka las roT phyung stanyid kyi phyug tshugazhag par gyur to// de nas 'od zer rnam par phyung ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzod nas dpar log ste/
tsamaM ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' n po kIn du bzang bo 'askur byin gyis brlabs ti/ mtshan nyid thams cad yos su tshogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis
brgyunapa/ dar dang 'phrang bas dbang bskur pa/ zla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis rlabs ta rnam par gnas so// de nas thugs ka nas phyung nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te/ do
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyanasdadang/ rgyab dang/ dung dudordzasams dpa' dang/rdo rje chos dang// ngo tsha'an chen dang/jorje las la sogs pa byang chub isams pa'i chen po'i'iphrang ba rnam par
gnas so// de bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang/ bdug pa la sogs pa khyad par du nges par bskyod cing gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang/ lcags kyul sogs pa'iwa nams bskyad da/'di
dag gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ donas yang dag bshad bya ba/ dkyil 'khorachen po mchog gyurapa/ sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis/ jorje snying po zhes su gsungs// grubazhiri la sgo bzhi
mtha0 pa dam dang lo tog 'phrang bas brgyan// sgo legs dang ni rig byed dang// rta babs kyis so sor smras/ de yi dbus su khrachon go// nyananas yongs su gru bzhi ba// de yi stang du pad chen po// ga
sar ldan zhing thab mdzes pa// dpalha bdabusasu// sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kyi mdang kun// sangs rgyas thams cad dgod pa la// sangs rgyas kun gyi nye 'khor
du 'khogal sgyur ba la sogs khri/ phyi yi gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dagod// kha dogasarapo gzi brjid che// dbang chen dakyila 'khor rab 'barab/ thams
cad rnam pa sna tshogs rgyun// brgyan pa de dag dgod par bya// rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rlung chen po las// dbang chen gyi dkyila 'khor gyi cho ga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
mdzad kyis slar yang rgyunimU'i dkyilawakhor chen po bka' stsal pa de nas yang dag bshad bya// kyila 'khor chen po mchog 'gyur ba// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bas na/ chos kyi 'khor lo nas
su brjod// de yi phyi rom gas pa la/ zlum po ru ni rtogs par bya// ri ma pa sna tshogs pas/ sgro dang spo logs brtag par bya/ rtababs rnam pasna tshogs pa/ dar dang me tog 'phreng bas
brgyan/ de yi dbus su padan pos// kos ldan zhing rab mdzes pa//'dab ma brgyad kyi ka ba la// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o/ dkyil 'khor da yi da dus su ni/ rgyal ba thams cad dakar/
po mchog/ kha ba ba zholtar dkar gsal// sheld zla ba lta khuli'od/ kund zla ba ltar dkar bstan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par de yinyamakhor h+phams cad du// sangs rgyas
sras po rnam par dgod// thams cad zla ba ltar dkar zhing// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs zla ba'adra// zla ba 'bar mtshungs mnyam med pa// chu yi ming zhes bya ba yi//
dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid du 'dod// rdodzasnying bo rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ chu'iwa'i dkyil 'khor gyi choga'o// des bcom ldan 'dasaro rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos mo
'tsho lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khoran po bka' stsal pa de nas yang dag bshad byab/ dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ rdordza[%]shes gzi brjid mtshungs// rdordzogazi brjid ces su 'tshod// gru
gsum rnam pa nyid du bya// shing rtakhInAmab dang mtshungs shing// 'bar ba'aphrang 'khrugs 'jigs pa'o/ kha dog dmar po stobs bon// 'jig pa'i dus kyi ma 'drab/ rtag tupad+ma rA ga latshus
de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// nyisa'i kha dog stobs pom// rdortsi gsum sna tshogs pa// shing rta'i snying khar gzhag par bya// bal bo'i chunasatog mtshungs/ ya kha'i mi ga dag dang 'dra/ khad+ma/
bad+marAg mtshungs// sangs rgyas dpa' bo yang dag 'bal/ bzang po mchal dnga mtshungs 'dra ba// rgya skyags b.rudadang 'drapor gnas/ de yi 'khor thams cad du// de bzhinasas rgyas
bsab ]sas rgyas sras// khro bo dang nim ngag pa dag mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya/ de dag thams cad kha dog dmar gzi brjid khams la 'od ldan ga/ 'od zer dmar po 'ba'aphro ba// khyim 'i
dkyil 'khor dbusason pa la/ Thams cad damar po'i mtshonachan// dmar po'i rgyan gyis nam par brgyan/ dmar po gos kyis bkab pa lus// 'phreng ba dmar po mchog 'dzin pa// 'di
ni gzi bar gtor zhes bya// dkyil 'khora mchog 'bar pa'o// jo snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/mo lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogasaso// de nas bcom ldan
rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang rlung lha'i dkyil 'khobaka'astsal pa/ de nas yang dgo bshad bya ba/ dkyil 'khor rgyunapo mchog gyur pa/ rlung gi khams dang 'dra bas/ rlung gi dkyil
la khor zhes su bshad// zla buphungalo'i rnamakha'adra// dbyar gyi smin gyi 'od dang mtshungs// a sa yi ma tog 'dra/ in+d+ra nI la'i 'od dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su pad chun po// pho yi 'od
dang 'dra// shin tshuganag pa'i mig sman marnyongs// ston dam gyininam par gnas/ de lte ba'i dbus sumi/ sangs rgyas dpa' bo rab 'bar ba// rgyal po'akhyil ba 'bar ba'i gzo// mtshan
mo zhagamolta bur gnas// ut+pal sngon po 'dab maritshul/ stong pa nam mkhawalta bur gnas// de mi nyo 'khor thams cad du// rgyas dang rgyal ba'i sras rnams/ khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang//
ba/ @#// de bzhin pho nyapo nyamo// thams cad snatshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ de bzhinag po'i gos gyon pa// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs bsdams// khadog nag po thams cad
[>du gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyibs// kha dog sna tshogs legs 'bar ba// bu re rgyus pa mnyam pa ni// kha dog nag posnatshogs pa// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// mdo
bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor rgyun po 'di lta bu// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa// bris nas shes rab can gyis bsgom// gal te dngos grub rang 'dod na// rdo rje snying po
tsa rgyan gyi rgyudachen po bas/ rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o/// de nas bam ldan 'das rnams kyis slar yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bcos ldan 'das rdo tshornal
'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de gsol ba btab pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shigs pa thams cad kyis de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan
'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig bar gsan nas/ sgrub par thabs kyi chog mchog tu gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa/sgog mo sogs
pas mchod pa kun// yang dag mdor bsdus byas nas nii// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen por// bdag gis rtag tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ga yang dag ldan// 'dod pa star ba'i sku pa bya
sgra dang gzugs dang de bzhin sbyor// yi ga'i 'phrang ba de bzhin te// thuba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sngags pas thams cad rnam par basam// tAMsngags pas snyingakhar
son par sgom// gsang sngags dgab brjod nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag la// dung gi sgra ru rab tu brjod// dril bu'i sgra ni ba gsalal// pad+mornal 'byor dbang
phyug go/ sa minasprin gyi hU~M gi sgra// TaTa'i sgra 'phro ba// rdo rje chen dbang phyug gi/ sgra ru de bzhin gshegs rnams gsung/ nor bu las kyi rigs kyi yang// rdza tshan sgra rurab

tshu bshad// pa wang gling bu de bzhini// garagyi rgyan gyi sku dang ni// rdza snga'i ngar sgra hU~Mgi sgra// spyi yi nyid durab tu bshad// rtog pa kun las rnam par sbyar/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las rnams
dang// donas gzugs kyi bzlas pa mchog/ go ramis ji bzhin rab tupa shad// dgug dang gzhug dang btsong ba dang// lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste// de la rang gi tshul ba sbyar/ sngags dang
phyag rab tul/ de rjesa rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ rtag tulus chen bsam bya bsam/ lha spyi sku gzugs bsgom par bya// lag pa'i phyag rgya ba nges pa'i phyag rgya'ang snying khasonashes bya/
rang gi gis ro mchog yis// de yi lus zhi'od gasal zhing/ sgron ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba'akhyomo// de ltar kun nas thams cad du// kun nas ba spu'i rtse dag nas// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phreng dge
bathab/ @#// khas gzugs kyi bzlas pa zhes su bshad// des sbyor ba'i bzlas pa yis// kasang sngags sgrub pa brtsam par bya/ mchod dang byin brlabs dbang bskur mchog/
spo la sogs rimams cad du// sbyor ba'i bzlas pa gtso bo 'di// 'bad pa yis nibatu bshad// snying kha mgrani pe ma lce min// dkan dang spyi bo dam in// nang min phyi dngaganyis
(par min// chos ni 'ba' zhig kho nal// bzlos nga tshisgra yang 'byum yin// 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byed cha// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba// sgom pa'i sngags pa de nyid ni// rnal 'byor pa
I gnas su bshad// de nas rjes su mdor bsdus te// snyingakhor dkyil 'khor rab zlum pa// zla ba gang bltar bsam bya/ drimamad cinge legs par gnas// de la yi gi rnam par dgod/
[%]tshig gi 'phrangabamachad pa// mu tig 'phyang ba ltar brgyud pa// char sprin gyin m 'dra'i 'od// de tsho thams cad gsal bar byed// lha yi lus ni snang byed cing// ji lta jilta yi ge'i 'phrang//
mchog gi'u sa larab 'ajug pa// de lta de ltar sngags gyi lus// lha yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur many+tsastobasalhadabang thams cad ni// tshangs pa khyab 'jug lasa chen lhag/ khazlas pa'i de nyid
mchog 'di ni// sas rgyas kun gyisabasngags pa'o// ji ltar soms ni sgom pa yi// deltar dangos gruba mchog tu 'gyur// rdo cha snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ bzlas pa'i de khon nyid kyi
sa 0// le'u'o//kade nas bcom ldan 'adas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa nipochab ka' stsal pa/ mnyam med mi g.yo
mnyam mad mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri mang mi g.yo mnyama med
dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan 'an tu phra ba'i la'ang tshad med de// dpe ninam mkha' dang yang bsgrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam mang da po dang bral ba rnams// semA
can khams la dngos grub mchoga rnams nges par stsol/ rtag tu dram med pa thugs rjerigs las byung/ smonalam grub dgag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i donagrub par
tubartson pa mthar yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bodwaganyid rtag tu rnam par snang// tshad med tshad dang bral ba shAn tatshogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa go 'phang dam pa bsnyes gyur kyang// kham
gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong 'gyur/ e maro shin tubazang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan/ mchog sbyin rnams kyi
nang nago 'phang mchog bsnyes pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tudangos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib ba med par rab mkhyenapas/ dam tshig mchog gsum dngos//
grub dam ba dag la gsol// 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag yon tan rgyas pa ste// lan cig tsam zhig brjod pas kyang// gsang sngags thams cad 'grub
pa par 'gyur/ bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// de bzhinagashogs de kun bastodan/ ma yas dngos grub stsol gyur te// bskal par gnas shing bskal par bskul// lus ni
g.yo ba mang pa ru// bdaganyid brtan par byas la yas/ mgonapo chen po rnam snang mdzad/ mi bskyod rin 'byung gnas dang// rgyal ba dag pa rong dpag mad// don yod rgyal ba
thams cad du// dal chu bcudalan de nyid dang// mchog kyang rab tu gsol bar byed// das grub yid 'ong ma lus pa// rgyas pa'i donadang phun sum tshogs// rab thams cad yongs rdzogA
pa yid la 'dod pa star bar byed// ye shes tshodang stobs dngashugs/ mchog tudag ba gso bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyibastod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya pa rdzogs
mkhaso/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyagachen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grupakyi chog rgyas pa bka' stsal pa// chos gros
mad cing rgyu skar mang// smyung bar gnas pa'i chog mang// dziltar bshad pa chogs bslab pa'i gnas na bar bzung ste gang yang rung ba'i yid dga' bar ji ltar rung pa'i dkyil 'khor byas te/
ma togasal ma bkramal bdugasmos kyis bdug ste/ ngobazhin gshegs pa thams cad la ji ltar nus pa'i ma rtog la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas te/ sngags 'dis yid kyis kyang ste//

ba bshags te/ osawa pA paM ta kA ya pAkit+taman shud+d+ha b+hA tsAragadzub mo dmAnamAnasiraNaya da kri TikAlaM kaM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT sarba pA paMspyo ba yA mi sAhA/oMsarba pA paM pra tiden Ami
