swAhA/ de'i rjes thogs le bdaganyid kyis dngos po dal bar byasgyu/ oM sarba ta thA ga tAnAn At+mab+habAr AtaA mi/ sarba ta thA ga tapra ti kladenatsAsAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang bzhi/osazata shug/ tapa dzA nasaMg+harAnaa numo daAmi swAhA/ yang dang yang du byang chub kyisams bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags kyis
byasku/ oM sarba ta thA ga tas man/b+ha dram hA badzra/sa ma yaM/ ma hA po tsati/ ud+d+hA ra yA mi sAhA/ de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyod pas thogasal zla ba'i kha dog can zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs po/ sa bcu'i dbang phyug nor bu rin po che chen po pad+ma'i snyaposang ga'i khri'i steng du bdag nyid bsam
par bya'o/ oM shud+d+he haM/ sngags 'dis bdag yongs su dag par byas te/ oM swa b+ha b+ha shud+d+hasarbatathA ga tAswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ sngags 'dis bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings yas pa 'od
gsal ba'i snang ba shin tu gnas par bya ste/ oM d+harma tusu glu pa Ata ko haM/ de nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/'jig rtenaThamA
capalas shin tu'angs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thamasad kyi chos kyi skur 'dogatod sngagros 'dis gnas par bya ste/ o pra b+ho shA rohaM/de bzhAn du ma pa'i dis chos kyi dbyes rgya chen por
sbyos nas/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas nyid do zhes nga rgyal khargyadal/ bdag skyo dgumalus pa'i dpung gnyen du byas la/ chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar lhan cig gnas par byas te/
'o bar rgyas par thun mtshams bzhir bzlas pa bsam par bya ste/ yi ga la rjes su gzhol ba'i yid kyis 'bum phrag nyi shu bzus par bya zhing/ nyi ma re rer stong phrag brgyad dam stong phrag ro
blobazhus te ji srid mtshan ma ma thob pa de srid du'o/ tshanadan dang/ ga pu' dang/ gur kum la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor byas te/ nyabar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod pa tsho'abrum gyi zla
ya/ bam/ sa ga'irtagang bal mar gyi mar ma stong phrag brgyad sbal rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas tA/ snamam tog gam ma tog pad+mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mchod rtenamachod do/
srid 'brug gi sgra sgrog pa ma thos pa de sude du bzlas par bya'o// donas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bdag la gsal bar 'gyur par shes par bya'o// des srog blugs 'bum phrag gcige
dgang bar byas pas mtshan ma thams cad gsal bar 'gyur// bye ba phrag bzhi bzlas pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa chen po
spyod par 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyis de bzhinagshegs pa'i mchod rten byas la/ mchod rten ra mdun du stong phrag re re bzlas pa 'am/ yang na dItsimachod rten/

gyi drung du 'bum lhag pa'i bye ba phrag bdun bzlas so// bdabar gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyi mchong rtan ma 'i rtsol re re ji srid bya ba phrag bdun bzlas pa rdzogs pa de srid du bya'o// tha mamachod
tshanarab r ba'i 'od des sgrub pa'i lus la zhugs pas brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rtenaskyong bal sogs nas/ ji srid dag pa'i gnas kyi ris kyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs sgyu rnams
ma tog gi char 'bebs por 'gyur ro// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ri la sogs pa 'ongs nas kyang stong par byed cing/ ji srid a
btsapar mod pa'i bar gyi sems M can ngamal ba thams cad bsalo bar 'gyur// yi dgasa rnams kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis
samasacan rnams la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyis mngon par gzigs par 'gyur ro// de'i rjes lus dang gser gyi mdog lta bu dang/ la brgyad gnyis/
kyi rnam pa can dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ ye shes thob pa dang/ kha dog dang/ tshodang/ stobs dang/ shugs dang/ dbang phyugal sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi
khams su rgyu ba dang/ 'khoramasgyur bltas chopa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bastod cing stong du 'gro ba dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'gyur ba dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'ajig tshun gyi khams kyi rig pa 'an pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag dums yongs su bskor ba dang/ phyogs bamumatha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzu 'phrul gyis
'gro ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'asprin gyisags par mchod cing grub pa thams cad 'od kyis ltung bar 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang/ rmongs pa dang/
'tsho 'jig rten skyong ba'i stan phyung ster bar 'gyur ro/ gakhri brjid dang/ gzugs dang/ dbal bsarig pa 'dzinupa thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i
sa'ang sosor klob par 'gyur ro// sa mas can thams cad 'dul ba la mkhas par 'gyura'o/ phyi ma'i mthar tsho byin gyis brlab ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad bskyod par mthong bar 'gyuramo/
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bya ba nges par ston par 'gyur ro/ mchod pa'i srin thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang/ byams pa dang/
'jam dpal dang mtshungs pa 'gyur mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// kasgrub pa'i rbabs gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad mchod par byas te/ gi'u wang ngam ldong ros pad+ma'i snod du gzhagal (ri sradi dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung ba de srid bzlas par byi'o/ sems can thams cad dbang du
'gyur ba dang/ mi snang ba dang/ rig pa thams cad na panyid do/ rig pa 'dzanapar gyur nas nyim stongashar ba'i kha dog dang/ 'a brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par sku li zhing 'khyil ba dang/ gdu
gu dang ldan zhing lha'i bumo bya ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing rig pa 'dzin pa'i grub pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang/ bskal pa chen po'i mthar gnas pa dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa

mas cad kyi dbang phyug tu'agyur ro/ma pa 'dis gsum basgrubasun dbang phyug chen po gyur mo mchod pa'i thogAbasgrubs tshadapar 'gyur ro//'khol laso khyab 'jug tu'agyur mo klog mkhur gyi rtse mo'i sa bzung sa sa spungs kyi dus
lade la zhonatabazlas na dbang po nagyuralo/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor byas te do'astong du bsdad nyi ma dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zla ba'i sta/ 'di nyid kyis lha'i phyi
brag gang gis mtshan mar bzung ste/ngos de longasaspyod la spyod par 'gyuyo/ de bzhin du ma pa 'dis dngul chu ram bcud len gang bsgrubs pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal tam
gruban de'i tshe sgrub palan bdun bya'o// bdun byas pas ci nus kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur bas bka' stsal
pa/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas posar bo lhun po'i tshod tsam gyi ri bo yang hUMzhes brjod pas lhung ba dang/ rgya mtsho skams pa dang/ ljon pa drung nas 'byin pa dang/ bum pa
mamakha' la 'phan pa dang/ glang po che res par byed pa dang/ pha rol gyi sna mngon par 'joms par byed ba dang/ bar snang na gnas pa thams cad ltung bar byed pa'o// sems
can Thams cad 'bebs par byed do// sgrub pa bo las gang dang gang sgrub pa 'dod pa de dang de thams cad byed do// yang na zla ba gcig tsam mi smra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
skur bdag nyid bsgoms nas nigs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la gnes shing 'chag par byed do// ma 'bar ba dang
glog 'gyural la sogs pa ston par byed do// gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur mo 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag kyang g.yo bar byed do// sgrub pa pos bye ba phrag bdun brgyus nas
'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// rim pa 'dis lhung bzedadang/ chos gos dang/ stod g.yogs dang/ khar gsilalas gang yang rung babazung nas drisrid rig pa 'dzin par gyur pa de
srid du bzlas par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang/ sprul pa du ma byed pa dang/ 'dod na ni ba dang/ skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro zhing de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi bar gnas par byed do/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis sas rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang byed do// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs
pa'i mtho'i tshad kyi mchopa na'abum phrag gcig byas te/ rnamod pa'i la gri glangs la cho 'phrul gyi zla pa phyir la bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod de brgyadapa'i m/ bcu bzhi pa 'am/
nyagang ba la skyil krung bcas te sde srid du mal gri ralar pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o sa thogis la rnga ba rnams kyi sgra grag ko/ sta nas ma tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// lhan
cig pa jisudapa dang bcas pa stong du 'gro// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur mo ge pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro/ sa kri'i rig pa 'dzin M pa chen po'i//
'khor lo sgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sa gos dang rgyan 'chang ba 'dod dgur skya ba skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par sbyod pa dang/ rga mad pa dang/
nyimare re zhingasas rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba mthong ba dang/ mchod pa'i sprin thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mchod parIchar 'bebs pa dang/ bskal pa chen po stong
phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yapa 'khor lo'am pa Tas blangs te 'bum phrag nyishu bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang dpal gyi sgor song ste/
rnam pa'i lam tshaba'i ma khu la btab pa 'bum phrag gcig srog blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'byed pa 'gyur ro/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur
ro gal tem grub na 'bum phrag gnyis sam/ gsum du srog blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad bsregs bzhin du 'ong ba rAgyur ro// 'ongs nas kyang sgrub pa bo la zhu
bar byed de/ kye skyes bu dpa' bo 'jug tu gsol zhes smra'o/ danas grogs dang bcasanas 'jug par bya'o// la gri 'ama 'khor lo do bzung nas lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzan po'i rgyal por
'gyuro/ sa 'og gi rdzas rnams kyi mnga' bdag lham yin gyi bu mo thams cad kyi bdag po/ gsang sngags grub pa gzhan dang lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi dbang phyug/ sa tsog
thams cad kyi bdag po/ lham yin chen po'i sprul pa khyedapa po bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo daMzhes bya ba brjod pa tsam gyis rlag par byed pa/ khyab 'jug
kyang hU~M zhes brjod pa tsam gyis rlag par byed na/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'bum phrag sum cu byas te/ mchod
rna na re re'i mdun du stong phrag brgyud brgyad bzla bar bya'o// thams cad lanyapar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ thamar mo tog can kyi lcags la 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa mtho gang tsam
pa bzung ba la cho 'phrulagyi zla ba phyed pa skyil krung bcas te/ ji srid 'bar ba des d du bzlas par bya'o// de nga cangs pas cig pa'i dzin pa'i 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyuramo// rig pa 'dzin pa'i
rgyal po thams cad kyi ma'adzag dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'ilha thams cad 'dul bar byed pa/ bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'oslob dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams/
stong rdzu 'phrul gyis gnon pa dang/ saMchod pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag gis mchod pa byed pa dang/ sangs rgyas stong phrag mthong bar 'gyur ro// donamasal ma re re zhing mchod pa chen po'i
sprin gyis mchod par byed do// sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa gzhan yang mchod rten 'bum phrag drug cu byas te/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas l bye ba bzlas pa'o// de nas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i
ro blangasal khrus byas nas nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod de/ ji sridams pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o// las nas daachu dang/ bcupalen dang/ mi snang ba la sogs
pa thams cad das stor bar byed do// gal tami star nadzisud khas lce chu byung ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o// donas mtshon rnon pos de gcad par bya'o// de bzung bsatim stong gi gzi
ba/ khaN+Did can rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba stong phrag drug cu'amakhar can/ tshobaskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag drug nu 'tshob/ sas
rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang/ ribo lhun po bye ba phrag stong skul ba dang/ gling stong phrag 'phan pa dang/ mtsho stong phrag skamasapa dang/ lhali'ajig rten brgya
stong phrag bsdigs pa dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams lhung ba dang/ skul zhing 'khyil ba dang/ lo brgyad gnyis parinam pa dang/ rgyun
thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ srog pa'i bskal pa ma 'jig rdzun gyi khams gzhan du 'gro zhing rga ba dang 'tshib mad par 'gyurazhes/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang
phyug chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang/ bum pa bzang po dang/ nor gyi char pa dang/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting
tsa' 'dzin chen po dang/ rinapo chen po'i lag pa dang/ nor rgyun gyi rtog pa chen po dang/ soms can gyi ripa thams cad rjes su 'gengs pa dang/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal bo dang/ rin po
cha thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya'o// de la 'dilta sta/ 'khor lo rin po che dang/ nor bun po che dang/ bud med rin po che dang/ khyim bdag na po che dang glang po rin po che dang/ na po che
dang/ bstan bkur ba rin po che'o// de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang tsan danadakar polas pad+masor drug pa'i tshod byas pa/ pad+ma de lag par bzung nas zla ba drug tuskyil krung
bcas te/ rta bar sbyod pa thams cad kyis mchodonas na mtshams gsum mam bzhir grangs mi gzung bar bzlas par bya'o// zla ba drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang pad+mo'abum phra/
bdunasag thugs bya'o// klu banyanas sbyang pa brtsam par bya ste/ 'bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la skyil mo krung bcas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o// rangs kyi tsho
rig pa 'dzin bor 'gyulo sku la zhing 'khyil pa dang/ lo brgyud gnyes kyi rnam pa rgyan gyi tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ nyim stong phragarab 'od dang mtshungs pa/ rig pa 'dzin
pa bye ba phragadumalirakhor can/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgyabastong dums yongs su bskor ba/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams mngag gtug par 'gyuramo/ sas rgyas kyi zhing thams
cad du skad cig tsam gyis rnam par rgyu ba dang/ mchod pa'i sprin du mas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par 'gyur po/ de bzhin du u la'i sgrub pa dang/ tsan dan dmar po'ipad+ma'i sgrub
ba'ang bo/ sgrub pa gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba nil dang/ pad+marAg dang/ mu tig gi 'bras bu'am rin po che yongs su rtog par byed pa pos yongs su brtags pa na bde bar gshegs
pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam pa'i mchod rten 'bumatsam byas te/ gang yang rung ba'i gras mi gzung bar ji srid bdag yongs su dag par mthong ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ de'i
rdzas sumangar gsum gyis sbags pa'i pad+ma'abum dang/ sna ma'i ma tog 'bum phrag gsum dang/ a ka ru yam shiba'abum dang (tsanangan gyi yam shi 'bum phrag gsum dang/ til dang/
'angs 'bum phrag bzhi dang/zho zan 'bul dang/ mar gyi srog blugs stong phrag gsum dang/ smanathams cad pa'i srog blugs 'bum phrag gcig byas l/sbyin srog longs su rdzogs pa dang/ dkar
bo'i tshes bco lnga la bsgrub par bya'o// skyil mo krung bcas te/tibar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchodal/ ji srid nor panapo che'abar pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'bar nas kyang rig pa 'dzin pa/
@#/gzhonanugadod du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// kri li zhing 'khyil ba dang/ la brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcumu med bzhi'ajig rten gyi khams rgyas par gsal bar
'byed// rig pa 'dzan pa thams cad kyi bla ma 'khor lo sgyur pachen por 'gyur ro// yid bzhin nor bu'i dngos grub byang chub sems dpa' chen po rig pa 'dzin pa zhes brjod do// sangs rgyas
thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bar byed do// skadatsogatsamal 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can bskor nas slar de nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ gal te 'dod na byang chub sems dpa'i

0 tshogs mngon par rdzogs par byas te/ lus de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'agyuyo/ de bzhin du sgrub thabs kyi le'ul bris sku dang/
shibalham dang/ mu tig gi 'phrang pa'i ng yid bazhin gyi nor bu'i tshogs bsgrub par bya'o// thams cad du 'grub par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang mchod rten bye ba phrag stong byas te//
'bum phrag bdun bzla bar bya'o/ yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ ma tog can gyi lcags sam/ lcagasalnga'i rang bzhin gyi sdong rtse mo lnga pasor bcu'i tshad dam/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mkho'i tshod

tsam cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la mtshan thogathag khri stong du lag pa bkapal/ ji srape 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de bzung nas rdo tsA'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor los sgyur brtan po rim bye
pa brgya phrag dang rjes su 'tsham pa/ rowa'achang ba ltar gzi brjid dang ldan zhing 'od gsal bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu zhing/ dbang phyug chen po lasogs pa'i lha rnams la/
cibasgo ba nyan bar 'gyur/ lham yin rnams skrag pa dang/ srin po rnams 'dzoms pa dang/ sems can thams cad des ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur bar/ picom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags ba
thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ jorjesnying po rgyan gyi rgyudachen polas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzas kyi bya ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u
yongs su rdzogasaso//kad nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ bam ldan 'das
thog ma rang tham med pa rdo rjernal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po ka kA sbyar ba ste/ mtha' yas
h+pha pa kha sbyar ba zhes bya ba paka' stsal du gsol/ des khacom ldan kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi gsang bzhinapo gsang sngags kyi ka kA pu Ta paka' stsal pa/de nas yang dag bshad/
bya pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes su skyob// gsangasngags ka kA sbyar zhes bya/ gsang chen mchog turmadadu byung// gru bzhi pa tshad mdzes pa// kun nas yongs su bzang zhing dag/
ramig bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa// mdor bsdus nas ni sngags pas bya// dang po'i'aphrang bzang gnyis la ni// sa sogs blo glos ldan pas dgod// ka sogs lhag ma'ir mig la// sngags
pas mdor bsdus taphro// sbyor ba yi zhon ya gakun// go rims pazhin du dgod par bya/ re mig stong pa dag la ni// kA lig dang ni rdo grwa/ rim pa 'di dag bkod nas ni khang sro'i
'og tu 'bar ba mchog/ dang po dbyas la de'its+tshas su// yi ga phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa// ka tsa Ta tab ya shA// dag ri sku yi dkyil 'khor ldan// 'di rnams myur du'agrub par byed//
00 pad+ma'i rigs kyilha'inyid do// don kun grub par yang dag ldan/ ma yi dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad// 'bar ba'i ma dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// kha tsha Tha tha phar la// dbang chen gyi nidakyil
'khor ldan// ga dza Da da ba lasA// dngos grub kun byed cung gzugs ldan/ dbyar gyi sprin ltar shin tu 'jigs// g+ha dz+ha d+hab+ha waM hA// stong 'gros dngos grub byed par brjod/ slar yang nga
nyaNan ma// chos kun dpangadu byed par mchog/ thog ma'i dbyangs yig gang yin pa// de ni de bzhin gshegs stobs bsu// khyad par yan lag bcu gnyis bshad// de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs bcu gnyis// ma ning ye u0f7aga pa'i po spong// 22la lo zhes bya ba// dbyangs dang sa bon de bzhin sngags// de dag yi ga yang bshad// dbang du byed pa'i raMn kun// khrig
le sgragatsug zla phyad ces// sna ldan gyi ni'i phung zhes bshad/ sangs rgyas de bzhin byang sems kyis/ yi gar brjod pa de bzhinazhing// gsal byed ces kyis gsal ba'o// de bzhin
la ba rlung// mo dang dbang ldan bdag po ste// 'byung ba chen po ri khams rnams so/ rlung ma bdud rtsi'i bcud ces bshad// mnyam dang mi mnyam cha dbye bas// thams cad kyi lam zhes bya/
phyag rgya dang nyid kyil 'khongasngags// ting 'dzin mdor bsdus bshad pa'o// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdagamad// chos kun las nibaton nas stor/ stong pa mtshan madasmon mad pa//
rnam par thar pa gsum du bar/ phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// mkhas pa yis nishes par bya// dani sngags kyi ka kAle sbyor ba'as// rab tu btus pa sbyar ba/
tse dang phral ba bshad par bya'o/ yi ga rnams kyis byang chub dpyod// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// lhan cig nyid du sbyar bar bya// dbyangs rnams kyis ni bsdus pa bshad// mtshan
nyid kyang ni rab bshad bya// dbyangs ni byang chub gzugs nyid de// gzhan dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya// de la des par sangs rgyas nyid// star ba nyid du legs por bshad// thog mar/
sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gsang sngags dri ma med pa 'byung// thog mar dbyangs ni thig le yaldan// jo rje'i stang du yang dag gnas// 'bar ba'i 'phrang can rab zhi ba/ rnam pama'aphra
ba nyid du gnas// zla ba'i dbusasu bsgom bya pa// kun gyi ye shes 'od po che// kun tu 'agro ba rab tu thob// thams cad du yang rnyedapar dka'// de ni gdod nas gnas rtag pa// yi ga
ga mdacingadabyer med pa// byang chub sems nas rab tupashad// dung dang kund zla ltar dag/ gnyis pa'i sgra dang yang dag ldan// donishan tu ring bor shes// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa
ste sa dang pha rol phyin pa rnams// usma rnams kyi rnam pani// mya ngana'as pa zhes su bsgrags// dbus dang yi ga khyad par can// mtshan nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya// rang gi phyag rgya sogs
sa ldan pa// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// dranisangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi de nyid 'di bshad bya// thogamar spyod pa byas nas niI/ gnyis pa smra ba po ru bshad//
zhi ba'i dbyangs kun nas mnan// gsum pa'i ming ni yid ces bya// rgyu med pas tacung zad pa// bzhi pa yis ni gsal bar byas// drug pa'i sgra dang ldan pal// de yi steng du thig le
gnas/ chos kun nam mkha dang mtshungs par// yang dang yang du bshad pa yis// dri ni lnga pa shes par bya// yi ga lnga pa stobs po che// yig lnga yi stobs lnga'i bdag nyid las skyes
gtso// mthu stobs chen po khyab bdag srid pa'i bdag nyid skyes// mthu stobs chen po srid gsum las rab grol byed pas/ yi ga ldani 'gro ba drug las grol ba'i bdag/ mngon shes drug
kyang rab tu stor byed dri ma med// nga nyid bcom ldan spyod pa ste// mi bskyod pa zhes rab tu grags// byang sams ro soms dba' ste/ brtan pa'i sa mas dpar rab byung ba// chos kun gyi ni
de bzhin nyid// glang bsgrags de nithams cad du// ma yi sa bon dang ldan pa// dpyadapa yi ni stong du gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// 'an chen 'byupaldan zhes su bshad//
chos rnams kun gyi byed pa// mod pa nyid du'ang bshad pa'o// mi yi sa bon yang dag ldan// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi spyi bo'u// mnan pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med// de nyidabcom ldan rnal
'byor ni/ sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ drug pa'i dpus dang yang dag ldan// don yod pa yi snying por grags/ so lnga pa mi bzhi pa ni// dngos dang
dngos med rab rtogs byed// mi yi sa bon rab tu ldan/ 'khor lo'i dbus su rob tu gnas// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ thig la sgra yis rnam par spras// 'khor lo sgyur ba
se shes che// rnam par rgyal pa'i nor stor byed// gang zhig sna lnga pa yi mthar// sgyu ma'i chos 'khab tu gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni/ gdugs dkar zhes su bshad pa'o//
brgyad pa'idabyas dang yang dag ldan byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// de nyid locom ldan l 'byor ni/ spyi bor thig le mnan bko/ 'jam ba'i dbyangs dang ye shes che/ mAm ki
ru de bsgrags so/ lnga yi dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// spyod pa'i gara mkhan rab rtogs ming/ sdig bathams cad res byed de// rnam pasal
bzhes bya ba// sdig kun rnam par sbyong byed pa// sngatshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni phyag najordzastobs chen dang// gshin rje mthar byed khro ba// yag gsum ni stobasanapo// thog mar
dgu pa yi ni dbyangs// de yi dbus su spyod pa gzhag ma sna tshogs zhes bya sbyar// sku gsum duni rnam par sgom// kha ma'i sde tshan gsum pa ni// gang yin kun tu bzang bor bshang//
0 sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba lo/ de nyid brtson ldan mgon po ni// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// rdorje khro bo stobs po che// de nyid rab tu grags pa'o/
'dra kun thams cad stong pa ste// rgyu ni rab tuphyang ba lo/ dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje hU~M mdzad hU~M mdzad do// gang zhig bzhi pa'i sde dang po'o/ mo dang rab tu ldan pa dang//
bzhi pa'i dbyangs dang yang dgaldan// gzi brjid phung po stobs po ma// de nyid gong dang ma sbyar ba// sgol ma nyis su rab tu grags// bzhi pa yan gnyis pa gang// shes rab pha rol phyin
par nges// thig le lhan cig yang dag ldan// sgra dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gyur// sde mtshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa gang// ma nyid dang ni yang dag ldan/ bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi yang dag
mnan// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan zhes bya ba// spyod pa'i gar mkhan zhes bya'i mtshan// de yi rjes nyid la ni ma// dgu pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag
ldan// gsum pa'i dbyangs kyis mnan pa yi// sdu tshan dang por dang po ste// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni// 'jig rten mgon po thub pa che/ ye shes rgya che bsgrub par bya// sangs
rgyas byang chub rang gsol byed/ sna tshan lnga pa rin rgyunar chog/ bzhi pa'i sa bon dam pa ste// 'og tu yi yan lag ldan// khro gnyer can zhes rab tu grags// dbang chen a ga dag pa
khyu// la thigal sgra yis rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas sbyin zhes rnam gras pa// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog par byed// snga rmanadang po'i gsum pa ni// nam
mkha'i spyan zhes brjod pa'o// sgyu ma'i chos la rab gnas nas// gsod pa'i don du rab tu gsal/ mA ma kA zhes bya ba'i ming/ mig pa mchog tugasang ba ste// rgyu mi dmigs pa'i
chos rnams kyis/ drim med pa stsol ba byed// gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang a nga dag ldan// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya// dbang chos bon yang dag ldan// 'gro ba'i ro tsho rengs byed na//
gdug pa gzhan kun smos ci dgos// rlung gi dkyil 'khor byas pa// rang gi sa bon gnas shing 'bro/ 'gro ba thams cad skyod byed// gdug sems can gzhan smos ci dgos//
waM ngeng mdang ldan pas na// dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams dang// bgegs dang bgrwa rnams zhib mi/ khyad par mi g.yo ba yis byed// don dam bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs/ sa par snang
mdzad gnas las byang// gzhan gyi dpag dpung 'joms pa ni// ma dang ldan nyid kyis bya// drug pa'i byas dang yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor
gyis gras pas// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// desi mnad ral sogs// de yis phyu mar zlog pa des/ ro rdzol gnas 'khor lo yi// dbus nas 'gro kun ras pa' byed//
gnas nas bskyod par byas pa yis// 'byung po rnams ni dbang du byed/ rtag pa'i gzugs su gsas ni// mi g.yo ba yi snying khar son/ chos kyi da pus mtshungs thob nas ni/ bdag
gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya// rlung gis ho'an po che// spyod pa'i stong du yang dag ldan// mi las byung ba mi la gnas// 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par byed// sde tshan dang po'i dang bo
gang// sa a yig stod du man/ statshanalta pa'i thamani// drug pa'i sgra yi stong du gzhus// 'og tu yi sa bonaldan// nyima'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ste// sa gsum thams cad rab
ra byed/ me yi phyogasasu gnas nas ni/ phyag rgya'i bdag nyid thams cad sgom/ rlung lha mo lha yang dag sbyor// rgyun byed pa mtshungs pa'o// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes che// de nyid
kho na bsgrub par bya dbang chen ni sbyor ba las// 'khol sbyar ba'i go 'phang gnas [“]yo shas rgya chen bsgrub par bya// yang na phunasu tshogs pado/ grib 'dzin dang sangs rgyas
nyidarnalaM 'byoraashes phun su mchogs// skyo ba 'a di las 'grub 'gyur te// 'di la the tshomami bya'o// dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad la// sbyor ba'i dbye ba rnam par gnas// tshig dang
ga gi tshad mas dang// tingapa'i dzin rnams thams cad du// slob dpon man ngagashes bya ste// gzhan du bya ba ma yin// rdo rjesnying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'irgyudan po las/ rdoNi kakA'i
sbyor ba mdor bsdus te bstan pa ste/ rgyus par slob dpon gyis mngon par dpyad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur
bas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsung ngag gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba btab pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ de rnams kyis gsol
ba btab pa'i tshig gi rjes tid la/ 'brug gi sgra mkhaM' yas pa mi legs par bsgrags pa nam mkha'i mdzod kun nas rdo rje chob tshangs pa chen po'i sgra yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor so sor yongs su rtogs pa'i den du/ de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi gsung grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor na
po bka' stsal pa/ n gnas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor/ zlum po kun nas bzang po ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khogalta bur gnas// de yi stang du bdapo//
'dabam brgya la gas ga/ dayikaste ba'i dbus su ni// yi ga mchog gi go 'phang nyid// bdagog dngos grub bsgom par du// ngag gi dbang phyug ron po// snying khar zla po dang pad+ma// de yi
stangadu dung brtag bya// dung gi rabus su lce yin te// rdoN+Di'i rang bzhin dge ba'o// de yi stong du rin chen pad// yang sa sangs rgyas gzugs bano pang/ 'bar zhing rkan kyi mtha' khyab pa// bdud
rtsi'i rgyun ni rab 'bab pa// nga yi yi ga spyi tshugs pa// sangs rgyas kyi nisnying du gnas// bdud rtsi'i thig pa 'dzag pani/ go Nims bzhin du bsam par bya// zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig/ mdun
zla ba pozhi ram ni// zla ba brgyadadu rab mchog bsgoms// dkyil 'khor bzang po bsgrub par bya// skyil krung gis ni nyir gnas te// dang po'i sbyor ba'i dbang phyug skyes/ chos kyi dbyings ni
mkha'i dag/tu// thams cad du yongs su gang// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis skyob pa'i/ risnyad rig pa
thams cad ni// lus dang ngag dang yidi rnams kyis// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog/ de rnams thams cad bdag nyid kyis// lus kyi 'khomado 'dzugakhasam// dung gi sgra nagasal ba
bsam// pad+ma khams la yang dag rten// pad+ma'i bsar thig lelas// sgra yi rang bzhin rdul phran rnams// mgrin pa sonanas sgra gyur te// de las kyang ni ji ltar gyur// slar yang
lce zuson pa dang// yi ge mchog tu dge ba'o// lci yi pasig cher 'bar ba// gcig nas gcig tu rdo rje'i tshul// kun nas rab tu 'od gsal ba// rdo ri'i ngagazhidam pa'i don// sgra yisanam
mkha'i kun gang bas// sgrub pos mdo ru bsdus te bzla// dpazhin dusnying khar sgra/ rtsel 'od zeranges 'phros nas/ mchu'am solas pa bkra ba'i// gol ta'od zer mthong nani// de mo
shug grub par rnam par shes// grung pa'i ngag ni dam pa'i do// yang na lha ni gzhan pa yis// ngag gi sgrub thabs chen po mchog/ rang lce ro Ni'i rang bzhin bsam/ bdag
da rdo sems dpa'i rang// 'bar ba'i sgron ma dang mtshungs pa// rang gi snying gi dbus kyi chu// ya gi mchog tu pra ba yis// a yi ya gi mnga' bdag mchog/ rnam pa ra bkrapa nyimab//
rang gisda pa'i mthar thug mtshungs// yi ga yi ger yos su gzhol// phra mo mnyam pa'i mthar thug ni// 'bar zhing thig le dang mtshungs shing// snying gi dkyil 'khor gsal byed pa//
daa 'bar ba'ab phra ba// ji srid dkan gyi bar du son// sur yang yi ge thams cad ni// yang dang yang du gsal byed cing// rdo rja 'bar bstong phrag dang// yang dang yang du rnam par 'don/
'jig rten kun tu de song ste// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// ya go'i rang thazhane rnam bkra ba// rang gis 'gro ba rnam byas te/ sa yang khos na rang
gnas su// 'jug pa ru ni yongs su brtag/ de nas sgra dngayi gi ni// lte bar song sta yos su gnas// lte bar nipad+mi mchog/ pad+mar rdo tshu dri med mdzes// de yi steng du dung chen
po rab tu 'phro ba nyid du gnas// nges 'bar ba'i rnam pa'i sgra/ brang gi gnas nas yongs su byung// slar yang mgrin par song nasasu// rdo rje la yang dgareg/ 'gram pa sbyarab 'i
dbus sunI/ sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma mad// kha ba pa 'oltar dkar 'od// bcud len bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dra// rdo rje ni mtha' dag rnams// yang dang yang dugs
bar byed// ting po'adzan gyi rtsar son tu// slar yang si pal nyid du song// thig le las ni gug kyod gyur// 'dug kyang ri mo ring po can// cha shas rnam bzhi 'dus pa las// da re yi gar
rnam par shes// a ga las ni sgra skyo zhing// sgra las nAd de las dbyangs// dubyangs las ngag tu rnam par 'gyur/ yi ga las ni chashas chogs// tshig rkang dang ni ngag tu 'gyur/
tshig rkang las tshigs bcad dang// de bzhin du ni ga dang// 'breng 'dzin rgyun sa de bzhin te// 'di ltar sdogs dang ga stags dang/ rang gi snying por rab tu 'gyur// de nas bzlas
nga'i la 'byor che// blo gros ldan pas brtan byas te// da dug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang// dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya// bzlas pa 'di yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad du ni brtan pa
bya ya de bzhin gyi ni ngag 'grub po// rmad byunga mchog tu rnyed dka' pa'i// yang dag lhani gzhan pa yi// ngaga'agrulo thams cad skyob rnams kyi// yi ga gcig pa gsang chen go/ ngag gi sgrub
thabs mchog tu dag/ sangs rgyas kun kyi bdag nyid ni// legs par mnyam par gazhag pas bsgom// rang sang zla ba rdodzin// 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba'akhrugs pa'i'od// de las bstan
bcos thams cad ni// nges par gdon pa nyer du bya/ ngag grub pa yi ye shes 'dis// thams cad mkhyen pa thob par byed/ bstan bcos thams cad rab 'don cing/
[>nga nyid kyang mi'atar par byed// sems can kun gyis thams cad du// dngos po cung zad g bsams pa/ de dag thams cad rnal shes te/ skad cig tsam la smra bar byed// dzodzisnyingapo rgyan
ces bya ba las/ ga gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
'tsho thugs mchog gi dbang phyug gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi glog rgyas pa sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol//
rgyu ngos bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis de dag gis gsol ba btab pa zhapar gsan nas de de bzhin no zhes bka' stsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamacad kyi gsang sngags
kyi mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim par phye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsalapa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya pa// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs// 'khor lo rtsa bas brgyud rnam par bri//
yang na bcu druge rtsibs kyang bri// lte bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgod/ 'khor lo'a'i phreng bas rnam pa brgyan/ mtha'i nu rin chen rnam pa bdun// mkhas pa yis ni spel bar byed//
0da yi lte bar bdaganyid mi/ 'khor lo sgyur ba stobs po che// sas rgyas kun gyi skun po// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ da yi phyag rgya bgrang las 'das// skad cig ma ning la//
'thom/ 'gro ba thams cad snang saM nas/ sngags kyi dbang phyug nyung la gzhug 'khor lo'i dngos grub gzi brjid che// 'khor lo sgyur pa bdag nyi'agyur/ chung dang tshe dang dbang
phyag dang// rang dbang 'dod dgur spyod pa dang// kun tu 'gro ba nyidadang ni/ kun gyi dbang phyug phun tshogs 'bras/ rgyadang 'chib mang thob myong// nges par 'khoralo smra ra dnga mtshungs//
gsar gyi 'khor loran po cha// de bzhin dngul dang shalanyid dang// me tog can gyi lcags kyang rung// rang gi lag gis bzung nas su// dpang chen ngakyila 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas la ma
rung bsgom par bya// 'khor la sgyur ba gzi brjid/ mtshan rnams kyis nim par brgyan// de ltar bdag nyid bsgoms nas ni/ 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid du'agyur// del de'i sngags kyi tshig tu

gyur pa ni/ o saphu ta thA ga toN+Di Ti a ba lo kiti/ mutsitsakra wati dzA la dzAl rgyun bi b+hun tAs ya ma ra a/ uts+tshaT pa tanab+hany+dza bro khe kuN+Da ni a pa rA dzitAm+bo d+hA ri Ni/ hUM hUM phaT yabaswAhA/ rtsa
ba'i sngags so// o au a pa rA dzi ta d+hika sA/ snying po'o// namasan+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nAnAn a pa rAdzi tad+hikaswAhA/ mchog gi snying po'o// 'khor u0f8bsgyur bar rab grubasti/
sangs rgyas nyid ni thob nas ni// ye shes tshu dang stobs dang shugs// yang na dbang phyug dam pa kun// dpa' bo thams cad ster byed na// dngos grub gzhan lta
smos ci dgos// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub parI shAbs so// nyima'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// nam mkha'al niyongs su sgom/ gzi brjid phung po ye shes che// sangs
rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// gsasu ma 'byung sams kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu rmad byung ba// de ni ma yir shes par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de
yang 'khobalo'adzin rgyal po// 'khor lo sgyur ba legs 'bar ba// de la de bzhin rin chen bdun// 'khor lo'i 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//
nyim re re'i bkra shis sgom// gzi brjid phung po sku chen po// sum cu rtsa gas mtshan 'chad ba/ 'bar ba'i 'phra 'khrugs dpa' bo ni// snang ba shar ba lta bur gnas// de yi phyag rgya rtag
tu bsam// nam mkha'i rnam par legs par gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyi mthatsAkus pa// 'od zer 'phrang bas rnam par khyab// de dang bdag nyid rdo rjer sgom// sangs rgyas byang chub rab
sgrub byed/ kun tu kun nas thams cad du// dngos po kun las 'byung bar 'gyur// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang zhugs// kun tu 'agrol/dadang ni// sangs rgyas thams cad de dag dang//
rodzacan kunyid dang ni// gzi brjid mchog kun thob gyur nas// gzi brjid phung po 'dra bar 'gyur/ de la sngags kyi tshig gyur zhi/ oM tag torengs nu b.lokitilutsitaM/ ta/

dzar si dzA la dza rU ka chu ka/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ba lhab lha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// o don si swAhA/ sAng polo oM dzal tu phor si hU~M phaT swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po lo/ dag pa'i
gsang sngags 'di rnams kyis// nyam yo shes rab zhugs l// kun tu 'gro ba'i 'grub par bya// rig pa 'dzin pa nyid thob 'gyur// gzi brjid phung po gsangasngags kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so//
kun nas snang ba zhes bya mchog/ yi ga gsum pa stobs po chu// gsar gyi kha dog legs 'bar zhing// gtsug tor stang na'od gsal la// sngags par bdag gis bsgom
bya kun nas snang ba lta bur 'gyur// oM hU~M/ gsang sngags rtse mo dam pa'i di// bsgoms pa tsam gyis thams cad du// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro kun kun nas snang par
'gyur/ kun nas snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// chos kyi 'kholo phyag rgya che// legs pamanyam par bzhag pas bsgom// sangs rgyas kun nyid kun
kyi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor byed// 'khor lo 'di ni rtsibs bcu gnyis// ram pa bcu gnyis yongs su gnas// rnam gsum gsum ni yongs khaskor ba// bya ba'i don du dag pa
[N; ]sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// nam mkha'i khrugs na gnas ba ste// chos kyi dbyis ni khyab pa ni// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom//
'gro ba brtan dpagayo ba ni/ 'di kun rten cipa'i brel 'byung ba// 'di'i chos kyi phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yi sngags su gyur pa ni// o d+hun pA ta ya tsan+datsa
kraNabadzraNihU~M/ gsang sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis mda'achar// skudacigatsam gyis thams cad du// dam pa'i chos ni stobs ldan byed// chos kyi
'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs so/// chos kyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa 'ad// sangs rgyas sku gzugs legs 'bar ba// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog bsgrubs na// nyon mongs rdo
'drab r 'gyi// snying nas rdo rje gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ de yi snying la jo rdzom/ ma mid pa sku baba'agyur/ nyonomongs rtag rgyu yos zad kyi//
dgra rnams kun las rgyal bar byed// bden pa bzhi ni rtogs pas na// bdenapa'i yashes thob par 'gyur// sngags ni/ o glisha a shAnihU~MpaT/ 'di ni nyon mongs rdo rje'i sngags/
dragacing drag po'igazhan gnon pos// sas rgyas nyid kyang ltar byed na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// nyon mongs rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs [”]so// dbang chen dkyil
ba 'khor la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas rang bzhin stobs po chu// bdud bzhi las ni rnam rgyal ba// legs par manyam par gzhag bas khasgom// bden pa bzhi yi khu tshur che// lus dang
ngag dang de bzhin yid// khu tshur sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gnyis med skye ba'i mtshan nyid do// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya// rang nyid sa sa rgyas yin nozhus// brtan dung
g.yo ba'i 'gro ba ni/ 'di dag thams cad m skyes par rokhu tshur bsgoms nas nii// rdo rje khu tshur 'dra bar 'gyur// pal sngags su gyur pa ni// oM bi dza ya daN/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i khu tshur chu// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba// sngags pas rtag tu bsgoms na ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi
sgrub pa'i thabs so// dngos grub las byung 'od gsal ba// gdod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med// sas rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su 'o//
bong rdo rje'i bdag nyid sgom// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis// 'di yis 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ 'khor lo sgyur banyid du ni// 'jig rten kun kyi thams cad du// kun nas phun sumatshogs
pa kun bkug nas gus pas sbyin par bya// sngags ni/[0f00] dz+wa la dz+wa la di pa dI bya ud gtoT+Thita d+hu na d+hAmashI/ sIpa'i gro'i gtsug tor zhes bya bar// sangs rgyas dpa' bo kun gyis
gsungs// 'di bsgrubs pa tsam gyisani sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so//
sangs rgyas rang bzhin phyag tshe/ legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// tshangaskyob gdugs dkarachen po mi/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pas/ zla ba'i kha dog cher 'bar zhing/ chu yi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa// mdapuN+Da ri kar gnas/ ri mo bdun kyis yongs su gang// bcud/
lanalta bur bsgom par bya// dngos gruba'adiyi sbyor ba yis// sems can rnams la thams cad du// re ba thams car yongs rdzogs pa// 'dirigatsug tor gdugs dkar che// sngags
ni oM ma ma mam shun/ 'di bsgrubs pa tsam gyis mi/ ye shes tshe dang stobs mgyogasa'ago// dpa' bo thams cad thob 'gyur zhing// sangs rgyas tid kyang rnyed dka' min// gdug
dkar po yi sgrub thabs so// zla ba'i dkyila 'khor la gnas pa'i// 'ba'akhasi'aphrang 'khrugs ral gri ni/ sngags pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rang gi bdag nyid sangs
rgyas zhes/ de sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin chen pos// nam mkha'i mthongs rnams yongs gang ba/ bdag nyid gnyis med ngo bo yis// rnal 'byor gcig tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi si gi

chan/ 'khor lo che// 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// sngags pas snying kha bsgom par bya// rgyal ba dam pa nyid du 'gyur// sngags ni/o dz+wa la dz+wa le rikhadzul dzAl ban+d+ha ban+d+had ma dam
jum dra ma ra bur phan hUM/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor ral gri cho// shes rab lo shas dri ma med// sngags pas kun nas bsgoms nas ni/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tori'adri bar 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i
gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// sas rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba 'khrugs pa'id// seng ge 'i khri yi steng du bsam/ yang na rdo rje'i gdan la gan//
kun tu gatsug lo cho 'bar ba// snying khar yongs su bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid// yi ge dam pa yi gnas// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// chos kyi sku mchog tu mo//
'dinibasgrubs pa tsam gyis ni kun tu gatsug tor Mbastobs po che// skad cig de la 'grub 'gyur to// jo rjesangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin no// sngags ni/ o badzrab n d+ha/ gsang
sngags 'di ni dam pa gso/ sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur byed// rtag tu rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na/ de ni kun gyis dbang bskur mo jo tsho snying po rgyan ces bya ba'irgyud chen po las
de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad gtsug tor gyi chog rgyas pa'im par phyob yongasasu rdzogasaso//de nas bcom ldan M 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang dus
bar gyur to/ bcom ldan 'dwa ro rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa rgyas pa
bka' stsal du gsol/ donas bcom ldan 'adas rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid
gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpar shAms cad kyi gsang sdogs kyi rim par bya ba bka' stsal pa/ shes rab ye shes rdo tsha che// snying khar yongs su bsgoms nas su//
ral gri 'bar ba gzi brjid che// mtha' klas pa la rnam par gnas// 'jam dbyangs zhes bya bsgom par bya// gur kum gyi rnam pa 'dra// gtsuganazur pud ldan pa// gzhon nu
byis pa'i gzugs can ni// mtha' yas rgyas pa/bas che ba// rnam par 'phra ba lta bur gnas// ut+pal sngon po phyag na bsnams// dpachen dang ni mi las 'khrungs// ye shes
chen pogazi brjid che// 'khrul pa mang cing yi ga bral// sangs rgyas kun bdag shes rab ma chog/ nyon mongs thams cad zad par byed// rdo rje kun dag bkod pa po// kun tu 'gro ba'i
dam pa'i don// dbu med mchog tugasang ba po/ rig pa mchog gi bdag nyid 'di// zhal drug pa la phyag drug mchog/ mngon shes drug ldan yag drug/ rjes dran jug gi sbyor ba yis/
phyag rgya dam pastobs po che// gzi brjid yang na skyobs kyis kyang// kun nas yongs su gsal ba go/ gzugs che lus kyang tsho ba ste// nam mkha'i khams na rnam par gnas// yang na
phyag gnyis shes par bya// ting nga'adzina gnas sngog pa bas// dpa' bo pal gnas pa// zla ba'i mdogacan 'od po cha// rnal 'byor pa ya ya shis sha shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'ab
gdod nas skyes pa zhes bsam/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yo shes mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags/ de'i sngags ni/ o bA
kyin m/ gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tshugasapa/ gsang chen gyi no dam par bzhad// nam thar gsum gyi sgo mar gnas// pha rol phyin drug rab tu gsal/ khanyid shes rab yin
no zhes// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dbang po drugani rab bsgyur te/ sangs rgyas nyid ni rnal 'byoralas/ pad+marA ga lta bu'i mdog/ ston cha lta bur cher gsal ba// sems
dpa' chen po gser gyi mdog stobs po che bsgom par bya// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur// bstan bcos thams cad rab sna zhing/ dbang
phyug thams cad mdunan gnas// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang// byang chub kun gyi pha rol son// dbang phyug kun dang bdab che// chos rnams kun gyi yon tan mag/ dodza dzani
pa thams cad dang// yang nasas rgyas thams cud kyi// kun tu 'gro ba thob 'grub// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dngul chu bcud len pa dang// rkang

rnams kyi tshangs pa'i dbyangs// 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyisani// bsams pa'i phun sum tshogs kun gyis// sangs rgyas kun tu brtan
'gron// gzhan par lha lta smos ci dgos// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyisgrub pa'i thabs so// snying khar partsa chen po la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gnas// 'jig rten
! dbang phyug dpa' bo cha// thugs rje chen po'i thugs ldan pa/ phyag bzhi pol zhal bzhi pa// dung dang kun da zla ltar dkar//chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung// chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po
la bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug skyes// de la gnas pa dag bsgom// rang bzhin gyis 'di kun dag/ gdod nas ma skyes ma byung ba// gsang sngags chen po 'di yis ni/ snying
khar yongs su bsgom par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor lam// kun tu rnam par 'gro ba yis// 'bar ba'i 'phrang bas 'khrigs shing zhi// ral pa'i thor tshugs 'dzin pa po// mal pa'i
dbus su dpa' bo tsha// 'od dpag med paldan pa'i bdag/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bur gsal// kun tu nam mkha' tshos gang ba// gsang sngags sbyor bdag bsgom par bya// rang nyid 'jig/
rten gsum rnam rgyal/ chos kyi dbyings kyis mtha' klas pa// khad+ma'i lus kyis yang dag gang// kun tu pad+ma rnams la ni// khams gsum m par rgyalakha'i sku// khyad par du dag/
dgang bar bya/ 'gro brtan dang g.yo ba kun/ snang dmi snang dngos bo ni// yang dang yang du blta bar bya// gdul bya ma lus sems la ni// stobs bos ni dgang bar[S ]/rtsa don/
dbyibs na 'di bzhin du// sna tshogs gzugs la char 'barab// kun nas yongs su bsdus nas ni// sngags pa'i bdun du gzhag par bya// de nas sngags pas de ma thag/ slar yang
rtse gcig sems kyis ni// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang// dpang du bya ba bsgrub par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyag zub go bcom ldan rnal 'byor can 'gruban// dpa' bo tham
cad stsol 'gyur zhing// rang gi dngos grub mchog rnams dang// rnal 'byor thams cado'adzan nyid dang// rnam par rgyas pa'i nor star 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin dang 'khor lo can/ sa dang pha
la phyin sogs dang// sangs rgyas rnams kyang stsol 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de'i sngags ni/o A mol ko gsang sngags dpal ldan mchoga'adimI/ rang nyid

dbang phyug sgrub// 'jigarten gsum gyis rgyal rnams ni// srid pa bkug nas rnam par snyam/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabasoso// thamasacad rdo rje'i rang
bzhinakozugs// ma yi dkyil 'khor dag ba ste// de yi dbus su bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor rlungadang rab mtshungs pa// de yi dus su da'adrab sam// zhim yini dkyil 'khor lo/ de yi
dbus su gzi brjid che// 'bar bu lta bu'i gzi brjid can// rdo rje'i lag pa gzi brjid che// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// tshangs pa'i yulas thams cad du// kun nas
yongs su gsalabar byed// hU~Mg yi ga sgra zab mo// dbyar gyi sprind nga mtshungs pa'i 'od// rgyal po 'khyil ba dang mtshungs pa// bla ma yi ma tog 'dra// 'bad pa dmar pos 'khrig/
tshagashapa'i jigs// bskal pa'i ma dang 'dra bar gnas// zhal bzhi pa las ma bu bzhi// 'jigs pa'i dus kyis thal ba 'dra// hU~M gi yi ga bzhi dang ldan// sprin 'khrugs pa dang rab
tu 'dra// jorje hU~M mdzad ces bya ba// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom// sngags kyi tshigs ni/ oM sum+b+ha nisum+b+hAhU~M/ grits+tsegrib+hAhU~M/ grosgyul ma gro la ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga wAn/ti
rAdzA hUM phaT/ rdo rje'adzin pa'i rgyal po 'di// kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'jig rtenagasum yang 'gugs byed na/ bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang
rmanasogs// chung ma dang bas phyag rgyar bas/ de dag thamasas cad 'gugs byed na// sdug bsngal can gzhan smos ci dgos// tima'i dkyil 'khoradabus gnas pa// rdo rje'i
gzugs brnyanasnyipakhar son// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyorakhas/ nanagyi sngon du sgrub// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed/ khacom ldan don 'grub 'gyur// rgyal po
thams cad phyin 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sngags ni 'dir/ Tik+ki hUMdza0/ gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ longs spyod
ji skad thams cad rnams// deser thams cad rnam par snyam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa sgrub pa/ da bang chen rakyi 'khor la gnas pa/ byams pa chen po'i bdag nyid sku// sang
khar bzla zhing gzugs brnyan 'od// rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba ldan// 'jig na khams ni 'byam klas pa// rang bzhin gcig tu byas nas ni// jo rdza is ni spro ba dang// dbang bskur ba yi
rang bzhin dgo gser gyi kha dog legs 'bab// pa'i thor tshugs 'dzin pa po// jal pa'i dbus su mchod rten che// khudang kun r zla 'od bzang// bsgoms nasasems tsan thams

dbadag gi kham/ shAn tu dri med pa'i gnas// rab lta bur brtan pa risams// 'khrul pa ma cing yig bral/ ded ltar sems ni brtan byas nas// mnyam med sems can kun
dang mnyam// bdag nyid byams pa yin nozhes// dga' ldan gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// cung zad l zhing 'khyil ba'i sku// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs ba'i 'od// rin chen sams ni ma dag
pas bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom par bya// 'di gsang sngags rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni/ oM a dzi ta ya sarmas kyus ma yA nu ga ta swAhA/ gsang sngags bdag nyid rgyal po 'di//

rin chen 'byung bsams chen po// 'gro bsnang bar byed de gnas// pad+ma mkha' 'dra'i rnam pa can// phyag rgya de yi snying la gnas// rin chen sbyo bas bsgom
bar bya// chen char pa 'bab por 'gyur// sngags ni// oM ratAka la dwayat+tan da dasu// rinu0f00'byung gnas rgyal po 'di// mchog rnams kyis yi phyug/ sbyor ba kun gyis bsgrub
par bya// rgyu cha'i nor rnams stsol bar 'gyur// ni na 'byung pa'i sgrub pa'ithabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo snyingapo rgyan gyi rgyud las/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/// de nas bcomaM ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad s pa 'dus tagags nas/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang mamadapa ma
pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khro bobcom ldan 'das skyod du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'khor losgyu achen pos de skad ces
gsol ba btam thag khon rdo rje khro bdekyil 'khor gsang sams chos gsang ba bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad byas// khro bo yin dkyil 'khor mchog/ rlung khamasaM rab tu gsal ba la//
chen dabus nas dbus su'o// de yi dbus su rdo rje che// 'od zer lnga yi 'phralas mdzes// de yi mdunadu bya ba yang// bdud rtsi 'bar mche po yi// de yi g.yas gdan la ni// rdo chen po/
'ba'aphrang can// g.yon nyid du ni tho ron na// rig pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par spras// rgyabatul gri'i phyag rgya/ rin chen 'bar bas rnam par brgyan/ phyi ngos rnams su nam khros pa'i//
khro bo thams cad dagodapa bya// de yi sngags kyi yig gsang// gsang chen mchog tu 'bar ba lo// gzhal du mdacing grangs med mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// yi ge
gcig pa gsang rgyun po// rgyu yi don du rtogs par byed// dbyangs lnga dngan yang dag ldan// zigali sgra yis rnam par brgyan// nyid gsang pa'i mgonapomi/ dbyas bdun pa ni bshad
pa yis/ harAka dpal do ma// 'jigs pa'i bskal pa can makhas// sams dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i bdag/ 'bar ba ma yi dkyil 'khor bzhin// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus mtshan
gyis// char sprin dang ni'adrab li'od// pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// 'bar pa kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dur khrod mkhazhin shin tu yang// gsal ba'i sgra ldan stobs po che// noba'i dzIwid+har
'bar ba// thod pa'i cod pan stong du 'bar// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus mtshan gyis// rgod ma kha yi mo ltar gnas// smin 'khyog rnam par 'khrug pa can/ g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis
bzhugs// khro bo la sogs nyams dang ldan// rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrugs pa'i gdong// gar dang sdud par yang dag ldan/ 'jig rten snang ba'i gara mdzad pa// phyag ni brgya phrag stong dang ldan/
gcig tu cing rnam pa mang// nama bzhi l ldand dag gi sngos lasogs tha dad lda// zhabs kyang rnam pa du ma ldan/ sna tshogs mdog ldan rnam par 'khrug/
de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po cha// shin tu gdug cing drag rnams la// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba zhes byar gnas// phyag drug zhabs drug snang ba can/ zhal drug pa sta
lca gsus po che// na sprin mdog 'drar gnag pa// dus mtha'i ma dang 'dra bar gnas// mdog chen rgyal po'akhyil ba'ad// zaram yi me tog mtshungs// khro bozod pali'aphrang ba
'chang// gshin rje mthar mdzad stobs pom// de la sngags kyang/ o A/hA saT/ o ya mam banahU~M phaT/ o gling kr-i tanan hUM sarba sha tan nA sha ya stam+b+ha ya hUM phaT/ sngags
kyi rgyal po'i bdaganyid 'di// khyab bdag gdul dka' las thabs 'dul ba po// gshin mthar mdzad khro bo che// sas rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gtso/ sangs rgyas thams cad spyama'adren
tshu cing dbang duyang mdzad par gnas// rtag tugadul dka' 'dul mdzad cing/ rdzongosnang mdzad legs par 'dul// shin tu gdug pa zaga rnams la// zhi pa'i nya bar tshisbyar to//
shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis// de bzhin ga shags rnams khro bor mdzad// thugs rjes khro bo'i ngang tshul can// 'jig rten gsum yang nges srog mdzad// de bas 'bad pa thams cad
[z]kyisaN+Da shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sku// thugs rjes khro bos ma lus mchog/ gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa bskyed// ga shin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so//[..]
nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor to// khro bo gzegs ma zhes su grags// rin chen 'bar ba'i khro bo che// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus dang 'apra/ ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma bzhin// de yi kha dog/
rnam par gsal// drag po chen po'i zhal bzhi pa// 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// spyan gsum pa la khro gnyer snyam/ phyag drug pa la mchog tu 'bar// me yi khams dang
'dra ba'i mdog/ li khri'i mdog ltar shani tudamar// de yis khro gnyer bsor ba yis// gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'byin par byon// khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis pa ni// yang dang yang du bsam
par bya// ma lus sa rnams thams cad du// son pa'i bdag nyid chen po des// 'gugs pa dang nidabang byed na// skyo bo gzhan wusmos ci dgos// sngags ni/ o ka Nika Ni hU~MphaT/
khro bo 'di yi sngags 'dzin pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog stobs po che// sa rnams thams cad srogabyed// skyo bo gzhan lta smos ca dgos// khro bo gzigs ma sgrub pa'i shAbs so//
kade nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhinagshegs// pad+magar gyi dbang phyug gyur// rtamagrinazhes su bshad pa yin// rtag tu'achor ka'imadog 'dra ba//
mya skyogs mdog ltar dmar ba'o chudang gzi brjid can sog pa/ ma yi dkyil 'khor dgag dang ldan// 'dod ldan rnams 'dod pa 'byung// gdug pacan rnams gag
pa'i byung// zhi bal yang zhiba'abyung// stobs ldan rnams l stobs kyis sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa// bsam gtanabazhidang mnyam par ldan// phyag bzhi pa la brtson
'grus[ ]/sang ga ltar gnas mchob bzhi// rtamagrinargyal po chen posi/ ngom pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub par bya// skad cig nyid la gnasazhas mi/ thams cad lhung ba bsgrub par bya//
sngags ni// oM a mr-i tod+d+habod b+ha be hU~M phaT/ oM a ma khyodatsA bshI ya1/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyorib yis// g.yon brkyang ba ni rab tusbyar// khro bo skyil krung byas nas ni/ 'jig/
rten thams cad btums/ pad+ma'i dbang phyugargyal po 'di// sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog yi mgrin pa stobs po che// stobs kyi sbyorab bsgrub par bya// dbang phyug chen po la
sogs lha/ tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang// mi dang gdug pa'i bsam pa can// sa rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rta mgrin gyi sgrub pa'i thabs Mso// senganyid
bcom ldan rnal 'byor de// gcig puting ni lhag pa'i lha// shes rab thabs kyi bdaganyid gyur// khro bo mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// kun sbyor bdog gi rnal 'byor gyis// thugs rjes khro ba'i
dbang du song// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sna yi rtse mor yid kyis ni// g.yo ba med par bsam bar bya// slob dpon mi g.yo khro/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brnyan/ ral gri zhags pa 'dzin pa
gsang// thog ma tham med pa'i mchog/ pri yang kunu sngo ba'i gzugs// 'khrigs shing byis paltakhur gnas// malus pa yasa rnams kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/

kho ngo mngag pa bran dang ni/ pho nyas kyang ni rnam par brgyan// skye ba kun gyis yongs su gang// sas rgyas kun gyi spyan snga na// bkalalung yang ni yongs su stsol// sngags ni/ nams man+ta badz+dzA
tshatsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Naso Ta ya haM/ trakahA maM/ khro bo gzi brjid chen po 'di// gzugs mngamanga' bstobs po che// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// dbang du yang ni mdzad pa gnas// rlung dang/
ma las mang dag byung// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// sngags dang phyag sogs kun mchog/ lus dang ngag yid de bzhin no// ngagug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang// dpa dang bya bsgrub
par byed// de lasogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas mchog/ khro bo'i phyag rgya rang byung ba// drug po thogam thama med/ rnam par 'phro ba bzhin du gnas//
de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi ngo rdzasnying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di yong su rdzogs so/// donas bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang
'dus tagshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi gzungs thamasacad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa//
bcom ldan 'das gzungs rnams thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi dkyi 'khor bka'astsalal/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//
u0fc4 gzungs rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khoradakaM/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs kyisanabar mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bshad// de yi dbus su pad
chen po// lam kun gyis shin tu mdzes// nyi shu rtsa lta dbam ldan/ jo na chen legs par brgyan// de yi dbus su rtag khrib// dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin// de yi la 'khor thams cad
! du sna tshogs las 'bar rnams m/ tishu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis// zhes 'ab pha rol phyin magri/ shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te// thog mtha'anyid kyang brtag par bya/ phyag rgya'i yig rigs
par go rims bzhin du rnam par dgod// phyogs cha'idabye ba tha dad kyis// kha dog bya bathamasacad du// nam dubu mchogatusnyatshogs pa// chos nyid mnyamadangami mnyam pa/ dolas 'od zer bsam
mi khyab// sngo sar la sogs dbye ba yis// shes rab snang ba'i dkyil5khor gyis// 'gro ba thams cad gsal bar bya// 'dus par gyur nas de dag kun// lha nyid kyi migazugs ji bzhin// shes rab
[s]]na po gzugs chen po// 'bar bcas mdzes pa'i gzi brjidacan// deyi lta ba'i dkyil du ni/ sngags kyi rakyila 'khor kun nas rten/ sku nagasar gyi mdog dang 'dra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par
brgyan// rangagi ting nga'adzin la zhugs// du ma'i gzugs kyigazus ldan pa// shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni// sems can khams ni rnam sbyong mar// kun nasasomasacan rnams kyi yum// sems
can kun gyi thams cad du// thams cad lus l mnyam par khyab// sems kyi rgyunabazhin legs par bzhugs// zag pa macing bsam mi khyab// dri med cing ngang gis stong// nam mkha' dang
ni mtshungs 'drab// dngos dang dngos mang nam par spangs// thog ma tham macing zhi// chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// bden pa gnyis la rnam par gnas//
kun rdzob dang nidam pa'i don chos kyisku ru de bshad do// dbang po kun kyang nam pa shes/ sems dang thams cad thoms cad du/ yid kyi rnam shesazhes su bshad// shes rab blo dang blo gros dran/
lhag mthong dang yo shes kun// kun sanyon mongs mi mthun phyogs// rtag dang chad pa'i mtha' dang ldan/ mthar gnyis po ni mar spangs// kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don/ rnam pa gnyis su/
rab brtags// ji ltakhud shing l brtan nas// mi yis bonogs pa dang// til til mar ji bzhinamo/ yushang robazhirarab rtabartag/ ma tog dri ni ji bzhinanam// zhol mar gsar ji bzhin du//
rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes srub// bdud rtsi lta bu'isnying po 'byung// gtsub shing rang nyigatsub stan las// ji bzhin gtsubs pasam 'byung ste// de bzhin yo shes rnal 'byor
[>pas bsrubs pas yongs su brtag par bya// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad l// yang nas yang du bsub par bya// mun pa thams cad rnam la bsi// nyi ma'i 'od zer dzibazhin bdag/
nam mkha'i dros med rten nas// khyim zla ba ji bzhin gnas// 'char li gsal byed pa// 'bar ba stong phragag ni snod// mun ba kun 'joms/mal/ kun sakyang mdzes pa yin/
rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar sems// mkha' pazhin shin tudrim mad// gzung 'dzin las ni nges par grol/ mnyam dung mi mnyam dngos po kun// der gnas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis/ ye
nas nyizla mtshungs pa'i 'od// shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms te// gsang sngags 'di nibasam pa pya// rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i dngos// rang bzhinamadapara rnam par gnas/ rang bzhin
gyis 'od gsal kun// 'dod nusam skyos rnyog pa med// yig de nyid de lta bu// gnas dang mi gnas rnam par spangs// sdetshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la// zigalisgra yis rnam par brgyan//
ngonyid bcom ldan mgon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin marab shad// o tsAsAhA/ oswAhA/ ogatits+tshati bi dza ya swAhA/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab 'dis// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs
[pe/]par byed// 'dini sangs rgyas kun gyi yum// ded 'khor los rnam par sgyur// 'dis nidangos grub thams cad dang/ grul nyid nibyed par gnas// bstan bcom rab skul byed dang//
shes bya thams cad khyad par du// thams cad mkhyenapa'i chos rnams kum/ dbaphyagaram pas shes pa 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so//
nas 'gal rtsol phyin gnyis pa// rdzu 'phrula chen pomakha' dang mnyam// gser gyi mdog can dpar bska/ zlakha'i gdan legs par bzhugs// brtsonaM'agrus po bsam gtan bya//
sngags kyi yi ge rnam par brgyan// mchog tu rnal 'byor ma nams kyis/ sangs rgyas spyan zhes btags pa yis// de yi gsang sngags 'ba bshadapya// nyon cig gas rnams 'dod pa rnams// sngags
ni/ oM ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tisid+d+hatsazhes rba anAsA d+ha ni swAhA/ 'di ro mchog tugasang ba ni rnala'abyor malamachod du bshad// dmachen yi ge'i mthar thug pa// bsgoms pas dge ba rab tu
ster chos kyi phyag rgya'adi shin tu// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// dpung dang bcas pa myur bkug ste// bran du gyur nas bar gnas// phyag rgyagacig pa'ilcamocha/ rol cing g.yo ba'i
zhal mnga' ba// sgog pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// rol snang ba'i gar mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur// mig gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyar/ mig gi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// 'jig/
rten gsum yang garabyed do// sangs rgyas skrun gyi phyag rgyarisgrub pa'i thabs so////chu yi dkyil 'khor dgos pa na// bcud kyis len dang mtshungs pa'i mchog
mthas yas rgyas shing mdas pa yi/ drim med pa'i mkhar la gnas// dkyil 'khor yi dbus suni/ lhamo mchog tu mdzes pa mo// 'dam bu mda' rgya'i mdog ltar dkar/ grubam ral pa'i
cod pan 'chang// 'gro bamatha' dag snang mdzad m/ rtag tu nam mkha' bzhin du gnas// sngags ni/ o a ka Ti ba ka tre ka TaM ka sngosAhA/ gos dkar mo yi phyag rgya cho// dung dang kund zla
ba 'dra// sngags kyi yi ga'aphradab cha// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas// 'gro bamatha' dag snanga mdzad na// sgrub pa pos nibasgrub par bya// dam pa'i lha mo 'grub par gyur// pad+ma'i dkyil
'khor sgrub pa'ithabs// zhi ba'i yi ge mnyam par ldan// zhib mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi// sa gsum sgrub par byed pa'i thabs// gos dkaramo'isgrub pathabs so////sngo bsangs
dkaramo sna tshogs gzugs// nam pasnatshogs rgyanagyis brgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// zlog pa'i nyams kyis yongasang ba// 'gro ba mtha' dag skyob mdzad ma// thugs rje'i
thugs dpaldan pa can// rab tu 'bad bsgrub par bya// rol pa yiniyi gas mchod/ sngags ni/ oM tA ra t+tar tureswAhA/ chos kyi phyag rgyamatha' yas mchog sgrol masalegs par nam
0bar gnas// gsang chen bzhin du thams cad la// bcud kyis len dba'adra ba'i mchog/ kun kun tu thams cad du// dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzod// sgrol mamisgrub pa'i thabs so//
dkyil 'khor rgyunabo'idabus su mi/ rnal 'byor dbang phyuganamo mchog/ phyag bzhismanani gsum pa dang// pa'icodab dgagis brgyan// 'das du mda' rgyu'i
mdogaltar dakas/ dba'ab la sogasanyams kyis brgyan/ brtson 'grus chen mo 'jigs salas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khoradabus gnas par// rab tu 'bar ba'i ma bzhin du// shin tu
gsal ba'i gzi brjid can// hU~M gi yi ga zab mo sgra/ sa gsum po mi 'khrugs par mdzad// khro gnyer can zhes legs par grags// sngags kyi 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan/ sngags ni/
u0f00lha a nA sha ni/ tAsani sa/ sa ya/ b+hi ku Ta ta le [z]le raTi shA shIta dzi na/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzasAhA/ gsang sngags 'dini brtson 'grus che// gsang sngags kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/
'grol kun kyang mgu phying na/ gdug pa'i sems lta smos ci dgos// khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so//ti'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
rdo rje ldan// jo rdzale'i phrang bas yongs su bskor// gzi brjid dkyila 'khor kun nas dkrisaM// der gnas rtag tu lha moni// stobs chen pri yang ku ltar ljang// phyag bzhi pa der bsam par bya//
can ms kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ mal 'byor ma rnams cher zhi ba// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ma/ sngags kyi yi go 'phrang pa che// rdo rje'i dbusasong rab tu
po gnas// khro bo hUM mdzad gang ba'i mthar// dpa' ba'inyamasal sogs par ldan// lha mo 'jig rten gsum rmongs byed// dngos grub chen po rab stsol ma// skad cig tsam gyis 'gro ba kum/

nges par dbang du byed par 'gyur// rdo'i ngagi 'phrang ba che// rdo rje'i 'khor la rab tu gnas// 'jigs pa chen po'i ma ltar drag/ snang ba chen po stobs po cha/ pad+marAga'i rnam pa 'dra/ jo tsho 'bar
bas rnam par brgyan/ mtshan zhimA ma kI zhes bya// lha mo 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod// sngags ni/ oM ku la d+hA ya nAmashi kare/ shA ka'i/ g+hag+haT+Thag+hanib+hUta ya g+haT+Thi niswAhA/
saM ku lanani/ ban ban+d+hahUMphaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni don gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// sa gsum po ni gugs byed cing// tshes pa la sogs lha rnams kun// 'gro ba
thams cade'agugs pyadal// rang gi dbang du gnas pa rang yin// mA ma kA'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// rlung gi dkyil 'khor drag pol// jo rdzolu gu rgyud kyis bskor/ de yi dbus su snang
ba che// zla ba'i gzugs kyis rnam par brgyan// de spros pa las bdag nyid ni/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku// phyag bzhi la lha mo do// rdo rje yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan// dmar po 'bar ba de yis ni// sa
gsum po ni'aching bar mdzad// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyag chu// bkug nas dbud du mdzad par gnas// dngos grub thams cad 'dzin pa dang// de yi thugs kar rdo dzache// 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba 'khrigs
pa'i 'od// de tshe 'bar ba lcags sgrog gi/ nam pa rdo rje sanamasamtshan// nges par phyung nas de dag kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// 'jig rten khams na mtha' dag tu//
kun nas rnam par ba gang nas kyang// bsgom bya rdo rjethams cad du// khro bo dang ldan slob lo// lte ba 'phyang zhing sku tshab// ma ba bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// 'bar ba yisi'aphrad pa gsal// gzugs
mdzes drag po'i gzugs dang lnga// sngags ni/ o badzra kr-i khal A d+hi pa ta ya/ ma hA ba ya mahAb du rA dzA ya ta pra dzA lita/ thas yananIl kaN ki'i tarU pa lam bo da ra a/ b+hA b+hi ku mu khA ya
mAdzA la mu khA ya/ tur daMwA ka rA ya/ a byadzi a slar sha ra/ ma nu pa wishu ro grosgyu/ gri bA// sku pa daM gra gi/ A ba sha la/ ka pa ya kaM pa ya/ b+hamalham ya/ mes many+nyo/ gi

kurtsa pa kucha/ tsuts+tshan+tu/ ku kaSh+Tha/ spo Ta ya sU tra a/ mamaNi/ ni kr-inAya/ phud la/ ts+tshin+da/ b.lalal/ kiny+tsir as/ de ba/ nAg/ akA/ rakas/ping+genatsatsan ya/ sa ma ya ma nusma ra/ dzA tim

nu sma ra hA// nib+hini d+hi/ khe na Ta/ badzra kaM ka lA/ Adz+dzA pa ya ti swAhA/ oM badzra ra Ni hU~M phaT/ o badzra NihUM phaT/ oM badzra kAu0f8bhUM phaT swAhA/gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// bcud kyis len
ni bar ba dang// 'gro ba thams cad 'babs pa dang// gdug pa rnams mi 'ching ba dang// tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams dang// lha dang lha min lto 'phye che// 'jig rten skyong dang
klu rnams kyang// rang gi gnas nas bskyong nas ni// grub pa kun gyi dngos grub ni// dngos grub 'gugs par 'dod pa yi// thams cad gus pas sbyin par byed// bu med gzugs kyis sgrub par byed//
ngo rdzolu gu rgyung mar sgrub pa'i thabs so/ ka zlapa'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'o// pad+mamar pos rab tu ba gnas / phyag bzhi pa la duma'i gzugs// dung dang kund zla ba 'dra//
thugs kyi rdo rje'i de nyid yin// rdo rjod kyil 'khor dbus su ni// zhi ba lasogs nyams dang ldan// chos rnams kun gyis bdag skyes mchog/ rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu sgom// sas rgyas
mazags yang dag lta byung// der bdag yang dag sgom pa ni skul byed ma zhes yongs su grags// sngags kyi 'phreng ba'i mi gni// kun sa'aphro pa mu tig 'dra// nam mkha'i khamasani yos
gang ba ji sring de yi spyod tshul yang// de srid de yi 'od zer sgom// rnal 'byor 5dngashes kyis rab sprul/ sngags ni/ o rtsa'atshu litsuswAhA/ 'diyi sngags kyi mchog gtso bo sangs rgyas
kun gyi mchong pa po// mtshungs pa med pa'i dngos grub star/ lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod// 'di yis sdig kun 'phrod byed cing// phumasum tshogs kun rab stsol mdzad// pad+ma'i phyag rgya
yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas nyid kyang sbyin par mdzad/ skul byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs
rgyas kun badagaragyas pa ni// rdordzasams dpa 'bad ba mchog/ 'di ni ma byang bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pasilha// sas rgyas kun dang mnyamasbyor ba// mkha' 'grom i dra ba/
sdom 'dod chags med cing chags bral med// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgyu// 'di nigs mang theg pa'i mchog/ sgrum dag ni thams cad las// bdamodasgyu
ma khyad par 'phags// rang bzhin nyid kyis de grub pa// nus pa yis ni rang bzhin gyis// 'jig rten gsum gyi bud med 'dir// bkur bar bya ba 'osam yin// ngan spyod rnams kyis kyang
'grub ste// red pa kun dang bde dang spro// thams cad bud med sgyu mas 'grub// rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur ba// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya'adi// shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// kun la sna
tshogs phyag rgya ni// kun lasnatshogs sdom pa yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor// stong pa nyid kyi de nyid bskul// rtsol kun nas thamasacad du// kun tu kun nas rang nyid kyis// sas
rgyas thamasacad brtan dang g.yo// thams cad dngos po rang nyid 'gyur// sams dang sems can ting 'dzin dang// byang chub spyod pa sna tshog sanyid// sa dang phalol phyin spyod pa// dbang nyid du
yang de bshad po/ bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// thog ma tha ma mang zhi ba// byang chub sangs rgyas bcom ldan ri'o/ rdordo'adzin
pa nyid// pad+ma de bzhin pa'i dzin/ nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa de/ snatshogs de bzhinasnatshog sa'adzi/ ral gri ral gri 'dzin rgyal po/ 'khol bzhin 'khor lo 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum/
rgyalanyid dang ni// 'di rnams kyi yang rigs nyid 'gyur// panyid chags dang gas bral ba// mdzod dang thar pa ru yang 'gyur// dus gsum dang ni srid gsum mchog/ 'jig rtenagasum dang
khams gsum pa// brtan pa thams cad de nyid do// rnam pa sna tshog sanyid du 'gyur// g.yo la kun nas sna tshogs po// thams cad duning 'gyur ro// palasogs pa sna tshogs mchog/
chos dbyings mam dmi mapa/ nam mkha'i khams kyimatha' klas pa// dngos po kun tu de 'gyur ro// de'anyidabacon ldan nal 'byor te/ gcig pu nyidani lhag pa'i lha// nam mkha'
kun gyi skabs nad pa la/ ro soms dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpa2ldan mchanabo 'chang/ rnamasnang rtag pa thams cad du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtsowinakhyab// sasargyas 'khor
lo ma mi bskyod// che dang rin chen 'byung stobs che// tshe dpag med pa kun nus tshogi/ donayod sna tshogs mdzad pa dang/ rdzordzasams dpa' blta na sdug/ ngashug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang/ legs

par mdzad pa danyid yin// rin chen sgrol ma de bzhin tog/ rdoN+Di bzhi d pa snang ba che// rje chos dang no ba che// rgyu dang sma mchog bdud rtsi dang// las dang go chaganod sbyin cha// khu tshur de bzhin gshegs/

pa kun// ngonyid bcom ldan rnala'abyor te// jorjesems dpa' stobs po che// rdzoraMAmadzayumadzod dang// rtamagrin zhes ni rnal par grags// he ru ka dpal rdorjecho// mchog gi gshin rje gshin rdzagashad/
khrobo gzegs ma snang ba che// rdoN+Dami 'od chen po// gzugs rnams kyi mchog gcig tu// ting nge 'dzin las dbang skya ma// shes rab ba'ol phyin mchog gtso// sa dang ba 'ol phyin pa stobs//
tshongs pa'i gnas chen po bzhi// dbangani mchog tu 'bar ba dang// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang// rjes dran drug por gyur pa gang// bsgom par bya ba rab tu
gnas// donyid bcom ldan gacig pu ste// byang chub yan lag bdun brtags pa// mtha gcig yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// sumacu rtsa gnyis mchog mtshan// 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam
bo cha 'phagasalam yan lag brgyudabartags pa// stobs bcu yin bcu pa nyid// sangs rgyas chos kyis bdagongs// byang chub phyogs kyi chos chen po// rnam par dbye bsum nubadun//
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jugani// dgul gnas par 'gyur ba dang// bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhi// sems can bsdu bas sdud pa dang// soso yang dag rig pa bzhi/ de bzhin srung bami
mnga' ba/ skal ba chen po'i mi 'jigs pa// mchog tu gyur pa nyid dang ni// bsam gtan gzugs mdabazhi phrag gnyis// tshad med pa ang de bzhin mo byang chub kyi ni
! su mchog gtso/ bden pa bzhi ston pa po// nyon mongs can gyi mi mthun phyogs// zag bcas zag pa med pa'i mchog/ nga nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// dbang phyug mchog gi rab ng phyug dang/
sku dgu'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgom mchog gi bdag nyid dpyangs bdag po// kun rdzogs brjod bzams cad dang// sgra rnams kyi ni spyod yul 'gyur// brjod du mang cing spros pa bral/ stong
ngamakha' mnyam mtshungs pamang tshig mtha' sgra yaM nam dgod pa// 'jig rtenatha snyadatshulangu gtogs// de tsho lus sogs dbye pa yis// sa rnams kyi ni yongs su brtags// sku nisprul pa
rgyu nga ngu 'gyur longs spyod rdzogs pa yang dag b.res ro rdza'i sku dang de bzhin du// shes sku sogs yongs su brtags// mtha' yas sku pang sa chen po// rin chen s ni 'od byed pa// pad+ma'iska ni
snangang mas cad sku las bzang byed/ rtogs par bya ngo sa kyi sku// rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ byang chub sems ni'od gsal ba// kun 'od kyi
sa chen po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan// gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya// zla ba'i 'od 'od gsal ba// gsum pa nas mkhala'od ces 'u/ mkhal bzhinalags lar rab tu gnas//
rdo rje'i 'od ma lagang zhig sa// bzhi pa de ni yid 'ong ba// bsam pa brtan pa'i sbyor ba yis// jo zhes ni yongs su bsgrags// lnga pa rin chen 'od ces bya/ dbang bskur pa ni rab tu gnas// drug pa

pad+mo 'chang zhes bya// pad bzhin rab tunam par snang// rang bzhin gyis ni chos nyid dag/ bdag gi mad cing yongs bzung mad// bdun pa las kyis zhes bya// sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad pa che// brgyad pa
pa mad pa zhes bya// dpa ni del yod ma yin// dgu pa dpa dang bral zhes bya// dpo rnams thams cad rab rag pa// bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya// sangs rgyas sa nas+san mod// bsrugs kun
mkhyamanyid ces bya// sa chen po ni 'od gsal ba// bcu gnyis so sor bdag rig pa// rnal 'byor a shes yongs rdzogs nyid// sa chen po mi 'di dag rnams// sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du//
sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos// rnal 'byor ya shis gang brjod pa// thams car nyid ni mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de bzhin gshegs pa klams cad kyi rdo rjesnying
po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las// sngags kyi de kho ni de do////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mas cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi 'khor la
chen po bskor ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyugachen po la gsol ba btab pa/ rinas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig ga de ma thag nyid du//
bya@#// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i rim thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi thugs rdo rje la rjes su bcug nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas mnyam par bzhugs so//

pa de nas bcom ldan 'das rdorjornal 'byor kyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi skur bdag nyid rtogs nas ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ 'jam dang la gzhon nu gyur pa la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal dpazhin gshagos pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'idakyila 'khor chen po yod do zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par
gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi blabs kyis stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sman
sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lta ngas btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ shes rab kyis la tu phyin pa dang thabs kyi theg pachon po/
mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas/ sems can rnams Thabs chung dus re bzhin gshegs pa thamA cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyurapa bka' stsal du
gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjornala'abyor gyi dbang phyug chen pos// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'dzam pal khyodag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
tshigal rjes su zhugs pa ni 'jam dpal khyod legs so legs so de legs pa ra rab tul yid la zung zhig dang/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'ing kyi 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o//

de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lasnyoms par zhugs nas/ ngam tshig chen po rdo rjes/
byin gyis rlob pa thigapachan po mngon par rtogs po zhes l ba'i dkyil 'kho 'di bka' stsal pa/ ri nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad byas/ dam tshig chen po rdo rdzo mchog/
snyingapo chen po'i rgyan ces bya// grubazhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig bzhi dang ni mnyam par ldan// 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa 'od/ rdo rjesnying po yos bcug pa/
byang chub shing gis bar mdzas// jo rdzogs dkyil 'khor grwa rnams dang// sgo yi logs kyi mtshams rnams su// do na nams kyis spras// rdo rje pa thams cad du// las kyi rdo rje zams cad du//
'bar ba'i 'phrang ba'akhrigs pa'i 'od// dril bcasasnatshogs mchog dang ldan// rgyal mtshan bsgreng brlung bskyod pa'i// gos dang lo tog chun pos spras// zla ba phyed pas bar mdzes// ral grilha
bu'i ut+pal/ lcags kyul sogs sna tshogs rgyan/ chuyis dkyil 'khor yongs bskor ba/ mu khyud bzhin du nam par gnas// de la'angasgo logs lasogs pa//
[>mkhas pa yisani spro bar bya// de yi nang dubri bya ba/ 'khor latshon po rab tu gnas/ cha brgyad dang yongs suldan// dkyila'akhom legs pa rnam par spras// rdoN+Darithig dang yongs su ldan//

rdzo'i 'khor lo char 'bar ba// de yi dbususnying po che// rdo rje'i snying po zhes su bshar/ de la stong du rdo rje ma// rdo rje pad+ma rab tu gnas// pad+ma'i stang du rdo chu// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag
gis brgyan// dung dang kun da zla ba dkar// sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan dutha shang// de yi steng du legs bzhugs pa// khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad gyi// zla ba'i mdog ldan 'adzum bcas rang// ting
rgyu'adzan ldan ni sdig pa bcom// rdo rje'i 'phrang las rnam par spras// sna chogs 'khor bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// nan chen po'i 'phreng ba chos// smras pa rnam par dgod par bya// desngags rtag tu
ba shes byab// yi ga ina mchog gtso lo// sa yi stangadang ldan pa g.yas mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu gcig pa// drug pa'i dbyangs kyis legs gsal ba// thig le nadas legs par brgyan//
u rtenacing 'brel 'byuba 'khor lo yis// don can rab tu bskyod par bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor tsin// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// chos kyi sku niyoshes che// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug
ba shar// des yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyodapa ing shas kyi 'od ze dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba rdo rnam par gnod/
pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs phodzanyid du rang ga bdag nyid byigyis babs// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams
cadramanyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir 'khod do// dbang rakyil 'khor mi bskyod pa/ ma yi dkyil 'khor yang shes 'od// chu yi dkyilakho 'od dpag med// rdo rjes rnam gnon rlung
dkyil 'khor// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chubu sams dpa' n po kun tu bzang po'i mtshigs 'gyu ba sems dpa' phyin kyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lasoms pa
zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po'i rgyun gyi sIpo 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas
phyung ba'o// oM badzra satwA/ n gnas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs kas rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams phung ste/ ja'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams/
thams cad snang bar byas te gsal bar gyur nas/ de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus
'jig rten gyi khams rnams su gshegs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mas cad snang bas da rdo/ sems can thams cad kyi don mngon par rdzogs nas slar ung
gcig 'dus te/ byang chub sams dang sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i sku gyunas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i thugs kar gnas trachad du brjod pa 'dis
da du brjod pa a ma rogs snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// snying po yaM shes rnam dag la// rdo rjes mas dpa' nyid gyur nas// byang chub basams ni brtan baskyod de//
sangs rgyas ya shes bya named// gang zhig brtan phyir lus min yang// sangs rgyas sku nyid du gyur to// nga nas rdo rje'i sku byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon
nas bcom ldan das mi bskyod pa'i khor thams cad rnam pa bzhis khya ste/ dkako salo/ dmar po/ ljang khu'i mdog tu mngon par sprul nas/ rang gi sngags kyi yi gis zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor la brten tu gnas par gyur to// dgug pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ oM badzra dza/ rjes su chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzrarA ga/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad palegs par
