mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzanani/ oM badzrasA d+hu/ de bzhin duN+Dinama'abyubaldan gyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba'i tid pa'i dzin gi/ oM badzrar/ nyima'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting pa'i dzinani/ oM badzrati dza/
de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting 'dzin ni/ oM badzra ka tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badzra sa// de bzhin du'od
dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor yang thugs rje'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzarnya/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badzra tIkA/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/
oMbadzra datu/ de bzhin ga shags pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' skya pa'i teng nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra b+hu Sha/ de bzhinatu rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khoralasasna tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/
oM badzra kA// brtson 'grus kyi pha solatu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni oM badzur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra yakA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs khur tshur bcas pa'i tingang 'dzin ni/ oM badzrasan+ti/ de nas pacom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag

rgya'i dam tshig rdo tshu'i dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas 'di phyang ngo/ oM badzra d+ha tud+d+haM// rang gi rig pa mchog ni/ o
badzra d+hAtIshwa ri hU~M/ badzraNaM/ de nas ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis slob
pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di byung ba/ oM ak+Sha b+hu a/ o dzA muk+ti tsit+tabadzraNi/ de bzhi/
gshags pa 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i ngam tshig gi ya shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs nas/
nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rigapa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM badzrarasaM b+ha ba tuM/ oM badzra dzAnAg ti/ ngo nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dapag tumad pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi rdo tshu chos kyi dam tshig gi ya shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga'i dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal
pa oM a mi tA b+hA hi/ oM badzra d+ha ra NidaM/ de nas de bzhinagashigs pa rnam par gnod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo las kyi mtshig gi ya shis kyi phyag rgya'i dkyirakhor
byin gyis rlob bzhes bya ba'i tingaparAdzin snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sam+b+ha a mo g+ha sid+d+haaM/ oM badzra ma hAb le hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshAkas pa rnam par snang mdzad yul la rnam pa gzigs shing// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal pa/ oMsaN+Ta ta thA ga ta ma hA dzAn
badzra hU~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di dag bshad pa tsam gyis/ de bzhinagshegs pa mas cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad ra thongabar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdzongs de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisnyinge 'i bdag nyid rtogs nas rdo rje mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ oM badzras ma tA dz+nyA na bud+d+hanaM/ ngo nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi snying po rnams phyag na rdo rjer mthong bca'agyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo thugs ka nas chos thams cad nyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di byung ngo// oMsam+bad+harmAs ma tAdzAn badzAhU~M
de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis kyang slar yang phyag na rdo tsi thugs kar de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyisabarlabs par mdzad nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du
'khod par mthong ngo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thugs ka nas dpazhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo// san+d+rasatAs ma tA pra pa/

bud+d+hanaM/ de nas 'di byung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyag na rdo rje rnam par phyung sta/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyanasdu na gnas nias bkar nod/
cipa'i khor po// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsalal/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
'a@#// dkyil 'khor rnams la byin gyis rlob pa byos shig/ de de bzhin nozhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams dpa' de bzhinagshegs pa thamA cad kyi thugs ka nas
po dkyil 'khor h+phams cad byin gyis brlabs te brtan par gyur nas/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha rnams phyung ste/ lhamo de rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gru rnams su de bzhin du rnam par grags
so= sgo rnams susgo skyong ma rnams dang/ mtshamasa rnamAsu gzugarang sgyur sridang/ ro dang/ rig bya rnams bshad do// de dag gi sngags su gyur pa ni/ oM badzram g+hakaM/ 'khor lo'i mtshams su gzhag
wa par bya'o// o tsA ha badriNihaM/ oM badzra ra badzra saM yaM/ oM badzra TikI li kAsihU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa chen po'i mchod pa phyi'i rakyila 'khor gyi grwa dang/ mtshams rnams

sung rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams de bzhin ga shegs pa'i sku par gnas par dgod par bya'o/ oM badzra ga/oM ma d+hu badzra ts+tshin+d+haM/ gaM/ oM ma nod b+ha ba bidza?Ni hU~M/ oMbadzrashi shin poho/
ba/ rab zhin gshags pa thams cad kyi rol pa chen po'i lha mo'i sgo'i mtshams rnams su gzugs sogs pa'i/ oM badzra d+hu pe/// so badzrapA/ oM badz+dza gan+taM/ obidzras/ oM badzra spar she/
mnyes par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i sange pon/ os ma a bo su ra tan+taM/ dga' bde chen po'i rjeN+Da'i snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa/
thams cad kun nas mnyes pas dkyil 'khor thams cad la brtan par gyur nas/ dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzod// dgug dang legs par rab gnas dang// ji bzhin gnas su
sbyar ba nyid// kun nas dgyes madzradasangs rgyas kun// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin dgo/ sngags kyi tshig rnams kyang/ o a hi b+ha ga wan badzra aM ku sha dza/ o pra beA hU~M/
sa ta thu gti/ chos ma ya ba tiT b+ha ga wan/ o tu ho/ b+ha ga wan badzra A be sha a/ 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgo'i 'phrin lasaso// de lta bu'i da kyil 'khor 'dre ba la
byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ kun tu babrang po dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyanapo rnams dgod par bya'o// sngon du bshad pa'i dkyila 'khor kyi tsho
gas slob ma bcug ste dbang bskur ba lasogs pa byas slob ma dang bcas pas thabs cig tud bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bar mkho ba thamasacad kyisamachod par bya'o// de la dang po lo
narar zhig dkyil 'khor masaM cad kyi slob dpon dam tshig thams cad shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rnal 'byor gyi dpang phyug chen pos dngos grub thams cad kyis byin gyisabarlabs pa/
dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu/ thams cad mkhyen par mi shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyal bslab par bya'o// de nas
'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyur ba ni skyil krung bcas nas/ dri la sogs pa rnams kyis phug bcing ba rab tu bsgrub par bya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo bsdams
[>pa byas te sor mo phan tshun bcings nas skyil krung gi dbus su rje bsdams pa bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// jo rje sems dpa' sogs pa ni gar gyi sbyor bas so//

rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid da cha dpa'i phyogs su bzung ba ni jo sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o// jordzabasdams pa las ma mo lcags kyu ltar bzung ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid med pa'i phanapa lta bu'i

sbyor ba ni rdo rjemada'i phyag rgya'o/ nganyid las legs so ba sbyin pas rgyab tu 'jog pa ni rdo rje lags pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya'o/ rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid dpal bar 'jog pa ni rdo rjerin

tshanagyi phyag rgya'o// ngong bsdams pa la'od kyidakyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba ni rje rje nyima'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor sbyar ba ni tog gi phyag rgyu so// kha'i thad du

bsgo bzhi rdo bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa pa nyid ba'i thad du bskor ba ni rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ dad snying khar byas pa ni rdo rje rnal gri'i phyag rgya'o// panyid 'tshong lo ltar yongs su bskor

ba ni rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya'o// nyid snying khar sbyong ba ni rdoN+Di smyo ba'i chos kyiphyag rgya'o/ rdordzogs bsdams pa de nyid garanyid du ston pa ni las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis spyi bo dang/

snying kha dang/ mgrin par 'jog pa ni dza[Z] srung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ tshu bsdams pa 'gram pa gnyis su 'dzeg pa mdze rje gnod spyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdzordzobasdams pa de nyid spung khar bcangs pa na ro

khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhinangusmag mo dngabadug pa mal sogs pa'i sbyor bsalha mothams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad3da rab du sbyar bar bya'o// rol cing rnam par dgodapa dang// sgog ngaskang/
rje'i bdag nyid dang// dang pa dang khro sogs chos bdaganyid/ rang nyid zhi ba'i bdagating nyams// phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar// gal tadangos grub mchog 'dod na/ bdag nyid rdo rje'i gan
byed dam// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgyu bcing par ba tuspyan// thams cad grub par 'dod sogs kyis// skyil krusangs rgyas thams cad kyis// de phyirags mngardo dzacan//
sangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sku// sgogapa'i sbyor ba'i rdzoNacan// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi ba'i spyan// bsams bcas jo nan gyi dgos// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje can/ ting 'dzan dbyib
las shes bya// 'khrugs pa'i lta stangs khro rnams kyi// btsun mo rnams kyi rol pa nyid// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang// bsdigs spyod rnams kyi lta stangs to// chos rnams kun gyi rjes
'jug palaM/ shugs kyi lta stangs phyag rgya lo// chogs dang pho nya pho nyamo// lta stangs rnam pa sna tshog sanyid// mchu yi phyag rgya yongs ldan pa// g.yo ba med cing mi 'gul ba// sangs rgyas
@#/ nams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sas rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// mtshamasasbyor cung zad yang dag ldan/ rnam 'gyur med cing mtshungs mda gnas // rol pa'i yi ga yang dag
[>ldan achuyi phyag rgya rdo rje can// rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor bamanaM/ khro bos suni yongs su bsdams// 'di'i khro ba'i phyag rgyur bshad// mchu yi phyag rgyagazugs mdzes can// 'jig rtenapa
rnams mchuphyagargya/ ma 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral// shin tuganag dka'i 'dod chags dang// sdang dang rmongs las thams cad du// rol cing rnam 'khor dang ldan pa// g.yo bcas
rab tu 'phro ba yang// mchu yi phyag rgyur shes par bya// lha mo tshogs kyi ang/ dusogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ lta stangs mtshul sogs pa'i ming// phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdus//
skyob pa rnams kyi kun shes bya/ ji srid sku yi dbye ba dang// dbang po lasogs rab dbye dang// de dag phyag rgya sna tshogs mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi brtags pa la// sna tshogs sku'i gzi brjid che//

tshang mang yon tan 'byung pa'i gnas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub basbyin byed// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyidagasang ba zhes bya
pa'idakyi 'khor chen po yongasasu rdzogs so/// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par dbang
bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bka' stsal pa// da nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu shar bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya//
sna tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog dar dang me tog chunapos brgyan// ro dzan na rnams kyis sngas// sna tshogs pad+mo bzhin gzhan// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku
gzugs yid 'ong ba// mgonapo sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// 'bar ba mchog gis brgyan pa po// de sngags rtags su shes bya ba// dang po'i dbyangs dang gnyis pa 'o// de yis nye 'khor brgyad ngun//
'gram du rtsibs brgyad pa yi yang// 'khor lo dag ni bri bar pya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// 'khor 'pho kun tu 'bar ba gzhag/ 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbusasu ni// pad+ma'i rgyal po bzhu gnas
sgragaso/gsas rgyas thams cad ni// ji ltar sngon bzhinabri bar bya// rta bar makho pa'i mchod kun gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya// dgug sogs cho ga'i sbyor ba ni// dkyil 'khor sna
ma ji bzhinano// dkyil 'khen par spyod pa kun// cho gnadi ni'abyung par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rtog pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor nyin po mchog/ a dag rab tu bshad
byakha 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal zhes// bya ba rdo rjehaM mdzad grags// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// dkyil
'khor brgyad pa lta bu 'o// de yi dbusasu khro bo'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyalang// khro gnyer ldan zhing smin 'khyog spyanagasal 'bar ba chen po pa///
cung zad che ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// rnam par dgod cing sar khro ba// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// dga' zlog dbang phyug chen po gnon/ sangs rgyas 'phreng ba sogs pas spras/
orani mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa la spyanagasum pa// zhal bzhi pa la thub par dka'// khe nyon dang nizhags par mdzod// dang po na ni rdo rjer bshad// gnyis pa zhags pa sdigs
mdzub can / phyag gnyis khu tshur dam pa mchokaM/ khu tshur gnyis ni rab tu brtag/ many+dza' rlung gnyis nimanyam sbyar ba'o// lu gu rgyud kyis rnam par sprel// sIpakhar phug rgya legs gnas/
nas sdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs pa mad// 'jig rtan gasum rgyal zhes bya ba'i// phyag rgya mchog tu thub par dka'// sngags ni ming gi de nyid ldan// 'bar ba rephrang bas
ma nyam par 'khrigs// dkyil 'khor de yi gnas rnams su// cha rnams kun tu thams cad nas// phyag rgya thams cad mnyam par bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyan gnasapar// ral gri 'khor
la gzhudang mda'// de bzhin nguningagra sta nyid// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas mchog/ mdor bsdus nas ni phyag rgya dgod// de ltayakhro po'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par bkod nas kyi bar
mkho pa'imachodapa thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i da kyil 'khor ro// de nas rakyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab
tu bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang ma tog chun pos brgyan// de dbus dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ chu
zhes bya ba'i ming can// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyudapa yid 'ong ba// daya lta ba'i dbus su// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba// zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i mdog/ phal pa'i cod pan
'dzin pa can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// sangs rgyas phreng pasogs pas spras// sku nams thams cad kun nas spro// mtha' yas rab 'byams rgya che/
pa'i chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam la// de yi sngags su yongasagrags pa// sha Sha 'i sde yi mtha' dag ba// kAyig don ldan sngon byung ba// rgyu yi ngon du rab sgrub byed// bzhi pa'i
dbyangs kyis spyi bor mnan// me yis bon gsal bar byed// thoge la sgra ni mchog tu sbyin// 'jig rten dbang phyug ces bya'i mtshan// de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// pad+mo'i thal mo rab tu brkyang
bris pa'i phyag sbyor yang dag bshad// dbyug gulo'i baspyi blugs bri mdun du bgrapa'i phrang pad+ma yi// rgyal po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhug/ de la sogs pa mtha' las mchog/ phyag rgya mchog/
@#// tu 'bar de dag/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ji ltar rigs pa dgod par bya// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyal po 'o//
de nas dkyilanakho nyin po mchog/ gzhan nu rab tu bshad par bya// dpa' bo ni rkyen snying po yi// jo dzanasmin zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par
byas de yi dbus su narin chi// yan lag brgyad pa mchog tu 'bar// dadabus rin chen pad+mani// rin chen 'phrang bas rnam par mdzes// de dbusam ra ka ta'adra// na chen po cha cher 'bar
ba sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// rin chen 'phreng bsa rnam par mdzes// mdun du kun gyi dbang bskur gtso// rin chen de yi lagatso bo mchog/ g.yas su pad+mar gas// rgyab tu in ni
la 'o// yid bzhin nor bu rin na g.yon// phyag rgya ma pa sna tshogs mchog/ snyatshog sarAnin rnam par brgyan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa bzhi ni// gnas rnams su ni gzhug par bya// sangs
rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// dayi sngags su yongs grags pa// bzhi pa'i snga yi dang po gang// ma yi sa bon gyis gsal byas// dbus kyi gnyis pas kun nas mnan// dbang sgyur ba ni
stang du gnas// de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// rin chanasnyim pargyab bskums te// rin chen rnam pa legs 'byung ba// ngani rdo rje rin chen// dzatsho rin po che'i dkyil 'khor lo/
0 nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// klakhazhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ d+hababs bzhis mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// jo rdzo'abrang bas rnam pa mdzes/
de yi dbus su zhal bzhi pa'i// 'khoralo bzhi ni yongs bskor ba'o// de yi dbus su padachen polo/ kha dog sna tshogs yongs 'bar ba// de yi rabus su brtson chen po// ngo tsha'i gzugs ni yongs
sum+bi// rdo rje khur 'dzin mdzos pa ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// sas rgyas 'aphrang par rnam pa mdzes// de yi sngags ni yang dag bshad// bcu
gnyis pa yi dbyangs kyi mtha'// mya ngan 'das donAlegs gsal pya// sgog sogs rig ma thams cad kyis// de bzhin rang gi phyag rgya yis// rdo rje'i thog la yongs su ldan// sna tshogs
bkra ba mchog tu 'bar// de yi dbang bskur phyag rgya yis// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas// kun nas yongs su bskor ba yis// las kyidakyil 'khor bri bar bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro//
danas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dgarab tu bshad bya ba// shes rab ye shes 'khor legyi// sngags kyiyi gsa rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab
ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes// de yi ste ba'i dkyil pu mi/ gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa// skumadog dmar zhing 'dzum bcas pa// sna tshogs gzugs can ral gri can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal
bzhipa// ral gri'i 'phrang bsa rnam par brgyu// gsang sngagasan poyigalnga// de yi drung du legs par gnas// dbyangs dang sna ba kun nas de'i// thugs karu/

[>ni yang dag gnas// phyi rol nying ni gru ba medze// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ rta babs bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor// sgo gcig gis ni shin tu mdzes// zhes reb pha rol phyin pa nyid// de la dkyil
'khor dbus su ni// gal tadangos grub mchog 'dod n// 'bad pa yis ni grwa par bya// sngon du bshad pa'i cho ga yis// mchod sogs cho ga rgyas pa nyid// gzhugs pa'i chog de bzhin du//
ltar dkyil 'khor 'dir mthong bzhi// shes rab a shes dkyil 'khor ro////de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//
kha babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// khrig bzhi yis ni yang dag ldan// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yang nang du bri bya ba// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// nyon cing 'brel byupa'i pha ba ni//
'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// 'khor le'aribus su brtson chen po// rdo rje'i rgyun stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// kha dog nag po gzi brjid che//
chos kyi 'khor lo'i pa skor mdzad// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pani// rgyu yidon du so sor bcos dbus drug dang ni yang dag ldam/ thig la phyi mo s ma par brgyan// yi ga chen po'i 'phreng ba
can 'khor lo gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// dpe mdun du dung yin l// rgyab tu zhags pa brjod par bya// rdo rje'i thal mo phyag rgya che// 'khor lo bzhin durapa tshu gnas // mchod pa
thams cad rab tu brtag/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor pa bzhin// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// thog mar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// dngos grub thams cad yang
ngag 'bar/ sa kyi 'khor lo'i dekyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab bshad bya ba// thog ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor pa yis// dkyil 'khor
kun gyi thig gdab bo// de yi dkyil du snang ba che/ mkhar bzhin shin tu 'ong gsal ba// sems dpar rgyunaponam mkha'i mdzod// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tubazhugs// zla ba'i mdog can
gzi rjid che// sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog/ gzhon nu rab tu brjid pa'i zhal// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// sangs rgyas 'phrang pa sogs pas spras// rdo rtogs dkyil 'khor rgyan/
par mdzad// 'di yi gsang sngags gzi bang che// dbus dgu pa thig le dang// nang yis ni rnam par brgyan/ sta tshun dang po gsum pa la// thig lenAngs rnam par brgyan// gtso bo de yi
sngags pa yang// nam mkha'i mdzod ni rab skor mdzad// ngaltari dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sngags kyi 'phrangab mchog ldan pa// ma lus pa yi sa rnams kun// thams cad nas ni mkha'i/
@##// la tog ne phyag rgyur gyur pa de'i// de bzhin du nangs par bcing// de lta'i dkyil 'khor gris nas nii// nam mkharayi ni mdzod de la// gal tu bdag ni grub 'dod na//
mchod pa kun gyisa rnam pa mchod// nam mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor lo// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba
is dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bo// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// khro ri'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// der ang jo tsho'adi yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog 'dod// de yi
dbus su gzi bde// gnod sbyin bla na med// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// pad+ma'i rgyal po la 'ab gnas// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i las// bdud rnams thams cad rang
'joms mdzod// de phyugs yi ger gyur pa na// shakha'istatshanamany+dzar dpe ba// skyayi don du legs gsal bya// khro bo'i rikyil khor chapo thaskor/ sngags kyi yi ga'aphrang pache// bad pa
yis ni bri bar bya// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// jo rje gnod sbyin de ini// galaM tadangos grub mchog 'dod na// sgyu ma thams cad gzhom par bya// jo rdzaganod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor po'o//
de nas dkyil 'khor chapo mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa// dz+ha babasaM bzhis ni mdzes pa shus//de yi dbus su 'khor lo rma/ lcags kyu
yis ni rnam par mdzes// dbus suphacom ldan rdo rje rgyu// lcags kyu la ni rab tu bzhugs// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyananams thams cad rab tu 'bar/ rdzo lcags kyi khu tshur cha//
'bar ba'aphro bsam par brgyan/ 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par mdzad// sngags kyi gos legs par sbya// sha Sha'isna yi drud gnasapa/ byed pa'i rgyu ru legs par gnas// dbyangs
drug pa yis 'bigs par bya// pa phyad thig legasalegs par brgyan// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyalegs par sbyas// 'dugs par byed l don yong pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//
ro lcags kyu mchog tudage/ dgag pa la sogs thams cad la// 'gro ba 'dul ba yongs su bsdu// dngonayod rgyal po'i dkyila 'khor lo// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po
mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grubadagyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor
de yi dbus su mi dgyil 'khor lcags kyu'i rnam pa na// de yi dbusasu gru gsum grags// lcags kyu mchog tu dge ba'o// de ya dbusasusems dpa' che// rdo rdzorgyal po stobs
po phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// gzi brjing chen po dkar dang dmar// zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin dag ba// de yi gsang sngags yang dag bshad//
byabyu// don yod 'bras bu stsol ba po// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa ni// gnyis 'gyur nyid dunyam par gnas// daoM thig la mya ngan 'das// sngags kyi 'phreng ba gzhan gyis bskol/
sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// 'bad pa yis ni bri par bya// sgo skyong ba dang mchod pa yang// sbyor ba ji bzhin rnam par dgod// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad los
su sgrub// jo rje rgyal po'adekyi 'khor lo// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu phashadubyab// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje chags pa zhes su
bka'ad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzos par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// chags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ thams cad dmar pos rab dregs pas//
dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin// de yi dbus su padachen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa gesarabs// de yi lte pa'i dbus su ni// rdo rje chags pa bri bar bya// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa/
la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum 'od kyi 'phrang bcas/ de yi phyag rgya mchogatsagi/ mdzes pa yis ni mdza' gzhupha'agyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis yaMsapi' lus// 'gro ba kun la ches mchog 'gyur//
yo/ nga yi gsang sngags mngosagyur pa// joN+Dichags pa mchog tumed// sha kha'i snga yi mthar gyur pa// ka yi ya gi'i sngon du gnas// dbyangs dag pa dang yang dag ldan// sngags kyi 'phrang bas yong
dag brgyan/ ma to ma niyongs su 'phan// ring thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// de lta'idakyil 'khor bris nas/ sangs rgyas Thams cad rab mchod byer// chags pa'i dkyil 'khor mo
ngosarakyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshang bya ba// doN+Dalegs pa zhes grags pa// gnyis sumadapa'i dga' pa'i ng 'phel/ gru bzhi pa lasgo bzhi pa// rta
babs bzhis ni mdzos par lus// nga yi dbus sur mdzes pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa gru bzhi pa// de yi dbus su pad chen po// bre rabru yis ni dpar mdzes// de yi lta ba'i dkyil du mi/
zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang dag 'apas// der gnas dpa' bo bsam par bu/ dolags pa stobs po che// dung dang kun ng zla ba dgu// kha ba ba zho'i 'od ltar mdzes// legs so stsolab ya
par mdzar// ting nge 'dzin dbang mang po sbyar// jo jo sgrigamo sogs mchod pa// de bzhinam tog bdug pasogs// sgo mi skyong ba nyid kyang ni/ rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya// de yi sngags gyur
mas pami/ gsang bachen po mthog tu 'khaM// lha mi yi ge sngon gangade// sems can don ni bsgrub phyir// thig le gnyis dngayosasu ma/ legs stsol bas inam par gnas / da lta'i
dkyil 'khor bris na mi/ mchod pa thams cad rab tubaskor// bdag nyid dag pas gzhus pa sogis// thams cad yongs su spyad par bya// tshordzalegs pa'i dkyil 'khor lo/
nga nas rakyil 'khor chen po mchog mngarag rang shu bshad bya ba// rdzordzagazi brjid ces su grags/ jo rdzanyims blo gros ldan// gru bzhi pa lasgo bzhi pa// babs bzhis
[>mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyile 'khoradapal bri bar bya// da nang du bri bya pa// rdzordzanyi ma 'od po ma/ chodzanyima'i stangaduni/ gru gsum rnam palas byung ba// de yi
dbus su gzi bang mo// 'bar ba yi ni malta bu// pad+machen po'adab brgyad pa/ kha 'bru yisanishin tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyila 'khor du// jo gzi brjid stobs po che// bzod po'i mtshal dang
mtshus pa'i 'od// rgya skyegs khu ba mtshungs parimadog/ phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ rgyana rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// kun nas sangs rgyas mtshus
u0f00 pa'inyid// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yi mtha'// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sngags kyi 'phrang bas yongs su bskor// rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ldan// de ltaridakyil
'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab machod bya// ro rdzogazi brjid dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chan po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad byal// yid bzhin nor
blta/ gu'i rgyal mtshan ming// bdag nyid chen po doN+Di tog/ gru bzhib la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil
'khor du yi dbus su mi/ mchog lu'aparab yi ni rlung// sgrub phyadapa'i rnam pa 'dra// rin chen rgyal mtshan yongs bsgang pa// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po//
zhal bzhi pa la gabri brjing// ain+d+ra nIl mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen char pa rab 'bebs// phyag bzhi pa snang ba che// de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// snga tshan bzhi pa'i dang po
la ma yis rab tu gsal byas pa// tog gaphyag rgyas yongs su bskor// sngags kyi 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan// de lta'i dkyila 'khor bris nas mi/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod
bya rdo rjetog gi dkyil 'khor ro/// de nas dkyil 'khor na po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dzodrab zhad pa zhes grags pa// ji bzhadapa mtshungs pa'i 'od/
bzhi pa la sgo bzhipa// rtababs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor chen po khri par bya// dkyil 'khor de dbus zlum po ni// in+daniya mtshungs pa'i 'od//
de bzhin mu ni gzi brjid can// phyag rgyu 'khor los rnam par mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// ston ga'i zla ba 'dra ba'i 'od// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad pa// rgyan rnams kun
gyis brgyan pa po// phyag bzhi pa la namakhazhis// dbang phyug thams cad yang dag ldan// de ye gsang sngags gsang po// rgyu yi ngon du bsgrub par bya// stong pa mngon brjod bsam mi khyab//
[s]/ 'bya/ rang ming rtogapas mtshan pa'o// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod bya// rdo rje bzhapa pa 'dakyilakhor lo/ sang nas/
[>dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya pa// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ rtababs bzhis nimadzes pa khyas// thig bzhi dang niyang dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor/
mang dag bri nga yi steng du'ang pad+ma che// pad+mamal sa yang dag byang// gru gsum mchog tu mdzes pa po// thor cog dag gis rnam par brgyan// chos dbyings si ga'i de kho na// thams cad
tsho gzi brjid bdag nyid dgo/ de yi mdog gi re 'angani 'phro ba'i mo ra ga ta'adra// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// gnyis pa'imadog tugyur pa mi/
pad+ma ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// jisridapa gi 'khor lo ni/ smra ba'i dbye bas rab tu gnas // thams cad so sor gsal bar byed// sminagyi dkyil 'khor mchog dbyung// de lta'i dkyil
'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rabu mchodabya// smo ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/// n gnas dkyil 'khor po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bu la// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i
sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// de yi dbus su ge chache// 'ani chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus su brtson chen po/ rdzordzasus bar a padag sri/ phyag bzhi pa
la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dogasna tshogs gzi brjid che// thams cad srung ba mchog turag/ phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan// gsang ba chen po go 'phang
mchog/ de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che/ sha kha'i sna yi rab r gnas mchog/ mgon po'i rgyuni mngon par brjod// stangadunus brgyan par bya// kun nas kha dog du ma yis//
yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya// sngags kyi 'phrang ba longs suldan// glog gi 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan// da lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad rang bsgrub bya//
jo srung ba'i dkyil 'khoraro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshang bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis zhi mdzes par bya/
thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// khu tshurarakyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rdzogs par yid 'ong ba// gzi brjid chen po gser gyimadog/ 'bam brgyad pa yi/
[“ ]'ong ba// de yi stang du gzi brjid che// rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kun da dung dang zla ba dkar// khu tshurang bzhin
gshegs kun gyi/ skudangagasung dang thugs khu tshur/ jo rdzonyidadu mnyam nyid mchog/ gnyis su med pa mchog gsangapa// khu tshur gyis ni sdud pa pang// desngags mchog tu
dga' ba ni// brjod du ranyid stsola mdzad pa// sta rman lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rakyil 'khor can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo tsha'i sku/ 'diyi sngags
la rnam par gnas// da lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// jorje khu tshur mchod par bya// rdo rmakhu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor 'o// de la sogs pa'i mthunams mchog dkyil 'khor/
mchog tu 'bar ba ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar klas pa'i/ sangs rgyas byang chub l bar mdzad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ de bzhin gru bzhi
bris nas ni// sgo khyud la sogs rnam par spyang// rtsa gsum snam bu nyid dang ni// dung dang pad+ma so gas pas brgyan// thog mar dbang phyug chen po dgod// rtse gsum pa yi phyagargyus ldan//
khyu mchog la zhon migasum pa// stag gi pags gyon phyag bzhi pa// thal bas byugs shing mgo bo la// la pa'ichogs ni rab 'phyang ba// muyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// de bzhin gshegs

po thams cad la// phyag 'tshol bde da bri lo// ri'i sngags ni/ o tis hUM hUM phaT/ gosang sngags 'di ni cher gsang ba// bdag nyid chen po dbang phyug che'i// dbang phyug chen po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/
rakyila 'khor nan po de nyidal// dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nag kho[%]na pogazhag par bya'o// lag pa stong gi gar byed pa dngoldan pa'i dga' byade dbang phyug dpalhan cika phyag bzhi
pag pa stong gis gnas pa'o// rang gi sngagasani/ oM ma hAkAlayaM b+hu/ o nas ka shA' shaM/ 'di bzlas na dngos grub thams cad byed do// dga' byed dbang phyug dnganag po chen po'i/
sgrub pa'i thabs so// kang nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi thig gdab bya// de ni pad+mayang dag bri// pad+ma'i dbus su sbrang rtsi byed// la sogs mthar byed spyan
bri'o// gzhu yi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin// sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal bar byed// nyid kyi sgrub thabs de bzhin no// ma tog mda' dang yongs suldan// rang gi ming rtogs mtshan macan// sngags ni/
o ma rU krit+tAhU~M/ os d+ha na su/ gsang sngags 'dzin 'a dod gzugs can// dbang du byed pa thams cad sgrub// sbrang rtsi dzil sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so//dkyil
'khor gru pozhi pa bris nas dbus su thig bzhi gdab bo// dbus su tum pu'u'o// shar gyi 'dab mar rgyal ba'o// lho ru rnam parmargyal ba'o// nub tu mi nyus pa'o// byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o//
de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bris nas/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags dgod par bya'o// oM du du ruhU~M/ oM dza yodaM/ oM bi dza ya b+haM oM a dzit+tadzaM/ a pa rA dzitAraM/ dga' pa 'di dag/
lag g.yonadu// khu tshur g.yon pas 'bagrubastsol// 'di yi phyag rgya nying gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// lag pa dgod par rab bshad bya// go rims ji lta ba bzhin du// tum
[4]@#// bu ru nimathe bor dgod// sdigs mdzub la ni rgyulab gnas// rnam rgyal gu mo nyid la lo/ mi thub de bzhin ming med la// gzhan gyis mi thubamathi'u chung la// lag/
[>pa'i dbus su mi ga o// dgod bya de nyidalag pa'i rgyal// rdo rje 'phrangaba'i mthar thug tu// dgod par bya ba mchog tu bshad// sbyor dang rnam par phye ba yang/ phyag rgya kun spyod yongs su bsdu/
so sor brtan par bya pa nyid// sor mo rnams la khyad par du// dbang dang dgug dngamo sa la sogs// rengs byed la sogs go rims bzhin// las rnams dag nithams cad du// sngags
pas mnyam par bzhags bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus tagshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la/ de
[$]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyigasang ba'i mtshan rnams kyi legs par mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das mas par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems ni ro d+ha// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs
pa kun// dgra bcom 'dod chags bral ba dang// legs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas mchog blo gros dag pa la shes che// thams cad mkhyen pa kun rig mchog/ mchog gi dbang phyagadapa' bam/
thog maza ma mar khyab pa// ma 'dres ma 'dres pa yi don// shin tuphra khaM mchog sbyin rgyal// jo nangon rnal 'byor cha/ dzi rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ mi bskyod pa dang mi zad magon//
chos dbyings gzhan dang gzhan min pa// rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje mchog/ dbang bskur kun gyi tha ma'i bla// zigachen rma ba'i mchog gi mchog/ dpa' bo mchog tungapa'i pa'i mchog/ thob/
cing ya ngas la phrab dang// thams cad thams cad de bzhin gsheg/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po che// tshad skyob dkar po stobs po che// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid che// phul byung phul las
phul du byung// rgyu mang mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog/ gzi mchog gzi brjid byed mtshungs pa// rgyal ba rgyal ba mchog nyid dang// legs pa'i rgyal po padag nyid che// rdzoN+DasaMms dpa'
sems dpa' che// rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu tsho// rdo rjechags pa mda'achen po// ro laMgs pa legs grub mdzad// rdo rje rin chen tsha mchog mchog/ rdo rje gzi brjid legs bad
mdzad// rgyal mnachen po rin chen tog/ rje rdza bzhi d pa rtsegs bzhad mdzad// 'jig rten dbang phyug bad+mache// shes rab yongashes 'gas moladzad// chos kyi 'khor lo chos chen po//
sa mas dpa' skya ba legs bzhad mdzad// sna tshogs las ni rgyal po che// rdo rjesrang ba legs srung mad// khro bo chen po gnod sbyin che// jo mtshan s sbyor mtshams sbyor la// phug
'tshol sangs rgyas kun khyod la// dang po'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ legs so rdor can rnal 'byor che// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dag/ snying po'i rgyan ces mtshan gsol ba//
'di dag thams cad legs par gsungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems// 5 shes snying po shin tu mdzes// gsang ba chen po mchog tugasang//
phyashin turnyed dka' ba// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdo// brjod du med cing yi ge bral// rdosnying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyila 'khor zhes bya ba'i
rtog pa rgyas pa 'di yongasasu tshog saso/// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thamasnyaslar yang 'dus tagshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang
tsa ma med pa'i dzarnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'adas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dpadaphyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nyaparagasananas/
ra sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa yo shes rdo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das ma'ang snyoms par zhugs so// nga nas bcon la mdzad
jorjornal [“] 'byor gyi drab ng phyug po 'di skad cig khrid la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi yo shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to// zhugs nas
kyang de bzhin gdags pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar mdzad cing brtan par gyur nas/ de bzhinag shegs pa thams cad kyis thugs sa
'thon te/ sas rgyas thamasacad kyi yulachos kyi dbyings kyi mthatsaklas pa ma lus shange 'us pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas/ sems can thams cad kyi'ang
shes rab dang ye shes rnam par sbyang to/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bkug cingasasu mas par byas nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par gnas te/ rdo rje sams dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
lags par o sa surdzogs par mdzad nas mngon par dbang bskur tagazi brjod dang/ tog dang/ bzhadapa dang/ de dag la nges par sbyar tA lachog gidabang phyug rgan pos rdo rjes ras dpa'i
ting 'dzin gyis chos rtogs pa la'ang bcu gnas nas rnon po dpaM/ rgya dang smra ba'i sems dpa' rnams la'ang thugs brtan par mdzad de/ yongs su dag naso yang pad+mo'i sems dpa'i ting nge
'dzin la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid gzhi nad pa la sbyar nas/ sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bdag pos kyang sems can mos u smin cing srung pa'i khro bos de bzhin gshags pa thams
cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs tshodza mtshams sbyor ba rnams sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su smin pa dang/ byin gyis brlabs taslar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
kamarjes su zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi shes rab kyi yashos la zhugs nas nyid du brjod pa 'di ched du brjodo// a ma hothag mod shes rab ni// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad
kyi= gsarab shin tudu mdasoms// sams dpa'i lus su bdag gyur to/ dri mdasangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos rang dngos med nam dpyad nas// e ma'o//
[>chos ni bsam ma nyid// bdag gi dbang du rnam par gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i chen po 'jam dpal bam ldan 'das kyi thugs kun s 'thonanas/ byang chub sems dpa'
bcu drug gi lus su mngon par sprul to/ bcom ldan ' das rnam par snang mdzad la yongs su bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye 'khor kun tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang/ 'od kyi
dkyil 'khor dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khol 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces gsolato// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying
po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan pa'i chos kyi tshig bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bsams pa ni legasasolags so// legs par rab tunyonal yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan

yag 'das dodzarnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas sngags kyi chig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni nang gi lus dang/
[4 ]phyi'i lus dang/ phyingagi lus la lus kyi rdzas sul zhing btson 'grus can shes bzhinadang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi gsasems dang/ yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par

spyod do// lus kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod ngo// lus la zad pa'i rdzas su ltazhing nas par spyod do// lus la mi gnas pa'i rnam pa spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nyab len pa med do//

mong gi tshor ba dang/ phyir kho dang/ phyin ng gi ba dang/ nang gisams dang/ phyi'i soms dang/ phyin ngagisams dang/ nangagi chos dang/ phyi'i chos dang/ phyi nang gi chos l chos kyi rjes su lta zhing
brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang/ yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ chos la kun byung ba'i rjes su ltazhinganam pa
spyod do// chos lazad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la mi gnasar 'i rnam par spyod cipa 'jig rtenadugang yapatab lenapa med do// rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lus dang/
pog dang/ soms dang/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyis gnaso// oM kaM/ o tsa ta spo cupas nA nA/ yang dag par sdong pa bzhi nisdig tomi dgaba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyod pa'i phyi mi dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis 'dun pa skyed ci rtsol lo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyi mkhru skyar ngo snyoma'am yang dag par 'dabs so// sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rgyas pa rnams sbyang ba'i phyir 'dusnyapa la
sogs pa dang/ dge ba'i chos maskyes pa rnams bskyod pa'i phyir 'dun pa da do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ sems rab tu 'dzin to// smonalam yang dag
po pa 'dabs so// dag pa'i chos skyas rnams 'phalazhing shin tu rgyas par bya pa dang/ sgom pa yongasasu rdzogs pa'i phyi'i 'dun pa skud do// 'badado// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// soms
tsA rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// chos tshad yod pa thams cad don dam par chod mad par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
kha pos 'di bka' stsal to/ [W]samyaka pahAN sam+ba ta thA ga saatAa d+himita ap+pahU~M/ yang dag par sbyong ba brjod pa zhes bya ba shesa'ab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgolo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa

rgyu bzhi ni mos pa'i ting nga 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do// sems dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan r 'i rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do// shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dam pa dang/ kun rdzob kyi sgo ris thams cad sgyu ma'imatshamanyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi 'khor

mo sbyar bas bka'astsal to// o ra d+hi pA da pA ra miti la ba pa ra hU~M/ rdzu 'al gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi yi shes zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa'o// dbang po lnga zhing
pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ ting nge 'dzin kyi dbang po dang/ shes rab kyi dbang po'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la dbang/
sgyur bas spros pa ma dang 'dabang po 'di dag bka' stsal to// o an+d+ri ya ba bo d+ha pra dzI esha na man nA pa ga tA ya hU~M/ dpang po mnyam pa nyar ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa'o//
stobs lnga nidad pa'i stobs dang/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang/ dran pa'i stobs dang/ ting 'dzin gyi stobs dang/ shes rab kyi stobs so zhes bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das
chos mas cad mnyam pa dal gnas ba/ stobs thams cad rtogs pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba// gdod ma nas dag pas 'di bka' stsal pa/ oMsam+ba ta thA ga tab la A/hU~M/
shwa ba/ stobs 'thal ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi ni byams pa dang/ sing rdzad ng/ dgar ba dang/ btang snyoms pa'o// so khrus bi hAr b+hi/
ki maM puM kaM hUMt+taM/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bka' stsal to// tshangs pa'i gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhin
spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ donaso so yang dag par rig pa dang/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das chos
thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to// oM pra tisamI rasA hU~M/ shes rab kyi bcol/
tuphyin pa mnyam panyid do// rjes suM dran pa drug gangazhin/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang/ gtong brjes su dran pa dang/ tshul khrims
rjes su dran pa dang/ lha rjes su dran pa dang/ chos thams cad gcig turjes su dran pa ni chos thams cad don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// mtshan nyid dang mtshanyid med pa rnam par dpyod
pas mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo zhes bya ba ting nga'adzen la dbang sgyur byas bka' stsal to// osarba a nu su ti bud d+hisaM pa dAdeshi tshu AhU~M/ dran pa drug gi shes rab bo/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
( gapan na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang rag byung chub kyiyan lag dang/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagadang/ dga' ba yang dag
byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagadang/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang//
byang chub kyi yan lag41 pa nyid skyo bsad pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bka' stsal to// oM sarba pAsaM bo rnyog sam tapra ti'i ta paM/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
zhes bya ba'i bsalab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ngag dang/ yang dag pa'i
las kyi mtha' dang/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rbapa dang/ yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin to// lamazad mi shes pa'i byang chub kyi samasachen po la
'jug palegs pa soson ga khag thamasacad mkhyen pa'i ya shas so/ o Aru[é ]gamAmaT/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid ces pa shes rab kyi pha rol kyi pha'ol tuphyin/
pa'o/ ting 'dzin gsum ni stong pa nyid dang/ mtshamacher pa dang/ smon pa med pa'o// de la stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gang zhon/ stong ba'i rnam pa dang/ dben pa'i
nam pa dang/ mad pa'i rnam pa dang/ rang bzhinamad nga 'i rnam pa thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tugs pa sems rtsa gcig pa ste/ 'di'i stong pa nyid kyi tid nga'adzinatsas bad do// dalamanaM/
mched pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhin/ gangs mtshan ma mi byed pa dang/ 'dod pa mad pa dang/ shes pa med pa dang/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang/ rnam par bral ba'i rnamakhasams rtse gcig paste/ 'di
mtshan ma mdang 'i ting nga'adzanas byago del smon pa mad pa'i ting 'dzin g bzhin/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par sems rtsa gcig bsta/ de ni ston pa med pa'i ting nga'adzin
bya// ces bya'o// chos thams cad rtogs nasasmonapar mi byed/ lha 'am lhalas gzhan gang yang rung ba don du mi gnyer zhing 'phags par yang mi 'dod paste/ dngos po
thams cad l ting nge 'dzin thamasacad kyi sgo yis kyang// shes rab kyi bcol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gsum nyapar rtogs par bya'o// o kha sa mAsawad+hakhaM/
dal stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pamkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ las kyi rnam par sminapa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ dbang po mchog dang mchog
ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa so sor mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi ma khyenapa'i stobs dang/
sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ mngon par nasapaldamkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ zag pa zad pa mkhyen ba'i stobasaso// de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi mnyam pa nyid so
sor rtogs pa'i phyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// o da sha ba las ma ta/ stobs banumanyamab nyid la bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyadagang zhan/ gzugs ma/
gyis gzugs rnams mthong pa 'di na rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nangagazugs med pa 'i'adu shesadang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'dzin nam par shar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos
0/ pa 'dininam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'dus thogs pa'i'adu shes rnams nub par gyur cing/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam
mkha' mtha' yas so zhes to nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mcheda' bar bsgrubs gnas pa 'di ni rnam pa shar pa bzhi pa'o// nga rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha'aasaskye mchedas
yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mchad la par bsgrubs te gnas pa 'din rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// nga rnam pa thams cad du namashes
mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag pa des ticung zad ma yod dozhes nung zang med pa'i skye mcher nye ba'athosgrubs te gnas pa 'di'i rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// rnam pa thams cad du rlung phrad mod/
pa'i sku mchod las yang dag par das 1/ 'du shes med 'dushes min skye mched sku bar bsgrubs ta gnas pa 'di ninam par thar pa bdun pa'o// ngo rnam pa thams cad du 'du shAs mod 'du shes
mdamin skyamachodalas yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gogal la bar pasgrubos te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// chos thams cad ltos pa med pa'i mtshan nyid
kun nas nyon mongs pamadacing rnam par byang ba med pa/ bsam gtan ma da cing bsam gtanamed pa ma yin pa// soms ga'ajug pa mngacing soms par 'jug pa med pa ma yin pa 'debaka'
stsal to// oMsamanab+ha dra pra b+hA ba bi shudad+hadz+ha TaM khaM/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang bral pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhigang
po zhanabadag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar ba dag la dgasbyong ngam/ bram ze nas/
( lha ram/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i chogs gzhan cing rung ste/ 'jig rtenan chos dang ldan pa bzlog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjesasu ma mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag
par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang/ bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa thob par nam pa'i spyodad/ khyu mgo rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' 'o// 'khor
gyi nang du seng ge 'i sgra sgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo'ajig chonanadage sbyong ngam/ bram ze nam/ lha nam/ bdud dam/ tshongs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor
ba minus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad de zhes dam bcas nas/ pal zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dgosbyongs/ bram
ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i chos gzhan su'ang rung sta/ 'jig rten na chos dpa' thun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su
bstan pa de dag la bstanan bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rgyas pa sbyor ro// gang yang bdag gi lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'isdugakhasal yang dag par
'gyur ba brten pa de dag la nan tan byas nas/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad por 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes ngag sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i
tshogs sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i skyayang dag par rjes su mi mthod bal sogs pa ltar gyur pa thams cad yongs su spros tabarjod par bya'o//
mi 'jigs pa ni ngar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid do zhes/ o bsha ra dus ma tapalta a a/ aM a/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi
snyoms par 'jug pa dgugang zhin/ 'dod pas dbanab/ sdig to mi rig ba'i chos kyis dbenapa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde
btsan/ bsam gtan dang po rtsa bar bsgrubs ta gnas so// ngo rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyod pa bar zhi nas nang yongs su dungs sems kyi rgyudagacig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/
dpodapa ma pa/ ring pa'i dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa nye bar bsgrubs tags so// da dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang brel bas btang snyomasasu
gnas te/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis dol dran pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o
[° ]zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la bar bsgrubs ta gnas so// de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba'ang sngasashing/ yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas
( chub pas/ bde ba'ang mod/ sdug bsngal ba'ang mod/ btang snyoms pa dang dran pa yos su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar bsgrubs ta gnas so// de nam pa thams cad du
pa gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid lami byed pasaM nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes// namamakhar
mtha' yas skye mchedal bar bsgrubs te gnas so// danam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas sku mched las yang dag par 'das rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes
mtha' yas mchedal/par bsgrubs ta gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mchabs yang dag par 'das te// cung zad ma yod do zhus cung zad med pa'i sku mchod
la bar bsgrubs te gnas so// da nam pa thams cad du nung zad med pa'i skye mchedalas yang dag par brdasaMto/ 'dushas mar 'dunas mdamin mdalata par bsgrubs ta gnasaso/ de rnam
ba thams cad du 'du shesalar 'du shasamin skyamar las yang dag par 'as te/ 'dushes dngachor ba 'gog pa yatabar bsgrubs gnas so// rnam par thar pa brgyad po dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su
thob nas dngos por rtogs par mi byed/ dngos po med par rtogs par mi byed/ chos thams cad ganyis sumadapar rtogs so// 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mas sa
pa dgamanyam pa nyid do// oM a nan+tab moka mu kha hU~M/ dngos po thams cud mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi bcol phyin pa'o// de la pha rol

du phyin pa bshu gang zhe na/ 'dit+taste/ phyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i sa phol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi zol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan
gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba dang/ smon lamakyi parol tu phyin pa dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs kyi pa rol

tu phyin pa dang/ thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin padrang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ spros pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ yang dag pa'i don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/

chos thams cad kyi khon nyid kyi don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ rdo rje'i pha rolatu phyin pa dang/ rinapo cha'i ba mol tu phyin pa dang/ pad+ma'i pha la tu phyin pa dang/ las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ bstan pa'i rdzas su rtogs pa'i sbyor bas so// oM sarba pA ra mi ta acha pa ri pAr Ni/ o pA yAtaM/ thams cad kyi pha rol

po chu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de las bcu pa gang zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'isanang/ drim med pa zhes bya ba'i sa dang/ 'od byed pa zhes bya ba dang/ 'od 'phro ba

la zhes bya pa dang/ sbyang dka'apa zhes bya ba dang/ mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang/ ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang/ mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang/ legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang/ chos kyi sprin zhes
bya ba dang/ sa thams cad don gcig sta/ 'diltar yashes kyi don to// ya shas kyang ci'ang mad pa/ nyon mongs pa mad pa/ yi ga med ba/ don yodapa/ gdod ma nas dag pa/ drim mad

lcapa 'od gsal la/ brjod pa dang pral ba zhes bya ba'i don to// o b+h+yA mi bangekorta nasadz+dza rlu pa 'ipa raNi paM hU~M sa mos su sbyong ba zhes bya ba shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// lung lasoms pa'i

gnas pa bcu gang zhe nA/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyod pa dang/ gzhon nur gyur pa dang// las dang po pa dang/ rnal 'byor spyod pa dang/ skya bzhas skye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang/ bsam
pa dang ldan pa dang/ phyir mi ldog pa dang/ dbang bskur ba thob pa dang/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang/ byang chub sems dar ba rnams kyis ma por gnas pa dang/ mi gnas pa dor ba ste/
don dam par gnas pa gcig yin pa'i phyir tu/ 'di ltar gnas ba med pa'o// mos bya ba sku nabi gtahU~M/ rnam par gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha zol tu phyin pa'o/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi dbangabcugapa'i na/ tshol dbang bdang/ las la dbang ba dang/ oM bde la dbang ba dong/ mos pa la dbang ba dang/ smonalamal dbang ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul la ngabangab dang/
skye ba la dbangab dang/ yo shel dbang ba dang/ chos la dbang ba dang sams la dbang ba'o// dbangab dang mi dbang ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba thams cad l dbang ba dang/ ngabang phyug
thams tsang la dbang rjes su thob pa/ chos thams cad dang legs par tuldan ba'i phyir ro// u0f00sarlabasha tra tut+taM/ thams cad la dbab nubya ba shes rab kyi bcol tu phyin palo//
ngalasangs rgyas kyis mgas pa bco brgyad gabazhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khrul ba mi mang 'o// rtsom mnga'a'o// dgos pa nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// thugasamanyamapar ma
gzhag pa mi mnga'a'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga' ro// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga' 'o// mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'a'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi
mar 'o// ngagos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// ting po'adzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' lo// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa
ba/ mi mnga'o/ rnam par grol ba'i shas gzigs pa yos su nyams pasim la'o// tshangs pa'i dus lam thogasam chags pa'i shes gzigs pa'i jug go
[S•/ ]ma 'ongs pa'i dusalam chags ma sgrogs pa'i ya shas gzigs la 'jug go/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa'i jug go/ su'i 'phrims thams cad
ye shes snonapu'aglo ba sto ya shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo// gsung gi 'phrin las thams cado shas sngon du 'gro ba stu yis kyi rjes su 'brang// thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad yongs
sngon 'gro blta ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni yul thams cad du dusathamasacad kyi thamasacad mnyam panyid legs pa rab tu gnas pa sgo/ stod pa til
yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir na shes rab yongs su dag pa'o// o al khri Dikakhuts+tshan+tamasam ta dir hUM khaM/ ma 'dres pa mnyam par ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha la tuphyin pa'o//
del skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum su rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhin/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khogs mtshan pa ted de/ 'di yi phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs
stong na lte ba rang so pa mu khyud dang bcas pa nam pa thams cad yongs surdzogs pa'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi mthilalegs par gnas pa ste/ zhabs kyi mthil thams cad kyis sa gzhi la rig
cing de'ang 'di'i mtho ba ni dmar ba dang dma' ba ni mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dad pa'i rgyal po lta bu drabs 'brel bsto/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag dag dang zhubs
de dag gsar gyi mdog can gyi lo'i 'phrang ba rnams kyis da pa bad pa bzhin dumadzes pa'o// phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag
rang zhabs dug ras bal 'jam po bzhin dang/ skyes nas zla ba lon pa'i byis pa bzhin du gzhon shacan dang/ kAtsalani da lta 'jam pa'og na bde ba'o// bdun mtho bar gyur// phyag gnyis
dag dang/ zhabs gnyis dag dang/ phrag gong dgadang/ mgrin pa'i phyogs gcig go/ sor mo ring bsku/ 'di yi zhabs kyi sor mo rnams rim gyis dang btedado// rting pa yangs pa ste/
'di'i rting pa chazhing zhabs kyi rjesasu ratsham par yangs par 'gyur 'o// sku chang drang ba nyid do// 'phye bo ma yin zhing zhom pa ma yin/ ma tshang ba ma yin/ 'gras pa ma yin/ legs par skyes pa
rnam pa mas cad pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sku sta/ mthob 'di'i srid dang saM su'atshams pa'i zhing du 'gyur ro// zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid de/ 'di'i dus mo rang long bu mtho bar 'gyur spro/
ba spu'i rtse mo rgyan du phyogs pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu rnams rtse mo gyen du phyogs par 'gyur zhing/ ba sbya rnams g.yas phyogs su 'khyila 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te/ donams kyis
gsar gyimadog can gyi sku mngon par gsal bar byed ngo// byin pa ri dgas ar+ya yasilta bu ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyin pa dag khrum pa ni dgas ar+ya a nams
kyi lta bu 'o// phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste/ rgyas shing m btud pa nyid du phyagam rag gis nga gipus mo'i lha bal rig pa'o// mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su chub pasta/ sbubs kyis rab tu
a g.yogs pa grubapo tsharigasang gnas lta bur 'gyur ro// skumadog gsar 'drakhasto/ 'di'i kha dog gsal lta bur 'gyur// pags pa srab pas/ shin ras pa gsar shog ltar 'jam
'a pa'i pagapa can du 'gyur zhing jul med pa'i nabaza 'dzin pa lo pa'i nas smyos pa lta/ 'di'i spyi khung bur namasare re'agyur ro// smin ma'i dbus na mdzod spu can// 'di'i smin
zla ma dag girathus na ras skud sogs pa lta bu dang bcagalamadog can Mgayas phyogasasu 'khyilekhama'agyur/ mdzod sbyanyikyis zhalo gsar gyi kha dog lta burashin tu gsal bar byed do// sku stod
sar gi lta bu ste/ di'i sku stong du yas paseng ge 'i lta bur 'gyur ro// dpung mgo zlum pa ste/ yongs su zlum pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur ro// thal gong rgyas pa lta/ 'di'i par rgyas po//
paN+Da 'gyur zhing gsar shog bzhin du rnamakhar gsalala'i mgrin pa tsano// yan lag so so rnams su rnams myong bar byed do zhes pas ni/ robro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid de rtsa rnams yin la/
re rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kanal sogasal rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa nyid kyis phyir yang dag par gsal ba'o// yang rgya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa skyes bu chen po'i
chudang zhing dag mnyam pa'o// dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa sta/ dbu zlum par 'gyur zhing/ gtsug tor gdugs lta bu s las bkab pa gtsug tor mangashin tumatho ba'o// ljags ring bas//
stan gyi mtha'i bar du ljags kyi rtse mos rig bar byed cing/ dbu sku'i mib thug lorayang dpral ba'i mthar lcags kyis khebs pa'o// tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ 'khor stong phrag dumaradabyangs
nang du wilta ba da lta spyi la du'ang thos shing/ byakal bad kanibazhin du snyanu pa shed du 'gyur ro// 'gram pas nag ba lta bu ste/ 'gramal dgasangaga'i bzhin du zlum por 'gyur ro// choms
da bas te/ dudang/ kun dadang/ zla ba'i kha dog can gyi tshimasa rnams so// choms mnyam bsta/ hacang dma'ab ma yin/ mtho pa ma yin/ mnyamapo ma yin pa'i rtse mo can kyi
tshomasa rnams su 'gyulo// choms thags bzang ba ste/ choms rnams bar mdaba'o// choms bzhi bcu mnga' bste/ tshoms rog tutishu dang/ stong duchoms ti shulo// spyan mthon

mthing ste/ spyanadagag sngon po gang yin ba dashin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ ri mo dmar mo rnams dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyi'i la/ gang dkar bo yin pa bdakarapo kho na shin tu rnam pa ba'agyur 'od/
dzim pa'ilta bu ste/ spyan gyi rje ma rnams khyu mchog gi bzhin dug 'ogam inapa de rnams 'og kho na dang/ gang steng ma yin pa de rnams stong kho nar gnas pa ma'adzings pa
[>legs par gzhol ba'o// sems can 'agalazhiga rnams kyis de bzhin ga shegs pa gser gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis gal gyi mdog can du mthong la/ 'ga' zhig
wA rnams kyis pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog dang 'ga' zhig rnams kyis in+daniwa'i kha dog can dang/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can dang/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis dung dang/
paNaM kun dadang/ zla ba ltar dkarab dang/ 'ga' zhig gis kha dog snarigs pa dang/ 'ga' zhig gis nam mkha'i kha dog can dang/ 'ga' zhig gis khu phyed dang btsugasum pa'i tshad dang/ khri

srid du dpag tshad 'bum gyi tshad jam dpag tshad phye ba'i tshadadang/ srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtshosprinamatha' yas pa rnams su snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyila 'khoracan dang/
stong gsum gyi stong cha po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dang/ ji srid du ma tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyanabakod pa'i rgya mtsho rnams snang bar byed cing/ chos kyi
dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i bar dusta/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gdul bya'i dab lasathamasacad snang bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyangs kyis rnam par
ga par mdzad pa dang/ stong gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ ji srid nam mkha' la thar thug pa'i bar thams cad 'od dang dbyangs kyis snang bar byas nas/ rnam par rig pa mdzad pa dang//
chos dang/ zang zing dang/ don 'thun pa dang/ don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams kyis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs shing/ phanabatagasanas byang chub chen bo ya rab ludagodapa
mdzad do// skyes bu chen po'imtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyisachos rnams zams cad mnyam zhing mnyam bsto/ lha rnams kyi mtshan mngon par 'grub par blta bar bya'i/ mtshan

ma yin pa mngon par 'grub pa ni ma yin no// byang chub mtshamanyid rtsod pa'i nyid kyi phyir chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid mang ba sta/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no// lha thams cad
kyang stongapa nyid du mnyam pa'o// lhathamasacud dang/ byang chub dang/ chos rnams thams cad kyang mtshan nyid gcig pa ste 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid
can/ zhiba'i mtshan nyid can rnams so/ 'osazlatu thug tu bar la nasam d+harma ta aM/ mtshan thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o////
dpe byad brgyad nu rnams ci zhi na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams nisan mo zangs kyi mdog lta bur 'gyur te/ sonamo snum pa dang/ sonamomathob dang/ sor mo rnams zlum par 'gyur
da/ ba dang/ sor mo rnams rimakyis phra ba dang/ sor mo rnams rgyus pa dang/ rtsa mi mngon pa dang/ tsho rnams mdud pa med pa dang/ long bu mi mngon pa dang/ zhabs
[>mimanyam pamed par mtshungs pa dang/ glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa dang/ song ga'i stabs su gshegs pa dang/ g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa dang/ drang por gsheg
rgyal pa dang/ mdzes par gshegs pa dang/ rim gyis gshags pa dang/ rmo zhing yangs pa yongs su gyur pa'i bus mo'i lha nga can dang/ mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ gom pa snyoms
pa dang/ sku rnam par dag pa dang/ sku 'jam pa dang/ sku rnam par dang ba dang/ sku zhum pa med pa dang/ sku dgu la med pa dang/ kun spyod pa gtsang ba dang/ khyu mchogaltar kun nas
rab tu dang ba can dang/ gzegs pa yongs su dag cing mngon par 'dod pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang/ dku zlum pa dang/ dku skabs phyin pa dang/ dku ma rnyongs pa dang/ dku skyod
gzhuling ga bcas lta bu dang/ lte ba zab bang/lta bami g.yo ba dang/ lte ba g.yas phyogasasu'akhyil ba dang/ lte ba thogasal mod pa dang/ yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam bar 'byed pa dang/

[“]3 pags pa skyon dang bral ba dang/ gnag bag dang skya ba med pa dang/ sku brtan pa dang/ phyagashing bal ltakhu dang/ phyag yas pa dang/ phyag gi ri mo sna ma pa dang/ phyag gi ri mo mi yo ba dang/
mchu bim pa lta bu dang/ zhal ha cang mi ring pa dang/ mnyenazhing srab la rag pa'ilcags dang/ glang bo che'i nga ro can dang/ snyan cing mnyen pa'i dbyangs dang/ sgra phunasum tshogs pa
dang dbyangs 'jam pa dang/ shangs mthob dang/ mche ba zlum pa dang/ mchab dkar ba dang/ mchapa kun gyis phra ba dang/ spyanagatsang pa dang/ snyan angs pa dang/ spun
mthon mthing dang/ rdzi ma gnag pa dang/ smin ma stug pa dang/ smin ma 'jam pa dang/ spyanadakaganag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma lho bu dang/ sminatshugs ring ba dang/ snyan mo'i
spu nag pa dang/ smin ma'ispu phra ba dang/ sminamarjes su mthun pa dang/ kha dog ma nyams pa dang/ snyan mi mnyam pa med pa dang/ snyan skyonadang bral pa dang/ dbang po thams cad mnyanas
shing skyon dang bral pa dang/ yongs su rdzogs shing mthola mchog tu gnas pa'i zhal gdong dang dpral ba can dang/ dbu shin turgyas pa dang/ dbu skra gAn pa dang/ dbu skra snyug pa dang/
dbu sku 'jam pa dang/ dbu skra dri zhim pa dang/ dbu skramanyam pa dang/ dbu skra snam pa dang/ dbu skra ma 'khums kha dang/ dpal be'u dang/ bkra shis dang/ g.yung drung 'khyil bas
brgyan pa dang/ rgyalamtshan yang dag par gnas pa dang/ dpral pa dung lta bu dang/ dbu mchogatumathob dang/ gtsug tor yara'aphags pa dang/ dbugadugs kyi rnam pa can dang//

kun s mdzes pa sta/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni da chad pa'i dpa bang camanyam pa'i spags par la tagasal/ gsalzhin gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i dpe byad can mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ gsal byed dang gsal byed ma yin pas
mnyam pa nyid la legs par ba tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad gsal byed mad par mnyam pa nyid la rab tu legs par gnas pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan pa legs
par rab tu gnas pa/ dus gsum gyi dpe byad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu mnyam pa nying klob pa/ stong pa nyid thob pa nyid kyi chos thams cad dang dpa byadamanyamapa nyid thob pa/ gnyis su med pa'i
donal legs par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams so zhes pa'o// o a nu byany+dzan sa ma tAsu pra tiN+Dita badzralcan yAlaM kaM/ dpe byad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'o/
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ljon 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyidabang phyug chon po can lags so zhes bya pa rnams
kyis mnyes par mdzad do/ oM2 byang chub sams na khyod legs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyida mchog/ sangs rgyas chos chen khyod legs so/ tshad mad ched du khyod legs so//
aN shes rab dam ba'i tshad du'ang// mdo snga'adinilegs par bshad// sangs rgyas snga mas ma gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyidabang phyug chen pos lhan ms
thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba bzhi yis 'gas mdzad do// sangs rgyas kund la phyag 'tshal// chos kyi sku yi mchog gi mchog/ gdod ma'i sngags kyi donanyid la// rdo ye shes stobs
can l// shin tu sgribamang zhi pa la// rdo rje chos rnams legs gsal/ theg pa chen po'i go 'phang thob// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi lha// gdod nas dag pa dpa' bo che// dbang
byug dam pa mchog gi mchog/ dge chos mchog tu 'gyur ba mad/ khadarakhags da rnams la phyag 'tshal// ces pa'o/ namo sU te/ omA hUM na mosU tas// 'di ni brjod pa tsam zhig
gos// sangs rgyas thamasacad rab mchod pa'o// zhes pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dus rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa rnams thams cad dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyopar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcoldan ' dus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad
slar apa'i dus par mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyong nyid kyi rigs thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskyed par mdzad
du gsol/ donas bcom ldan 'dag jo dzarnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i gsung gi ngo ma thag kho nar/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pal bos de bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
du ka @#// nga bzhin gshegs khams thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po nyonacig cas te/ de nas 'di las yang dag bshad// byang chub dkyil 'khor bla na med// rdo rje yu shes
gsang ba mchog/ sas rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi'o/ dban pa'i sa gzhi nyam dga' la/ me tog 'phreng bas rnamakhargyanapa// kun tu sna tshogs chab zang ba// kun tu sna tshogs sdom
par ni// kun nas snatshogs bya pa rnams// dam pa'i den du bsgrub par bya/ mi yi mchog gamagrong khyer ni// ma tog 'brasabus rnam brgyan pa/ der gnas sngags pas dngos grub
mchog/ gal te 'dun yang dag khri// gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas// mi stos rnams su kun nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub pa//
mamo'i gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas// dur khrodalha yi gnas su ni// rdo rje'adzan dbal bya ba rnams// don dam par ni bsgrub par bya// pad+ma'i skyed mos tshul kun dang/ chu bo 'dus pa rnams
su yang// phyag na pad+madabal bya ba// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// rgyal po'i pho brang nyams dga' ba/ rgyal po'i skyed tshalo rnams ni joTarin chen de yi ni// rinachanabya ba rnams
bsgrub bya// rtags gcig pa dang ba glang gnas// chu klung 'dus pa rnams su yang// sna tshogs bya bathams cad rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// dpal ldan rdo rjesems dpa' ]
dngalha rnams gnas mchog kun tu lo nam mkha'a'amani phyogs gzhan du// gang du mnyam par bzhag pa der// rtag pa bsod nams mchog gyur pa/ bya ba thams cad bsgrub
par ba/ phyogs kun mnyam nyid gnas dkyil 'khor// shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya/ shar lho nub dang byang rnams kyi/ phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig brgyad pa'o// dayi
phyi 'khor lo ni kha dog lnga pa chen 'bar ba'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi'i// rtababs bzhi yis mdzes pa ste// sna tshogs gos dang ma tog 'byung// rnga yabasogs kyis rnam
brgyan pa// dkyil 'khor kun l gnas pa yi// sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdodza ni chonanams kyisasngas// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus
suni gal tadas grub mchog 'dod na// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas khar// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bri bar bya// shar du bcom ldan 'khor lo can/ jo dz+dzasems dpa'i yang
dag ldan// 'khor lo sgyur ba thams cad ni/ sgrig pa ra bcas pa kun bu bya lha ru gtsug tor dkar po ni// rin chen ' ra ba yang ngag ldan// gtsug tor dkar po'i ngos su ni// rdo
gzi brjid la sogs bri// byang du brtson 'grus po ni// gzi brjid phung po stobs po chu// sna tshogs rdo rje sogs bcas pa// rim pas kun ms bri bar bya/ dornal 'byor can gyis
0 byu/ dbang phyug mgonapo'i nub phyogs su// gtsug tor rgyal ba brtson 'grus che// jo dzachos sogs dang bcas pa// thams capasngags pas khri bar bya//
gal tadangos gruba mchog 'dod na/ dbang ldan phyogs su 'phags pa gnas/ ma mtshams su ni ra 'phagasaso// bden bral du rnam rgyal nyid// rlung du de bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o//
rdzasams dpa' sems dpa' che// samasadapa' kun gyi mdun du ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// gsang zhi 'baba'akhrigs 'od zer/// mkhas pas dkyil
'khor rnams su ni// mchod pa rnams ni bzhag byas te// sgrug mo la sogs mad pa mo// de bzhin gzugs sgra la sogs dang// bdug pa sogs gsang chen no/ sgo skyong ba
nibazhi yAn tud/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// kun tu bzang po sogs rnams bri// de ltar dkyil 'khor bri bya ste// mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin// de bzhin 'jug pa
sogs byas la// sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya// jo tsha rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs// dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong pa las/ snga ma brtag pa ji bzhin du// phyi nas da
'a bzhinabar ba// saMsod nams ji bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams// thams cad tshon gyi rab brtag pa/ rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngo bos// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar 'gyur// rang lha'i
bdagi rnal 'byor gyis// dkyil 'khor masacad rab tu grub// chogadaman dpalhag nga sa kyang// 'grub par 'gyur taskyonam yis// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang// kun nasasna ]
tshogs 'khor 'a can// 'khor lo sbyar ba bdag nyid cha'o// sman chan bdun gyi mchod pa che'ang// 'os su rdzogs pa'i zu bltar// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya sa sa rgyus ngo dza/
'dzanasogs kyis// dkyila'akhopo 'di ni bshadu byas pa'o// phyag na pad+mabadag nyir che// pad+ma'i rnam par brtag shes bya// rin po chu yi rin chen rnams// dkyile'akho sna tshogs rnam pa 'o//
dkyil 'khor dal zhing ras tshig rnams// don bar byas pa de nye ni// gsang ba shes pa ma yin na// sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'grub mi 'gyur// de phyir gsang ba thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor thams
cad ng lta ba mi gal ta dngos grub mchog 'dod n// gdon mi za bar rtag tu bya// bla ma la ni yon shul nas// rjes su rim pas bsgrub par bya// brtan pa'i m ni g.yo ba yi// sa rnams zhi
snyang thams cad da// rtsa ba ma tog 'bras bu sogs// bu mo legs par brgyan byas dang// 'dod pa'i chung ma phul byas nas// sur ang rin gyis bsu bar bya// grongadang de bzhin gtsug lag
khang kun dga' ra sogs rgyal srid mchog/ gapal sbyin bya cung zad yod/ 'tsho ba de ni sbyin par bya// bdag gi dngos po yongs gtong ba// sangs rgyas thams cad ba mchod pa'o// bla ma
@#// lani yon phul nas// gsang ba dam pa rmad byung ba mngon par dbang bskurade nas bya// 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong la/ slob ma bzhag nas yan lag kun// phyag rgya kun/
nas bcings byas nas// khams kun rang bzhin rtsa ba dang// sa bon 'bras bu dud pa i// bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ta// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba'i dbang bskums// spyi bo dang ni
dpral ba dang// gzhogs dang de bzhin rgyab tuyang// sangs rgyas rin chen chen po kun// cod pan mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o// dpal ldan sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu// gdugs dkar stongan
nga gnas pa 'o// rgyal srid kun gyi dbang bskur gyis/ yang dang yang dudabang bskurabya// dpal kun gyis ni ma ngomamatho pa// zhes bya'i dbang bskur bshad pa 'o// khams kun rang bzhin glang
po dang// rta mchog du 'bar pa 'am// sang go'i gdan gnas dbang bskur pa// dpal kyisngags nid byed cing// dpal gyi mngon mtho zhas bya ba'i// dam pa'i don gyis dbang bskur pa//
bkra sa sam ni dba' bcu// gang yang bris nas dbang bskur bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// rnam rgyal dbang bskur zhes bshad do// tsan dan rludang bum pa che// gzhan/
ba gyis mi thub sman blugs pa// kun nas dbang bskur ched ni// rtag tu shes rab can gyis brtag/ gzhan gyis mi thub dbang bskur mchog/ dkyil 'khor gang gang bris byas nas// phyag rgya
gang dang gangabakodapa// da de dang de brtag bya// danams phyag rgyu dam bar bshad// dbang bskur ched du sangs rgyas rnams// lha ro rnams ni yodadu 'ang/ smanakyi dam pa mchog gyur pa/
sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bshad// tsan dan dang ni rgya spos dang// ga bur de bzhin gur kum dang// a ka ru dang lha ya shing// tsanadan dmar po nyid dang ni/ saM swa bya rgyu de bzhin mchog/
kun nasas hade ba dang// gi ri kar Na tshos mchod sbyin// sman gyi rim pa rnams su bshad/ lha gnas kun gyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchod pa rab 'jug cing// dang po rdo rje dbang bskur
ba shesab thams cad rab 'jug byed// rin chen dam pa'idam pa ni/ gsod lasogs kyis thams cad nas// sman kun dang nis bon kun// 'bru rnams thams cad bzang po mi/
sas rgyus byin brlabs rnal 'byoralas// dbang bskur don du rab brtag bya sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor rgyu// dpabaskurd pa 'od 'bar ba'o// sas rgyas kun nasasangs rgyas 'gyur// zhes
pa'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud du jiltar nad pa yongs su rdzogs so// ri gas gzugs skal bzong mang shos blo 'byor sogs// phun tshogs ldan pa dpal ldan chos rje yis/
rgyud radi bsgyur las cung zad ma rdzogos pa// dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas rdzogs par bsgyur/// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shA badzra maNA a lang
hi/ @#/ kA ra nA ma mahAtanarA dzaM/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo dzrasing po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+mal spyi bos gus par
[>>phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dang nor bu dang/ rin po chadang/ pad+madang/ las kyis byin gyis
ba/ babs pa'i dmatshig gi a shas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i khyad par dang ldanupa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po cha'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur pa bsdus/
pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo phradam tshig gi ya shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi a shes kyi phyag rgyabarnyes pa/ de bzhin ga yogs pa/
thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud cing las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ ma lus shipa'i s pa mad pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ra ba thams cad yongs su
rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i las mdzad pa/ shugs chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag ba dus gsum du gnas pa'i sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan cing bsngags pa'i nor bu rin po tshochen po dang ldan pa/ kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dril bu btags pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i daragyi ba dan dang//
matog gi chun po dang/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas klubs shing 'bar mdzes pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad legs par yongs su dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi khang bzasa'od mtha' yas pa/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtsug lag khang mo rtog gi 'khri shing mchog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho la dubakram pa'i sprin nam mkha'i khams
mos su khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'khrungs pa'i dbus/ rnam por snang mdzad kyi snying po 'od gsal ba'i gzhal med
khang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas jorje snying po'i rgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsungadang/ shugs rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrus//
ma 'gog/ 'gog par mi 'gyur ba'i yan lag gi spyod yul/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gsal ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i yanyis kyi tshul/ chos kyi
dbyings kyi snying bo'i khang bzangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yoshes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyisnyingapo sa chen po 'dam pa la bzhugs so// ngol
sangs rgyas kyi zhing tham cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun
dubadar tachos ston par mdzad do// thog mar dag pa/ par dudag bu/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/
yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par dag pa'i sgo ston par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/
gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje ganyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ya shas sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yi shesakyi nyim/ rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi 'byung
gzhas rdo snyingapo/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ya shas mnyam paribasus pa/ rgyatsholtar zab pa/ las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgyu'i shes klob pa/ sku dang/
zla gsung dang thugs rdo dzinamamakhalta bu/ sku chen po rdo rje'i sku/ mthalag 'das pa'i sku/ sku rin po chachos kyi sku/ sprul pa'i sku/ las mam pa nyid kyi sku/ byang chub kyisoms//
don yodapa/ yongs su bsdus pa/ dag pa'i thalo ba/ rgyal po tshan/ snab tog/ bzhad pa po/ chos dpo ldan pa/ shes rab 'khoralo/ skad thams cad pa/ sna tshogs/
a pa can/ srung ba bo/ gnod sbyin can/ mtshams sbyor ba/ gtsug tor du gyur ba/ mchog ldan/ rdo rje can/ 'khor lo can/ yo shes can/ khyab bdag chen po/ sku dang/ gsung dang//
thugs rdo rjenam mkha'i dbyis thams cad du legs par bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamad yang dag par 'du bar byed pa/ rdo'i dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i shes sems dpa'

nyam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdordza'i byin rlabs kyi tshashes snying po/ de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i rdo rje rin po che'idabang bskur ba po'i dam
tshag nam mkha'i khams thams cad du sngos pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par byang chub par gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par
dgal/ de yis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa/ nam mkhar thams cad la khyab pa po/ gzugs thams cad yongs su mthong ba/ ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa ma
