pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don yodapa'i bka' lung mdzad pas sems can thams cad manyam pa nyid bla na med pa'i las sna tshogs pa
dun rnam snangami 'gyur mi bskyod pa// rin chen tog lta 'od byed pa/'od dpag med pa rgyal ba'i mgon// don yod pa las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma long lta bu'iyaM
sa kyidakyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mo bshas pa la rab tu gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyiso sor rtog pa'i yashes gnyis su med pa brnyes
pa de bzhin gshegs pa thamAd kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i yi shesad dag par rjes su klog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ chos/
Thams cad manyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su mdacing mnyam pa de dmigs parishas yongs su dag pa mthar phyin pa/ stong pa nyid/
dngade bzhin nyidangang/ yang dag pa'i mtha'adang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smonapa med pa dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi po dag gis sas rgyas kyi shes kyi yul du gyur pa// sangs
kaM rgyus kyi yul mnyam pa nyid la dmigs pa/ da bzhinagshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po nyid la byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs dang mtshams rnams su kun tu gnas
so= de nas yang bcom ldan 'dwa jo rnal 'byoragyi dbang phyug gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur rol bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang dza dza'adzin pa rnamA
spyan drongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'astsal pa dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu 'khor lo sgyur ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i zhalas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
a cad dang dzo 'dzin pa rnams spyan drang ba'i don du thos gol brdabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'phro ba'i snying po chen po 'di da dubarjod pa/ bud+d+has mA dzaAwanA oM hUMbadzras/
dza/ ngo nas de skad ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje'adzin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams ma tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkodapa'i rgyud rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i
sprin yang dag par mthong ngo// de nas yapa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la de bzhinag shags pa rnams thams cad kyis lhan cig yang dag par
spyanas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje slo'i ya shas yongs su bskyed d gnas thams cad du rnam par gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'adasa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gsheg
pa thamasacad kyi rdo rjerang bzhin rnala'abyor gyi dbang phyug gis/ de bzhinagashugs pa thams cad nyid du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs to/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nams dngajo phar dzan pa
rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kya de bzhin gshags po thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes 'khor las sbyar ba chen po'i snying po bdag la yod pa dang bshad par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis byin gyisarlobs shig hUM de nas/ mi bskyod de bzhin ga shags pa dang// rinachaso'abyung gnas de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag mod//
ngonayod grub pa de bzhin gshegs// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lhan cigade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dpal gyi be'al rab tu zhugs so// zhugs pa tsam gyis
@#// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor lo'abad pa thams cad yang dag par ston no// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'al bzhir gyur/ zhal bzhi po
rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings dngamamakha'i khams mtha' mid pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi tshul mngon par btags pa 'di nyid dbyangs kyis ched du brjod bo 'di lta ste/ rab tu
ngaga'akha rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de'i/ 'dilta ste/ byang chub sems pa'i gnas so/ lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub bams dpa'i
gnas so// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa ra ni/ 'dalta sta/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// srid pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltas/ byang l
soms dpa'i gnas so// 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// zhe sdang nas par rag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta
sto byang chub sams dpa'i gnas so// gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa doni/ 'di lta sku/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ngargyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa
ni 'dit+taso/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// mi khom pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gangayin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dba'i gnas so// yid sim pa rnam par dag ba'i
gnas gang yin pa ngani/ 'di lta ste/ byang bsams pa'i gnasaso// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems pa'i gnas so// lus rnam par
dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ngag rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta sta/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnasaso// yid
rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa dran/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa dono/ 'dilta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
gnas so// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa yin/ 'di lta sta/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta sbyo/ byang chub sem
dpa'i gnas go ronam par dgapa'i gnas gang yin pa dani// 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/'di lta ste/ byang chub
soms dpa'i gnas so// dngos po thams cad nam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di sto/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ da rgyu ci phyir zhan/ 'di ltar chos thams cani
rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa sto/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de ska ces bka' stsal nas/
gsang sngags thams cad kyi dbang phyug/ khas sngags thams cad kyi 'dren pa po/ sngags thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa/ thams cad gtsug tor 'khor sgyurab/ bstan
ba la brdzib mdab/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ g+haM 'jam dbal gangal las chos thams cad bsdus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'isnying po 'dilan ciko tsam yang
thosan/ de'i byang chub kyi snying po lozugapa'i bar du sgribapa thams cad chod pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa chen po 'bar bsags kyang/ nams
kya'adul ba sogs pa'i n gnas ong rnams su lhung bas mi 'gyur ro// sdig pa rnams byas pa tsam na'ang sdug bsngal mad cing zad par 'gyur ro// gang gis 'di'achang ba dang/ nyi ma re pha'adon
pa dang/ klog pa dang/ rgyunamachad pa tshul bzhin yid labyed pa de ni/ skya ba'adi ngalachos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting 'dzin so sor thob nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug cu'agyur go
chos thams cad dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba myongabar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po skya pa bcu drugan/ dro bzhin gshegs pa nyid su jo'adzin pa nyid thob par gyur ro/

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa'i tshul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par byang chub pa mngo//
parab sgrub pa 'di ston pa mdzad do// rdo rje ston pa nyid kyis rdo mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen bo dang/ don gcig pa nyid kyis don mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang

rkub pa'i byang chub chen po dang/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pas chos nyid mnyam ba shing mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang/ rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis las thams cad
mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po ste/ 'jam dpal gang ma las chos kyi gnas bzhi po 'di nyan pa byed pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ sgom parubyed na ji srid byang
chub snying po la gnas kyi babadu sdig pa thams cad la kun tu spyod pa thams cad kyang sdig pa thams cad las 'das par 'gyur zhing/ myur du bla na cha dpa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
byang chub pa 'gyur ro/ ngo nas yang bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba re bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ sa thams cad mnyam pa nyida rnam par rgyal bas bsdus pa

zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrung pa bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags spros pa mang pa'o// zhe sdang gispros pa mang nga'i phyir zhesdang spros pa
med pago/ gti mug gi spros pa med pa'i phyir gtachug spros pa med pa'o// chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad sbyos ba med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyos pa
mad pa'i phyir shes ya kyi rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal gang la la shes rab kyi lol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang/ 'dzin cing/
'don la klog par byed na/ 'dul ba'i dbang rkya bar bzungs/ khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams bsang bar gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing/ myur du bla na med
ba yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'gyulo/ hU~Mng nas partsom ldan sarang bzhin kyis rnam par dag ba'i chos nyid brnyas pa'i de bzhinagshegs pas slar yang chos thams/
cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yA shes kyi phyag rgya zhes M bya ba'i shes pa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyi'i 'jig rtan n
zla mul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid du'ajug par 'gyur// zhesdang thams cad m pa dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro chos
thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten chos thams cad nam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten ni thams cad
an mkhyen pa shos rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'khrig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug
bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyanang na byed/ 'dzacing don la sgom par byed na/ de 'dod pa thams cad kyi nang na gnas kyang pad+malta bur
'dod chags kyi skyon glo bur ba'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur zhing/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pardzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
ldan 'das khams gsum ba thams cad kyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs bsaslar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dabang bskur ba'i 'byung gnas yo shes snying po zhes bya ba sa rab kyi
ba rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ dbang bskur byin pas khams gsum bo thams cad kyi rgyal srid yongs su thob pa ra 'gyur ro// don gyi sbyin pas thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs
su rdzogs par 'gyur chos kyi sbyin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pas thams cad kyi lus dang/ ngag dang/ midabad ba thob par 'gyur ro/
des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi yang shakyi phyag rgya b.ris pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'chang khad bzhin gshegs pa rtags pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi ya shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa rdo zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ba dang/ gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas chos thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang/ thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs
po su bzung bas ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang/ rdo'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs thams cad rdo mchog tu grub pa'i don du/
sgra 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gapa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par byed/ 'dzin cing 'donol 'chad cing sgom par byed na/ da dngos grub thams cad dang/ phunasum
tshogos pa thams cad dang/ e shas thams cad dang/ las thams cad dang/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rjes mas dpa' mchog gi dngos grub thams cad so sor thob par 'gyur zhib/
myur du bla na med pa ya dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro// A re nas bcom ldan 'das chos mas cad spros pa mang ba'i de bzhin gshegs
pos slar yang rdo'i yi ge'i 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin mad pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stongapa nyid dang/ chos
thams cad mtshan ma med pa bar gzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan mas dben pa dang/ smon pa lasazhe bar grol ba'i phyi'i chos thams cad ston pa med pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha sel
phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i phun chos mas cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// u0f00de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i nang du gnas pa'i de bzhin/
gshegs pas slar yang 'khor chen por 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha zol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang/ donamanyam pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lor 'jug par ragyur ba dang/ chos thams cad manyam pa nyid la
zhugs nas dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang/ las mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas 'khol thams cad du 'jug pa par gyur ro// hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das de
bzhinagshegs pa thamasacad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyus pa'i snod bzhin gshags pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchong ba dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin ba 'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas ngo bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchodapa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang/ sems can kham thams cad yongs su skopa pas de bzhin/
gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i chog rgyas pa dang/ chos thams cad yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i chog rgyas pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ba dang/
'jiba'ajug pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'donapa dang/ rjod pa rad/ sgom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i las kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i chog rgyas pa'o//
so/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i zhus pa'i de bzhin gshags pasasuratshad sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i tshashas snying bo zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu
( yin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ samasacan thams cad m nyal pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid dang/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul khanyid dang/ sems can
nga thams cad chos nyid nyid bas khro ba chos kid nyid dang/ sems can thams cad rdo rjed pas khro brdo rje nyid do/ dergyu ba'i phyizhin/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub sta/
zla huny+tsa de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad manyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thoms cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
byin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa// shAms cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ thams cad kyi donanyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngomanyid dang/
[g ]chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang/ thams cad lasanyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// b+hi de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha sol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang
chub sems dpa' chun po kun tu bazang po bdag nyid thams cad pas sems can klas cad de bzhin gshags pa'i sing po dang/ rdo'i snying pos dbang bskur pas mas tun thams cad
rdo rje'i snying po dang/ rin po chathams cad kyis dbang bskur bas somasacan mas cad rin po cha'i snying po dang/ dag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying
po dang/ las thams cad khyad pa'i sbyor bas sems can[à]mas cad las kyi snying ba'o// I de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing chu mod pa'i mthar phyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs
bas su yang mu mad cing mthar phyin pa'i chos dang/ slar yang 'di rtog pa dang yongs su mthar g pa byin gyis brlab pa'i don du chos thams cadra mnyam pa nyid yongs su mthar phrug pas byin gyis
brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya dra'i shes rab kyi bkol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa// g shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' mad pa'i phyird bzhin gshegs pa thams cad matha' med pa dang/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir da bzhin gshegs pa thams cang mu mad pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyi chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang/ sa
ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mthar thug pa'i phyir chos thams cad yongs su mthar thug par 'gyurab sta/ 'jam dpal gangal las shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin

pa'i tshul 'di nyan par khyed/ 'dzin cing 'donalasgrom par byed na/ de ni dag cing mthor phyin pa'i byang chub sems pa'i spyod la mthar phyin pa la gnapa nyid kyis sgribapa thams cad las rnam par grol
bas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob pa 'gyur ro// bye de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa/
thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid bsnyas pa/ chos Than saM cad spros pa mang pos sar yod bad pa chen po rdo rjadon yod pa'i dam tshig dus bya ba rdodra chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa klog ma dang/ tham dang/ dbus las grol le'i mchog 'di bka' stsalal/ byang chub sas dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po mchog tu grub pas bde
ba chen po mchog tu grub bar 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po mchogatu grub pas de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po mchog tu grub par
'gyur ba dang/ byang rkubasams dpal chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog tu grub pas bdud sde chen po'abcu'ajoms pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang/
byang chub sems dba'achan po rnams kyi bdud sde rgyunapo rab tu 'joms pa mchog phyagrub pas khams gsum po mtha' dag gi rab ng phyug mchog tu grub pa 'gyur ba dang/ byang sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyi 'jigartan gasum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas malus shing lus pa med pa'isems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang
bde ba'i mgangazhinatu bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ro// saMd rgyu ci'i phyir zhen/ jisrid 'khor ba'i gnas su// mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa// de sridamanyam med
sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// ye shes byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub// las ni thams cad rnam dag pas/ srid pa dag pa
'gyur phyir ro// chagasasogs kyis 'dul 'jigany+tsanani// kun nas med par rtag sdig byed/ de dag rnam par sbyang don du// srid pa'i bar du ba 'dul byed// ji ltar pad+malegs
dmar ba// tshon gyi skyon gyis ma gos ltar// bag chags skyon gyis srid pa ru// rtag tu'agro pan gos mi 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag pa// bde ba chen po nor chen po//
khams gsum dbang phyug thob nas su// de dag donani brtan par byed// ha 'jam dbal gang la las shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa'i tshulakyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin ra bzhin dunang
palas te/ gaba'adonapa dang nyan pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ rjod par byed pa des bad ba dang yid bad ba thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing/ bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod
ba'i ram tshig gi dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa skyab 'di nyid la thob pa 'gyur ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
pa'i shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni nges par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skul gyi sgoste/ 'di ltar/ oM namasarba bud d+habo d+hisat+tanaM/ o be d+hi tsit+ta badzra/ os mnab+ha dratsarusde/ o tsan
maN/ o ani ro dz+ha/ a dzat+tib+hi b+ha ta/ o dzA tipa ri war ta/ om hArA ga d+harmato/ obAr+ya kab tse/ os gA mi ni/ oM badzra wA ka li tsa tapha/ oM sarba ta thA ga ti//
oMswa b+ha ba shu/ oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi tAdz+nyA na bi shud+d+ho/ so[']mabi sho d+han hUM ya/ oM sum+b+ha badzra NihU~M ba'/ ngaso kAmarAg/ oM badzra badzra/ us tA ma Ni/ oM oM a kA ro mu khaM/
oM pradz+nyA par m/ oM paM/ o a/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a gyi/ oM sarba ta thAgatodAka'i kon/ oM sarba tathA ga tatsit+tabadzia/ oM so la ya sarba a pA yo ban nu ni phra ma lha sa/

cha sarba pA la ga ti byA sachas ma a badzrahU~M phan/ sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// dbarjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub rdo rje 'dzin pa
0 chen po'am// de de bzhin gshegs panyid du 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi lam du grag par mi 'gyur zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun/
pa'isems can gyis bri ba dang/ bklag pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ rim gror bya pa dang/ bla mar bya ba dang/ rjod par bya ba dang/ mchod par bya bar yang nus pa ma yin no// gzhan dunagong
gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rtsol kyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na yig gcig tsam yang thos nas/ sems can de sangs rgyas mang po la dag ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par byin/slar
ang mtha' dag ma lus pa rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal sems can gang la la gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma brgyud ru stod kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la phyag byas/ bla maras/ rjod par
byas/ mchod pa byas na/ des shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa'i u0f74la 'dinyan par nus so// gang dun chos kyi rnam grangs 'dirab tuspyod par 'gyur ba'is phyogasang mchod ton du gyur par
'gyur/ gang zag de'ad phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// grangs kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la gzung ba nas/ glegs bam du bris par gyuranA/ de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrigabargya stong mang por

skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ dad pa bdud sdig to can gyis par du mi gcod do/ rgyal po chen po bzhi bo rnams dang/ gzhan yang lha rnams kyis phyi bzhin rjes su 'brangs ta/ de srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang//
[s/ ]bya// sbed pa byed bar 'gyur zhing/ tshul ma yin pas sa byed pa mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa mas cad kyis dgongs bar 'gyur ro// mdor na
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang yid la 'dod pa de dang der skya bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam
grangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjornal 'byor gyi dbang phyug nyin pos rdo'i snying po thams cad kyi rgyan thogal skyen kho'i mngon par rtogs la de bzhinag shags pa thams cad kyi mchog tu
gsang ba rnyapo/ mchog tugasang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dam pa chen po/ 'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzhis yongs su bskor ba/ rdo tshosnying po rgyan cas bya ba'i snying po 'di
khyung ngo// mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyi chos Thams cad gdod nas ma skyes pa'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// spros pa thams cad sngangs pa'i phun chos
thams cad gadong ma nas yongs su dag pa'o// brams cad kyi sems gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad chos kyi dbyis yongs su rgyas pa'o// b+hud+d+haM tsAhIhU~M/ de bzhin gshag

la pany+tsams cad kyi rje yi ga'i tshig 'di brjod pa tsamakyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' nas pa sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad nga snyanyid du shin tu gsal ba rgya chen po snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom
ldan 'dus pa bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang bsdu las byonanas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i bkodapa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs ta/ 'am dpal gzhonanur gyur pal bka'astsalo pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snyingapo rgyan ces bya ba'i dkyila 'khor chen po bshad par su yis
nyon cig ngelegs par nyon la rab tu yodal gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o/ danas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dbos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab yashas la zhugs l/ de bzhin gshegs pathams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po chen po la byin gyis brlab
par byos shig de nas kAng 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi
thugs kar zhugs twA/ byin gyis brlabs nas de las 'khronatu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar rnam par gnas so// des khacom ldan 'das kyis de bzhinagashig

pa thamasacad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo tshosnying po'i rgyan bzhin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga'adzin snyoms par zhugs sa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rjen po snyingabo'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyigasang ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa chen po bka' stsal pa// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur ba// rdo rje snyipo gsangan/
po po de bzhin gshegs pa kun ldan dag/ rjesnying po dang mtshungs pa// khams rnams thamasacad rnam par sprul// sas rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsi dang// gzhan yang bcud len dang
mtshungs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyigasang// rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin grong// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi po// rtababs bzhis zhi rnam par mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag
ldan dar dang me tog chun pos spras// grwa yi tshanams thams cad dang// sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// jo rin chen rnams kyis spras// rdo rje'i thiga rnams kyis smras
pa'i phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gurngab bya/ de'i yang phyi lol du bya ba// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi yi mi 'od// khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du// sdegs pas kun s yongs bskor du//
daltar rnam bzhi'i ma pa dang// risrid grong ni rnam pa bdug/ sbyor ba bdunadang yang dag ldan// dar dang ma tog 'phrang pas brgyan// sgo dang sgo khyud rin chen ni// angadag mtho ba
legs par gnas// de yi grong gi nang du mi/ rab zhugs 'khola'adra b.ru// rdo rje glig gis yos su bskor/ ka kha brgyad kyis 'bar mdzes// rdo rje ka mdun gnas rnams su
[s/ ]bkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa'o// de ltar 'khor rnam pa gnyis/ nang gi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa// chadams pa yi snying bo che// rje 'khor los rnam par nga rgyan// gru bzhi
pa dang zlum po nyid// gru gsum rnam par yang dag byung// zla phyed rnam pa dang mtshungs pa// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi slar yang/ slob dpon rdo rje yang dag 'byung// shes rab chen
pos rayaM brtag bya// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyud pa// pad+macha ga'i 'od mtshungs la// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyanagazhag par bya// dkyil
'khor gyi nadabusanyid du// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa 'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni sa kun tu // shes rab can gyis gzhag bya ba// sa tshega mchog bzhi nam bzhin// go rims
bzhin du yang dag pa// dzachan pasad ba'i/ 'khor lo can gyi khyab bdag gzhag/ gdugs dkarargyal pa'i gtsug tor dang/ gzi brjid phung po skal barma// rnam par 'phro
byed rnam rgyalanyid/ de bzhinagatsug tor lnga po ni// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad la// yongs su bskor nas snam bu la// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// rdzong shugs kyis song/
nas ni// dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhi po ru/ mi bskyong lasogs rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyagabri// mi bskyod pa yi dkyil 'khor ni// khru 'od lta bu'i mdog tu@#// rdo sams
[n ]@#// dpa3sogs rgyalag/ kun sags yi dbang phyag las/ rtoslob dpon stobs po la// sa ban pos dgod par bya// rinan 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor/
du rdo dzarin chen sogs kyis dgang// derdzachos sogs gsang ba yi// dkyil 'khor dpag med pa'o// rdzolas la sogs ldan pa// don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// gnyis pa
ny+tsA 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ rnam gzigs la sogasasangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor kun tu dir ni bri/ tshordzasungapo rgyal po che// khyab bdag gsang
'kho pa'i chos dbang phyug/ 'dod pa'i don kun grub pa'i phyir// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// blo gros rgya mtsho zad blo// byams pa bdag nyid chen po dang// nam mkha'i snying po grugs chen po/ kun
tu bzang po nyid dag dang// phyag na rdo bdag nyid na// kun s 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// 'jam pa'i dbyes ni gas kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bzang phrimamad/sgrib
bkrams cad ngs pasal// de nas sa yi snying po mchog nam mkha'imadzodamadzod dam pa// lag nanan blon mad/ na song kun ni'ajoms pa ni// drab can gyi 'od cas byu// dpe'
po 'di dag gsang bachu// dkyil 'khor 'di dag bri bar bya// 'khor lo de ni dor nas ni/ blo gros ldan pas phur song ste// shar dusangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya go rims
bzhin du dgod// 'khol mdzes pa'i dag legs na// do dpal btsupad rtsis bya// gtsug tor m ba sna tshogs la// rdo rje pany+tsas rnam par brtson// lhung bzed dang ni'akhar/
gsil dang/ chos gos kyang ni khyad par du// shAkyas ngag srid par/ sangs rgyas kun gyis 'apa gsungs// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas// da rnams blo ldan brtan pas
gri byang du 'jig rten dbang phyugagi/ phyag rgyu'i tshogs mchog de bzhin tu// pad+maut+pal nyid dang// spyi blugs pags pa'i g.yang gzhi dang// dbyug gu'i shing ni mkhas pa yis//
mamyos pa 'u bri bar bya// sa yapalce ru son gnas nii// phyag na rdo rdzobadag nyid// slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// phyag rgya'abad bas bri bar bya// sngopaTi sha dngani// dril bu
tumadzes pa dang// dbyug gu dang ni 'o pa dang// dbyug pa rdo rjes mtshon pa dang// lcags sgrog dang ni rtso gsum yang// 'di dag dpa' bo'i phyag rgyu'o// dkyil 'khor nubatusong nas nii/
'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo dang ldan// gsang ba'i [“]chos ni dam pa'i mchog/ brtson 'grus chen po'i phyag rgya bro// ut+pal 'khor lo rdo rje dang/ la grwa mang ni khyad par du// 'od pa dang ni dgra sta
nyid rma bya dang seng ge nyid// phyag rgya 'dini brtson 'grus che// mkhas pa yis nidagod pabya// 'khor lo'i grwa nalogs gnas par// ngo tshosgag mo lasogs bri// phyi yi 'khe phale'i grwa
ru ni dordzobadug pa zhes bya sogs// bdag nyid chen po 'bad pa yis// mchod pa 'di dgatre bar bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// gzugs kyi rdoT/
la sogs ming// gzugs sgra de bzhin dridang// khyad par du ni ro nyid dang// reg da chos kyi dbyis dwapa ni/ mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// sgo yi rlung ni thams cad du// sgo skyong
banidagod par bya// de bzhinadakyil 'khor gnyis pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// go rimos bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi// umanams 'bad pas bri bar bya// nam mkha'i spyan/
zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba dang// shes rab pha rol phyin m yang// phyag rgya kunudang yang dag ldan// ji srid de bzhin gshegs rigs// thams cad shamadudagod pa'i bu//
de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// byang gi phyogs su song nas ni/ gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma chu// khro gnyer can dang grags 'dzanam// khyad par du nidapa la bdun dang// mnga' bdund ni
dbyangs can m// de la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// bran dang branamor yang dag ldan// de bzhin pho ta mo// gas pa'i phyag rgyalhan cig bri// rdzoshugs kyis song nas ni// lho yi phyogasasu
rab phyin la/ ma ma kA dang lcags sgrog dang// khab rtsa rdo rje'i mtshan mi mchog/ de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis/ nub kyi phyogs su song nas ni/ 'dzerani phyin nas shes ldan gyis// sku
can stobs chen bri bar bya// de bzhin 'dam bu mda'i rgya dang// lha mo bla mas 'od zer 'dra// dkyil 'khor kun gyimanaMms rnams su// de bzhin ba'i sku nanam// 'badapa yis
ni bri bar bya// rab bkranor gyi blo gros dang// 'gugros byed pho nyalnga dang ldan/ kuyi cha ru bri bar bya/ jo rdzomadung rtsi zhes bya sogs// sgo yi nang mi thams cad du// so skyong ba ni
rnam bar bri// gzhan gyis mi thub lha mol// de bzhin ral pa gcig ma mchog/ rdo dzadrags mo lha mo che// rdo rje kum b+hi yang dag bri// dunas blo ldan dakyil 'khor ni/ thams
cad lasanI'athon nas su// shar gyi rmani thams cad du// sngags pa many+tsam par bzhag pa yis// khro chen gzhan gyis ma grub pa// de bzhin mi g.yo zhes bya dang// khams gsum/
rnam rgyal snying po ni// mnga' bdag brgya phrag lnga yis bskor// shar du bris nas sngags pa yis// donas byang char song ste/[6]mgrin khro bo chen po dang// skarama'i spyan mikhyad
par du'o/ khreganyer rim pa rnam bsgyings pa// khro bo blo ldan brtson 'grus cha// rnga nyagran rnams thams cad dang// ma mo stong gis yongs bsor bar// 'jigarten mgonagyis bka'
stsal to// de nas po gros ldan pa yis// lho ya phyogs su song nas su// der ni phyin ta brtson chen po// khro bo chen po stobs po che// rdo rjes mtshan pas legs mtshan pa// shes rab
zla// chen pos dgod par bya// khro be zla ba'i thig le dang/ de bzhin khro chen rje tsa'achang// khro bo gzags ma stobs po che// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang/ rdo rjes
'ogs 'og dang// de bzhina'ajigs pa'i mig can dang// rkang bas bsnun pa rdorje mchog/ gsang dang rab gsabarjes 'gro dang// bran dang po u rjes 'gro ba// rjes 'gro can bye khro
po ni stong phrag gsum dang phyad kyis bskor// daltar phyis nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogs su phyin nas ni// dar nisongs brtson chen po// gshen rdzo mthar byed ces bya ba// gdong
gapalag drug pa// khro bo yi ge bdun zhes bya// khro bo'i gtso bo stong phrag ni// bdun dag gis ni yongs bskor ba'o// dkyil 'khor man thams cad du// khro be gtum po thams cad bri//
panas shulta'o sa nas su// rang la rgyal ba thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ni// rgyal ba nyan thos sribarabya// de nas thams cad bris nas su/
pa rnams tshangasasogs lha dadag/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rnam par bri// dbang phyug cha dang khyab 'jug dang// zla ba nyim zhes bya dang// gza' brgyad dang ni'ajig rtan skyong// rgyal chen ris nibazhi
[“/ ]po dang// de bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum nyid// 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams// 'phrula dga' gzhan 'phrul dbangabyed rnams// tshangs pamadunan 'don pa rnams// tshangasa chen namA
dang 'od chung rnams dang/ tshadimapa'od nams dang/ 'od gsal rnams dang/ dge chung rnams dang/ chadamade dag rnams dang/ dge rgyas rnams dang/ sprin med rnams dang/ bsod
nams skyas rnams dang/ 'bras bu tshab rnams dang/ mi chab rnams dang/ mi gdung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba rnams dang/ shin tu mthong ba rnams dang/ 'og min rnams dang/ dag
pa'i gnas pa rnam dkyil 'khor thamasacad kyi mtshams su dgodabarakhya'o// de nas dbang ldan du dbang ldan dang/ dbang por dpang khro dang/ mgam lha dang/ gshin rjer gshin rdzad ng/ bdenubral

dubadan bral dang chum+b+hanulha dang/ rlung du rlung lhadang/ lus ngan du lus ngan rnams dang/ phyi rol tu khor yug tu chen po'i ri'i rgyal po khri bar bya'o// rab dag gi nang du rgya mchan po bdunaM
dgod par bya'o// phyi rol gyi shar phyogasesu khro li gzhan gyisami thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag na po dgod par bya'o// lhor rdo'ajigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya chen bo dgodapar stsalo// nub tu

khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gshin rje gshad kyi phyag chen po dgod par bya'o// byang du rta mgrinagyi phyag rgya chen bo rnam pa dgod par bya'o// de lta bu'i gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khon po ra dang
me tog gi chun po dang/ sgo khyud dang/ gags dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan sgreng ba/ drab dang drab phyed pas krabs pa/ dalta bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris la bsgom par bya lo/ de'i phyi
rol du 'gro ba lnga po gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du dbus su ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i tshadadapag tshad brgya stong phrag dumanam par bsams nas/ de'i stabadurjesangaga'i/
khri la bzhugs pa'i sas rgyas bcom ldan 'dras gzhag par bya'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor rir gyis bkod nasatabar spyod pa thams cad kyi cho gas mchod nas/ zhibar zhugs te dgags
pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ dam tshig gis bcings nas matA pa'i byas te/ mchod pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dwang/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ spro ba dang/ bsdu ba la sogs pa byas nasaM/
de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du sgom pa las byang sgyu/ de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad dang rdo rjesaras dwapa'i bdag nyid ni rnam par sang mtshapa'o/
zhes bsgom par bya'o// de lta bu las langs nas po'i snyams pa 'an pa'ing snying rje dang/ byams pa'i 'dren byed dwang/ mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenagyi kham sa mtha' las 'das pa rab
'bams rgya mtsho'i sprin mas cad dud bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sngon gyis kun nas bkang sta/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'bab pas rdorjesams dpa' dzaM mdzad kyis phyag rgya rang
gi lus zhugs nas phyogs thams cad hU~M gi yi ge'i sgras rab tubasgrag por bu'o// bsnyen pa bzhis rol ba dang bcas pas phyag byas la bzlas pa bya ste/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la//
cho ga bzhin du dro slob bon gyis bkugs bcug sta bcings la dmal bzhag par byas nas// rdo rjes gol gyi sbyor ba dang/ kun nas 'babs pa'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbabasto//
snying po 'di'azhis de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad dung bdagamatshungasaso snyam du bsam par bya'o// dal 'arinithams cad 'babs ba'i snying po bzhi po 'gyur ro// a A oM//
bdag byin gyis rlob pa la sogs pa byas nas/ slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshus pa yin no zhes nga rgyal brgyadapar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i sa gol gtogs nas/ sangs rgyas thamasacad spyan drang bar bya'o// de la sIng po ni 'di yin te/ bsngos mA dza/ AgatsaA gats+tshan+tu sarba tathA ga ta sa/
bod+his tApa 'i bri tapra kAraha/ saha/ zhes so// oM badzras mA dzA/ A gats+tshA/ Agats+tsaM/ sarba ta wA ga ta badzra yo gishar sat+tan yos ha a ha a/ nas dpi'on gshegs pa thams
cang dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad yongasasu rdzogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyirigs dang/ rgyud dang/ gzungs rnams dang
lhan cig dkyil 'khor du 'dusan byon par 'gyur ro// donas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyagargyan po bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa btonal chog jilta ba bzhin du
mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byas nas/ sgo bzhi po rnams su rdo lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas te/lasachen po dam pa'i phyag/
rgyus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug bar bya'o// oMsam+batathAgata/su ra tabadzra badzrasatAdza/hU~MyaM ho/ a b+hi tiT+Thitu/ sarba ta thA ga tam sdomaN+DalaM/ zhes so// de nas gsang ba'i mchod
pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/ ngo bzhinagshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab par bya sta/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsol la
'dabs lags kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlagatu gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzod du gsol/ bdag la dngos grub thams
cad stsal du gsol/ ji ltar bdag gis ri bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi mchodaparab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi yul kun s pakapas byin kyis brlab par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas 'dir rdorjesnying po'i rgyan chos kyi dbyings
kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas par 'gyur ba ni/ de nas gos dmar po phrag par gzar ta/ dobazhinagshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshol ba'i thal mo sbyar nas/
sngags 'dis snyan gasan dbab par bya ste/ sam a ho/ sa ma ya hU~M/ sa ma ya badzra d+hiSh+ThanaM/ kumAn+taM/ sarba ta thA ga sa ma ye dzam a d+hitiSh+Tha nusathabumaMpra be sha yachu/ patipA lu

mtshupU dzAny+tsa ma pra yatsan/ pra bis+saM/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzamatsA a lang kA'i/ mahA badzimats+tshAl bra tibal yanaman+tadziny+tsam pra yats+tsha yan+tu/ de nas slob dbon gyis de'i thal mo me tog dkapo'i
'phrong ba stags 'dis btags nas/ nang du ma tog bzhi dang sor mo'i rtse mor ma tog rir bcugal/ donas sngags 'di brjod cing gzhug par bya'o// hUM hUM hUM/ hUMshu bkapo bzhi dzI AlaM
a d+hitiyaM/ sarba ta wA ga ta sa ma ya satA pra be shAmi/ danas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g.yogs bcings la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyerachos kyi
dbyings nam mkha'i khams rab tu khyab pa'i sbyor bas dbanug la/ sngags 'dis me tog gtor bar bya'o// sngags ni/ sam yo haM/ sa ma ya hUM/ sa ma ya haM/ gang lam tog rnams
lhub panyidada'i lhar byin bar bya'o/ de nas chog bzhin du sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o// namasarba ta thA ga ta/ ta TataT/ d+ham rnyam/ badzahaM/ bkratab rgyu/ hA puN+Dadasnyadam
ka/ hasi tAlaM bod+ha ra/ ka haka ha/ tsu lu tsu'u/ mumu/ anA yus par bi dar/ badzra badzod+mata badzran taM/ badzratA/ badzra g+hA Na/ badzradiyaki+irAyi sa pra bisha badzrapA NasI/
daa ma li sha/ sh+tsaN gyur+Na/ pA ts+tsha pA ts+tshA/ g+ha smyu ba ma gats+tshapa ya/ blum ya b+hU ma ya/ pA tuyamo Ta ya/ a bshaya/ dzaladzalnga/ dzam+b+ha ya dzaM lA ya/ la glu la glu
sarba tathA ga ta dzA ka ra/ pa par/ d+harma la/ bi dza ye haMhabadzra kIrahu kr-itaswAhA/ dbab pa'i dam tshig go/ de ltar phab nas/ kye khyod kyis gang dgo ba 'am mi dge ba mthong ngam zhis
dri'o// de nas dod pa'i nagshegs pa 'amaM/ rdo 'dzin pa 'am/ dgo ba 'am/ mi dag khabadagagis 'dit+ta bu mthong nas sna bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon gyis de thams cad de/
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du yos su bzhagal/ mig bcings pa bkrol la/ dbang bskur ba'i don du dekyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ de'i dbus su kha dog thams
cad kyis pad+machan po 'dab ma brgyad pa yid du 'ong pa 'am/ song ga'i khri rang nyid kyis bris te/ de nas de la dar gyi bgo pa dang/ ma tog bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchodal/ khyad par
ngugazugs dad/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan la sogs pa nye bar mkho ba dang/ dung dang/ rdzo rje dang/ rnga bo tshe dang/ dpal
[– ]sogs pa dang/ garadang/ glu rnams kyis legs par mchodanas/ cod panalnga'i dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lo rjeslob dpon gyi go 'phapalasngags 'dis rab
gzhag par bya'o/ osarba ta thA ga tA badzra[@]a b+hin+d+riny+tsa/ oM badzrasatwa a b+hi khi 3/ oM badzrang sna a b+hiTi'u/ oM badzrapad+ma a ki/ oM badzra badzra a b+hi'u/ spyi bo dang/
dpral ba dang/ mgrin pa dang/ snying kharing/ lta ba dang/ rkad pa nus/ rje ngan gyi bar du yi ga'i phyag rgya bkod la rang gi lha'i gzugs kyi sbyor bas blta bar bya'o// nga de ltar dbang bskur nas
rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming byas nas rdzordza'i tshig rnams bslab par bya'o// de la rdo rje'i gnas tshig rnams ni'adi dag/ rangabazhin gyis rabur mod pa'i phyi nang galus rdo rjes mas dpa'iganyis
rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba'i thibs po thams cad nges par 'joms par 'gyur ro// rig pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ma rig pa rje'i gnas te/ rdzordza'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i dngos po
yongs su shes pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// hA mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir mtshams med pa'i mthA'ajo'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di lta bar gyurapa thams cad du nges par rig par
'gyur ro// yaM 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' mnyam pa nyidakyi phyir 'dod chags kyi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'dod chags 'dachags dang bral ba'i chod yu'ajug go/
byams pa'i mtha'amanyam pa nyid kyi phyisazhastang gi mtha' rje'i gnas to/ jorje'i gnas 'dis nyes pa thams cad gacod pa'i chodadu 'jug go/ mo shes rab sgron ma mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir
gtemug gi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis mun pa bsal bar byed par 'gyur ro// raM sems can thams cad sems can gcig pasA/ rdzo'i gzhas/
'disas mA ya mnyam pa nyidal 'jug pa'i donAdang/ sems can gyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i don pu'agyur ro// gisoms can thams cad sams gcig pa ste/ rdzordza'i gnas 'dis sems
rjes pa la 'jug pa'i donadang/ sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba mngon par rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// a sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ste/ ro'i gnas 'dis
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i don dang/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdzasasurtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// oM chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te/ ngo tsha'i gnas
'jis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su rtogs par 'jug pa'i don dang/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rjesasu rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// aM bdud kyi las thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
las te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis las thams car rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang/ las thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'i don du 'gyur ro// daM ngag thams cad de bzhinagashog
pa'i gsung sta/ jo'i gnas 'dis sgra ji bzhin pa thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'idon dngo/ brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// hU~M/ chos mA
[o/]cad ma skyes pa ste/ rdzo'i gnas 'dis mi'apho mod pa la 'jug pa'i don dang/ skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba'i lam las 'da' ba'i don du 'gyur ro// maMchos thams
cad ma byung bas/ rdorje'i gnas las 'gog pa mad pa 'jug pa'i donadang/ chos thams cad 'gog pa mad pa'i don du 'gyurano/ khaM'adil rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa// bdag gi
nyid retho rtogs te// bdag gis da nyid rab brtags nas// sas rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam mang 'gyur// de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang/ phunasum tshogs pa thams
cang dang/ gter thams cad dang/ 'khor lo thams cad dang/ do thams cad dang/ ral gri dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang/ dngul chudang/ bcud len rnams dang/ rgyan du'agro ba
da rkang 'og dang/ mi snang ba dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ 'khor los sgyurab nyidadang/ brgya byin dang/ tshongs pa dang// khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po nyid dang/ byang chub
sems dpa'i sa rnams de myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro//hu yid ni rtsa gcig gyur po yis// sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgoms sazhi/ ima'i dgyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// sangs rgyas
sku gzugs bsgom par bya/ sbyor ba de yi bko'adrinagyis// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam ma 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// 'od kyi dkyil 'khorab gsal/
byabya// ba'i kun tu bzang po phyag rgyan// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas sgom// le nid kyi sbyor ba yis// kun tu bzang po 'drab r 'gyur// rdo rjerin chen phyag rgya che//
legs par mnyam par bzhag pas sgom// rgyal bo'i dbang bskur nyid dmami/ yang na dbang phyag thob par 'gyur// rdo rjechos kyi phyag rgya che// da nirang gis brtan por bsgom// 'jig
na kun gyi dbang phyug kyang// thob na dngos grub gzhan ci smos// jo rdzolas kyi phyagargya gang/ de bzhin nyid kyi 'ong gsal pa// rdo rje'i sbyor bas po bsgoms pas// ngoji'i rnal 'byor
brtan por 'gyur// dalta bu'ibyang chub kyisams kyi mchog sgom pa phyag chen po'i ya shas nyid yin no// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// phyag
rgya kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// dam pa'i don nyid thob par gyur// gzi brjid phung bo phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgomaM par bya/ gsang ba'i rgyal srung thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta
ci zhig smos// gdugs dkaragatsug tor chen po ni// dam pa 'i don dubasgom par bya// gtsug tor ya shas thob 'gyun// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhigasmos// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag
rgya che da ni yang dang yang du bsgom// chos kyi rgyal srid rnam rgyal nyid// mdor bsdus pas ni thob par 'gyur// rnam rgyal gtsug tor phyag rgya yis// dam pa'i yi ga bsgom par bya//
legs par rab gnas 'od zer can// dngos grub yi nas thob par 'gyur// dalasogs pa mthar yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// gtsug tor rnams kyis
legs bshad pa// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog/ da ltar rnala'abyon pas bsgoms na// lhag pa'ilha ni gcig pu tod// thog mtha ma mang zhib// rang byung mchog tumi 'gyur
ba sas rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor pa// rnal 'byor dbang phyug go 'phang mchog/ sangs rgyas yongashes dri ma mang// bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur// de bzhin ba/ shegs pa thams
cad kyi gtsug tor gyi dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rnams so// danadabazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi yi ga'i rang bzhin gyi yang shas pul bslab par bya'o// zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyod
pa'i phyi chos thams cad kyi sgoste/ rnam par 'byed pa'i donadushes par bya'o// oM khaM/ a zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM A A hUM/
a/ pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ don dam par chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yos su rdzogs par blta ban bya'o// o paM/ na zhes bya pa chos thams cad kyi
ming dang/ gzugs dang/ shes rab dang/ chos dang bcas pa la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM naM/ nga zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba dang zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs/
su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM daM/ sa zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med pa las yang dag par 'dus shing/ yongs su+o namongs pa
[G• ]drang rnam par sbyong ba dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang/ khams dang/ skya mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i bden pa la bar len pa mi dmigs pa'i
phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ osru/ ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhinanyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyangs la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par blta'o// o taM/

'a ka zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam par sminapa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bya'o// oM kaM/ mazhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang/ dran pa med cing snying rje cha ba dang/ shes rab/
rno ba las byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bshad do// oM maM/ gu zhes bya ba ni zabamo gting dpag dka' ba'i phyirechos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM kaM/ dza

zhes bya bar skyo ba dang/ rgyab dang/ 'chi ba las yongs su rgyal ba'i rang bzhin mi phyed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dzing+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi phyed
pa'i rje yongs pa rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// o d+haM/ sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yos su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta babulo/
ongasha/ kha zhes bya ba nigang zag dang chos kyi bdagamad pa nam mkha' ltar gsal zhing chos thams cad dang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyisgor rnam par gzhag go/
oM khaM/ kAzhes bya ba ni g.yo bskya ba med pas mi'ud pa'i yo shes so sor dmigs tachos thams cad yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM kaM/ nga zhes bya
ba nithams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM daM/ thazhes bya ba ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pasasas rgyas kyi zhing yos
su sbyong ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM thaM/ D+ha zhes bya ba ni mtha' phyin pa dang/ mur thug pamed pa dang/ sgrib pa thamasacad rab spangs pas zad pa dang mi skya ba'i

yang shos thob pa'i mchog tu byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshapado// oMt+taM/ dz+hazhes bya ba ni drima'i rnam par damigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// ots+tshA/
lus rnam par byed pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyangs te rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM kaM/
soms rnam par 'byed pa mi sa pa dang/ rmos pa dang/ bag la nyal pa rab tu spangs nas byang chub kyi sams bskyed parang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyi'i sa thams cad kyi sgor
blta bar bya'o// oM kaM/ ngag rnam par 'byed pa ni ngag gi sbyos pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i phyis thams cad kyisgor blta bar bya'o// oM thaM/ tsha zhes bya ba ni grib
mam dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ daatsha/ rgyu zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'dres pa ma dmigs nga na don dam par gnyis nga tshe den
chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM hUM/ Ta zhes bya banicu so dang bral ba dang rdo rjesnyams pa 'dzin pa'i phyir chos kyi sgor bshad do// o TaM/ pha zhis bya ba ni chos thams cad
dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang pa'i ye shes gsal ba'i pha chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// owaM/ Da zhes bya ba ni 'tsho ba las grol ba'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba grub pas so
sor thog pa'i chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// o TaM/ 4zhes bya ba ni mosgo mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyisgor blta bar bya'o// oM khaM/ chos thams cung cabar
zhi ba'i phyir nye bar zhi pa ni chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ o aM/ chos bzhinanIpis par 'byung ba'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jug pa'i phu chos/
thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// o yaM/ de kho na nyidani spros pa thams cad rnam par spangs ba'i phyi'i chos thamasacad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ oM taM/ ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par grol/
ba'i mtshan nyid kyi donayod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo bshad do// oM hU~M/ yongs su gzung ba mad pa ni'athab pa dang rtsod pa spang ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams kyi sgor lta ba/
bya'o[：]on+ti/ kun nas nyon mos pa med pa nimtshan nyidam pa dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ oka kha ga g+hag/ rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid gzung ba'i
phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gnas so// o tsa chadza dz+ha1/ snang ba nigasal zhing 'bar pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// o Ta waDA b+ha Na/ sgom pa ni chos thamasacud kun sbyor ba dang bral ba
yang dag par sdud pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// o tatha dad+dan/ gzhimad pa ni chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ o pa pha ba b+ha ma/ byang chub
ni chos mas cad drim med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// e a ralawa/ mya nganalas 'das pa ni glo bur pa thams cad nges par dor pa'i mchan nyidarang/ chos kyi dbyings so sor sbyong
cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ shes mkhyen pas sangs rgyas kyis yongs su thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM sha khas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa
thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes rnam par dag pa rnam par 'byed par byed pa'o zhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par nges pa'o// de nas rigs
shukla//thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chog rgyas par gyur pa ni/ sngon bzhinangs par byas nas ni// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyidabasgoms nas// ni rab chen po gru bzhi pa// nIn/
chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// yi steng du rdo rje ma// de yi stong dupad+magazhag/ 'dab ma brgyud pa ches bkru ba// rnal 'byor gnasazhes rnam par bshad// dbang po gnyis nisnyoms
'jug pa// yongs su rdzogs par bdaganyid kyis// sangs rgyas h+phams cad nyidabasgomasan/ nganibaskal pa'i mthar thug gnas// sas rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya ni// 'od brer gsa' ba'i
dkyil 'khor ma/ rnal 'byor thams cad basgom par bya// mnyam mang sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// phyug chen po rnal 'byor cho// rnal 'byor pa gnas mi bzad pa// sangs rgyas
kun bdag bsgoms nas ni// sas rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid rma/ sems can kun la thams cad du// gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms// de
dngos grub lag na gnas// rang bzhin gis ni 'od gsa' chos// gdod nas dag cing ma 'dres ba// gang tshe yang shas mthong ba yi// de yi tshon dag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thamasacad mdo
bsdus pa// sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// gang tshornal 'byor pa bsgom na// sna tshogs las ni byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya chen po'i yasha so//
'khor loskyar ba rgyal po cha// kun mchogs yi dbang po ni/ rdza stor bas bsgoms ni// mnyamamad 'khor losbyar ba mtshungs// gzi brjid yud po phyag chu//
legs par mnyam par bzhag pas sgom// 'bar ba'i 'phrang bas 'khrugs shing mas// pad+marag mtshus pa'i 'od// ngo sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// rang zhing gzi brjid phung ngo//
'gyur// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nani// 'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor pa yis// sems can dag panyid du 'gyur rnam par gsal pa'i gtsug
tor rgya/ bam gri 'bar ba'i 'od kyis 'khrugs// zag pa med pa'i sbyor pa yis// mnyam med gsal pa'i gtsug tor mtshungs// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che// 'gas par ma pa
bzhag pas bsgom// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sbyor ba yis// de yim pa'i spyod yul 'gyur// sdo dmatshigs sache// legs bamanyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ kun tu babrang po'i
sogs gzugs kyis// mnyam mang rdordzasams dpa' mtshungs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// joams dpa' sems dpa' cha// byang chub sems dang mtshungs pa'i
'od gtsug tor lnga ldan stobs po che// ron+da'i sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis// jorjesams dpa' 'drab 'agyur// rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// denom pa ni bsgoms na ni// 'gro
ba thams cad 'gugs byed na// skyo bo gzhan ltasmos ci dgos// ro chags pa'i phyag rgya ma// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ skye dgu thams cad chags
[S]'gyur na// bud mdwagazhanan+tasmosaci dgos// ngordzolags pa'i phyag laM// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// legs so ba ragasol bas// bud mdathams cad chom par byed// byang chub
kyisoms kyi phyag rgya'i yashes so// jo rin chen phyag rtsam// 'bar ba 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// dpral ba'i phyogs su gnas pa bsgom// de yis da thod dbabaskur
thob do tshagazi brjid phyag rgya che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od// snying khar gnas pa bsgom pabya// kun mkhyen yo shasastor bar byed// na chen tog gi phyag rgyany+tsa// legs par
mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ sbyin pa pha rol phyin pa mchog/ sgrub po dam pasardzogs par byed// rdo rdzo bzhi d pa phyag rgya cha/ legs par many+dzam par bzhi g pas bsgom// dzoji bzhi dapa ltar
gyur te/ rtanibs dgu dga' byed 'gyur// dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i cha shes so/// pad+mapad chen pad+mal// dag pa'i chos ni mnyam bzhag pas/ dam pa'i don du bsgom
par bya// mnyam med rdo rjes dang mtshungs// shas ba shes rodzino// bsgoms pas dani rdo rje 'chang// shes rab ba rol phyin dag pa// stong nyid sbyor bas bsgoms nani/ dam pa'idon
du bsgom bya da// mnyam mda'ajam rubyas dang na mtshungs// rdo rje rgyu yi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag bsgoms nas// chos kyi 'khor la kun magartsa/ mdor bsdus sa red/
yis bskor// rdo rje sna ba phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don dubasgoms nas ni// rdzobazlas pa'i nus pa yis// ldem pa'i dag med yis 'ad// chos kyi phyag rgya'i angashesaso// dze
las kyi phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don dubasgoms na ni// kun nas kun nas rang nyid kyis// dzodzolas byed pa 'gyur// jorje srung ba byams pa ma// rong chos zhes grags pa ste// chos kyi sbyor
bas bsomasanani// jo srung ba dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje ganod sbyin brtson 'grus che// khro bo chen po stobs po che// dam pa'i rtenagyis bsgom pa bya// jorje gnod sbyind mtshungs 'gyur/
khu tshur phyag rgyalaM/ lus ngag yid kyis de bzhin du// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms nas// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin par 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// dag mos mngon
bar dga' ba ste// 'phrang ba yi nidabang bskur ba// grums mas pasgra dbyas byed// galAms rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// dri mas bzang po'i dri yin te/ dmatog byang chub yan 'a gnyid/
sgronams many+dza'adag gsal ba'o/ bdag pas bdag po dag khartson/ lcags kyus dbang phyug 'gugs byed na// skyo bo gzhan lta smos dgos// zhags pas dbang po/ ting 'gyur na/
gdug pa'i sems ran smos ci dgos// lcags sgrog gis ni'aphrog byed dang// tshangs sogs dbang phyug chen po'apa'i ching// 'a bas pas thams cad 'babs 'gyur na//
dman pa'i mi dgasmos ci dgos// 'di nyid kyi nisbyor ba yis// chos kyi yi ge mchog gi ni// phyag rgya ye shes rab sbyorebs// sbyarata myur du bsgrub par bya// 'di yi sbyor ba shes par bya//
phyag rgya'i 'khor lo khyad par du// spyigatsug snying kha rkang pa'i bar// yi ge yas ni yosagang bar// gzugs bar nag cig gi go 'phang gyur/ sams rtsa gcig gyur bsam gtan gyi//
sa la rab gnas pad+mani// dbang chen gyi ni gnas zhes bshang/ dbang po gnyis ni mtshungs sbyor bas// dbang phyug kyang ni bsgrub par bya// dbang nA ga ni gru bzhi pa// dbang chen gyini
[% ]lasasu bshad// chu ni zlum por shes par bya// pad+ma'imtshan ms rnam par mtshan/ zhi bar byed pa las dpaljon// zhiba'i don du da bshang ngo// ma ni gru gsum shes par bya/ sum mdo
yi ni gnas su gnas/ dbang du byabasgrub don du// pad+ma rA ga'adrab 'i 'ong// mngon spyod la na brtson 'grus che// rlung gi dkyil 'khor brjod pas/ ral gri ya ni phyag rgya'i dbyibs//

dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// so'o dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar// nag po yang ni khyod par du// dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi nas ni// tha ma'i bar du rab tu brtag/ dang po rdo rje rab tugazhaka/
de yi rjes surin chen te// pad+madang ni las rnal 'byor// grub pa'i go 'phang rim par bshad// phyag rgya thams cad kyi yi shesaso/// de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag par de nga zhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi phugargya'i shes bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gnyis su med pas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ rtag pa dang skud pa
yongs su dag pas chos thams cad zhi ba dang/ mtha' dang/ mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// zad pa'i sgo dang/ zad pa'i mtha' dang/ zad nga 'i mur thug pa dang ldan pas chos klams cad
cod pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgyas rgyus btab pa'o// mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha'i rnam par dag pas chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mi ga lta 'das yang
dag par 'das pas chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sems can thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyis phyag rgyas rgyus bab/

pa'o// chos kyi dbyingasasu yang dag par 'du byed kyi phyir chos thams cad dabyer mi spyad pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ byang chub kyi sams dang h+phami dad pas chos thams cad byang chung kyisoms kyi
phyagargyas rgyas btab pa'o/ chos kyi dbyis phyid pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// ngo bo 'de med pas chos thams cad stong pa'id kyiphugs
rgyas btab pa'o// 'tsho ba med pas chos thams cad bdag mad pa'i phyag rgyus rgyas btab pa'o// skad cig ma nyid pas chos thams cung mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab
bo pa'o// skye ba dang/ rgyab dang/ 'chiba'i mtha' dang ldan pasachos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' de bzhin nyid pas chos la ma
cang de bzhin nyid kyi gargyas rgyas btab pa'o// gdod ma nas yos su dag pas chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas sam
panyidapas chos thams cad chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// spros pa'i dmigs pa rnam par grol bas chos thams cad mchinam med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rab

thams cad las rnam par grol bas chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// dngos po mad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyagargyas rgyas btab pa'o//
phung po lnga yongs su 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyus rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa phugargyas rgyas
btab pa'o// shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir chos thams cad zhi ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// don dam pa'i bden pa yang dag par 'du ba'i 'i chos thams cad bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btang
pa'o// 'tsho ba rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad drim med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mchog tu mthar phyin pa'i chos thams cad 'khrugs pa mang pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas patapa
pa'o// ston gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyus btab pa'o// 'jal ba'i dpang du byed pa dang dbang du bya ba med pa'i phyir chos thams
cad sgro 'dogs pa mad pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// byed pa pos byas pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa so// rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'byung
ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'gag pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdong ma nas
skya ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rtogag kun tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa mdang 'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gzugs rnam par lta ba med pa'i
phyir chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gnas spos su bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i pu ga rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mi mthun pa'i phyogs
(mas cad nyob mi dmigs pa'i phyi'i chos thams cad la rjes su sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas bab pa'o// mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir chos mas cad las kyi rnam par smin pa/
[s]@#// mad pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skye ba dang gnas pas rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas baya pa'o// nam ma ba dang
[>khyad par mang ba'i phyir sa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thamasacad gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par
bshes pa'i phyagargyasorgyas btab pa'o// snying po med pa'i phyir chos thams cad phung po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po drangabs pa med pa'i phyir chos mas cad khams dang skyo gad
kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas chos thams cad khams dang sku mchod kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ mtha' gcig tu'ajig rten
gyi lam rnam par dag pa'i phyi chos thams cad 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// lha'irjes su phyid pa'i phyir chos thams cad phyag rgyan po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /
mtha' gcig tuchos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir chos thamasaud chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad kyi las sna tshogs byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//
thams cad dam tshig thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i phyir chos thams cad dmatshig gi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi sathams cad rab tumi gnas pa'i phyir chos lums cad sangs rgyus kyi/
phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas patab pa'o// theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ gsang sngags kyiphyag rgyas rgyas ba pa

pa dang/ phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ dkyil 'khoragyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ rdo rnga ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/
yanas thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas bab pa dang/ ma long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ mnyam pa nyid
kyi yushes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ so sor ga pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ bya ba sgrub pa'i yaNashes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang/ chos thams cad chos kyi
dbyis rnam par dag pa'i shas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yo shas kyi phyag rgya'o// mu/ 'jam dpal phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag nimi mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa'i ye shesakyi tshig/ de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rlig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yang shas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa theg pa chen po chagasta/
'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan sa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyag rgya nyid kyi phyag rgya'i tshig gang gis/ phyag rgya tshig 'dInAlas kyis kyang
chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong skud par byed do// sems can ms cad kyi sos kyi rgyud laphyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// a i a I/ sngags pas phyag rgyun ji lta
bus rgyas btaban/ de bzhin gshags pa'i ya kyi phyag rgyu yang dag pala'a'o// hU~M/ myur dum skyes po'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// des dani da pazhin gshegs
pathams cad kyi sbyor ba thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i phyag rgyar ye shes su gyur pa ni/ snying gi dbus su rtag bsgom bya// pad+machanapo 'dab brgya pa/ 'bar pa'i 'phrangangs 'khrigs pa'i
'od[： ]zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// de yi stang du rtag sgom pa// yi ga yi ni gtso bo mchog/ thog ma tha ma mang zhi ba kha ba bamo'i 'od 'dra 'od// dpa' bo kun zla lhan
dkar/ nyima'i dkyil 'khor ltar 'od gsal// zhi ba'i chos kyi'ang ba'i sku// kun mkhyenaangashas kyis gang ba// ngabazhin ga shegs pa kun gyi gsang// sA ya na dang mtshungs
mchog/ kha yig mkhan 'drar shes par bya// thig le nA dras rnam par sbas/ gsang ba chen po mchog tumadzes// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ de yi steng du 'od ze che// 'bar ba'i
tsa 'phrang 'khrugs ba'i 'od// doji rdo rje lta bur gnas// spyi bor rtsa mo lnga dengaldan// de yi steng du rtag bsam pa/ yi ga mchog gi go 'phang ngo// man ngag mchog las shes bya ste// [C]zhan/
nguni ngamisna// sangasargyusamakhas pa mas cad kyis// mdor bsdus nas ni 'ang gsus so/ ma par grol ba gsum thob nas/ thob 'gyur 'di ni gzhan dumin// lce ni skad la sbyar
par bya// sna yi rtsa mo' yigang+g+haM// dbang po gnyis zhisoms 'jug pos// phyag rgya'i go 'phang tshig gis ni// shes rab ldan bas rangasams sgrol// snang ba lang cing spros med pa//
shAn tu mchog tu phrar shes bya/ khyab bdag bsod nams ye shes dngos// bsam bya bsam gtan brtson byas ta// mig dang sgron ma'i 'od bzhin du// ra yig 'bar ba dang ldan pa//
mgrin pa 'bad pas bsum nas ni// dkar po ser po sngon po'i 'od// dmar po yang ni bdag gis sbyo// 'bar ba 'dadag 'bad pa yis// 'di dag yang dag nyar won bya// snying
khar gsal bar byas nas su// de bzhin thams cad spyi bor song// gnas de las ni'athon nas kyang// dbung po thams cad dgang bar bya// de las 'thon nas 'jig rten ni// mtshungs
par kun nus thams cad du// slar yang de ru'ongs nas no/ de ni 'jug par dpa tubasam// yid kyis daltar bsgoms na// rang nyid 'khor 'thosasgyur lta bur// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyo
bas legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// dbang po lngas dmigs nas yang// mi rnams lus ni dag par 'gyur// jis dbu med yon tan dang// ldan pa kun tu gnas pa ni//
zla// bku gnas bcug ste bcings nas su// dbang du bya ste bsgrub par bya/ de rnams lhan cig yos brtenanas// sngags pa mchog gi dngos grub thob// gsang ba'achog
tu dgyes pa na// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste// zhi ba'i chos kyi rim pa mchogi/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rdo rjesams dpa'i dngos grub gang// de 'grub gzhan lta smos
ci dgos// mchog ni rtag par shas bar bya// bar mas phun sum tshogs pa ste// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma mchog/ smon pa med pa zhes su grags// chos kun badag mad pa yi mchog/
kun khyen yongs rdzogs par byed// sa bcu yi ni stobs dag gis// pha rol phyin pa thams cad thob// jo rdzasams dpa'i mchog bsgoms na// rdo rjesams dpa'i 'dra bar 'gyur// red
'di ni bcud kyis len// gnyis sumed pa'i ya sa mchog/ theg chen mchog tu yid 'ongs pa/ stong nyid bsgom pa 'i bdag nyid can// gnyis su mad pa yo shes mchog/ gang gis rtag tu
sgom byed na// de yang rdo rje 'dzi rgyal po// yon tan mchog las skyes por 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// bud med lus ngag yid sbyor pas// yongs rdzog a ling gtsum pas//
a mag gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud mo pakha dog ljang khu gang// rgyan rnams kun kyi rnam par brgyan// da tshong ni sngags pas bstan/ mnyamo mdagasang ba'i yo shas mtshungs// bdamed/
0 gang zhig kha dog dkam/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i 'od// de dang lhan cig sngags pas bsdad/ dam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bu mo gangawIkAkha dog pas// u la yi rgyun 'chang ma//
sngags las de dang lhan cig gnas// shes rab pha rol phyin mtshungs 'gyur// bud med in+d+ra nIl mtshungs// gsang ba rdo rje rjes su sbyor// rig 'dzin rnams ni rgyal po ni// stobs chen grub par
'gyur ro// sang nyin mar ta ka mtshungs// gang gis rtag t+tabastanupani// de yang 'dzin rgyal po// ma du gsang ba'i dam par 'gyur// pung dpad+mar ga dang// rgyan rnams kun gyis
rnam par brgyan// dbang po gnyis nisoms 'jug pas/ rdo 'dzin ma lta bur sgrub/ sangs rgyas kun dang mnyamasbyor ba/ gnyis su med pa'i ya shes mchog/ bsam pas rtag sgo pa
ni= mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// dran pa rta bar gzhagapa bzhi// mchog gi gnas kyis bsgoms nani rnal 'byor mchog gis mi ring bar/ ngo tsha'adzinapa lta bur 'gyur// yang
dgaspong ba rnam pa bzhi// legs par mnyam par bzhag pa sgom// dbang po gnyis snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med 'jiganadabang phuga mtshungs// so so yang dag rig pa ba'i/ shin
mam bzhag bsgomasan ni// rdo rjesangs rgyas ting 'dzin mchog mam mda'ajam pa'i mchog da 'dra/ mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi/ rdo'i sbyor bas bsgom par b// dbang po gis ni
chas @#// snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rdzo'adzin pa lta bu ste// rdzu 'phrul gyin rkang pa bzhi/ shin tumanyam bzhag bsgoms nani// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdzu 'phrul
ldan pa'i mchog 'gyur darlus pa yini gnas bzhi po// tshad med pa mi sems kyi ni// gyur bar bdagakhasgomasan// do'an pa lta bur 'grub/ sbyor ba'i bdaganyid dbang po/
dam pa'i donagyis bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam mad rdo rjesangs rgyas mtshungs// yid kyi stobs ni rnam pa lnga// na tumanyam bzhag bsgoms na ni//
'khor losgyur ba brtson 'grusacho// stobs 'dzin lta bu nyid du 'gyur/ byang chub yan lag nan ban// gsang sngags sgom pas bsgoms na ni// rtog pa'i ye shes sbyor ba yis//
khyab bdag chos kun ' dzan par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi lam/ kun mkhyen yang shas rdzogs byed pa// de bsgoms pa gyis ni// 'jig rtan so nas sku 'da'//
rjes su dran pa rnam pa drug/ bdag nyid rtsa gcig gis bskyoms na/ sngags pa rdo rje 'dzin paru// sngags pa dus mi ring bar 'gyur// stobs bcu po ni yang dag bsgoms// bsgoms pa'i
rnal 'byor nyid kyis// bsod nams ya shes yongasardzogs te// rtag tu stobs bcu'i dam par 'gyur// pha rol phyin banu yongs su rdzogs// stobs rnams dang ni dbang rnams dang//
tsa0 sa rnams kun gyis ngos bskyed nas// myur du mtshan ma dag par 'gyur// rnam grol gos kyis bsgribs nas su/ dang a nu ma shin tu bstan// rje ngar gyis kyang de bzhin du/ mchu
yis mchun yongs su bzung// 'bad pas ma du A ling ga/ byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje a shas brtson 'grusan/ ngo dzad byings su bdag bton pas// rnam pa sna tshog
kar na// rnal 'byor shes pa dbastan bya// bud med rnams kyi dam tshig 'grub// dordzasams dpa'i mtshungs par 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi b+ha gas bstan// ling ga myur du gang
bar 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di'i mkhyen pa yis// stobs rgyanas nigs rgyas rab tu grub// gsang ba 'dzinidam pa ste/ sangs rgyus kun gyi skyob pa'o// gsang ba 'di yi sbyor ba yis//
yi gdam pa grub par 'gyur// sas rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i// chos M su grags pa gang yin pa/ da rnams sgom byed gtso bo ni// dngos grub thams cad rab u0f7cgas pa'o//
ma 'dres pa la chos bco brgyad// sangs rgyas chos su grags pa ste// de rnams bsgom pa dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang ba rab sdur byed// bsam gan bzhi po thob nas ni//
gzugs mad pa yi rtag par yang// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa po// byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// chos ni mchog tu rmad byung ba//
de rnams bsgoms pa dang ldan pas// byang chub sems dpa'i skyob pa 'o// sngags rnams thams cad rab 'grub cing// sbyor ba thams cad thams cad ngu'o//
ngosan 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas chos nyid bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam// ashas ri la ba da dka'/ mchod dang dwapa bskur byin
wA babs bas// rang 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// bshags dang gsol ba gdab pa dang// bdag nyid dbul ba de bzhin no// ngas sogs la yi rang zhing// de bzhin ngos su
bsngo ba dang// byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// khyad par duni dus kun tu 'o// thog ma bar dang phyam red du// thilta bzhin du rjes mas pas// sangs rgyus thams cad bsgrub byas/
'di la zetshom yod ma yin// 'gro ba sems kyis spro ba ni// brtan pa'i snying por legs par bshad// stong nyid de bzhin nyidalaMsamyan/ rdzordzasams dpar de bshad do// 'gro pa
thams cad bkug nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub sbyar bar bya// don yod yashes dag pa ste// rdo rje rgyal po mchog ces thad/ ngodzachags pas chags gyur nas// rang bzhin gyis
brtan bar 'gyur// 'gro ba ma lus lus med pa// de yisomasani chags par bshad/ chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// rnam par dpon zhing gnyis su med// gang tshos/ sa dag pa'i
00 bdag nyida mthong// de tshado rdzolags par bshad/ jorjesams dpa' bzhi po yis/ ming dang brtani sbyar ba'o/ sas rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// ston pa mchog tu dam pa 'o//
khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid skyo/chos/nad gnyis rdzogs par byas pas// sa dang pha zeb phune mag gtso/ rdo rje dbang bas las byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes de//
nog pa mad cing yi ga mod// 'od kyi dkyil 'kher gzi brjid mchog/ brtan pa rtag pa nyid du 'gyur// nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod yon po// chos rnams thams cad dbang sgyur ba// yid
bzhin nor bu rdo rje// rdo rje tog ni bla na med// ya shas snang pa rin chen che// rmad du byung ba ngas par mthong// de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ni// dza bzhi d pa zhes su glags//
chos kyi bdag med las byung ba// gnyis sumad par shes mchog/ chos nyid dam pa bsam du med// rdzong chos zhes bya bar dran// ngo rdza blo gros snang ba che// shes rab ya shis dang
mchog/ zag med shes rab chen po pa// de ni tshe tshanon por bkashang// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor lo// gnyis su mdAlas byung bar mchod// yan lag bcugs na 'brel ming//
rdo rje rgyu las nges par bshad// dgos paskad ni spros pa'i mchog/ yul rnams kyis ni pagasha9 pa ste// sas rgyas kun gyis bzos pa che// de ni rdo rje skya pa'i bshad/ sems can kun kyi
ngonal sbyar// sas rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// gdod nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor che// de 'jo rdzalas su bshad// bla na med pa'i byams pa che// bsrung ba'i bya ba gongan mang//
dag pa'i chos ni brtson chen po/ rdo rje bsung bzhes sugrags// shes rab thabs kyi khro bo sku// saargyas kun dang rjes 'thun pa/ nyon mongs thams cad za ba che// de ni ngo rje gnod sbyin brjod//
lus ngag yid ni yang dag spyon/ sgrib pa medacing yi gi bral// de bzhinag shigs pa kun gyi gsang// de ni rdo rje mtshamasasbyor ba shad// jo rdza ya shes rnal 'byor ni// sangs rgyas kun kyi stobs
pon// thog ma tham mdazhi pa// rig ba mchog ces bya bar bshad// de nas ya'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i grus de bzhin gshegs pa la
cad legs par mchong nas glur blangs pa/ oM sarba bud+d+hapa ra mnAr bu rgyushud+ma/ lal lo/su b+hagasur tam hAm AA rim hA bo d+hin+d+hishud+d+hashu/ so shA ra b+hu po dam ka ta shA ga ta byas pa/
somasabaskyod las 'khrungs pa// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'is// gdodonas zhibalaphyag 'atsal// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa po// ro dz+dzacan kun la
a phyagasal// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjemo// sangs rgyas byang chub la phyag 'tshal// mi dmigs go 'phang la gnas pa// mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal// 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs po
tsa rma hU~M gi yi ge ma lus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa mtha' dag dang// shin tu yongs su mya ngan 'das// 'jig rten dbang phyugamagon bzang po// rdordza[-]shes dris mod// rnam par dag pa doNaM
mchog/ dngosagrub thams cad rab gsol byed// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi mgon// dus gsum bsam pa dpo sgyu la/ sems can rnam la phan don du/ 'byung ba khyod la phyags la
dud// rdordzasnying po rgyan las/ dkyi'i khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sar yang 'dus par gyur nas// de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje snyingapo'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i don dubarjod pa/ de nas yang dag
bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// jo rdzasnying po zhes grags pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes// sgo khyud rdo rje'i
gzugs brnyan dang// phyag rgya dang ldan rab tu mdzes// dkyil 'khor du yi dbus su ni// 'khor lo gnyis ni rab tu gnas// rtsibs brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs// rnam par bya pa 'gab
par btag/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor nang gi ni// lta ba'i gnas su legs brtags pa// pad+ma chen po ra ba brgyadapa// ga sar gtams pas rab tumadzes// de yi lte ba'i dbus na ni//
khyab bdag rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// rnam par snang mdzad brtson chen po// sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/ de yi 'khor kun tu // de bzhin gshags pa brgyad/
rnams dgod// shar dudagod bya 'khor 'a na// gtsug tor dkar po nub tu gnas// gzibarjid phung po lho ru 'o// rnam par rgyal u byang du gnas// dbang ldan rnam par gsal ba
wAbri mar ni stang 'gro dgod par bya// stong 'gro chen po bden bral du// nang du rgyal brtan po gnas// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rnal 'bur ldan pas 'di
dag bri// mi bskyod pa ni shar du dgod// lhoru rin chen 'byung ldan no// nub tu 'od dpag med par 'gyur// byang du don yod grub pa'i ming/ zla ba'i dkyudal 'khor brtan pa'o//
dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// rdo sems dpa' la sogs bri// thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas// 'khor ni dkyil lo 18 'phrang ba rnam par dgod
bya pa rang gi phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar rdo ga mo la sogs pa'i// lha mo 'bad pas dgod par bya// rdo rje bdug paso/ de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// rdo rje lcagA
kyal sogs pa/ sgo srungs 'bad pas bri bar bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor la gnas par// kun tu bzang sogs la bzhin// rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor rnams dang// pho nya yi ni 'khor dag
dang khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang// de bzhin pho 1po'am// rgya mtsho i ni dkyil 'khor ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o// phyi ru phyi rol rdo rje'i ming// dkyil 'khoral ni 'bad
pas bri// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas su// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po sde// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen ming// dbang po la sogs lha thams cad// ma mo kun dang srin so
rnams// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang// de bzhin lha rnams thams cad dang// brtson 'grus na po na 'kha' lding// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// delta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas
su/ khyad par du/mad par bya// ma tog bdug spos rol mo'i tshogs// de bzhin bza'adang ston mo sogs// 'phrad ba'i rgyun ni sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams mod/
parabya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi cho ga des// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas// 'khor 'a kun gyi cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad machod par bya// de nas slob ma thams cad
gzhug/ yongs su dag pa khyod padu// byang chub sems ni bskyed nasasu// byang chub bsgrub pa rjes sbyod pa// chog shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug/ 'dren pa rnams pa mchog tu
gzhug/ dordza'i dbang bskur sbyor ba yis// dbang bskur pa ni de nas sbyin// sang ga'i khri yi stang du ni// dar dang ma rtog rkun pos sras// dkar po'i gdugs dang rin chen rgyu pA ra rgya so/
u// 'bar ba dang// de yi g.yas kyi drung du mi mkhas pa yis nigazhag par bya// bdan rnam pa snachogs dang// sna tshogs kyis rab mchod pa/ g.yon gyi drung du byams/
chung nas/ 'bad pa yis gzhag par bya// chanasmon kun gyis gang ba'i// bum pa legs par bzhagacus te// jorje'i ming gi dbang bskur gyis// de la rang gis dbang bskur bya
ngoming gis dbang bskur ba/ mkhas pa yisazhi slar yang bya// kun gyi cod pan dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// chos kyi cod pan dbang bskur dang// sos rgyas

ma dbang bskur ba/ khyad par du ni stags pas bya// de la ma ga cho ga yis// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya zhing// sgrub po kun la smad mi bya/
sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad la// 'da' bar mi byasma mi bya// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang// grubamatha'i rigs pa thams cad la// smad par mi bya blang mi bya// dal mngon par dga'
