dpa' ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras bdag skyes// thogam zla ma mad zhi ba// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas thamus chags las 'khrungs// de bzhin zhe sdang rmos las
'khrungs// mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kun drang/ dbu ma'i gnas la gnas nas su// de nyid dam tshig shes nas su/ sangs rgyas byang chub yongami spong// lus can kun la 'tshe bya//
khyed kyis bsnami bya ste// phrag dog bya bar mi bya'o// dam pa'i chos nispang mi bya// byang chub sems ni mchog tu bde// chang gi btung ba sdang bya ste// pha rol bud mad rnam par spang// thams
cad mkhyen pa yongs mi dor// rtag tu srog chags gsad mi bya/ sems can kun la snying dang// byams pa yang ni rnam par bsgom// sems can rnams la phan pa ni// yang dang yang du yongs bsdu
bya/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa// dam chig nyida'adi dag ni// slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas// mkhas pa yis ni bstan par bya/ de nas phyag rgya rdos bcing ba// go rims bzhin du
bstan par bya// phyag rgya 'di dag khyad par gyi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// thal mo bstan par bsdam bar du// ma rtogazum pa'i tshul du mdzes// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis//
pa'i thal mo sa su bsgrugs// rtse mo thams cad legs brkyang ba// pad+ma'i phyag rgya zhes su brjod// pa'i mtshan su ngas bcings pa// ngan rdo rje thal mor brtags// sor mo nyAms cad nges
bsdams pa/ rna bsdams pas legs bcings pa// gomo brkyang sta stong du bstan/ sangs rgyas byang chub nas gsol byed// khu tshuranang du sa nus ni gnyis
[>ka sbyor bas yongs su brtag/ 'khor la sgyur sogs phyag rgya lo// dam pa sbyin pa yin par bdu/ sas rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// dmatshog phyag rgya 'di yin no ming mdan bcug
khu tshur gyis// kun gyi rtsa morayongs su brtag lodz+dza nam pa legs par sbyar// jo nan bo zhes su bsgrags// mthe'u chung srin lag khu tshur las// gung mo legs par brkyang nas su//
mdzub mos mthe bong yos su sbyar// 'khor los sgyur ba nyidagasol byed/ brkyang ba'i rtsomo sbyar bsi/ gdugs dkar zhes ni rab tugrags// srin lag dnganimathe bong sbyar// gung
gnyis ni brtag par bya/ gzi brjid phung po'i phyag smyor// gzi brjid phung po nyid gsol byed// nga nyid la gri lta bur sbyar// rnam par rgyal ba zhes su grags// de nyid rgyal ba zhes bya ba//
dordzoldan pa de bzhin gshegs// khu tshur snying po ldan byas pas// gtsug tor rnam pa'i 'byung gnas te// thub dka' sas rgyas thams cad kyis// stong du 'gro ba zhes su bshad// rdo rje
bsdams pa yongs su sbyar// dmatshig kun gyi 'byunga gnas te// gamo'i rtsomo mchog tu gyur/ mthe chung dang nimab bong brkyang// lcags kyu'ada' yi sbyor pa yis/ legs so ba'i
sbyar bar bya/ gung mo jorjod rin chen rtswa// phyi ba gzi brjid mchog gi mchog/ rgyal mtshan gnas su nges par sbyar// bzhadapa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// dbu
ma pap+palta bu bskum// ral gri 'dzin pa 'jam pa'i dbyas// 'khor lo sbyar ba'i 'khor los sgyur// kha nu phyi lo'i phyagargya#// rdo rje sna ba nyid du 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya che//
ga mtshungs rdo rjesna tshogs can// chos yongs sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// dodza srung bar brtag par bya// mchob gnyis ni rnam par gcigs/ jo rje gnod spyin zhes su bshar// khu tshur bsus
pa khu tshur gyi// rodzitha' mo snying khar gzhag/ rdo rje sgrog mo zhes su grags// yongs su sbyarab spyi bor gzhag/ rdo 'phreng ba zhes su brjod// thal mo sbyar ba gdong du grol// sde rje grum
rjes su bsgrags// 'gyodatsang 'dapa'i sbyor ba yis// de ni rdzordzogar mar bshad/ pad+mo'i thalaM mo gdong du dbye// spyi bor yongs su sbyar gzhag/ dasopakhar mthe bong mnyam pa dang//
rab tu brkyang ba byug pa 'o// lag pa stong du ongs brkyang ba// gzugs kyi phyag rgya nyid du 'gyur/ lag gnyis rna pa'i lam dugazhag/ sgra yi phyag rgyanyid du bshad// zhi drug pa'i sbyor
yis/ du yi phyag rgya zhes su brjod// gdong du snyam pa phyob mi/ ro yi phyag rgya zhes sukharjod// mkha' la myur ba'i sbyor ba yis// reg pa'og pa zhes su bshad// mthe'u chung gnyis ni yos
susbyar/ mdzub mo lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// nga nyidazhags pa'i dbyibs dang ni// lu gu rgyud kyin mkhan brtag/ bzhi pa rdzong dril bu zhes// rdo dza'abebs par/
[>rnam par ngartag/ phyag rgya kun dang dba'irgyu// blo gros ldan pa rang gis brtag/ thal mo yongs su sbyar labasdam// mdzubamo gnyis po bskumanas/ rin po che yi rnam par bcing//
kun tu bzangapo blo ldan kyis// palas rtse mortsalobaskum// sems kyis byams pa bsgoms nas so mdzub mo spyar bcu gnas ni+ti/ la gri'i rnam par brtag pa ste// 'di nam mkha'i
snying po yi// phyag rgya sasargyas kun gyis bsngags M// danas ral gri'imachon chayi// rnam par nyara gnas lo// phyag rgya 'di ni rnam 'gog par// thams cad kyis ni yongs su brjod//
gar ni snyad pa'i sbyor ba yis/ rdo rje thal mo rab tubarkyang// pad+malta bur rnam par brtag/ pad+ma'i lagapa blo ldan gyis// nged mo tog zumatshul dang// ut+pal rnamapa ltamadzesapa// 'di
nipa'i sgrol ba'irgya/ pad+ma'i mgon po zhes su grags/ mtsho pa gtsugs pa dang ldan pa'i// kha dpa' drab yigs par brtag/ 'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgyas// kha yi phyogs su rab tu brtag/
pad+d+hi'athal mo ragralab yi// khro gnyer du nita bar sbyar// jordzothal mo 'bebs pache// dpal gyi snying po rin chen ldan yid bzhin nor bu'i rnam pa bzung// thal mo legs par rab tu bskyang/
mi zad blo gros phyag rgyu cha/ sas rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// gar risdudapa'i sbyor ba yis// rin rdordza snying khar gzhag/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste// nam mkha'i mdzod/
stabar byed/ rdorje chen po'ags par brkyang/ mthe'u chung mthe bong nges par bcing// lag pa gnyis ni sa par brtag/ blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// sngo thal mo stong du

phyage rgyas// dodza la gri zhes su brtag/ de nyidashag ti'i rnam pa ni// 'jam pa'i dbyas ni blo ldan gyi'o// gshin rje mthar byed mdung rtsar 'gyur// mdung cun por rab tu brtag/

pa stongabacings te// dbu ma gnyis ni rnam par spangs// mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam bar bya// mthe'u chung dang nimathe bong brkyang// 'di ni ro rtsa 'dzin napo'i/ phyag rgya donakun sgrub byed yin/

po rgyu rdo rje lta bur yos su bshad// rdo dzachen po rtsalta pa// khro bo gzagasamar rnam par bshad// mchog gi rtsi mo rtse gcig bya// do rtse mo nyid kyir bshad// lag na rin chen phyag rgya
ni lag gnyis legs par brkyang bar bya// sor mo pad+ma'i dbyibasasu bya/ skul byed lhamor yongs su bshad// thal mo yongasasu sbyar ba las// mdzub mo dungani mthe bong dag mig

gtan phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// 'di'i rnam par snang mdzad rgyu// sangs rgyas kun gyi dona mdzad pa'o// mi bskyod pa yi sa la reg/ rin chen tog gi mchog sbyin bshad// bsam gtan phug 'od

srin po bdag nyid chen po'i'o// mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba ni// chu lha'i zhags pa nyid du bshad// mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dag/ rgyal mtshan lta bur legs par brkyang// rlung lha rgyal mtshan/
phyagargya ni// lag pa gnyis kyis rab tu brtag/ dbu mgacig pu legs brkyang ba// dbyug to'i phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// gnod sbyin kun ci dbang phyug ni// lus ngan bdag nyid chen po/

bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor ro// nyi ma'i 'od zer stong phrugani/ lag pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dbang po'i rdo lda mtshonachaltar// 'di'i lha rnams
kun gyi rgyu// dpa' bo kun gyis rab tu gnang// dri za rnams kyi phyag rgyani// ga len lta bur rab tu bsgrags// dga' byed dbang phyug phyag rgya che// dza ja'i sgra dbyangs rab tu 'bar// sangs

sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'gyed dang 'du ba'i de bzhin no// lag pa zhags pa nges bcings pas// de ni phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// 'di rnams dam tshig phyag rgyaru// de bzhin gshegs

tu gnas// dri za'i grong khyer lta bur snang// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang// mig 'phrul lta burashin tu ni// 'gro ba thams cad rab tu gsal/ mi rtagasdug bsngal stong pa ru// sridang/
thams cad mdor bsdus pa/ bdag med pa zhes mthong nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang dpa' bo yis// sgyu ma smig rgyu brag cha dang// phru ba chu yi chu bur dang// gzugs brnyanalta bur
'jig rtan ni// de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs// thams cad mgal ma'i 'khor 'kho ltar// bri chun khyud mo ji bzhin du// gar gyi gnas kyi tshul 'dra ba// zla ba gnyis dang
mtshungs par blta// rtag tu glog gi 'phrang ba 'dra// sbrang bu'i sgra dang mtshungs par gnas// 'khor ba shin tu bsung ba ste// rgod malikha dang 'dra bar gnas// 'di ltar shes shing rtogA/
nas ni// bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rang nyid kyis// sems ni legs sgrub rnal 'byor pa// de la phyagargyu rab tu bshad// stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang// smonupa med pa'i rang bzhinalas//
lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni// dam tshig gsum ni brtags pa ko/ phyago rgya sngags dang lha nyid dang// de nyid gsum rab tu gnas// bdag nyid sbyor pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mtshan nyid
gcig rta rnam par gnas// de 'di dam pa'i phyag rgya ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal to// phyag rgyu yi ga bral ba ste// rnam pa mad cing snang ba med// dngos po med pa'i chos rnams
la dngos po'i de nyid du bshad// dngos ma dngos po'i rang bzhin yin// dngos med nyid kyang dngos po yin// dngos dang dngos mdu rnam par grol// a 'byor yang shes mchog tu bde//
rtog gamad cing snang ba med// 'khrul pa med cing yi ga mod// stong pa nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i soms// gang tshod ltar nyid gyur pa// de phyag rgya rnams dang stags// lha nyid du yang rab tu
brtag/ sngags las phyag rgya ma mthong zhing// phyagaskya las kyang sngags min cing// rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni// gnyis med sngags dang phyag rgyur brtags//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces byapa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ phyag rgya ma pa'i phya bu'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur bachon po rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
thams cad kyi rigs bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub ba de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig bar gsan nas/ 'og min gyi gnas nas byon te/
dga' ldan gyi gnasasu bzhugs nas/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la chos bstan nas/ zas gtsangagi rigs la mngon par gzigs te/ mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub
kyisnying po dag la nyapar mnan nas 'khod de/ bdud bzhi lasa rnam par rgyal ba bstan nas byang chub kyisnying po la bzhugs par gyur to/ bzhugs nas kyang kun nas 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin sngon du
'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad spyan 'dren cing gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sam+batathAg badzras mA dzaMAkArAyasarba ta thA ga tanad+d+haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor
chen po rnams legs par byon te chos kyi dbyings su sbyosanas/ phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams khyab su/ nam mkha'i khams na
gnas bathams cad til gyi gang bu ltar 'dzam bu'i gling du 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor kyi dbang phyug gis bkuganying bcug ste/ bcings nas dbang du mdzad de/
nyid kyi thugs kar rab tu bzhag par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'dis rdo ldan l 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen ngos gnyus su med pa'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs to/ sngags 'dis rang gi sems
so sor rtogs par mdzad do// o tsit+taMpra ti ba h+pha karomi/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la sangs rgyas nyams cad kyis bcom ldan 'dasa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar longs spyod rdzogs
pa dang/ sprul pa'i sku las chos kyi sku rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal pa sems rin po ches par bya sta spros par mdzad do// nyid soms 'od gsal ba/ thugs rje chen pos khyab pa/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshon// gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog paspangos pa/ nam mkha' ltar gdod nas zhib las thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas nas//
samasacan kyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/ mi shes pas rga ba dang 'chi bsa rnam par khyab pa'i 'jig rten la gzigs nas/ sun yang sngags 'dis byang chub
kyi sems bskyed pa nye bar bstan pa/ oM bo d+hita u da yA mi/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gar soms 'od gsal ba
yosasu rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar rnam par gzhag go/ legs par rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' lta'u
ngum med pa/ spros pa thams cad sus pa/ ma long lta bu bstan par byas nas gnas te byang chub kyisoms chan po la sngags 'di brjod do// oM na ras ba su dza/ de rjes thogs
nyidalas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par phyung ngo// de byung nas kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brangadu zhugs tashasabya'i dkyil 'khor thams nadagos labar byas na/
ba sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtsa bsil deb tu rtogs par byas nas gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje'i skun po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rjes su zhugs nas zla ba'i
a dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rab tu gnas so// danas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjernal 'byor gyi dbang phyugachen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs so// oM b+hA badzra/ slar yang sngags tsadis
spros pa/ oM sma ra badzra/ slar yang sngags 'dis bsdusaso// oM saM han badzra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisaya shes rdo rje'i snying po 'di cad du brjod pa// oM dz+nyA nA badzra
de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa// oM sarba ta thA ga tadzA na badzra hU~M/ de nas de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi
dang gsung dang/ thugs mnyam pa'id bar s pas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa// o badzra A/ kodzad M/ rdzanas da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan pa nyid du bar gyur to/
de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs gzigs nas stags 'dis byin gyis brlab par mdzad do//
ya shA sarba tathA ga tas thAar capaM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thamaMs cad kyisku sems can thams cud kyi don mdzad pa'i rgyu/ sas rgyas thams cad kyi sku pad
sems can gyi khams mas cad du nges bar bstan to// de nas brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyongab rnams kyis mthongs/ lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pas
bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa zhes sgra bsgrags so// de nas tshangs pas gsol ba btabasta/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor nas/ nga dang res 'dul ba'i sku bo ba/ gang
spya/ gis slar ldog pa med pa nyid du gyur to// 'di rnams nisas rgyas kyi byang chub sgom pa'i rim pa'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snangamad ting pa'i dzin ]
de las bzhengs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byung chub bstan ta/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa da bar bsgrubs nas de'i thugs ka las rdo rjephyungs/ nyid kyi phyag tu bzhi g par gyur to/ donas
'od zer rnam par phyungs/ 'jig rtan gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas slar log sta/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun bzang po'i skur byin

'tshegyis brlabs 1/ mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar dang 'phreng bas dbang bskur ba/ zla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis brlabs ta rnam par

gnas so// de nas thugs ka nas phyung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten/ de bzhin bshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga dang/ rgyab dang/ drug pa rdo rjesams dpa' dang/ ro chos dang/ rdzordzalen rgyunang/ dzodzi
la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tson po'i 'phrang par rnam par gnasaso// da bzhin du sgrig lasogs pa rnams dang/ bdug pa sogs pa'i lha khyad par du nges par bskyed cing/ gzugs lasog
[“w l]pa rnams dang/ lcags kyu la sogs pa'i lha rnams bskung da/ 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa//
sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis/ jo rje snying po zhes su gsungs// gru bzhi pa sgo bzhib// da dang sa tog 'phreng bas brgyan// sgo khyud dang ni kha khyer dang// rta babs kyis so so
sdus dayi dbus su khron po// kun nas yongs su gru bzhi pa// de yisnyad du pad chen po// ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa// de yi lta ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod
par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi ni drud kun tu // sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya// gas rgyas kun gyi 'khor du// 'khor losgyur pa la sogs bri// phyi yi gnas ni thams cad du/ sangs rgyas
sras po rnam par dgod// kha dog ser pogazi brjid che// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba// thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan// brgyan pa pad+hag dgod par bya// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud
sa polas dbang chen gyi dkyila 'khor gyi cho ga'o// kAtanas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyisaslar da chu'i lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka'astsalapo/ de nas yang dog
bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bas na// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su brjod// de yi phyi rol gnyis pa la// zlum po runItogs par bya// ri mo
mang po sna tshogs pa// sgo dang sgo khyud brtag par bya// rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs pa// dang dngam tog 'phreng bas brgyan// dayi dbus su padachen po gsar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa//
'dab ma brgyad kyi ka ba'i mdun// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyis brgyanapa'o/ dkyil 'khor de yi dbus sunI/ rgyal ba thams cad dkar mchog/ kha ba ba no ltar/
dkar gsal// shim dang zla ba lta bu'i 'od/ kund zla ba ltadakabartan/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par/ der me ta 'khor thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras bo rnam par dgod//
thams cad zla ba ltar dkar zhing// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnasal/ mchon chasna tshogs zla ba 'dra// zla ba 'bar mtshungs mnyam med pa// chu yi ming zhes bya ba yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa
nyid du 'dod/ josangabo bcunagyi rgyud chen po las/ chu lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdodzarnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos ma lhazhes bya pa'i dkyil
zla 'khongan kho bka' stsalal/ dA naso yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor d+han mchog gyur pa// rdo rje ye shes gzi brjid mtshungs// rdzordzogazi brjid las su brjod// gru gsum rnam
pa nyid du bya// sum mdo'i ris kyi rnam par mtshungs// 'bar ba'i 'phrod 'khrugasu'ajigs pa'o// kha dog dmar po stobs po che// 'jig pa'i dus kyi ma 'drab// rtag tupad+mar ga
tshungs// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// nyi ma'i kha dog stobs po che// rdo rje rtse gsum sna tshogs ba// sum mdo'i snying khar gzhag par bya/ bal po so cu'i me tog mtshungs//
yaba'im tog dag dang 'dra/ pad+ma pad+marAga mtshungs// sangs rgyas dpa' bo yang dag 'bar// bzung bo mtsho dang mtshungs 'dra ba// rgya skyags bcud dang 'dra bar gnas// do
yi lta 'khor thams cad du// de bzhin sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras// khro bo dang nimadag pa dag/ mkhas pa yis nidagod par bya// de dag thams cad kha dog dmar// gzi brjed khams la
'od ldan pa// 'od zer dmar po'ab 'phro ba// nyemaredakyil 'khor dbus sonapa// thams cad dmar po'i mtshon cha can// dmar po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dmar po'i gos kyis
bkab pa'i lus// 'phrang ba dmar bo mchog 'dzin pa// 'di'i gzi brjid gtor zhes bya/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar pa 'o// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyirgyud rgyun po las/ mi lhazhes bya ba'i
dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so/// des bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang rlung dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ panas yang dag bshad bya ba//
dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ rlung gi khams dang 'dra ngasan// rlung gidagyila 'khor zhes su bshad// zla ba khyodaba'i rnam pa 'dra// dpyan gyi sprin gyi 'od dang mtshungs// A
sa e ma tog 'dra/ in+d+ra nI la'i 'od dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su poda chen po// brtu yi 'od dpa' dra// shin tu gnag pa'i mig sman mtshungs// sngon dmar gyi ni rnam par
ka/ gnas// de yi lta ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas pa kho ra' bar ba// rgyal bo 'khyil ba 'bar ba'i gzi// mtshan monag mo lta bur gnas// ut+pal sngon po 'dab/
ma'i tshul// stong pa nam mkhamalta bur gnas// de yi ta 'khor thams cad du// rgyal dang rkyal ba'i sras rnams bri// khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang// de bzhin lo pho mo// thams
( cangasna tshogs brgyan gyis brgyan// de bzhinanag po'i gosagyon pa// kha dog nag po thams cad du// ba dananam pa sna tshogs bsnams// gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyibs/ kha dog sna
tshogs legs 'bar ba// blar rgyas pa mnyam panI/ kha dog nag po sna tshogs pa// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor chonapo 'di
zla lhabu sas rgyas kun gyis rjes skyob pa// bris nas shes rab can gyis bsgoms/ gal tadangos grub rang 'dod na/ thordzasnye mo rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi
cho ga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang bsdu bsabyon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te de bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bskyod du gsolaM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo dzarnal
khyor gyi dbang phyug chen de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i mig chu bar gsananas/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi chog mchog tu gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa/ sgog mo sogs pasamachod
pa kun// yang dag mdor bsdus byas nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi skun por// bdag gis rtag tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ga yang dag ldan// 'dod pa star pa'i sku
ru bya sgra dang gzugs dngod bzhin sbyor// mi ga'i 'phrang ba de bzhin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// sngags pas thams cad rnam par bsam// phyi sdags
pas snying khar son pa bsgom// gsang sngags dag pa brjod nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dgapa// dung gi sgra ru rab tu brjod// dril bu'i sgra ni rab gsal ba// pad+mo rnal
'byor dbang phyug go/ dus min sprin gyi hU~Mgi sgra/ tshatsan+da'isgra 'phro ba/ jo rin chen dbang phyug gi/ sgra ru de bzhin gshegs rnams gsungs/ nor bu las kyi rigs kyi yang// rje chen
sgra ru rab tu bshad// bi wang gling bu de bzhin glu dgar gyi rgyan gyi sgra dngani/ ja pa'i ngar sgra hU~Mgi sgra// spyi yi nyid durab tu pa// rtog pa kun la rnam par sbyar// sgrub pa'i bas kyi las
rnams dang// danas gzugs kyi bzlas pa mchog/ go rims ji bzhin rab tu bshad// dgugo dang gzhug dang bcing bdang// lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste// de la rang gi tshul rab sbyar//
sngags dang phyag rgya rab tugyur// nga rdzasa rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ rtag tu lus chen bsam byabasam// lha yisku gzugs bsgom par bya/ lag pa'i phyag rgyarab ngos
pa'i phyag rgyu'angasnying khar son zhes bya// rang gi rigs rims chogayis// de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing// sgron ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba'i khyim/ daltar kun nas thams cad du//
kun nas bsdu'i tsa gnas// 'od khar 'bar ba'isrung dag bas// gzugs kyi bzus pa zhes u ngashad// de nas sbyor ba'i bzlas pa ni/ gsang sngags sgrub pos brtsam par bya// man
pang byin brlabs dbang bskur mchog/ lce la sogs rims thams cad du// sbyor ba'i bzlas pa gtso bo 'di// 'bad pa yis ni rab tu bshad// sI kha mgrin pa mchurtse yin/ kan dang
skye bo de ma yin// nang yin pa dang gnyis bar min// chos ni 'ba' zhig kho na la// bzlas pa'i sgra yang 'byung ma yin// 'din bcom ldan rnal 'byor cho// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal
ba sgom pa'i sngags pa de nyid ni// rnal 'byor pa yi gnas su bshad/ de nas stang dumador bsdus// snying kha'i dkyil 'khor rab zlum pa// zla ba gang ba ltar bsam bya// drim med
cing legs par gnas// de la yi ga rnam par dgod// tshig gi 'phrang ba ma chad pa/ mu tig 'phreng ba ltar brgyus pa// char sprin gyi ni ma 'odra'i 'od/ nga tshosprams cad gsal bar byed//
lha yi lus ni snang byed cing// thilta ji ltar yi ga'i 'phrang// mchog gi lus l rab 'jug pa/ de lta de ltar sngags kyi lus// lha yi bdag nyid nyid du'agyur// mthu stobs lha dbang
thamasacad ni/ tshungs pa khyab 'jug las chogalhag/ bzlas pa de nyida mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'o// jiltar sems nibasgom pa yis/ da ltar dngos
grub mchog tu 'gyur/ rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyu rkyenapo las/ bzlas pa'i de khon nyid kyi le'u 'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhi
gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa rin po chapoka' stsal pa/ mnyam mdami g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyidacan// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal salaM bar mad//
mon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam mdadam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshadamad de// dpa ni nam mkha' dang yang
bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yasamam mad dpa dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tujim med pa thugs rje'ishugs
las byung// smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rjechen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang// tshad ma tshad/
dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas su gshags kyang a ma chos nyid bzang/ bde bar gshegs pa go 'phang dam pa bas
gyur kyang// khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang
ljon mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzod// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med pa rab mkhyen pas
dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la gsol// 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag yon tan rgyas pas// lan cig tsam zhig brjod pas kyang// gsang sngags
thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bstod pa'irgyal po 'di yis ni// de bzhin gshags de kun bstod na// rab yangs dngos grub stsol 'gyur te// bskalapar gnas shing bskal pa
bskul// lus ni g.yo ba med pa su// bdag nyid brtan par byas pa yis// mgon po chen po rnam sna mdzad// mi bskyod na rgyun 'byung gnas dang// rgyal ba dag pa 'od dpag mad/
'a don grub rgyal bo thams cad du/ daa chub cud len de nyidadang// mchog kyang rab tu gsol bar byed// dngos grub yid 'ong ma lus pa// rgyas pa'i don dang phunasum tshogs// rab
thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// yid la 'dod bstor bar byed// ya shasatshodang stobs dang shugs mchog tu dge ba gsol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i
rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bka'
stsal pa/ chos grangs modacing rgyu skar mad// smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga med// ji ltar bshad pa cho gos bslab pa'i gnas nye bar bzung ste/ gang yang rung ba'i yid dga' bar ji ltar rung ba'i
dkyil 'khor byas te/ ma rtogasalamakhakram la/ bdug spos kyis bdugs taM/ de bzhin gshegs pa lcams cad la ltar nus pa'i ma tog lasogs parimachod pa rnams kyis mchod pa/
byas te/ sngags 'dis yid kyis kyang sdig pa bshags te/ oM sarba pA pAtakA yi ka pAka tsit+tam nasod b+hU tan ga/ rwa Na mo nyam dmanabiSh+Tha Nayad ka totan tA kA li kaMhU~M hU~MhU~M phaT phaT
paT sarba pA pa spo Ta yA mi sAhA/ oM sam+ba pAn pra tidashayA misAhA/ de'i rjes thogs la bdag nyid kyi dngos po dbul bar bya ste/ oM sarba tathA ga tanAn Ad ma b+ha ba nir yA ta yAmi/

sarba tathA ga tapra ti gra@na tuswAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puN+ya dz+nyAn saMb+hanAn a numo piyAmi sAhA/ yang dang yang du byang
chub kyi sams bskyod pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags kyis byas/ oM sarba tathAg tas man+ta b+ha dra ma hA badzras ma ya ma hA bopatsit+te utapA da ya mi swAhA// de nas byang chub
[>kyi sems bsadapa'i rjes phyogs la zla ba'i kha dog can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ sa bcu'i dbang phyug nor bu rin po
chen po'i pad+mo'i snying po sang ga'i khri'i stang du bdaganyid bsam par bya'o// oM budadz+ha/ sngags 'dis bdag yongs su dag par byas te/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hasarba tu thuge sa phyu ba shu
dz+ha1hU~M/ sngags 'dis bdag nyid chos kyi dbanges yasal/ 'od gsal ba'i snang ba shin tu gnas par byas ta/ od+ha madz+hanusu glu ba At+ta ga Na nas skyes buny+tsan po'i mtshan sum cu
rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ 'jig rten thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i dabazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos skur bdag nyid sngags 'dis
gnas par bya sta/ oMpra b+hA su re haM/ de bzhin du rim pa 'dis chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po spros nas/ padaganyid sangs rgyas nyid do zhes nga rgyal bskyedal/ bdag skyo dag ma lus
pa'i dpung gnyen du byas la/ chos kyi dbyings yangs pa 'od gsal ba lha cig gnas par bya ste/ nye bar rgyas par thun mtshams bzhir bzlas pa brtsam par bya// thun mtshams gsum
du dus ji lta ba yi ga la rjes su gzhol ba'i yid kyis 'bum phraganyishu bzlas par bya zhing/ khyim re rer stong phrag brgyad dam stong phrag re bzus ta/ ji sridamtshan ma thob pa de srid du'o//
tsan dan dang/ gsur dang/ gur kum la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor byas te/ rkyabar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod pa byas nas cho 'phrul gyi zla ba 'am/ sa ga'i
lagang bal mar gyi mar ma stong phrag brgyad spar la/ rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas tA/ sna mnemo tog gam/ me tog pad+mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mchod rten la mchodad/ srid
'brug gi sgra sgrog pa ma thos pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bdag la gas bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// des srog blugs 'bum phrag gcig dgung bar
byas pas mtshan ma thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ro// bye ba phrag bzhi bzlas pas dpang phyag chen po sogs pa'i sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ de nas sgrubs pa chen po byed par
'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthe gongaba'i tshad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rtan byas la/ mchod rten ra'i mdun du stong phrag re re bzlas pa'i m/ yang na dri'i mchod rten gyi

drung du 'bum lhag pa'i bya ba phrag bdun bzlas so// bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyi mchod rten nyi ma re re la'i srid bye ba phrag bdun bzlas pa rdzogs pa de srid du bya'o// 'a ma'ang mchod
rten 'bar ba'i 'od dus sgrub pa'i las la zhugs pas brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dwang/ 'jig rten skyong pa lasogasanas/ ji srid dag pa'i gnas kyi dbang phyug chen/
po la sogs pa lha rnams ma tog gi char 'bebasaM par 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lha dang/ kudang/ gnod sbyin dang/ driza dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ril sogs pa
'ongs nas kyang bstod par byed cing jis A pAtsi mnar med pa'i bar kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad bsil bama'agyur ro// yi dgas rnams kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal las rnam par
grol bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis sems can rnams la gdung bar mi 'gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par gzigs par 'gyur ro// de'is la
lus dar ba gser gyi mdog lta bu dang/ lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa can dang/ ting po'adzin dang/ ma shes thob pa dang/ kha dog dang/ tshe dang/ stobs dang/ shugs dang/ dbang phyug la
sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang/ 'jig rtenagyi khams su rgyu ba dang/ 'khor lo sgyur ba ltar che ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod cing stong du 'gro ba dang/ rig pa'i dza/

pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba dang/ lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag
du mas yongs su bskor ba dang/ phyogs banu mthatsayas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprinagyis legs
par mchod cing grub ba thams cad 'od kyis lhung bar 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i stan phyung star bar 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang/ gzugs dang/ dang 3
bas rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad thil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'ang soso'athob par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad 'dul ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// phyi ma'i
mthar phyin gyis brlabs te/ sas rgyas thams cad bskyod pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thoms cad kyi bya ba nges par ston pas 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i sbyin mas cad
'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub bams dpa chen po kun tu bzang po dang/ byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal dang patshungs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sgrub pa'i thabs
zhes bya bsta dang po'o/// sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis pa nadabazhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par bya ste/ gi'u wang dam ldong ros pad+ma'i snod du bzhag la/ ji srid dngos grub
rnam pa gsum byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyurapo dang/ mi snang ba dang/ rig ba thams cad 'dzin pa nyid do/ rig pa 'dzin par gyur nas nyi ma stong
shar ba'i kha dog dang/ lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par sku li zhing 'khyil ba dang/ gdu bu dang ldan zhing lha'i bu mo byab phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing/ rig pa 'dzin
[S° ]pa'i grub pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang/ bskal pa chen po'i mthar gnas pa dang/ rig pa 'dzan pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// rim pa 'dis rtso gsum bsgrubs/
na dbang phyag chen bon 'gyur ro/ mtsho phyir thogs bsgrubs na tshangs par 'gyur ro/ 'khor los khyab 'jug tu 'gyur ro/ grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'is bzung sus srungs kyi bu byas la/ da
ma zhon pa brgyus nadabangapor 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ 'i stod du bsdadan nyi ma dang mtshungs par 'gyu'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zla ba'i sta/ 'di nyid kyis lha'i bye brag gang
gi mtshan ma bzung sta/ sa de'i longs spyodas spyod par 'gyur ro/ de bzhin du rim pa 'dis dngul chu 'am bcud len gang bsgrubs pa de 'grub par 'gyu'o// gal tam grub na de'i tshe sgrub pa
lan bdun bya'o// bdun byas pas ci nas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pa h+phams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur bas bka'astsalal/ bum phrag gsum bzlas pas ri bo

lhun po'i tshad tsam gyi ri bo'ang hU~M zhes brjod pas ltung pa dang/ rgya mtshoskams pa dang/ ljon pa drung nas 'byin pa dang/ bumaM pa nam mkha' tsAphan pa dang/ glang po che rangs par byed pa dang/
pha rol gyi sdo mngon par 'jom par byed pa dang/ bar snang na gnas pa thams cad ltad bar byed do// sems can thams cad 'bebs par byed do// sgrub pa po las gang dang gangasgrub par 'dod
pa de dang de thams cad byed do// yang zla ba gcig tsam mi smra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms na sangs rgyas thams cad mgrong bar 'gyur ro// sgyu 'ophrul dra ba
thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la gnas shing 'chag par byed do// ma 'bar ba dang glog 'gyu la la sogs paston par byed do// gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyuraM ro// 'jig
rten gyi khams stong phrag kyang g.yo bar byed do// sgrub pa pos bye ba bdun bzlas nas 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// rim pa 'dis lhung bzed dang/ chos gos dang snam sbyar dang/
'khar gsil las gang 'darung ba pazungs/ ji srid rig pa 'dzin par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang/ sprul pa du ma byad pa dang/ 'dod n
'chib dang sad cig tsam kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro zhing/ de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi nye bar gnas par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyisasas rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang/
byed do// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan ma ba bar gshegs pa'i mtho'atshad kyis mchod rten bum phrag gcig byas te/ rmamad pa'i ral gri blangs tacho 'phrul gyi zla ba khyadal nye bar spyod pa thamasang
kyis mchod de/ brgyad pa 'am/ banu bzhi pa'i m/ nyagadab la skyil krung bcas taji srid du ral gri 'bar bar srid du bzla bar bya'o// de'i rjes thogs nyid la rdzu be rma
[>>rnams kyi sgra grag go/ stang nasal tog gichar 'bab paru'agyur ro// lhan cige pa jisAd pa dang bcas pa stong 'gro'o/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// rig pa

'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// mal gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa chen po'i 'khor lo sgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshalugs dang rgyan 'chang ba 'dod dgur rgyu pa dang/ skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten
ba kyi khams thams cad dunam bor dpyodapa dang/ rga shi med pa dang/ nyis rer zhing sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid chab mthong ba dang/ mchod pa'i sprinathams cad kyis sas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du
mchod pa'i ra 'babs pa dang/ bskal pa chen po stong phrag na bka'agyur ro// donas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yapa 'khor lo 'am pa 'is blangs te/ 'bum phrag nyi shu bzla sa pa yongs su/
rdzogs pa dang dpal gyi sgor song ste/ nam pa'i lo ma tsho ba'i mar khu la btagos pa 'bum phrag gcig srog blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'byed pa 'gyur ro// lha
ma yin kyi bu mo thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gal tam grub na 'bum phrag gsasam gsum du srog blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad bsregs bzhin du 'ong ba'agyur ro/ da
'ongs nas kyang sgrub pa po la zhu bar byed do/ kyaskyes buya' bo 'jug tu gsol zhes smra'o// de nas grogs dang bcas pas 'jug par bya'o// ral gri 'am 'khor lo de bzung nas lha ma yin gyi/
rig pa 'dzin pa'irgyal por 'gyur ro// sa 'og gi rdzas rnams kyi mnga' bdag lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad kyi bdag po gsang sngags grub pa gzhan thams cad dang/ lham yin gyi rig pa 'dzo/
pa rnams kyi dbang phyug/ sa 'og thams cad kyi bdag po/ lha ma yin na po'i sprul pa byed pa po bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo pU zhes bya ba brjod pa tsam gyis lhag par
byed pa// khyab 'jug kyang hU~M zhes brjod pa tsam gyis rlag par byed na/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bad bar gshegs pa'i mchod nyan 'bum phug sul du byas
to mchod rten ri ri'i mdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzla bar bya'o// thams cad la 'bar spyod pa h+phams cad kyis mchod la/ tha mar ma tog can gyi lcags las byung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs drug
pa mtho gang tsam pa bzung nas 'phrul gyi zla ba phyadapa skyil mo krung bcings te/ jisring 'barapad srid du bzus par bya'o// de blas pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'kho le rgyur bar 'gyur ro// ga
pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lhathams cad 'dul bar byed pa/ bsal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'tsho po dang 'jig rten
khams stong rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba dang/ mchod pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag gis mchod par byed pa dang/ sangs rgyas stong phrag mthong bar 'gyur ro// nganamA
lam ra ra zhing mchod pa chen po'i sngon gyis mchod par byed do// sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa gzhan yang mchod rten 'bum phrug drug tu byas te/ sdon du bsnyen pa byas la bya pa bzlas pa'o da nas
mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa'i pol khrus byas nas/ tabar mkho thams cad kyis mad/ sridam las pa de jisrid du bzla bar bya'o// las nas dal chu dang/ bcud len dang/

'tsho mi snang pa 'a sogs pa thams cad de la ston par byed do// gal tam sa na ji srid pa las lci ma byung ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de nas mtshon rnon pos de gcad par bya'o// da bzung bas nyi ma stong gi gzi
brjidan/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal po/ rig pa 'dzin pa phye ba stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor na/ tsho bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag drug nu'achol/ sas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu
'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang/ ri bo lhun po bye ba phrag stong sprul pa dang/ gling stong phrag 'phan pa dang/ rgya mchostong phrag skams pa dang/ lha'i 'jig rten brgya stong thug bsdigs pa dang//
ya/ tshas pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams lhung ba dang/ skra li zhing 'khyil ba dang/ lo brgyad gnyis pa'i rnam pa dang/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan
pa sta srag pa'i bskal pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'gro zhing/ rga ba dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnatsan byor gyi dpad phyug na khos de skad ces bka' stsal
to/ de bzhin puyid bzhin gyi nor bu dang/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang/ bum pa bzang bo dang/ ra gyi char pa dang/ mamakha'i mdzod kyi tid pa'i dzin chen po dang rin po chen po'i
lag pa dang/ nor rgyun gyi rtog pa chen po dang/ sems can gyi re ba thams cad rdzas su 'gengs pa dang/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'irgyal srid dang/ ni bo che thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya'o//
dal 'di lta sta/ 'khor lo nipo cha dang/ glang po rin po che dang/ rta rin po che dang/ nor bu rin po chudang/ budomad ren po che dang/ khyim bdag rin po che dang/ bsnyonaM bkur ba rin po
chi'o// donas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang tsand dkar po las pad+masor drug pa'i tshadabyas la/ pad+ma de lag par bzung nas zla ba drug tu skyil krung bcings te/ rkabar spyod pa thams cad kyis/
mchod nas thun mtshams gsum mam bzhi'i gras mi gzung par bzlas par bya'o// zla ba drug yodas su rdzogs pa dang/ pad+ma'abum phrag bdun srogablugs bya'o// zla ba nyanas sgrub pa brtsam
par byasto/ zhibar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la skyil krung bcas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o// thorangs kyi tshorig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// skra li zhing 'khyil ba dang/ la brgyad gnyis
kyi rnam par rgyan gyi tshogs thams cad kyis brgyanapa/ nyim stong phrag shar ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag du ma'i 'kheb nan/ lha'i bu mo phu ba
khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba/ rmongs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams mAngag gzhug par 'gyur/ sas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig tsam gyis rnam par rgyabang/
wAmachod pa'i sprin du mas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ut+pala'i sgrub pa dang/ tsanAdanadamar po'i bad+ma'i sgrub pa'i ng ngo// sgrub pa gzhan yang 'byung ste/
shel dang/ bad+ma rA ga lam/ mu tig gi 'bras bu 'am/ rin po chayongs su rtog par byed pa pos mos su bortags pa la/ bad bar gshegs pa'i mawe'itshadatsam pa'i mchod rten 'bum tsam byas
yatu/ gang yarung bar grangs mi gzung bar sud bdag shos su dag par mthong ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ de'i rjesasu mad gsum kyis sbagarab ng 'bum dang/ sna ma'i ma tog 'bum phrag
gsum dang/ a ka'iyam shing khul dang/ nadanagyi yam shing 'bum phrag gsum dang/ til dang 'bras 'bum phrag bzhi dang/ zho zan 'bum dang/ mar gyi srog blugs stong phrag gsum dang/
sman thams cad pa'i srag rgyug/sa 'bum phrag gcig byas la sbyin srog yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ dkar po'itshes bco lnga la bsgrub par bya'o/ skyil mo krung bcas nyo ba spyod ba thams cad kyis ma
ji srid nor bu rin pocha 'a bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// bar nas kyang rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu gdod du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ sa li zhing 'khyil ba dang/ lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa can thams
cad kyis brgyan pa// phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gsal bar byed pa// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi slob 'khor lo sgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro// yid bzhin nor bu'i dngos
grub byung chub sams dpa' chen po'i rig pa 'dzin pa zhes brjod do// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bstan bkur bar byed do// skad cig tsam la 'jig rten gyi khams tham cad kyi sems can bskoran

slar de nyid du'ong bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mngon par rdzogs bar byas te// lus da nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par mtshon pa zlog par 'tshang
rgya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sgrub thabs kyi le'u la bris sku dang/ shing lhamadang/ mu tig gi 'phrangaba'ang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i tshogs bsgrub par bya'o// thams cad du 'grub par 'gyurayo/

sgrub pa'i thebs gzhan yang mchod rten bye ba phrag stong byas ta 'bum phrag bdun bzla bar bya'o// yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ ma tog can gyi lcags sam/ lcags lnga'irang bzhin gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sor bcu'i
do dag/ bad bar gshegs pa'ilatho'i chod tsamacho 'phrul kyi zla ba khyad mtshan thog thag lag pas rdo rje de bzung nas mdun du khra'i stong du lag pa bkab la/ rjesrid 'bar bar gyur ba desrid du
d+ha byabya// bzlas par bya'o// de nas bzungs rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor lo sgyur ba chen po rim bya ba brgya phrag dang rjes su 'am pa rdo rje 'chang ba ltar gzi brjid dang ldan zhing 'od/
[>gsal ba'ajig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu zhing/ dbang phyug chen po sogs ba'i lha rnams la ci bsgo brten par 'gyur/ lha ma yin rnams skrag pa dang/ srin po rnams 'dzoms
pa dang/ sems can thams cad da'i ci bso pa byed pa 'gyu bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor 'gyur ba chen pos de skud ces bka' stsal to// ngodzra sIpo
tsaNaM rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAms cad kyi rdzas kyi bya ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi li'u los surdzogs so//// de nas bcom ldan 'dasar
bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang tid pa'i dzinal mnyam par bzhage sku/ bcom ldan 'dasathog ma dang tha ma med pa rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po ka klu sbyar ba ste/ mtha' yas pa kha sbyar bzhi bya ba bka' stsal du gsol/ donas bcom ldan 'adas kyis de bzhin shag
pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po gsang sngags kyi ka klu pu tra bka'astsal pa/ donas yang dag bshad bya ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes su skyob// gsang sngags ka klu sbyar zhes/ gsang
chen mchog tu rmad du byung// gru bzhi pa la tshad mdzes pa// kun nas yo sa su bzang zhing dag/ mtshig bzhi banu zhe dgu pa/ mdo bsdusanas ni sngags pas bya// dang po'i 'phrod bzang
gnyis la ni// a sogs blo gros ldan pas dgod// kasogs lhag ma'i ri mig la/ sngags pas mdo bsdus te// sbyor ba ji bzhin yi ga kun/ go mas bzhin dudagod pa spyod/
pa mig stong pa dag la ni// ka yig dang ni rdo rje/ ma ba 'dig bkod nas ni// rang sde'i 'og tu 'bar ba mchog/ dang bo dbyangs la de'i rjes su yi ga phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa//
ka Ta tapa a shA// dag cing chu yi dkyil nAkhor ldan// 'di rnams myur du 'grub par byed// pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha nyid do// don kun grub par yang dag ldan// ma yi dkyil 'khor nas/
su bshad// 'bar ba'i ma dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// kha tsha' thapa ra lo/ dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor ldan// ga dza Da da ba la sA// dngos grub kun bad rlung gzugs ldan// dbyar

gyi sprin ltar shin tu 'jigs// g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha wa ha// stong 'gros dngos grub byed por brjod// slar yang nga nya Na na ma// chos kun dbang du byed pa mchog thog ma'i dbyangs yig gang yin pa//
de ni de bzhin gshegs stobs bcu// khyad par yan lag bcu gnyis ba[︽]'ad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bcu ba gnyis// ma ning yig bzhi bo stong// rar lo lA zhes bya ba// dbyangs dang sa
[z/ ]@#// bon de bzhin sngags// de dag yi ga ru'ang bshad// dbang du byed pa'i sde tshan kun// thig le sgra gtsug zla phyad ces/ sa dbyangs kyi ni 'brong zhes bshad//
sangs rgyas de bzhin byang sems kyis// yi gar brjod pa de bzhin zhing// gsal byed lus kyis gsal ba'o/ de bzhin yaralawa rlud// mo dang dbangachon chudag ste// 'byung ba chen po
khamasa rnams so// rlung ma bdud rtsi'i bcud ces bshadu// mnyam dang mi mnyam chadabye bas// thamasacad nyid kyi lam shes bya// phyag rgya dang ni dkyil 'khor sngags// ting 'dzin mdo
tsha bsdus bshad pa'o// mirtagasdug bsngal stong bdag mad// chos rnams kun gyi sdom du brjod// stong pa marman mdasmon med pa// rnam par thar pa gsum du bshad// phung po khams dang
skye med rnams// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// da ni sngags kyika kA'i sbyor ba la rab tu btus pa sbyar ba dang phral ba bshad par bya'o// yi ge rnams kyis byang chub spyod// sas rgyas
nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// lhan cig nyid du sbyar bar bya// dbyangs rnams log rnams bsdus par bshad// mtshan nyid kyang ni rab bshad bya// dbyangs ni byang chub gzugs nyid de// gzhan
dpalhan cig sbyar bar bya// de la ngos par sas rgyas nyid// starab nyid du legs par bshad// thog mar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ gsang sngags dri ma med pa 'byung// thog mar dbyas
na thig 'a ldan// rdo rje'i stang du yang dag gnas// 'bar ba'i 'phrang can rab zhi ba/ rnam par 'phro ba nyid du gnas// zla ba'i dbus su bsal bya ba// kun gyi ya shes 'od can po// kun tu
'gro ba rab tu thob// thams cad du yang rnyed par dka'// de nyid bral brtag pa ste// yi ga ma cing dbyer med nga/ byang chub sems zhes rab tu bshad// du dang kund bla ltar dag/ gnyis
pa'i sgra dang yang dag ldan// de ni shin tu ring por shes// sa sa rgyas kun gyi spyod pas/ sa dang pha rol phyin pa rnams// roba'i bzhi ba sbyar bani// mya ngan 'das pa zhes suT+Tesgrags//
dbyangs dang yi ga khyad pa can// mtshan nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya// rang gi phyag rgya sogs ldan pa// sangs rgyas byang churang gsol byed// ngani sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags da
nyid 'dir bshad bya// thog mar spyod pa byas nas ni// gnyis pa smra pa po ru bshad// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis kun nasamanan// gsum pa ma yi ming can no// rgyu mad bsatachung zad pa/
ba'ipa yisan gsal bar byas// dug pa'i sku dang bla dad mod// de yi stang du thig le gnas// sa kun nam mkha' dngoms par// yang dang yang du bshad pa yin// da nilnga par shes
par bya// ya galdab stobs pon// yi ga lta i stobs lta'i bdag nyid las skyes gtso// mkhru stobs chen po khyab bdag srid pa'ibadag nyid skyes// mthu stobs chen po sridagasum las
rab grol byed pa// yi ge lnga ni 'gro ba drug las grol ba'i bdag/ mngon shes drug kyang rab tustar byed dris med// nga nyid bcom ldan spyod pa ste// mi bskyod pa zhig
bdu grags// byang sems rdo tshesams dpa' ste// brtan pa'i sems dpa'i rang byung ba// chos kun gyis ni de bzhin nyid// gang bsgrags de nyid thams cad du// 'brar ba mo yi sa bon ldan/
spyod pa yi ni snying du gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// rin chen 'byung ldan zhes su bshad// chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ni// med pa nyid du'ang bshad pa 'o// me yis bon yang dag lta//
bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi spyi boru// mnan pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa kun// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// don yod/
chapa yi snyadapor grags// sde lnga pa yi bzhi pa ni// dngos dang dngos med rab rtogs byed// 'bar ba ma yis bon gyi// 'khor lo'i dbus su rab tshu gnas // drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan//

thig le sgra yis rnam par spras// 'khor lo sgyur ba yongashas che// rnam par rgyas pa'i nor stor byed// gang zhig ste lnga pa yi mtha'// sgyu ma'i chos la rab tu gnas/ de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni/
yam gdugs dkar zhes su bshad pa'o// brgyad pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// de nyid bcom ldan rnalo 'byor ni// spyi bor thig le mnan pa'o// 'jams pa'i dbyangs
dang yi shas che// mA ma kA ru de bsgrags so// lnga pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'jam pa'i dpal zhes rab tu grags// spyod pa'i gar mkhan rab rtogs ming// sdig pa thamasacad/
rengs byed de// sdig kun rnam par sbyong byed pa/ rnam par selab rnams bya// rje tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen dang/ gshin rje mthar byedu khro bo che// ig
gsum ni stobs chen po// thog mar dbu pa yi ni dbyas// de yi dbusu spyod pa gzhag/ thamar sna tshogs zhes bya sbyar// sku gsum du ni rnam par sgom// bla ma'i sde tshan gsum pa ni//
gang yin kun tu bzang por bshad// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// sas rgyas spyan zhes bya ba'o// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni// nam mkha'i mdzod cesarab tu grags// rdo rje khro bo stobs

po rma de nyid rab tu grags pa 'o// 'di kun thams cad stong pa ste// rgyunarab tu spangs pa 'o// dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje hU~M mdzad hU~M mdzad de// gang zhigabazhi pa'i sde dang po//
ma yis po tugasal bar byas// bzhi pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// gzi brjid phung po stobs po tsho// nga nyid gangadang ma sbyar ba// sgrol ma zhes su rab tu grags// bzhi pa yini gnyis pa gang//
shes rab pha rol phyin par ngos// thig le lhan cig yang dag ldan// sgra dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gyur// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa gang// ma nyid dang niyang dag ldan// bzhi pa'i dbyas kyis/
yang dag mnan// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog/ nyid bcom ldan zhes bya ba/ spyod pa'i gar mkhan zhes bya'i gan/ de yi rjes nyid la ni mad// dgu pa'i
dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ ma dang dbang chen du brjod bya// gsum pa'i dbyangs kyis mnan pa yi// sde tshan dang po'i dang bo'i yig/ de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni// 'jig rten mgon po
wA thub ba'o// ye shes rgya che bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// sde tshan lnga pan chen mchog/ bzhi pa'is pon dam pa de// 'og tu ma mi yan lag 'bag khro
gnyer can zhes rab tu grags// dbang chen yi ge dag pa las// thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// sas rgyas spyan zhes rnam grags pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog par byed// sde tshan pa dang po'i
gsum pa ni// nam mkha'i spyan zhes brjod pa 'o// sgyu ma'ichos la rab gnas nas// gsod pa'i don du rab gsol byed/ mA ma kA zhes bya ba'i ming// rig pa mchog tu gsang ba ste//
rgyu mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams kyi// dris med pa stsol bar byed// gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya// dbang nas bon yang dag ldan/
'gro ba'i rdo rings byed na/ gdugasams gzhan kun lta ci smos/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyar byas pa// rangagis bon gnas shi 'gro/ 'gro ba thams cad skyod byed na/ gdugs sams
can gzhan smosaci dgos// ngating ma dang ldan pas ni// dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams dang/ khagegs dang dug rnams zhi ba ni/ khyad par mi g.yo ba yis byed/ don dam bden pa'i byin
gyis brlabs// rnam snang mdzad bya gnas las byung// gzhan gyi dmag dpung 'jom pa ni// rgyu ni ma ris gsal byas pa// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam
par brgyan// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis gras pa'i// tis man da ra la sogs// de yis phyi ma rlog par nges/ ngo rdzol gnas 'khor lo//
dbus gnas 'gro kun rengs par byed// gnas nas skyo bar byed pa yis// 'byung po rnams ni dbang du byed// rtag pa'i gzugs su gnas nas ni// mi g.yo ba yisnyapakhar son// chos
kyi dbyangs mtshungs thob nas nii// bdag gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya// rlung gis bon rin po che// spyod pa'istang du yang dag ldan// malas byung ba mal gnas// 'gro ba thams cad
'debs par byed// sde tshan dang po'i dang po gang// sa yi yi ga stong du gnas [“]sta tshan lnga pa'i tha ma ni// drug pa'i sgra yi stang du gnas// 'og tu ma yis bon ldan// rima'i dkyil 'khor
dbus su ste/ sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar byed// ma yi phyogs su gnas nas ni// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid thams cad sgom// rlung lha mo lha yang dag sbyor// rgyu ni byed pa mtshungs pa'o// rnam
par snang mdzad yo shas/de nyid kho na bsgrub par bya// dbang chen mo nisbyor ba las// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i go 'phang gnas/ ya shes rgyan bsgrub par bya// yang na thun
sum tshogs pa'i don// rig pa 'dzin pa sas rgyas nyid// rnal 'byor yongashesazhun sum tshogs/ sku ba'adis 'grub 'gyur te// 'di la tshom mi bya'o// dbyangs dang yig thams cad la//

zla/ spro ba'i dbye bas rnam par dbye// tshig dang ngag gi tshada rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang sngags 'byung ba// slob dpon man ngag las shes bya// gzhan du bya ba ma yin no// rdo rje snying po rgyan sa
bya ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dojoka kA'i sbyor ba mdor bsdus te bstan pa ste rgyas par slob dbon gyis mngon pa spyad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams sur yang 'dus par
gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'as rongornal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsung ngag gi dkyil 'khor gsol pa pa pa go/ danas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig
gi rdzas nyid// 'brug gi sgra mtha' yas ba legs por bsgrags pa nam mkha'i khadzod kun nas rdordzogs rgya che patshangs pa chen po'i sgra yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi gsung gi 'a khor lo'i dkyil 'khor so sor yongs su rtogs pa'i don du// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal ba/ de
ba00 nas yang dag bsha bya ba// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ma// zlum po kun nas bzang po ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas/ de yi stang du padra chen po// 'dab ma brgyud la
gsar can// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// yi ge mchog gi go 'phanyid// bdag gis dngos grub bsgom par bya// ngag gi dbang phyug 'od chen po// snying khar zla ba dar pa// de yi
stong du dung brtag bya// dung gi dbus suny+tsa yin te// rdo rje'i rang bzhin dag lo// dayi stong du nan pad// yang nas nigs rgyas gzugs brnyan yang// 'bar zhing kun gyi mthar
khyab pa// bdud rtsi'irgyun pa 'bab pa/ pa yi yi ga spyi tshugs pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni stang du gnas/ bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dzag pa na// go mas pazhin du bsam par bya/
zla ba phyed dang zla ba gsum/ zla pa bzhi 'am zla ba nyid// zla ba brgyad du rab mchog bsgoms// dkyil 'khor bzang po bsgrub par bya// skyil krung gis ni tar gnas// dang po'i
sbyor ba'i dbang phyug skyes// chos kyi dbyings ni mtha' dag tu// thams cad du ni yongs su gang/ sas rgyas gzugs ban bsgom par bya// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi ma ma pa//
sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa'i// jisnyad rig pa thams cad ni// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyida mchog// da nams thams cad bdag nyid kyi/ lus kyi/
dkyil 'khor la 'jug pasam// dung gi sgra ni gsal ba bsam// brgya'i khams la yang dag brtag pad+ma'i go sar thig le las/ sgra yi rang bzhin rdul phran rnams/
mgrin par son nas sgra gyur te/ sgra ni dbyangs nyid lhag pa 'o// slar yang rtse ru son ba dang// yi ga mchog tu ngag ba'o// lce yi ma ga char 'bar ba// gcig nas gcig tu rdo rje'i tshul// kun
wA nas rab tu 'od gsal ba// rdo rje'i dag ni dam pa'i don// sgra yis nam mkha' kun gang bas// sgrub pos mdor bsdus bzla// de bzhin du ni sAng khar sgra 'am// lcel 'od zer ngas 'phros
nas mchu nam so la rab bkra ba'i// gal tu 'od zer mthong na ni// de tsho grub par rnam par shes// grub pa'i ngag ni dam pa'i don// yang na lha ni gzhan pa yi// ngag gi sgrub thabs na
ts+tso po mchog/ rang lce rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam/ bdag nyid rdo sams dpa' nga// 'bar ba'i sgron mdango mtshungs pa// rang gi snying gi dbus kyi cha// mi ga mchog tu phru pa so// a i
yi ge mnga' bdag mchog/ rnam par bkra ba nyim bzhin// rang gi lta ba'imany+dzar thug mtshus/ a g.yi gan yongs su gzhol// phra mo mnyam pa'i mthar thug ni/ bar zhi thig le dang
'khyu/ mtshungs shing/ snying gi dkyil 'khor gsal byed pa/ de yi 'bar ba'ab phra ba// ngesridarkan gyi bar du son// slar yang yi ga thams cani// yang dang yang du gsal khyed cing/ lcel rdorje
tsa00 'bar ba ni// rdul phran lta bur byed bzhinapa'i/ rdo rje 'bar ba stong phrag dag/ yang dang yang du rnam par 'don// 'jig rten kun tu du songs// chos dbyis mnyam dwangami mnyam pa/ dmi/
ga'i rang bzhin rnam bkra ba// rang gis 'gro ba sna byas ta// sur yapa'ong nasa'ang gnas su// 'jugapa ru na yosasu bcug/ srid phyogs kun song ba yi// yig kha ru rab tu 'jug
lus la lus can gyi gzugs bar na/ sams kyis phyag rgya legs par bsam// de nas sgra dang yi ga ni// lte bar song sta yongasasu gnas// lte ba ru ne pad+mi mchog/ par rdo rje drimad
mdzes// de yi steng du dung chen po// rab tu 'phro ba nyid du gnas// de las 'bar ba'i rnam pa'i sgra// brang gi gnas nas yongs su byung// slar yang mgrin par son nas su// ngo tsha lce la
yang dag rig/ 'gram pasbyarab 'i dbus su ni// sas rgyas gzugs brnyan dri mamad// kha ba bano ltar dkur 'od// bcud len bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dra// rdo rje'i lce ni mtha' dag rnams//
yang dang yang du gsal khar byed/ ting 'dzin gyi rtsar song ste// slar yang snying kha nyid du song// thig le las zhigug kyadagyur// gug kyang rim ring po can// tshashas rnam bzhi 'dus pa
las da ni ya gara rnam pa shes/ yi ga las ni sgra skye zhing// sgra las nA da de las dbyangs/ dbyas las ngag tu rnam par 'gyur// yig las ni cha shas chogs// tshig rkang dang ni ngag tu gyur/
[ni]/ rgyun rig skal las tshigs bcad dang// de bzhin du nishA tha dang// 'phapa'i dzin rgyun chags de bzhin te// 'di ltar sngags dngarig sngags dang// rang gi snying por rab 'jug 'gyur/
de nas bzas pa'i rnal 'byor ma// blo gros ldan pas brtan byas ta// ragug dang gzhug dang bcong ba dang// dbang du byas tabasgrub par bya// bzlas pa 'di yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad
ny+tsadu ni brtan par bya/ mi da bzhin gyi ni ngag 'grub bo// rmad byung mchog tu rod dka' bas/ yang na lhani gzhan pa yi// ngag 'grubo thams cad skyob rnams kyis// yi ga gcig pa gsangan
po ngag gi sgrub thabs mchog tudag/ sas rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rang nyidazla bar rdo rje// 'bar ba'i 'phrangab 'khrugs bab/
( bal bstanabacos thams cad ni// nges la gdon pa nyid du bya// ga grub pa yi ma shes 'dis// thams cad mkhyen pa thob par byed// bstan bcos thams cad rab 'don cing/ de nyid kyang ni
'chad par byed// sems na kun gyis thams cad du// dngos bonung zad gang bsamal// dag thams cad rnamashes te// skad cig tsam skyabar byed// rdo rjesnying po rgyan ces bya ba las/ ga
gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang ' sa nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thamA
cad kyi thams cad kyi thugs chen po mchog gibad phyag la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi chog rgyas pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bka'
stsal du gsol/ donas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nyob gsan nas/ de de bzhin nozhes bka' stsal nas/ da nasaMbcom ldan 'das
kun nas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po chen pos/ de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim par phyakha'i cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ donas
yang dag bshad bya ba// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i m yang na rtsibs bcu drug pa rnam par bri// lta bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgod// 'khor
lo'i 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan/ mthul rin chen nam pa bdun// mkhas pa yis nistsal bar bya// de yi lte bar bdag nyid ni// 'khor lo sbyar ba stobs po che/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chan
po/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ de yaphyag rgya bgrangs las 'das// skad cig ma ni nyid la 'thon// 'gro ba thams cad snang byes nas// sngags kyi dpang phyaganyid la
gzhug/ 'khor lo'i dngos grub gzi brjid che// 'khor lo sgyur ba bdag nyid 'gyu// chung dang tshe dang dbang phyug dang// rang dbang 'dod dgur spyod pa dang// kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni//
kun gyi dbang phyug phunatshogs 'bras// rmad 'tshib mdathobacing// ngas pa 'khor lo sgyu dang mtshungs// gsar gyi 'khor lo'an po che// de bzhin dal dngashal
nyid dang// me tog can gyi lcags kyang rung// rangagi lag gis bzung nas su// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// 'khor lo sgyur pa gzabarjid/
wA mtshan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan// de ltar bdag nyid bsgoms nas ni// 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du 'gyur// dul de yi sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga toTI paMa ba lo kiti//

muNItsakra wan+tidzA la dzA d+hun brnyan las ya mAr ya/ uts+tshan yahanab+hawapo lin kuN+Da li ni a bar dzitA s+ya rU'i NihU~MhU~M phaT phaT swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM o a pa rA dzitId+ha kaswAhA/ si

b+hU paNo namasan+ta bud+d+hAnA/ a pra tidaM da shas na nAM a pa ra dzitA d+ha ki sAhA/ cho ga'i snying pa'o// 'khor lo sgyur ba rang grub ste// sangs rgyas nyid kun thob nas ni// ye shes tshodang stobs dang
dang shugs// ma nadabang phyug dam pa kun dba' bo thams cad ster byed// dngos grub gzhan lta smosici dgos// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// gnyis 'i dkyil
'khor bri bar bya// nam mkha' la ni longs su sgom// gzi brjid phung po yongashes cha// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// gnyis su mda'abyung sems kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor la
turmad byung ba// ngan ma i shes par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de la 'khor lo 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor lo sgyur ba legs 'bar ba// de la de bzhin rin chen bdun//
'khor lo'i 'phreng bas rnam par nga rgyan// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pas// nyim ri rab kra shis sgrom// gzi brjid phung po sku chapo// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/
'aparapa'i 'a ya'akhrugs dpa' ba ni// snang ba shar ba lta bur gnas// de yi phyag rgyartag tu bsam// nam mkha'i rnam pa legs par gnasaM/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// 'od
zer 'phro bsanam bar khyab// da dang bdag nyid rdorjobasgom// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// kun tu kun nas thams cad du// dngos po kun las 'byungabar 'gyur// yo shes
tsho dang stobs dang shugs// kun tu 'gro ba nyidadang ni/ sangs rgyas thamasacad nyid drug dang// rdo rje can kun dad// gzi brjida mchog kun thob gyur nas// gzi brjid phung po 'dra

bar 'gyur// dolasngags kyi mig tugyur ba ni/ o ta thA ga toT+Thi khaa bal katamuts+tshA ti dzonAdzA la dzAl/ d+ha ka h+phu ka/ da ra dwar/ ban+d+ha ban+ti/ hUM hUM Ta phaT swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so//
o tatshonA si gAhA/ snying po'o// i r-il te dzo ra si hU~M las/ nyapa'i snying po'o// dag pa'i sngags tshig 'di rnams kyis// snyima'i shes rab tu gsal// kun tu 'agro ba bsgrub par bya//
@#// rig pa 'dzin pa nyir zlob 'gyur// gzi brjid phung po'i gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/// kun nas snang ba zhes bya mchog/ yi ge gsum pa stobs
[>bo gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar zhing// gtsug tor stong son 'od gsal ba// sngags pa rang bdag gis bsgom bya/ kun nas snang ba lta bur 'gyur// oM AhU~M/ gsang
zla stags rtse mo dam pa ni// bsgoms pa tsam gyis thams cad du// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro kun kun nas snang bar 'gyur// kun nas snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
so / chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// sangs rgyas kun nyid kun gyi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab sgo byed// 'khor lo 'din
rtsibs bcu gnyis// rtsibs bzhugs pa yongs su gnas// rnam gsum gsum ni yongs bskor ba// bya ba'i don du dug ba ste// sangs rgyus rang bzhin sku chen po// nam mkha'i khugs na
gnas pa ste// chos kyi dbyings ni khyab pa ni// legs par mnyam pa [”]ga bzhugs pas bsgom// 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba ni// 'di kun rtan cing 'brel 'byung ba// 'di ni chos kyi
phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// dayi sngags su gyur ba/ o d+hu na pa taya tshon tsaklaN badzra NihA/ gsang sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo gas mad
[d]/ 'a// skad cig tsam gyis thams cad du// dam pa'i chos ni rab skon byed// chos kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i spapas so// pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// sangs rgyas sku gzugs leg
'bar ba// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog bsgrubs na// nyon mongs rdo dza'adra bar 'a gyur// snying nas rdo gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'bar ba'i 'phrung ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de yi sApal rdordzum//
dris mod ba skyes par 'gyur// nyon mongs rtagaM tu yos zad cing// dmigs rnams kun las rgyal bar byed// bdonapa bzhin rtogs pas na// bden pa'i las thob par 'gyur// sngagasani/
o klu sha ashani baT/ 'di ni nyon mongs rdordza'i sngags// drag cing drag pos gzhan gnon pa'o// sas rgyas nyid kyang ston byed na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// nyon mongs rdo rje sgrub
ba'i thabs so// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i sa sargyas rang bzhinastobs pom// bdud bzhi las ni rnam rgyal ba// legs bar manyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ bdon

ba bzhi yi khu tshur tshe// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid// khu tshur sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gnyis med skyo ba'i mtshan nyid de// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya// rang nyidasas rgyas yin no zhes//
brtan dang g.yo ba'i 'grol ni// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes pa// rdorje khu tshur bsgoms na ni// rdorje khu tshur 'phrab r 'gyur// de la sngagasasu gyur pa ni// o bi dza ya/ de bzhin gshegs
'ug pa'i khu tshum// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal pa// sngags pas rtag tu bsgoms na ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi khu tshur/
gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// dngos po thams cad rgyan 'phags pa// gdod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med// sas rgyus rang bzhin skuchen po// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su'o//
'i bdag nyid sgom// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis// 'di yis 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du ni// 'jig rten kun gyis thams cad du// kun nas phun sum tshogs
pa kun// bkug nas gus par smin par bya// sngags ni/ o dzAl dzAl tIpa de pa ut+pa hopad+hu na d+hu nadaM/ stong 'gro'i gtsug tor zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dpa' bo kun gyis gsungs//
'din bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sas rgyas nyid kyang ro dka' yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thamaMsacad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// sangs rgyas rang bzhin phyag rgyu
cha legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// khyod skyob gdugs dkarachon po ni// chos dbyings mnyamadang mi mnyeso pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i kha dog
cher 'bar zhing// chu yi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa// dri med puN+Da ri kar gnas// rimo bdun gyis yongs su gang// bcud kyis len gyi mchog lta bur// sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgom par bya//
dngos grub 'di i sbyor ba yis// sems can rnams la thams cad du// ri ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// 'di ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar che// sngags ni/ oM ma ma ma ma hUM ni/ 'di
ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// ya shes tsho dang stobs mgyogs 'gro// dpa' bo thams cad shob 'gyur zhing// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// gdugs dkar po'i sgrubs pa'i thabs so//
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'bar ba'i 'phrang 'khrugs bul gyis// sngags pasasnying khar bsgom par bya// rang gi bdag da sangs rgyas zhes// sas rgyas rang bzhin sprin chen
pos/ nam mkha'i mthos rnams yongs gang ba// bdag nyid gnyis mdango bo yis// rnal 'byor gcig tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ga 'khor lo che// 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba 'khrugs
pa'i 'od// sngags pa snying khar bsgom par bya// rgyal ba dam pa nyid du 'gyur// sdugs ni/ A dzul dza len+d+rirAdzAl dzA la ban+d+haban+d+ha/ dam dam/ dum drum/ daha ha na hUM phaT/ rgyal ba'i
gtsug tor b.lagrimaM// shes rab angashes dri med// sngags pas kun nas bsgoms nas ni// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'dra bar 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so//
sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// sangaga'i khri yi stong du bsam// yang na rdo rje'i gdan la gnas// kun tu gtsug tor cha'abar ba// snying khar yos
su bsgom par bya// sa sa rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// yi gdam pa yi ni gnas// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// chos kyi sku ni mchog tu che// nga ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni//
kun tu gtsug tor stobs po che// skad cig de la'agrub 'gyur te// jo sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin no// sngags ni/ oM badzra ban+d+hAhU~M/ gsang sngags 'di ni dam pa gtso// sangs
rgyas thams cad dbang bskur byed// rtag tu rnal 'byor pas bsgoms nA// don kun gyis dbang bskur ro// kun gyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// jo rje snyingapo rgyan ces bya ba'i rgya chen
po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrubathabs kyi chog rgyas pa'i rim par bya ba yongs su rdzogasaso/// dmas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams thams cad slar yapa 'dus par gyur taM/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams thamasacad kyi gsang sngags kyi
sgrub pa'i chog rgyas par bka' stsal du gsol/ da nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byoragyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol babatab pa'i tshig gsananas/ domathag pa kho nar de bzhin gshags
po thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang sngagasaMkyirim par phya ba bka'astsal pa/ shes rab ya shes rdo rje'o// sAnge khar yongs su bsgoms nas/
su mal grisngon po phyag na bsnams// dbang rgyun dang ma las 'khrungs/ dmangs chen po gzi brjidacho// 'khrul pa med ciyi bral// sas rgyas kun badag shes rab mchog/ nyon mongs
thams cad zad par byed// rdo kun bdag bkod pa po// kun tu 'gro ba'i dam pa'i don// dbyer mda mchog tu gsang ba po// rim pa mchog gi bdag nyid 'di// zhal drug pa la phyag drug mchog/
mngon shes drug ldan yi ga drug/ rjes dran drug gi sbyor ba yis// phyag drug dam pa stobs po che// gzi brjid yang na stobs kyis kyang// kun nas yongs su gsal ba po// gzugs sa
kyang chags// nam mkha'i khrugs na rnam par gnas// yang na phyag gnyis shes par bya// ting nga'adzin gnas sdig pa bcom// dpa' bo pad+ma la gnas pa// zla ba'i mdog can 'od po che/ nam
'byor pa yi ma shes phra// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'bar// gdod nas ma skyes pa zhes bsam sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ya shes mchog/
'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// de'i sdugs ni// o shAkya daM nam/ gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsang/ gsang chen gyi ni dam par bzhed/ rnam thar gsum gyi sgo la
gnas// pha rol phyin drug tu gsal// rang nyid shes rab inano zhes// sngags pas rtag tukhasgom par bya// dbang po drug ni rab bsgyur te// sangs rgyas nyid ni rnal 'byor las//
pad+marAg lta bu'i mdog/ ston zla lta bur chagasal ba// sems dpa' chen po gsar gyi mdog/ stobs po che ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyisani//
sa rab dri ma mad par 'gyur// bstan bcos thams cad rab sna zhing// dbang phyugathams cad mdunan gnas/[– ]kun gyi rgyal po sngags pa nyid/ yang nyid kun gyi rgyal mo mtshungs//
rgyu rig pa'i dzin pa thams cad deng// byang chub kun gyi pha rol son// bang phyug kun dang bde ba che// chos rnams kun gyi yon tan mchog/ rdo rje'i yin pa thams cad dang// yang nas nigs rgyas thams
cad kyi/ kun tu 'gro ba thob 'gyur ba/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dwagos// dngul chu bcud len pa nyid dang/ rkang pas spyod pa dri med mchog/ la bu dang ni mi snang ba// thams cad ng nistar
zla bar 'gyur// dpal ldan 'jam po'i mchog 'di'i// chos kyi gsung gi mchog las 'khrus// sas rgyas rnams kyi tshangs pa'i dbyangs// 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// 'ang
bsgrubs pa tsam gyis mi/ bsam pa'i phun sumarnyogs kun gyi// sangs rgyas kun tu brtan 'gron// gzhan pa'i lha lta smos ci dgos// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so//
snying khar pad+macha bo la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gnas// 'jig rten dbang phyug dpa' bo che// thugs rjechen po'i thugs ldan pa// phyag bzhi ba la zhal bzhi pa//
dung dang kund blaltar dag/ chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung// chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po la// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug chos// ngal gnas ba dag ba sgom// rang bzhin
kyisana' dag kun// gdod nas ma skyes ma byung ba/ grosangasngags chen po 'di yis ni// snying khar mosasubasgom par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor ma// kun ngum pa/
'phros pa yis// 'bar ba'i 'phrangabos 'khrigs shing zhi// ral pa'i thor tshugs 'dzin pa po// a pa'i dbus su dpa' bo tsho// 'od dpag mdape ldan pa'i bdag/ ston ka'i zla ba lta
bur gsal// kun tu namamakharayongs gab// gsang sngags sbyor bdagu0f38sgom par bya// rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal// chos kyi dbyis kyi mtha' klas pa// pad+ma'i lus kyi
yang dag gang// kun tu pad+ma rnams lami/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sku// khyad par du bdag dgang bur bya// 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo
kun snang dang mi snangadas po ni/ yang dang yang du blta bar bya// gdul bya ma lus sams ni// stobs bos ni dgangobar bya// kha dog dbyibs ni 'di bzhinadu// sna tshogs gzugs
lacher 'bar ba// kun nas yongs su bsdus nas ni// sngags pa'i mdun du gzhag par bya// de nas sngags pas dam thag/ slar yang rtsa gcig sams kyis ni// dgag dang gzhug dang
@#// bcing ba las// dbang du bya ba bsgrub par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug thub chen po// bcom ldan rnal 'byor can grub na// dpa' bo thams cad stsol 'gyur zhing//
po rang gi dngos grub mchog rnams dang// rnal 'byor thams cad 'dzin nyid dang// rnam par rgyas pa'i nor star 'gyur// rig pa 'dzin dang 'khoral can// sa dang pha rol phyin sogs dang//
sas rgyas rnams kyang stsol 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de'i sngags ni a A ro lika/ gsang sngags dpal ldan mchog 'di ni// rang nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal/
longs spyod thams cad bkug nas ni// skad cig tsam gyis rnam pa stor// pad+ma'i sgrub pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag pa 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub// 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid// srid
par bku gnas rnam par ste// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs so// sa tha mas cad rdo rje nang bzhin gzugs// mo yi dkyil 'khor dwagab ste// de yi dbus su bya ba ni//
dkyil 'khor rlung dang rab mtshungs pa// de yi dbusasu de 'dra bsam// nyim yi ni dkyil 'khor 'o// de yi dbus su gzi bang// 'char ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// rdo rje'i lag pa gawaM
ga brjid can// rgyana rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// tshangs pa'i yul sa thams cad du// kun nas yongs sugasal bar byed// hU~M yi ga sgra zab mo/ dbyar gyi sprind mtshungs
pa'i 'od// rgyal po 'khyil ba dang mtshungs pa// braram yin m ga 'dra// 'khar ba dmar pos 'khrigs shing 'jigs// bskal pa'i mo dang 'drab r gnas// zhal bzhi pa la mtshab
bzhi 'jig pa'i dus kyi thal ba 'phro// sprin gyi sgra dang mtshungs pa yi// hU~M gi yig khazhi dang ldan// rdzahU~M mdzad ces bya ba// rnala'abyor pas nirtag tusgom// sngags kyi tshig ni//
o sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ grostsashrIts+tshahU~M/ grogrupa ya gracu ba ya daM/ an la don ga bAn bdu ra dza yA ya// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'di// kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis/ 'jig rten
gsumo yang tshugs byed na// bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang rgyun sogs// chung ma dang bcas phyag rgyur bsras// de dgo thams cad 'gugs byed
na sdug bsngal can gazhan smos ci dgos// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje'i gzugs branAn snying khar son// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje can gyis sngon du
sgrub bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa// bcom ldan rdo rje can 'grub 'gyur// rgyal bo thams cad sbyin gyur na// dngos grub gzhan ltasmos ci dgos// sngagasan 'dir/ o Tat+taM
hUMdzo/ gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// losaspyod jisnyad thams cad rnams// dasnyad thams cad rnam par sta// rdo rje 'dzin pa sgrub pa'o//
dab dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i byams pa po'i bdag nyid// snying khar zla ba'i gzugs khana'od/ jo'abs pa'i'i phudab ldan// 'jig rten khams
nib byam klas pa// rang bzhin gcig tu byas nasazhi// rdo rje yis ni spro ba dang// dbang bskur bo yi rang bzhin dag/ gsar gyi kha dog lags 'bar ba// mal pa'i thor tshugs 'dzin pa po//
ral pa'i dbus su mchod rtan m/ dung dang kun da zla 'od bzang// bsgoms nas sems can thams cad la// brtan pa'i don du dbang bskur bya// yang na sems can thams cad la// bu gcig
lta bur rnam par spro// sgom pa'i sbyor bas bsgomasan ni// gas mdam rgyal ba las rgyal// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang/ thom sogs phyogs dbyas rnam par dbye/ byams pa kun tu rnam par spro
chos dbyis mnyam dang mi mnyamapa// thams cad bdag dang bdag gi bar// 'angs shing shin du dri mchod// ri rab lta bur brtan pa'i soms// 'khrul pa mdacang yi ga bral/ de ltar sems ni
brtan byas nas mnyam mdasems can kun dang mnyam// bdag nyid byams pa yumano nas// dga' ldan gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// sung zad li zhing 'khril ba'i sgra// pad+ma ga mtshungs pa'i
'od[：]rin chen sams ni rnam dag pas// rang bdag zhi ni bsgom par bya// 'di'i gsang sngags rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni/ oM a dzi tany+dzasatshos sa ma ya ma nu ga ta swAhA/ gsang sngags
bdag nyid rgyal po 'di// byams ba zhes ni gragasapas// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par khyab// byams pa'i shugs ni yid du 'ong// dngabo'i sbyor pa'irnal 'byor gyi// sgrub pa'i
thabs mchog bsgom par bya// oM ma tra yati/ 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis kyang// dga' ldan du'i gan bar 'gyur// sgrib pa kun dang bral ba'i bdag/ rang nyid lha yi bu dang mtshungs//
byams pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms nani// 'di ni byams pa lta bur 'gyur// byams pa'i sas rgyas zhing du ni// rang bzhin gyis ni skyo bar 'gyur// dumadun chos ni legs mnyan nas/ sa dang
rol phyin pa dang// dbang dang ting 'dzin thob nas ni// da ni byang chub sems bar 'gyur// ma ra yang sangs rgyas thams cad ni [” ]byams pa'i yid kyis thob par 'gyur// byams pa'i sgrub pa'i
thabs so// rang gi lus thams cad ni// nam mkha' mtshungs pa dadu sgom// chos bdag med pa bskyod nas kyang// rang nyid nam mkha'i snying por 'gyur// gsangasngogs
'di yi sbyor ba yis// mkha' mtshungs pa las rnam par 'os// nam mkha'i 'od zer gyurapa yis// sems can rang gi sams las spro// thams cad sams las spros nas ni// slar yang m
gyis bsdu bar bya// nam mkhar mnyam par 'agro ba blta/ rang gi nyid kyis spyar bya// rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnasakhal/ rinicha kha dog 'od chen po/ rgyan rnams kun gyis lus khargyan
pa mag na'inanastobs po che/rin chen sbyor ba bsgom pa yasi/nam mkha' dam pa 'grub pa yin//sngags naoM A kA sha gan+tA ya sunA/ nam mkha'i snying posto po che/bcom ldan rnam
'byor 'grub bran 'a gyur/ rang gi dngos grub thams cad ni skadabar 'gyur tadapyad mi dgos// dpa' bosas rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos grub dzisnyad bka' stsal pa// nam mkha'i snying
pobasgrubs pa yis// de dag thams cad myur dusnyan// nam mkha'i snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so// gsas rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis// kun
tubazang po 'od bzang po/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sdugs pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rang gi lus ni dzisAd pa'i// rang gi phra rab rdul rnam
kyis/ de dag thams cad mtshungs par bya// sangs rgyas sku yi sku nyid du// yang nab spu'i khung rnams su// rang gi 'khor los yongs bskor nas// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs byas ta//
bdag ni kun tu bzang po zhes// yi ga lnga pa zhes su bshad/[0f7c] 'di yi sngags chan bozlas par bya// yang na 'das ni lha gzhan gyi// rtag lusngags su gyurapa 'o// osAku yas/
gsang sngags rgyal po che gsang zhing// gdong nas dag cing rang byung ba// 'dinubasgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// shes rapadrim mad par 'gyur// de yi ye shes dri med cing// gzugs mdzes
pa nid dang mtshungs// bstan bcos thams cad rab smra ba// kun bzang mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro// kun tu bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus/
gnas par// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya/[0f38]/gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba dang// bcud kyis len gyis kha
blag tu// ring po nyid du mi thogs pas// sgrib pa rnam sel mtshungs par 'gyur// sngags 'byung ba ni/ oM sarba ni war Nabi mi sAhA/ oMnis rA ya swAhA/ gtso bo gsang sngags 'di
'dzin la// rnam par sal ba grags pa ste// thams cad sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya kun gyis thams cad du// gdod nas skye med rang bzhin gyis// gdod nas dag cing 'gyurakha mod//
bltadachos 'dishesanas ni// lha nyid dang nemam byas nas// rtog pa med cing zag mad pa'i// rjes su rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub bya// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar// gsal ba'i rnam par
gnas pa'o// ba dan dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i// ma yis yongs su bskor ba yi// phyug namal gyi gzi brjid// yanas apa sams byed cing// dngos grub 'di ni gzi brjid che//
rnams l mchog gi dbang phyug ni// mtha' las 'das pa'i dngos grub mchog/ thams cad nas ni stsol ba nyid// rnam par sal bsgrub pa'i thabs so//
stod du ni// rdo rjei dbus na bzhugs// gsar gyi mdog can sku chen po// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// khar rdo rje'i phyag rgyags// sa snying zhes bya'i bdag/
nyid sgom rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyoralas// rang gi gsang sngag brjod par bya// sasnying zhes byarab dag bsgoms nas// sngags kyi yi ga mchog bde 'di// o kI rA dzathus//
bsam yas sngags mchog 'di yis ni// dngos grub thams cad rab gsol mdzad// sa yi snying po zhes grags pa// dmapa'i don du rnal 'byor pas// sa'i snying po'i sgrub pa'i thabs
