za dpa mad cing 'khrul pa mad// zag mda mchog gi shes rab can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su// shes rab rdo rje'i bdag nyid dag// blo gros mi zad rnyedadaka'al//
glu 'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya// sa yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa'i gzugs// rgyal po chen po zuba'i 'od// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal// stags ni/
oM a kA ya ma tisAhU~M/ sngags kyi ag gsang ba 'di// thams cad blo gros gsal bar byed/ ma shes mi brang 'dod pa yis// 'bad pa yisazhi bsgrub bya ste// dngos grub kun gyi mchog
yaMA shes bya// shes rab yi shes dri mamadzas sas rgyas nyid kyang thob gyur na// dngos grub gzhan ltatsazhig smos// blo gros mi zad pa'isgrub thabs so/ kun nas shes rab
chen po can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten par// gser gyi kha dog 'khri brjid che// rgyuna rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// gzhon nu'i gzugs can rtag bsam bya// de la thams cad rdzogA
par mad// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba// nam mkha'i bdag po bdag yin zhi// lus ngag yid kyis mas cad du/ thams cad rig pas brtan par bya// shin tudri med byang chupasoms// rang
snyingam long lta bur bsam// danAs yo ga'i ga bkod de// mkha'amadzod bdag sa bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms nas rdo rje rje'i bdag/ mkha' la rin chen 'byung ba/nas dang// yid bzhin no/
budapag bsam shing// de bzhin bum pa bzangapo sogs// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug gis// zhu bar mkho pa thams cad 'bab/ 'jig rten kun gyi rdzas thams cad// ji snyed yodapa
de dag kun// 'diran skad cig tsam nyid la// dngos grub dam pa stsol bar 'gyur// oM ga ga na gany+dzagi sA/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi dngos grubamo/ nor gyi rgyun gyi rab 'babs pa/ nam
mkha'i mdzodanistobs po chu/ skadacigatsam gyis byed par 'gyur// nam mkha'amadzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// rin chen dkyil 'khor las phyung ba/ rin chen phung bo chag pa
'bebs/ rin chen gzi brjid mchog tu rol// lag na rin med bsgrub bya/ lag na tshin phyag rgya che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// tshosbyongs bsgom par bya// bdag nyid
rin chen zhes bya dang// rin chen thams cad stsol bar mdzad// thams cad rdo rje bzhin bdagar// pri yang ku mdog sngo bsangs 'od/ dbang dang ni ma las byung/ phyag
nan chen char gsal ba// rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya// orat+napA Ni mu swAhA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grusachu// rab 'bar bsgrubs na ni// 'gro ba kun gyi lag tu//
rin chen thams cad rab stsol khyod// lag na rin po che'i sgrub pa 'bras so// 'a cho sa kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sogs// bdud rtsi 'i tshuyis rab grang ba// stong gsum zhes ni
bsam par bya/ pad+magacig gi steng na gnas// deyi stang du gzi brjid// chu lha yi ni gzugs kyi mchog/ desnyang du yang gsang chen po ma yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// de yi
stong du brtson 'grusatshe/ rtsa mo brgya pa'i rdo rje byung// dayistong du pad chun po// 'dab ma brgya pa 'od gsal ga/ destangag tu bsam pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che/
rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes grags pa/'bar ba'i'i phradabu 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ dung dang kund zla ba'i mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ 8yi lag na phug rgyan// rdo rje dung du
butu grags// rang gi lhag pa'i lhasbyor bas// rang nyid rdo rje yin no zhes/ rgyu mtsho'i blo gros shes rab che// slar yang gsang sngags bzla bar bya// sngagasani/ oM sA ga ra ma ti sa
swAhA/ sngags 'di mchog dang gtso bo ste// shes rab ye shes drimadamadzes/ jorje'i sbyor bas myas na// shes rab rgya mtsho'i blo gros mtshungs// rang nyid sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i/
dbyas// thugs rje 'jigarten dbang phyug rgyal// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyi sgrub pa'il bas so/// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas/
pa'i ut+pal sngon po 'dab 'dra'i 'od// de snying po brtso ga'agrus che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// jisnyadas stas mtha' dag tu/ khyab la sdug cing mtho pa yi//
sra zhing snying po rnam dag pa'i// mchog gi yi ga 'gyur med pa// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ni// chos kyi sbyin la spyod mdzad pa// bsam yas sa ni yang dag bas// a nIl
mtshungs ba'i 'od// de yi sngags gyuramajos ba ni// yi ga mchog ni stong du 'bago dkrugs kar rdo rjer gsal ba// rang nyid rnam par 'phro ba bzhin// sngags ni/ obadzra
gats+tsha hU~M 'dzin sngags mgagatso bo ste// sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub byed/ shes yas pa stsol mdzad cing// rnam pa kun tu phun tshogs kun// sangs rgyas nyid kun stsol mdzod
na dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dgug dang gzhug dngabacing ba dang// dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed/ bdag nyid rdo rje yano zhes// nga rgyala'agatubaskyod nas ni// rdorjesnying po
bzhin du gzhan// bdagagi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// thugs kyi rdo rje da gyur nas// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa thob// cesasanam pa thams cad kyi// jorjesnying po/
yang dag byung// rdorje snying po mkha' rdo // spyan byed tsamo drug pas bsgrub// jorje snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so/// dbangacha namapalas yang dag byung// nor bu rin chen 'dra ba'i
lus zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ tama'i dkyil 'khor mas pa'i 'od// rin chen 'byung bsams chen po// 'gro ba snangabar byed de gnas// pad+mamakha' 'dra'i rnam pa can//
phyag rgya de yisnying khar gnas// yin/ na sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ rin chen char pa 'bab par 'gyur// sngags ni/ o rar kaArat+taMd pasAhA/ rinachen 'byung gnasal po 'di//
mchog rnams kyi ni sa'i dbang phyag/ sbyor ba kun gyis bsgrub bar bya// rgya che'i nor rnams stsol bar 'gyur// na ma 'byung po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
zla snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/// donas nga com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slan
tshu mnga'ajus te bshags nas// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chen po la gsol ba btapal/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khro bo
bsomaldan 'das skyod du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'khor lo sgyur ba chen pos de skad ces gsol ba btab ma thag nas// jo rdzakhro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba las ches gsang
ba bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag pa shad bya ba// khro bo yin dkyil 'khor mchog dpakhams rab tu gsal ba la// ma ni dbus nas dbus su 'o// de yi dbus su rdo rje//
'od zeralnga yi 'phreng bas mdzes// de yi mdun du bya ba yang// mdung rtse 'kharab chen po yi// de yi g.yas kyi ru ni// rtogasadz+dzachan po 'bar 'phrang na// g.yonanyid du ni bo chonam//
rig pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par sgyus// rgyab tu la gri'i phyag rgya ni// min na'abar bas rnam par brgyan// phyi ngos rnams su rnam khros pagi/ khro ba thams cad dgod par bya// de yi sngags
kyi yi ga gsang// gsang rten mchog tu 'bar ba'o// gzhal du mud cing grangs mdamag sa dbyis mnyam dngam mnyam pa/ yig gcig pa gsan po// rgyu yi don du
tshogs par byed// dbusalnga dang ni yang dag ldan// thigal sgra yas rnam par brgyan// da ragasang ba'i mgon po ni// dbyangs bdun par ni bshad ba yin// phyar ka nga la rdorje//
'jigs pa'i thal ba mchog tu 'bar// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i bdag/ 'bar ba'i ma yi dkyil 'khor bzhin// 'jigapa chen po'i dus can gyi// char sprin dang ni'adrab 'i 'od//
pad+marA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// 'bar ba kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dur khrod mo bzhin shin tu yang// gsal ba'i sku ldan stobs po che// rno ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba//
po thodapa'icod panastangadu 'bar// 'jig pa chen po'i dus can gyi// rgodam kha yi ma ltar gnas// smin 'khyog rnam bar 'khrug pa can// g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// khro bel
sogs nyams dang ldan// rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrugs pa'i gdong// gar dang sdud par yang dag ldan// 'jig rten snang ba gar mdzad pa/ phyag nibargya phrag stong dang ldan// gcig tu
'gyur zhing rnam pa mang// rnam snang tu' ldan ngadag gi/ sngo sar la sogs tha dad ldan// zhabs kyang rnam pa du ma ldan// sna tshogs mdog ldan rnam par 'khrug/ de nyid bcom ldan rnal
'byor ta// khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po che/ shin tu gdug cing drag rnams la// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba zhes byar gnas// phyagajug zhal drug snang ba na// zhabs drug pa sa gsus pa che// nyan
sprin mdog 'dracharaganag pa// dus mtha'imadapa'i phrab r gnas// mdogachen gyol po 'khyil bu 'dra// zar ma yi tog mtshungs// khro bo bod pa'i 'phrang ba 'chang// gshin rje mthar

khyad stobs po che// de la sngags kyang/ oM A/hU~M phaT/ o ya mamathanAyU ban/ osIts+tshiSh+Thabi kri tAnanahU~Msarba sha rdzunan sha yastam+b+ha ya[%]phanu/ sngags kyi rgyal po bdag nyid 'di/ khyab bdag
gdul dka' 'dulabalo// gshin rdzo mthar mdzad khro bo che// gas rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gtso// sas rgyus thams cad spyana'adrenacing// dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas// rtag
tu gdul dka' 'dul mdzad cing/ dodzesnang mdzad legs bar 'dul// shin tugadug pa drag rnams la// zhi ba nya bar misbyar te// shes la thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis// de bzhin gug
rnams khro bor mdzad// thugs rje khro bo'i ngang tshul can// 'jig rten gsum yangs srog mdzad/ debs 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sku// thugasarjes
tre bo ma lus mchog/ gdug pa 'dul ba mdzad pa bskyed// gshin dzomatha mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs// nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byon to// khro bo gzagasam zhes su
grags// dmar po 'bar ba'i khro bo che// 'jigapa chen po'i dus dang 'dra// ut+pal sngonepo'i 'dab ma bzhin// de yi kha dog rnam par bsam// drag po chen po zhal bzhi pa/ 'ba'
ba'i 'phrang ba 'khrig pa'i 'od// spyan gsum ba la khro gnyer bsor/ phyag drug pa la mchog tu 'bar/ ma yi khams dang 'drab 'i mdog/ li khri'i mdog ltar shin tu 'bar//yi khro
gnyir bsar pa yis// gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'byin par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis pa ni// yang dang yang du bsam par bya// ma lus sa rnams thams cad du// son pa'i bdag nyidachen po
des 'gugs pa dang nidabang byed na// su bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sngags ni/ oM ka Ni d+hAnihUMphaT/ khro bo de mi stags 'dzin pa// 'jig rten gsum
po mchog stobs po che// sa rnams thams casug byed na// sku kho gzhan ltasmosatsadagos// khro bo gzegs ma sgrub pa'i thibs so// janyid bcom ldan rnam 'byor te// rdo
pa soms dpa' de bzhin gshegs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur// rtamagrin zhes su bshad pa yin// rtag char ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rgyaskyogs mdog ltar dmabapo/ chung
gzi brjid can zhig pa// ma yi dkyil 'khor dag dang ldan M/ 'dod ldan rnams la 'dod pa 'byung// gdug pa can rnams gdugs pa 'byung// zhi ba 'a yang zhi ba 'byung// stobs ldan
rnams la stobs kyis sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa// bsam gtan bzhi dang mnyam por ldan// phyag bzhi pa la brtsona' grus che// song ga ltar gnas mchob bzhi// rta mgrin
rgyal po chan po ni// dom pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub par bya// skad cig labasus nas ni// thamasacad slong ba bsgrub par bya// stags ni/ oM a mi ted+d+habod pa hUM phaT/ oM a
mi tod b+ha ba hU~M pa3/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// g.yon brkyang ba ni ba tu// khro ba'i skyil mo krung byas nas// 'jig rten thams cad rab nyid bya/[0f8b ]/pad+ma'i dbang phyug rgyal
po ni/ kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug ste// rta yi mgrin pa stobs po che// stobs kyi sbyor ngas bsgrub par bya// dbang phyug chen po la sogs lha// tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang//
mi dang gzugs pa'i bsam pa can// sa rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rta mgrin sgrod pa'i thabs so// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'a byor te// gcig pu nyid nilhag pa'i lha//
shasarapa thabs kyi bdag nyid gyur// khro bo mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// kun sbyor bdag gi rnal 'byor gyis// thugs rjes khro bo'i dbang du song// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rtswa yi rtsa
mor yid kyisani// g.yo ba med par bsam par bya// slob dpon mi g.yo khro bo che// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan// ral gri zhags pa 'dzin pa gang// thog ma tha ma med pa'i
mchog/ pri yang ku ltar ljang ba'i gzugs// 'khrigs shing byis pa lta bur gnas// ma lus pa yis rnams kun// chos pus mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// khro bomangag pa bran ngani//
bo nyas kyang ni rnam par brgyan// skyob kun gyis yos su gang// sas rgyus kun gyi spyan snga na/ bka' lung yang ni yongs su stsol// zad pa'i dus dang 'drara gnas so// stags ni//
nams man+tabadzratshotsatsam hA ro Sha Naswo Ta ahU~M/ traka pInAM/ khro ba'i gzi brjid chen po 'di// gzugs mang mnga' ba stobs po che// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// dbang duyang/
ni mdzad par gnas// rlung dang ma las yang dag byung// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// sngags dang phyag rgyu sogs kun mchog/ lus dang ngag yid de bzhin/
no dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang// dbang du byas nas bsgrub pa'i bya/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' kas mchog/ khro bo phyag rgya rang 'byung ba//
drag po thog ma tha ma mad// rnam par 'phro ba bzhin du gnas// dbizhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sungapo rgyan gyi rgyud las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di yongs su rdzogs so//
nga nasabcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus tagshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'dis la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzus thams cad kyi dbang
phyugagirgyal po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs rnams thams cad kyidakyil 'khor bskyodapar mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi
ra kyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas mang dag pashad bya ba// gzungs rnams kyi ni dkyila 'khor dag/ gru bzhi pal sgo bzhi pa// rtababs kyis ni rnam par mdzes// thig bzhi dang
ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dmapa ba tubashang// de yi dbus su pad chen bo la ma kun gyis shin tum jos/ shurtsa lnga'i 'dab ma ldan// joN+Din na legs par brgyan// de yi
[ze ]dbus su rtag bris// dpag tshad shas rab pha rol phyin// de mi 'khon thams cad du// sna tshogs lasan bar rnams la// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis// shes rab pha rol phyin ma bri//
shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te// thog mtha'anyid kyang brtag par bya// phyag rgya'i yi gni rigs par// go rims bzhin du rnam par dgod// phyogs cha'i dbyab zad dakyis// kha
dog dbye ba thams cad du// rnam dbya mchog tusna tshogs pa// sa byis mnyam dang mimanyam pa/ 'dralas 'od zer bsam mi khyab// sngo sar la sogs dbye ba yis// shes rab snang
ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// 'gro ba thams cad gsal bar bya// 'dus par gyur nas de dag kun// lha nyid kyi na gzugs ji bzhin// shes rab chen po gzugs chen po// 'bar bcas
mdzes ba'i gzibarjid can// de yi nye ba'i dkyil du ni// sngags kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas bstan// sku'i gsar gyi mdog dpa' dra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rang gi ting nga
'dzin la zhugs// du ma'i gzugs kyi gzugs ldan pa// shes rab pha rol phyin ma na/ sems can khams ni rnam sbyong mdzad// kun nas soms can rnams kyi yum// sems can kun
gyi zams tshadadu// thams cad lus la mnyam par khyab// sems kyi rgyun bzhin legs par zhugs// zag pa med cing bsam mi khyab// drim mad cing ngang gis stong// nam mkha' dang ni
pa[z ]a bla@#// mtshungs 'dra ba// dngos dang dngos med rnam par sbyangs// thog ma tha ma modacing zhi// chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// bden/
[>>pa gnyis la rnam par gnas/ dam pa dang ni dam pa'i don/ chos kyi sku ru de bshad do// dbang po kun kyang rnam par shes// sems can M thamasaud thams cad du// yid kyi rnam shes
T+Tha zhes su bshad// shes rab blo dang blo gros ldan// lhag mthong dang ni ye shes kun// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byed// gdang chad pa'i mtha' dang ldan// mtha' gnyis po ni rnam par
sdungs// kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don// rnam pa gnyis su rab brtags// ji ltar bud shing la brkyen nus// mi yis bona gnas pa dang// til latil mar ji bzhin no// bur
shi ro bzhin rab tu brtag/ me tog drin ji bzhin nam// zho la mar gsar ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa yis yo shes srub// bdud rtsi lta bu'i snying po 'byung// gtsub shing dang ni gtsub
stan la// ji bzhin gtsub pas 'byung ste// de bzhin shes rnal 'byor pas// bsrubs pas yos su brtag par bya// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la// yang nas yang dusrab
par byed// mun pa thams cad rnam solaM ba'i// nyima'i 'od zer ji bzhin bdag/ nam mkha'i phrim ma bton nas// ma zla ba bzhin du gnas// 'char ba yi ni gsal byed pa// 'bar/
bstong phrag gi ni snod// mun pa kun 'joms skar la// kun nas kyang ni mdzes pa yin// rnal 'byor pas ni dziltar soms// mkha' bzhin shin tu dri ma med// gzupa'i dzinalas
ni nges par grol// mnyam dngam mnyamA dngos po kun// de nas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// ye shes tid+ma mtshungs pa'i 'od// shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms te// gsang sngags
gsan bsam par bya/ rang bzhin gyi ni dag pa'i dngos// rang bzhin med par rnam par gnas// rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal kun// gdod nas ma skyes rnyog pa med// yi ga de nyid de lta
bu gnas dang mi gnas rnam par spangs// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pas// thig le sku yi rnam par brgyan// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ste// shes rab pha rgol phyin mar bdu// o
paN+NasAhA/ oshu tits+tsha ti bi dza ya swAhA/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab 'dis/ bsam pa thams cad tshogs par byed// oM yaM/ 'dirisangs rgyas kun gyi yum// 'di ni 'khor
lo rnam par sbyar/ da' ni dngos grub thams cad dpa// grub pa 'din byed par gnas// bstan bcos rab tu 'chad byed dang// shes bya thams cad khyad par du// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos
rnams kun// dbang phyug dam pas shes par 'gyur// shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin ma'i sgrub pa'i thapas so/// shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po mkha'/
dang mnyam// gser gyi mdog can 'bar ba can// zla ba'i gdan l legs par bzhugs// brtson 'grus chen po bsam gtan bya// sngags kyi yi ga rnam par
brgyan// mchog tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// sangs rgyas spyan zhes btags pa yi// de yi gsang sngags rab bshad bya// nyonacigs rnams 'dod pa rnams// sngags ni/ oM ru ru
spu ru dz+wa la tiShAsid+d+ha lo tsa ni sar arlas d+hani sa/ 'di d mchog tu gsang ba ni// rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu bshad// dbang chen yi ga'i mthar thug pa// bsgoms pas dag pa rab tu ster//
sa kyi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// dpung dang bcas pa myur bkug ste// bran du gyur nas da bar gnas// phyag rgyagacig pa'i lhamo che// latsang g.yo
ba'i zhal mnga' ba// sgog pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// rol cing snang ba'i gar mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyanani 'grub par 'gyur// mig gi phyag rgya rab tu sbya/mig gi phyag rgya
'deshin tu// 'jig rten gsum yang gar byed do// sangs rgyus spyan gyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// chu yi dkyil 'khor dgyes pa na// bcud kyis len dang mtshungs pa'i
pas sa mchog mtha' yas rgyas shing yangs pa yi/dri ma med pa'i mkha' la gnas//dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// lha mo mchog tu mdzesapa mo// 'dam bu mda' rgyu'amadog lta
kam// grub ma ral pa'i cod pana'achang// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad ma// rtag tu nam mkha' bzhin du gnas// sngags ni/ o ga rje bi ka Teka TaM ka Ta swahA/ gos dkar mo/
yi phyag rgya ma// dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra// sngags kyi yi ga 'a phreng ba che// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad na// sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya//
dam pa'i lha mo 'grub par 'gyur/pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs// zhi ba'i 'dangayang dag ldan// zhiba'i yi gnyam bas ldan/zhi ba mdzad ciba'ajig rten gyi// sa gsum sgrub par byed pa'i thabs//
gos dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// sngo bsangs dkar mo sna tshogs gzugs// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'a lon dbus gnas pa/ sgag pa'i
nyams kyis yongasaM ga ba// 'gro ba mtha' dag skyob mdzod la// thugs rje'i thugs dang ldan pa can// rab tu 'bad do bsgrub par bya/ rol pa li ni yi ga mchod// sngags ni/ o
re tut+ta ra tureswAhA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mtha' yas mchog/ sgrol mas legs par rab tu gnas// gsang chen bzhin du thams cadel/ bcud kyis len dang 'dra ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun
thams cad du// dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad// sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su ni// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po mchog/
phyag bzhi spyanani gsum pa dang// phal pa'i cod pan dag gis gnas// 'dam bu mda' rgya'i mdog ltar dkar// dpa' la sogs nyams kyis brgyan// brtson 'grus/
chen mo 'jigs sel ma// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pas// rab tu 'bar pa'i mo bzhin du// shin tu gsal ba'i gzi brjid can// hU~M gi yi gi zab mo'i sgra// sa gsum po ni
'khrug par mdzad// khro gnyecan zhes legs par grags// sngags kyi 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan// sngags ni/ o pA ya nAs ni dus ni tus/ pas ya/ blo ku Ta ta ta bcashAtashad
yin[：]o Tak+ki hUM dzaAhA/ gsang sngagasa'adin brtson 'grus che/ gsang sngags kun gyi bdaganyid mchog/ 'gro ba kun kyang 'gugs byed ni// gdugapa'i sems lta smos ci dgos//
khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo dza ldan// jo rje'i 'phrang bas yongs su bskor// gzi brjid dkyil 'khor
kun nas dkris// dar gnas rtag tu lha mo ni// stobs chen pri yang ku ltar ljang// phyag bzhi par de bsam par bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor ma rnams cher zhib/
dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba// sngags kyi yi ga'aphrang ba che// rdo rje'i dbus song rab tu gnas// khro bo hU~M mdzad gang ba'i mtha'// dpa' ba'i nyams la sogs par ldan// lha mo
'jig rtan gsum rmongs byed// dngos gruban bonab stsolas// skad cig tsam kyis 'gro ba kun// sa par dbang du byed par 'gyur// rdo rje'i rlung gi 'phrang bache// rdo rje'i khor lo'ab
tu gnas // 'jig pa chen po'i ma lta'adug/ snang ba chen mo stobs mo tsha// bats+tshanA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam bar brgyan// mchinaMni mA ma kI zhes bya// lha mo 'jig rten
gsum gyis mchod// sngags ni/ o ku lan+d+ha tri ya nam[d]karaM/ shamig ra/ rgyu gnag+ha ni/ g+ha tayalha'i nasAhA/ o kul+lAnad+ma ri/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~MphaT/ gsang sngags 'din don gyi
mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin// sa gsum po ni 'gugs byed cing// tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kun// 'gro pa thams cad 'gugs byad laM// rang gi bang du gnas pa'i ng
yin mA ma ki'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// rlung gi dkyil 'khor drag po la// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bskor// de yi dbus su snang ba che// zla ba'i gzugs kyis rnam pabargyan//
ngosaspros pa las bdagoskyid ni// rdorje lu gu rgyud kyi sku// phyag bzhi ma la lha mo de// rdo rje yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan// dmar po 'bar ba de yis ni/ sa gsum po ni 'ching bar mdzad// tsas
pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// bkug nas dbang du mdzad par gnas// dngos grub thams cad 'dzin pa dang// de yi thugs kar rdo rjecha/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// de yi
'bar balcags sgrog gi/ rnam pa rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan// nges par phyung nas de dag kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pagi/ 'jig rten khams na mtha'
dag tu// kun nas rnam par bkang nas kyang// bsgom bya rdo rje thams cad du// khro bo dpaldan spro ba'i nyAl// lto ba 'phyang zhing sku tshab// mche ba bzhi yaMs rnam par brgyan// 'bar ba
yaM ni 'phrul gsal// gzugs mdzes drag po'i gzugs dang ldan// sngags ni/ oM badzra kha lA a d+hi pa ta ya/ ma hA ba lA a/ ma hA bi cu nAdza ya pra dzul u0f7a/ 1sku yanamo ni la
kaNA ya ka rAtar ba lam+bo da nA ya/ blo ku Ti mu khA ya/ mA dzA ra mu khA ya/ mA dzA ramu khA ya/ tsatu daM kArA lA yA/ a rgya ha a kyasha ra raM/ ma nu pa ba@#/ shar srid+d+hagi dgra/
haste pa dgra 'i NaM/ A ba shaya/ kaM pa ya/ kaMpa ya/ b+ha ma a b+hu tsa ya/ maNA la ma rgyu/ ba kucha bi ku// tsAts+tsha tsuts+tshaku ku/ spo Ta ya swo Ta ya/ marANi/ na krin+tiya
ma zhwad a/ tsit+taM/ ba lnga ba la/ kiny+tsanA a sa/ da pa/ nA ga/ A/ rAkas pishAtsAnasA d+ha ya/ sa ma ya ya ma nu sma ra/ tsAti ma nu sma ra nAhA/ ni d+hi ni d+hi/ nishi ni/ badzra
dza pa ya tig/ saM brje tsitaM ya3/ o 'dziNidaM bas/ ladzakA li nI sAhA/ gsang sngags 'atsayi sbyor ba yis/[“]bdagyes len 'bar ba dang// 'gro ba
thams cad 'bas pa dang// gdug pa rnams ni'achi ba dang// tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams dang// lha dpalta min lto 'phya che// 'jig rten skyong dang klu rnams kyang// rang gi gnas/
nas bskyod nas ni// grub pa kun gyi dngos grub ni// dngos grub 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// thams cad gus pas sbyin par byed// bud mo gzugs kyis bsgrub par// jo rdzolu
gu rgyud ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas bar/ pad+mangamar po rab tu gnas // phyag bzhi pa la du ma'i gzugs/ dung dang kun ng zla ba 'dra//
thugs kyi rdo rje'i de nyid yin// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// zhi ba la sogs nyams dang ldan// chos rnams kun gyi bdag skyes mchog/ rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu sgom// sas
rgyas bye pa yang dag 'byung// don bdag yang dag sgopa ni// skul byed ma zhes yos sugrags// sngags kyi 'phro ba'i yi ge ldan/ kun nas rnam par 'phro byed pa// nam mkha'i
khrams ni yongs gang bye srid de yi spyod yul yapa// de srid do yi 'od bur bsgoms/ rnal 'byor yaM shes kyis ba sprul// sngags ni/ otsami tshutsun+ti pAdA/ 'di yi sngags
kyi mchog gtso bo// sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod pa po/ mtshus pa med pa'i dngos grub ster// lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod// 'di yis sdig kun 'dzad byed cing// phun sum tshogs/
kun ba stsol mdzod// pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan// sas rgyas nyid kyang star byed pa'o// skul byed ma'i sgrub pa'i bas so/// gsang ba mchog/
[>girags pan// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun bdag dgyes pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni ma byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu nyid
ni lhag pa'i lha// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// 'dod chags med cing chags bral mod// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// bud med kun
gyi sgyu ma'i rgyu// 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las// bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags// nus pa yi ni rang bzhin gyis// rang bzhin nyid kyis de grub

rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur ba// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'dis// shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// kun la sna tshogs phyag rgya ni// kun la sna tshogs sdom pa yis// sangs rgyas
kun dang mnyam pa'i sbyo'o/ stong pa nyid kyi de nyid bskul// kun la kun nas thams cad du// rnam kun kun tsherapa nyid kyi// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan dang g.yo// thams cad dngos
po rang nyid 'gyur// sems dang sems can ting 'a dzin dang// byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// sa dang pha la phyin spyod pa// dbanganyid duyang u0f97bshad do// bdud dngabadud
las rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas rdo rjod bzhin gshegs// thog snye tha ma med zhi ba// byang chub sas rgyas bcom ldan de'o// jo rdzordo rje 'dzin pa nyid// pad+mad bzhin pad+ma
'dzin// nor bu ra bu 'dzin pa nyid// sna tshogs pa bzhin sna tshogs 'dzin// phal gyi ral gri 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor lo de bzhin 'khor lo 'dzin// 'jig rtan gsum rgyal nyid dang
ni 'di rnams kyi yang rigs nyid 'gyur// nga nyid chags dang chags bral ba// 'dod dang thar pa ru yang 'gyur// dus gsum dang nusrid gsum mchog/ 'jig rten gsum dang
khams gsum pa// brtan pa thams cad de nyid de// rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// g.yo ba kun nas snachogos pa// thams cad du ni da 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa mchog gi mchog
chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa// dngos po kun tu d 'gyur ro// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// nam mkha'i
kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sams dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpal ldan sgyu ma chen po 'chang// rnam snang rtag pa thams cad du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso chen khyab// sangs rgyas/
'khor lecan mi bskyod// che dang rin chen 'byung stobasam// tshe dpag med pa kun nas mchog don yod sna tshogs mdzad pa dang// rdo rjesams pa'i blta na sdug/
dgug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang// lags par mdzad pa nyid yini// rin chen sgrol ma de bzhin ga/ jo ji bzhad bsnang bache// rdo rje chos dang nob ma// sgyu dang sku mchog bdud rtsi
dang las dang go tshaganod na che// khu tshur de bzhinagshegs pa kun/ nyidabcom ldan rnal 'byor 'di// ngo rdzasams dpa' stobs po chu// jo shA mdzad yaM mdzad dang//
rta mgrin zhes ni rnam par grags// we ru ka dpal rdo rje cha// mchog gi dbang phyug gshin rje gshing// khro bo gzegs ma snang ba che// rdo rje ma ni 'od chen po/ gzungs rnams kyi ni mchog
shes rab pha rol phyin chog gtso/ sa dang pha rol phyin pa stobs// tshangs pa'i gnas bachen po bzhi// dbangani mchog tu 'bar
ba dang// dran pa bar gzhag pa bzhi// dbang po rnamA da stobs rnams dang// rjes dran drug por gyurapa gang// bsgom par bya bar rab tu gnas// de nyid bcom lhan gcig pur//
ra sbya byang chub yan lag bdun btags pa// mtha' gcig yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gas mchog gi mtshan// 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam po che// 'phags lam yan lag/
brgyad btags pa// stobs bcu pa ni bcu pa nyid// sangs rgyas chos kyi bdag nyid gnas// byang chub phyogs kyi chos chen po// rnam par ngabye pa sum cu bdun// mthar gyis ba nas
pa'isnyoms 'jug ni// dug la gnas par gyur pa dang// bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhis// sems can bsdu bas bsdus pa dang/ so so yang dag rig pa bzhi// da bzhin srung
pa mi mnga' ba// skal ba chen po'i mi 'jigs pa// mchog tugyur pa nyid dang ni// bsam gtan gzugs med bo'i phrag gnyis// tshad med pa yang de bzhin no// byang chub sems kyi
spyod pa dang// bden pa bzhin ston pa po// kun nas nyon mos rnam par byang// zag bcas zag pa med pa'i mchog// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// dbang phyug mchog gi dbang
phyug dang// skye dgu'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon// mchog gi bdag nyid ces su brjod// kun rdzob brjod pa thams cad dang// sgra rnams kyi na spyodayul 'gyur// brjod du mad cing
smros pa bral// stong pa mkha' mnyam mtshungs pa mod// ga mtha' sgra mas rnamadagodang// 'jig rten h+phasad tshul du rtogs// de tsho lus sogs dbye ba yis// sa rnams kyis ni
mos su brtags// sku ni sprul pa nyid du'agyur// los spyod rdzogs le yang dag khares// rdorje'i sku dang de bzhinadu// ye shes sku sogs yongs su brtags// mtha' yas sku dang sku
chen po/ rin chanasku ni 'od byed pa// pad+ma'i sku ni snang ba che// thams cad sku ni las bzung byed// rtogs par bya ba las kyi sku// rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye/
par bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/[“]byang chub sems ni 'od gsal ba// kun tu 'od kyis chen po// nyima'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan// gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces
bya[·]zla ba'i 'od ni 'od gsal ba// gsum pa nam mkha'i 'od ces bya// mkha' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas// rdo rje 'od mtha' gang zhigs// ba' pa nga ni yid 'ong ba//
bsam pa brtan pa'i sbyor pa yis// rdo rje zhes ni yongs su bsgrags// lnga pa rin cha'o sa bya// dbang bskur bar ni rab tu gnas// drug pa pad+mo 'chang zhes bya// pad bzhin
rab tu rnam par snang// rang bzhin gyis ni chos nyid dag/ bdag po med cing yongs bzung mad// bdun pa las kyi 'od ces bya// sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad pa cha// brgyad pa dpa med
pa zhes bya// dpa nid la yod ma yin// dgu pa dpa dang bral zhes bya// dpo rnams thams cud rab 'jug pa// bcu panga shes rab 'od ces bya// sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med//
bcu gaMcig kun mkhyen nyid ces bya// sa chen po ni 'od gsal ba// bcu gnyis so sor bdag rig pa// rnal 'byor ya shes yongs rdzogasanyid// sa chen po ni 'di dag rnams//
0 sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du// sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos// rnal 'byor ye shes gang brjod pa// thams cang nyid ni mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang
mi mnyam pa// de bzhin gshegs M pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud rgyun bolas/ sngags kyi de kho na nyidado/// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos da dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi de ma thag nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
mnyam par bzhago nas// mnyam par bzhag pa'i de ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das dngazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo jo la rjesasu bcug nas/ bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus dang/ dgadang/ yid mnyam pa nyidadu byin gyis brlabs nas rnam par bzhugs so// donAs bcom ldan 'os jorje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid rtogs nas ting nge 'dzin las bzhes te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skam phyis bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegA
ba// pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor rman ngo yod do zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis stan las las to/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan star pus mo g.yas
pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bzhud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs kyi theg pa chen po
mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas/ sems can h+phams cad thabs chung dus de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur pa bka'
stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jam
dpal khyod gang slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig lo rjes su zhugs pa ni 'jam dpal khyod lags so legs so// de legs pa rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/

[“ ]theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes byin
gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin la snyoms pa/zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dibaka' stsal pa//
de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog/ snying po chen po'i rgyan ces bya// gru bzhi ba la sgo bzhi ba// rta babs bzhis ni
mdzes par byas// khrig bzhi dang na mnyam par ldan// 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje sIpo yongs bskor ba/ byang chub shing gis nye bar mdzes// ngo
dkyil 'khor grwa rnams dang// sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis smras/ do rdzopad+ma thams cad la// las kyi rdo rje thams cad du// 'bar ba'i
'phrang ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dril bcas sna tshogs mchog dang ldan// rgyal mtshan bsgrang ba rlung bskyod pa'i// gos dang ma tog chun pos spras// zla ba phyed pas khyabar mngos
ral girdo rje uSh+Thal// lcags kyu la sogs sna tshogs brgyan// cha yis dkyil 'khor yongs bskor ba// khor yug bzhin du rnam par gnas// de la'ang sgo dang sgo khyud sogs
mkhas pa yis ni spro bar bya// de yin du bri bar bya// 'khor lo chen po rab tu gnas// cha brgyad kyis ni yongs su bskor// dkyil 'khor legs par rnam par spras//
zhin deN+Da'i thig gis yongs su bskor// rdo rje'i 'khor lo cher 'bar ba// de yi dbus su snying po che// rdo rje'i snying po zhes su bshad// de yi steng du rdo rjecha/
po ngordzapad+marab tu gnas// pad+ma'i stang du rdo rje ma// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan// dung dang kun da zla ba dkar// sas rgyas kun gyi gdan du bshad// de yi steng/
du legs bzhugs bya// khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad ma// zla ba'i mdog ldan 'dzum bcas pa// ting 'dzin ldan gnas sdig pa bcom// do'i 'phrang bas rnam par smras//
sna tshogs 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// smin na chen po'i 'phreng ba ches// smras pa rnam par dgod par bya// desngags rtagatu shes bya ba// yi ga yi ni mchogagatsobo// sha sa'i sde pa
gsal byed// mchog gi dbang phyug rgyugacig pu// drug pa'i dbyangs kyis legs gsal pa// thig le nA das legs par brgyan// rten cing 'brel 'byung 'khor lo yi// don can
za rab tu bsnyad par bya// dadabcom ldan rol 'byor can// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// chos kyi sku ni yi shes che/ rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bshad// nga nas ang de bzhin
tshan gshegs pami bskyod pa dang/ ma shes kyi 'od zer dang// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsungadang/ shugs rdo rje nyid du rang gis bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
pa'i phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid dudamigs nas phyogs bzhin 'khod do// dbang chen dkyil 'khor mi bskyodapa// ma yi dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od// cha yi dkyil 'khor 'od
dpag mad// rdo rjes rnam gnon rlung dkyil 'khor// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i dam tshig las 'byung ba sems dpa' byin gyis rlob
pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi rdo rje'i snying po rgyun gyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ba'o// oM badzrasatwA/ de nas 'di rnam par byung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje'i 'od zer
rnams phyungs/ rdo rje'i 'od zerang nams kyis 'jig rtenagyi khams thams cad snang bar byas tagasal bar gyunas/ de nas jorje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rtan gyi khams thams cad kyi
rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su gshegs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad de/ sems can thams
cad kyi don bya ba mngon par rdzogs nas/ slar yang gcig tu 'dus tabyang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bazang po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rnal
'byor gyi dbang phyug po'i rdo rje snying po'i thugs kar gnas te ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa// e ma'o rdo rje snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// snying po yo shes/
rnam dag pa ro rdzasams dpa' nyid gyur nas// byang chub sems dpa' brtan bskyadad// sangs rgyas yongashes bla na med// gang zhig brtan phyir lus min yang// sangs rgyus sku
da du 'gyur ro// nas rdo rje'i sku byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'byon te/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i 'khor thams cad rnam pa bzhis sbasta/
dkar// sapo/ dmar po/ ljang khu'i mdog tu mngon par sprul nas rang gi sngags kyi yi gas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bton te gnas par gyur to// dgug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/
oM badzrarAdza/ rjesasu chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzran ga/ da pa'in gshegs pa thams capal legs par mdzodapa'i ting nge 'dzin ni o badz+dzas rgyu/ de bzhin du rten chen
'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba'i ting pa'i dzin ni/ o badzar/ nyima'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting 'dzin ni/ oM badzratadza/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' mdzo
kyi ting 'dzin ni/ oM badzra ki tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzradAs/ de bzhin du 'od dpag med ba'i dkyil 'khor yang shugs nga
pa'i dzin// oM badzra d+ha// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting 'dzin ni// oM badzra kI dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ting pa'i dzanani/ oM badzra btu/ de bzhin gshegs pa las/
cad kyi sems dpa' skya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzab+ha/ de bzhin du rdo rje don yodwapa'i dkyil 'khor la/ las sna tshogs pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ o badzra karma/ brtson 'grus/
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra kA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro ba'i ting pa'i dzin ni// oM badzra yak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/
gsung dang/ thugs khu tshur bcings pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzrasati/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snanga mdzad de bzhin ga shegs pa thams nad kyi sa shas kyiphyag rgya'i dam/
tshig rdo rje dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas 'di phyang ngo// oM badzra d+ha tu/ rang gi rig pa mchog ni/ oM badzra
d+hu tIshA re daM badziNi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa klams nad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya
ba'i ting pa'i dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thug ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di byung ba/ o ako/ maM/ odza namukhItsetA badz+dzobadzra ts+tshi/ de nas
ka de bzhin gshags pa'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjerin po che'i dam tshig gi ma shes kyi phyag rgyu'i dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
soms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka stsal pa/ oM rat+tasaM b+ha ba tuM/ oM badzran+tAn gtsA tihU~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu mad pa
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdorjechos kyi dam tshigagi yashes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi thugs ka'as
rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM a mi d+hab+ha hi// oM badza?d+ha ra Na/ de nas de bzhinagshegs pa rnam par gnon pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rdzogs
las kyi dmatshig gi ya shas kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsalal/ o a mo lha
sat+tiM kaM/ oM badzam hA ba la hU~M/ de nas bcom ldamaradas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la rnam par gzigs shing/ de bzhin gsheg
pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sa rta thug dus ma tA dz+nyA na badzahU~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di dag bshad pa
tsam gyis bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i bdaganying tog na ngo mnyam pa
nying spros pa'i snying po bka' stsalapa/ a pardzus ma tA dz+nyA na bun+tahU~M/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisnying po rnams phyag na rdor mthong ba kun
to de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas chos thams cad mnyam pa dkyus pa'i snying po 'od phyung ngo// oM sarbad+harmas ma pAdzAn badzra/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung btsam gyis kyang/
slar yang phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis bsubs pa mdzad sa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du'akhod pa mthong ngo// n gnas
de bzhin gshegs pa de dgathams cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshog pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo// osarba satAs ma tapa palcabud+d+ha hU~M/ de nas 'di phyu ba
tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyag ro sngonam par byung ste/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar gnas nas bka' nod cing 'khor de// bcom
ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun// bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pas// de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la byin gyis rlob par byes shig/ de de bzhinizhas gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdordzasems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka
wa nas dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs tabartan par gyur nas/ do sgag mo la sogs pa'i lha rnams phyung ste/ lha 'di rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi grwa rnams su de bzhin dun+nam par
gnas so// sgo rnams su sgo skyong ma rnams dang/ mtshams rnams su gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ rodang/ rig bya rnams bshangado// de dug gi sngags su gyur pa ni/ o
badzra g+ha Tit+taM/ 'khor lo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya'o// mo sna ha badzra tsitaM/ o sha rar badzra aM aM/ obadzra Ni kAl kAhU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dabyas pa na
po'i mchod pa/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor grwa dung mtshams rnanAsu dri rdo rjel sogs pa'i lha mo rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gnas par dgod par bya'o// oM badzragan+d+he hU~M/ oM ma rgyu
badz+dzaNi/ hUM hUM/ o ma rong b+ha ba badziNid+d+haM/ oM badzra shi ri bo ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rol pa chen po'i lha mo'i sgo'i mtshams rnams su gzugs la sogs pa'i/
oM badzra rU pa/ oM badzra sha// oM badzraras/ oM badzra par/ mnyes par byed pa'o// nga ba'in gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dga' ba jorje'i snying po ni/ os ma/
ho/ su'i ta hU~M/ dga' bdachan po'i rdo rje snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun nas mnyes pas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad la brtan par gyur nas/ dngos grub
thams cad stsol bar mdzod/ dgug dang legs par rab gnas dang// ji bzhin gnas su sbyar ba nyid// kun nas dgyes mdzad sangs rgyas kun/ dngos grub klams cad la sbyin
dag/ stags kyi tshig rnams kyang/ oM a rgya hi b+ha ga wAn badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ oM pra be sha ya hU~M/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ os ma ya b+hatsAtig+ha ga wan/ ong tung ho b+ha ga wan
badzra a bi shu a 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgo'i phrin las so// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor 'dib la byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ kun r bzang po dang/ spyan ras gzig
dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgod par bya'o// sngon du bshadapa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas slob ma bcug ste/ dbang bskur ba lasogs pa byas nas/ slob ma
dang bcos pas thabs cig tu de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad la nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o// de la dang po kho na'i zhig dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon na dam tshig thams
cad shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos dngos grub thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa/ rdo rje rnal
'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o/ de nas 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings par
'gyur ba ni/ phyil krung bcings nas dril sogs pa rnams kyis lag pa gnyis byugs nas phyag rgya bcings pa rab tu bsgrub par bya'o// lagapa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa byas te/
sor mo phan tshun bcings nas skyil krung gi dbus su rdo rje bsdams par bzhag pa ni dodrazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rjesams dpa' la sogs pa ni gar gyi tshogs kyi
sbyor bas so// rdo rje bsdams pa nyid skad pa'i phyogs su bzung ba ni rdo rje soms pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsnams b.las mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar bzung ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o//
de nyid mda' 'phen pa lta bu'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje mapa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid la legs so ba sbyin pas rgyab tu jog pa ni rdo rje legs pa'i lo// byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ 'o/

skabasdams pa de nyidadapral bar 'jog pa ni rdo ni gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa la bod kyi dkyil 'khor gyis sbyor ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// rdordzi bsams la

spyi bor sbyar ba ni tog gi phyag rgya'o// kha'i thad du bskor ba ni rdza bzhadapa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid khar byas pa ni rjechos kyi phyag rgya'o// nga nyid sipakhar byas pa ni rdo rje la

gro'i phyag rgya'o// nga nyid 'khor lo ltar yongs su bskor ba ni dodza rgyu'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying khar bsgreng ba'i rdo rje smra ba'i phyag rgya'o/ das kyi phyag rgya rnams so// rdo rje bsdams pa nyidagar
nyid du ston pa ni las sna tshogs pa'i phag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis spyi bo dang/ snying kha dang/ mgrin pa 'jog pa ni rdo rje srung ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa lasa'agram pa gnyis su

'jog pa ni ro rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// dotshe bsdams pa de nyid snying khar patsir ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du sgrog mo dang bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha mo zams/
cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ la cing rnams 'khor dgod pa dang// sgog dang/ ngarje'i bdag nyid dang// dba' dang khro sogs chos bdag nyid// rang nyid zhi ba'i gdan/
nyid nyams// phyag rgya thams cad rab sogs pa// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// rang nyid rdo rje'i gar byed ma// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag bcing ba rab tu
sbyar thams cad grub par 'dod sogs kyis// skyil krungasasargyas thams cad kyi// de phyiraganyis med rdo rjesnyan// sas rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sku// sgag pa'i sbyor bas rdo
[% ]@#// ca sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhi ba'i spyan/ bsnyams bcas rdo rje can gyis dgongs// sas rgyas rnams dang rdo rjecan// ting 'dzin dbye ba las shes//
'khrugs pa'i lta stangs khro rnams kyis// btsun mo rnams kyis rol pa nyid// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang// sdig spyod rnams kyi lta stangs song// chos rnams kun gyi
rjes 'jug pa'i// shugs kyi lta stangs phyag rgya'o// tshogs dang thon phonyamo'i// lta stangs rnam pa sna tshogs nyid// mchu yi phyag rgya yongs ldan pa// g.yo ba mdacing laM/
'gul ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sas rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// mtshams sbyor cung zad yang dag ldan// rnam 'gyur mad cengamatshus mngags//
rol pa'i ma ga yang dag ldan// mchu yi phyag rgya rdo rje can// rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor ba can// khro bas so ni yongasasu bsdam// 'di ni khro ba'i phyag rgyar bshad/ mchu yi phyag
gzugs mdzes can// 'jig rtan ba rnams mchu'i phyag rgya// rnam 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral// shin tu gnag dka'i 'dod chags dang// sdang dang rmongs las thams cad du//
rol cing rnam 'khor dang ldan pa// g.yo bas rab tu 'phro ba mang// mtshu yi phyag rgyar shes par bya// lha mo bo nyi'atshogs kyi yang// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ lta stangs mchu
la sogs pa'i ming// phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdus pa/ skyob pa rnams kyis kun shes bya// jisrid sku yi dbye ba dang// dbang po la sogs rab dbye dang// dadag phyag rgyaman
yas mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis brtags pa nyid// sna tshogs sku ni gzi brjid che// chad padayon tana'abyung ba'i gnas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas
byang chub rab spyin byed// rdodz+dzasnyingabo rgyan gyi rgyud na po las/ ma tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid gsang bzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so/de nas
bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ sur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'adi bka' stsal ba/ de nas
dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgrobazhi ba// babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ sa tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog/ da dang mi
tog chun pos brgyan/ jorje'i chen rnams kyis spras// sna tshogs pad+mo de bzhin gzhan// dkyil 'khor de i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs yid 'ong ba// mgon po sum cu
rtsa gnyis mtshan// 'ba' ba mchog gis brgyan pa po// de sngags rtags su shes bya ba// dang po'i dbyas dang gnyis pa'o// de yi 'khor thams cad du// 'khor lo can brgyad bro
bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbusasu ni// 'khor la kun tu 'bar ba gzhag/ 'khor lo'i lta ba'i dbus su ni// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas/ lhag
sogasasangs rgyas thams cad ni// jiltar sngon bzhin bri bar bya// nye bar mkho ba'i mchod kun gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya// dgug sogs cho ga'i skyon ni/ dkyil
'khor snga ma ji bzhin no// dkyila 'khor bar spyod pa kun// cho ga 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rtog pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/
mang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal zhes// bya ba rdo dzamadzod glags// gru bzhi kha la sgo bzhi pa// chu babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// dayi nang
du 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu 'o// de yi dbus su khro bo che// 'jig rten gsum las rnam la yang// khro gnyer ldan zhing smin ma 'khyog/ spyanagasal 'bar ba
chen po pa// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// rnam pa dgod cing slar khro ba// g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// dka' bzlog dbang phyug chen po gnon// sangs rgyas
'phrangab sogs bas spras// in nIl mtshungs ba'i 'od// phyag bzhis sbyin gsum pa// zhal bzhi ba la thub par dka'// khe nyon dang ni zhags bar brjod// dang bo nani rdo rje
0 bar// gnyis pa zhwags pa snyigs mdzub man// phyag gnyis khu tshur dam pa mchog/ khu tshur gnyis ni rab tu brtag/ many+tse'u chung gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba/ rnalu gu rgyud/
kyis rnam pa la// snying khar phyag rgya legs bzha gnas / sdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs par mdzad// 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya ba'i// phyag rgya mchog tu thub par
dka'// sngags ni ming gi de nyid ldan// 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba mnyam par 'khrigs// dkyil 'khor du yi gnas rnams su// cha rnams kun tu thams cad nas// phyag rgyathams cad
mnyam par bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas par// ral gri 'khoral gzhudang mda'// de bzhin du ni dgrastanyid// ngal sogs ba'i mtha' yas mag/ mdor bsdus nas
ni phyag rgyadagod// de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam bkod nas nyapar mkho ba'imachodapa thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil
khor rekadanas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog yang dag rab tu bshad byab// sangs rgyas dba' bo thams cad kyis/ 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes su bshad// bzhi
pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang ma togachun pos brgyan// dadabus kyil 'khor chen po ni// chu zhes bya pa'i ming can go/ dayi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyud pa yid 'ong ba/
de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba// zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i mdog/ jal pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/
can rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bo// sangs rgyas 'phrodab sogs pas smras// sku rnams thams cad kun nas spro// mthur yas rab 'byam rgya chapa'i// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi/
mnyam la// nga yi stags su yongs grags pa// shakha'i sna yi mthA dgo ba// kA yig donaldan sngon byung ba// rgyu yi don du rab sgrub byed// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bor man/
ma yis sa bon gsal bar byed// thig le sgra ni mchog tusbyin// 'jig rtenadabang phyags bya'i mchon// de yi phyag rgyu yang dag bshad// pad+mo'i thal mo rab tu brkyang// bris
pa'i phyag rgyur yang dag bshad// dbyug gu ril baspyi blugasabre// mdun du bgrwapa'i phrang pad+mayi/ rgyal bo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhag/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/
phyag rgya mchog tu 'bar de dag/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ji lta rigs bar dgod par bya// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyiskyalapogo
de nas dkyil 'khoran po'i mchog/ gzhan ni rab tu bshad par bya// dpa' bo rini na snying po yi// sdong nan zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhib// rta babs bzhi/
mdzes par bya/ de yi dbus su'amachu// yan lag brgyad pa mchog la bar// de dbusa'in pad+ma// rin chen 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de dbus pad+ma rA ga 'dra/
rin rdo rjechos 'a bar ba// sangs rgyas lnga yakhyod pa can// rin chen 'phrang bas rnam par mdzes// mdun gyi kun gyi dbang bskur gtso/ rin chen de yi gtso bo mchog/ g.yas
su pad+marA ga ste// rgyab tu in+danIl// yid bzhinanor bu rin chen g.yon// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs mchog/ sna tshogs ni ngan sku par brgyan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa yi
gnas rnams su ni gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// bzhi pa'i snga yi dang po gang// ma yis bon gyis gsal
byas dbyangs kyi gnyis nga sa kun nas mnan// dbang sbyar ba ni stod du gnas// nga yi phug rgyu yang dag bshad// rin chen snyim la rgyab bskums te// rin chen rnam pa legs
byung ba// ra ni rdo rjerin chen no// jo rin po che'i dkyil la khor log sma ngonas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//
babs bzhis ni mdzes bar byas// thig bzhi dbaniyang dag ldan// rdo rje 'phrangapas rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus su zhal bzhi pa// 'khor lo bzhin du yongs bskor ba'o/
'bu/ de yi dbus su pad chen po// kha dog sna tshogs yongs 'bar ba// de yi dbus su brtson chen po// jorjesna tshogs yongs su bri// jo lngakhu tshur 'dzin mdzes pa//
rgyana rnams kun gyis brgyan pa 'o// kha dog sna tshogs gabri brjid rgyu// sangs rgyas 'phreng bas rnam bar mdzes// de yi stag ni yang dag bshad// banu gnyis la ye dbyas kyi
mtha' mya ngan 'das don legs gsal byas sgragasogs rig ma thams cad kyis// de bzhin rang gi phyag rgya yis// rdo rje'i thig le yos su ldan// sna tshogs bkru ba
mchog tu 'bar// de yi dbang bskur phyag rgya yis// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas kun nas yongs su bskor ba yis// las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// las kyi dkyil
'khor ro/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya pa// shes rab yo shis kyi 'khor lo/ sdugs kyi yi gsa rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus
su pad chan bo// 'dab ma brgyad pa shin t+tamadzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du// gzhonan sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa// sku mdog dmar zhing 'dzum bcas pa// sna tshogs gzugs
can ma gri can// phyag bzhi pa la zhalabazhi pa// ral gri'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// gsang sngagasarkun po'i yi galngade yi drung du lags par gnas// dbyangs kyi bcu
gnyis gsang sngags ni// thugs ka ru ni yang dag gnas// phyi rol khyer na gru bzhi mdzes// thage bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rtababs bzhi dang mnyam par ston// sgo bzhi las ni
shin tu mdzes// shes rab pha rol phyin pa// de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dodon// khyad pa yis ni bri bar bya// sngonadu bshad pa'i cho ga yis//
mchod sogs cho ga rgyas pa nyid// bzhugs pa'i klog pa bzhin du// ji ltar dkyil 'khor 'dir mthong bzhin// shes rab yashes kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil/
'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu khaMshad bya ba// gru bzhi pau0f8bsgo bzhi pa/ chu babs bzhis ni mngos bar byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// phyi mi dkyil 'khor bri bar
bya de yi nang du bri bya ba// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// rtan cing 'brel 'byung 'phrang ba ni// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// 'khor lo'i dbusasu brtson chen po// rdo'i rgyu ni stobs
po phyag bzhi ba la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dog nag po gzi brjid che// chos kyi 'khor los bskor mdzad// de yi sngags gyur mngos pa mi/
rgyu yi don du so sor bskyod// dpyangs drug dang ni yang dag ldan// thig la phyi mo s rnam par brgyus// rang gi yi ge'i 'o thang ba che// 'khor lo gnyis kyi rnam par brgyan/ de la ma
durupayigal// rgyug tu zhugs par brjod par bya// rdo rje'i thalamo phyag rgya che// 'khor lebazhin du rab tu gnas// mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag/ ji
ltar dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor bla na med// thog mar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// dngos grub thams cad yang dag
rut+tA 'bar// sa kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro// gdonas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad pyab// thog ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dkyil
'khor kun gyi thig gdab bo// dayi dkyi snang ba che// mkha' bzhin shin tu 'od gsal ba// sams dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod// dam pa'i rgyal po rab tu bzhugs//
wA zla ba'i mdog can gzi brjid che// sna tshogs mtshon cha'adzin pa'i mchog/ gzhon nus rab tubarjid pa'i zhal// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// sangs rgyas 'phrong bsogs
pas spras// rdo rjod kyil 'khor brgyan par mdzad// 'di igasang sngags gzakharjid che// dbyas dgu pa la thig le dang// nad mis ni rnam par brgyan// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa
la thig le nadasa rnam par brgyan// de yang gtso bo'i gsang sngags 'gyur// nam mkha'i mdzod ni rab bskor mdzad// dalta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sngags kyi 'phrang ba
mchog ldan pa// ma lus pa yis rnams kun// thams cad nas ni nam mkha'i mtshungs// togazhi phyag rgya gyur pa de'i/ de bzhin duni nges par bcing// delta'i dkyil 'khor
bris nas ni// nam mkha' yi ni mdzod de la// gal te bdag ni grub 'dod na// mchod pa kun gyis rnam par mchod// nam mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas
dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ dkyil 'khor sngama'i sbyor ba sa// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdaba'o// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// khro bo'i
dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// dor yang rdo rjes yamagi/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'dod// de yi dbus su gzikhadamo// do gnod sbyin bla na 'ad// phyag bzhi pa la kAlabazhipa/
pad+ma'irgyal po la rab gnas// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyanapa'i lus/ bdud rnams thamasarnab 'joms mdzod// da sngags yi gar gyur pa ni// sha Sha'i sdo tshon mthar dge ba//
rgyu yi don du legs gsal bya// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskor// sngags kyi ya gi 'byung ba che// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ de lta'idakyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje ganod
sbyon de yis ni// gal te grub pa mchog 'dod na// sgyu ma thams cad gazhom par// rdordzoganodasbyin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/
yang dgarab tu bshad bya ba// grubazhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbus su 'khor lo che// lcags kyayis ni rnam par mdzes/
dbus su bcom ldan rdo rje rgyal// lcags kyu la nirab tu bzhugs// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu 'bar// rdorje lcags kya khu tshur che// khar ba
'thobs rnam par brgyan// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par mdzad// sngags kyi yi gas legs par sbyar// shaka'i snga mi drung gnas pa// byed pa'i rgyu ru legs par gnas//
pa'i dbyas drug pa yis legs par phya// zla phyed thig les legs par brgyan// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya legs par sbyar// 'gugs bar byed la don yod pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor
zla bris nas nii// rdo rje lcags kyu mchog tu dag/ dgug pa la sogs thams cad la// 'gro ba 'dul ba yongs su bsdu// don yodargyal po'i dkyil 'khoro/ da nas/
ba dkyil la khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rtababs bzhis mdzes par byos// thige bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor
bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor da yi dbusasu ni// dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i rnam pa can// de yi dbus su gru gsum grags// lcags ku mchogatudas pa'o// deyi dbusasusams par
rma rdo rje rgyal bo stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal pa'i pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bo// gzi brjid chen po dkar dang dmar// zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin dge ba// de
igasang sngags yang dag bshad// don yod 'bras bu stsol ba po// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pani/ nyis 'gyur nyid du rnam par gnas// de yi thig le mya ngan 'das// sngags
kyi 'phrang ba gzhan gyis bskor// sgog mo 'a sogs mchod pa che// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// sgo skyong ba dang mchod pa yang// sbyor ba ji bzhin rnam par dgod// da lta'i dkyil
'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad yongs su sgrub// rdo rje rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro////de nas kyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba//
sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// jo rdzachags pa'isasu bshad// gru bzhi pa sgo bzhib// rta babs bzhis na mesapar byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// chags
pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// thams cad dmar pos rab drags pa// dbang du byed ba'i dam pa yin// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa gi sar bcas/ de e lta ba'i
dbus suni// rdo rje chags pa bri bar bya// bats+tshar ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum 'od kyi 'thung ba na// de yi phyag rgya mchog tu// mdzes
pa yi ni mda' gzhur 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i lus// 'gro ba kun la chos mchog gyur// de yis gsang sdags mdzasu gyur pa// rdo=
rjes chags mchog gi bad// sha kha'i rdo yi mthar gyur pa// kA yi yi ge'i sngon du gnas // dbyas dgu ba dang yang dag ldan// sngags kyi 'phrod pos yang dag brgyan/
ny+nyAtog ma'ani yongs su 'phan// rab thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas mi/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod byed// jodzachags pa'i dkyil
'tsha 'khor ro/// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// ro legs pa zhes grags pa// gnyis su med pa'i dga' ba'anga'athal/ rgyu
pazhi pa lasgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbus su cher mdzes pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa gru bzhi pa// de yi dbusasu pad chun po// 'bru yis dpar
mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du/ kha ba'i gzugs brnyan yang dag 'bar// der gnas dpa' bo bsam par bya/ jo rje legs bstobs po che// dung dang nad zla ba dkar//
kha ba pa zho'i 'od ltar mngos// legasaso stsol ba chem par mdzad// ting nge 'dzin dbang mang bo sbyar// rdo rjesgog mo sogs mchod pa// de bzhin lo togasadug pa sogs// sgo
skyong ba nyid kyang ni// rab tu 'badad bri bar bya// de yi rtags gyur mdzes pa ki/ gsang ba chen po mchog tu 'bar// ha yi yig ston gang de// sems can donani ba sgrub byed//
thog leganyis dang yongs su ldan// legs stsol bas na rnam par gnas// dalta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod ba thams cad rab tu bskor// bdag nyid dag pas bzhugs pa
sogs// thams cad yongs su spyad par bya/ rdornalegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/// danas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje gzi brjid/
cesasu grags// rdordzanyims blo gros ldan// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa grwa ba bya// de yi nang
du bri bya ba// rdo rje nyi ma 'od chen po// rdo rje ma'i stang du ni// gru gsum rnam pa 'gas byung ba// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// 'bar ba ni ma lta bu// pad+man po 'dab brgyadapa//
ze 'bru yis ni shin tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du// rdo rje gzi brjid stobs po tsho// bzang po'i mtshal dang mtshungs ba'i 'od// rgya skyegs khu ba mtshungs pa'i mdog/ phyag bzhi pa la
zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// de yi sngags su yos grags pa// kun nas sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'o// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yi mtha'// ti ma'i dkyil 'khor
dbusasuni/ sngags kyi 'phrang bas yongs su bskos mang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ldan// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thamasacad 'ab mchod
bya rdo thogazi brjidadakyil 'khor ro/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad byab// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ming// bdag nyidachan bo
ro'i tog/ gru bzhi kha laspobazhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su
ni/ mchog tu 'bur ba yini rlung/ zla ba phyadapa'i rnam pa 'bu/ rin chen rgya la mtshan yongs bsgrung ba// de yi dbus su sams dpa' che// rgyan rnams kun kyis brgyan pa'o// zhal
bzhi pa la gzi brjid che// in+d+ra nIl mtshungs pa'i 'od// ri chen char pa rab tu 'bubs/ phyag bzhi pa la snang ba che// daye gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la//
ma yisab tu gsal byas la/bab/tog gi phyag rgyas yongs su bskor// sngags kyi 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad ba mchod bya//
rdo rje tog gi dkyil 'khor lo/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog (yang dgarab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rdzob zhad pa zhes grags pa// rdordzo bzhi d ba mtshungs pa'i 'od//
gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// tshig bzhi dang nim bdag ldan// dkyil 'khor chen bo bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor dadabus zlum po ni// in+danI la
mtshungs pa'i 'od// de bzhin chu ni gzi brjid can// phyag rgya 'khor los rnam par mdzog/ dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// ston ka'i zla ba 'dra ba'i 'od// 'gro ba mtha' dag
snang mdzad pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyanab po// phyag bzhi ba la zhal bzhib// dbang phyug thams cad yang dag ldan// de yi gsang sngags sngags chen po// rgyu yi don du grub
par bya// stong pa mngon brjod bsam mi khyab// rang mi rtogs pas mtshan pa'o// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad 'bamachodabya// jo rdzakhazhad pa'i dkyil
'khora'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// wig bzhi dang ni yapa/
ga ldan/dngos grubadakyil 'khor yang dag bra/ de yi steng du'angapad+macha/ pad+mab las yang dag byung/ gru gsum mchog tu mdzes pa po/ sum mdo'i ris kyis rnam par
brgyan/ chos dbyangs yi ge'i de kho na// thams cad gzi brjid bdag nyid dag/ de yi bdag gi de nyid ni// 'phro ba'i mar ka ta 'dra// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ rgyan nam/
kun gyis brgyanapa bo/ gnyis pa'i mdog tu gyur pa ni// khanA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// ji srid ngag gi 'khor lo ni// smra ba'i dbye bas rab tu gnas//
[>>thams cad so sor gsal bar byed// sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmad byung// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab machodi bya// jor ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//
de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor thamasacad bri bar bya// de yi dbus su
go cha che// rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ de yi dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje srung ba yang dag bri// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha
dog sna tshogs gzi brjid// thams cad sung ba mchog tu dag/ phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan// gsang ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ dmigasang sngags gzi brjid che/ sha
'a'i snga yi mthar gnas mchog mgon po'i rgyur ni mngon bar brjod/ stong dun pas brgyan par bya// kun nas kha dog dum yis// yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya// sngags kyi 'phrang
ba yongs su ldan// glog gi 'phrang bas rnam bar brgyan// dalta'i dkyil 'khor bris nasazhi/ mchod pa thams cad rab bsgrub@#// rdo srung ba'i dkyil 'khor lo/
dkyil 'khor tan po mchog yang dag rab tu bshad bya/ chu bzhi pa la sgobazhi/ rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// khu tshur dkyil 'khor bri bar
bya dkyil 'khorar yid bus su ni// rdordza pad+ma yid 'ongab/ gozi brjidan po gsar gyi mdog/ 'dab ma brgyab yid 'ong ba// de yi steng du gzi brjid che jo tshe khu chur stobs po che//
phyag kha'i pal zhal bzhi pa// sna tshogs rgyan gyis bskrun pa po// kun dadung dang zla ba dkar// khu tshur de ba'i gshegs kun gyi// sku dngagasungadang thugs khu tshur jo lding dumanyam
mchog/ gnyis su med pa mchog gsang ba// khu tshur gyis ni sdud par bshad/ desngags mchog tu dga' ba ni// brjod du mnyid stsol mdzad pa// sdo[]nalnga pa'i gsum pa mi 'bar ba'i
'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi jorje'i sku// 'di yi sngags 'a rnam par gnas// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur mchod par bya// jo khu tshur gyi dekyila' kho rog
pal sogs pa mthun yas mag/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba ni/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub stsol bar mdzad// de nas
yang dag bshad bya pa// 'jig rten pa yi dkyila 'khor mchog de bzhin gru bzhi bris nas mi/ sgo khyud la sogs rnam par sngas/ dartsa gsum paN+Di sa dang ni// dungadang pasogs
pas brgya// thog ma dbangaphyug chen po dgod// gsum pa yi phyag rgyar ldan// khyu mchog la zhon mig gsum pa// stag gi pags gyon phyag bzhi pa// thal
bsakhyags shayage bo la// ral pa'i tshogs ni po 'phyang ba/ chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ phyag 'tshal ba 'debri'o/ de yi sngags ni/
oM saMsuhU~M phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni rgyun gsab/ dbangag nyidachen po dbang phyug che'i// dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid la dbang phyug
chen po'i gnas sunag po chen po gzhag par bya'o// lag pa stong gis gar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dga' byang dbang phyug dang lhan cig phyag bzhi pa/ spyanagasum pa'o// lag pa stong gis gso
ba'o rang gi sngags ni/ oM ma hA kA la hAts+tshe/ o na dig shar haM b+ho/ 'di bzlas na dngos grub thams cad bu'o// dag 'byed dbang phyug dang nagakhe chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro//
gang nyid kyi ni chog yis// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi thig gdab bya/ dor nipad+mayang dag bri// pad+ma'i dbus su sbrang rtsir byed// la sogs ming po gsum bri'o// gzhu yi phyag rgya
yongasasu 'dzad// sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal bar byed// de bzhin nyid du'angasgrub byed do/ dmatog mda' dang yongs su ldas// rang gi mingagatogs mtshan ma can// sngags ni/ ma kaMb+hAu0f00/
lo sA/ d+hanasA/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod gzugs can// dbang du byed pa thams cad sgrub// sbrang rtsi rdo tshal sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/// dkyil 'khor gru bzhib
bris nas dbus su theg pa'i gdab bo/ dbus su tum pu su'o// shar gyi 'dab mar rgyal ba'o// lho'u rnam par rgyal ba'o/ nub t+tami thub pa'o// byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o//
de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bris nas go rims ji lta ba bzhin dugasang sngags dgod par bya'o// oM tum bu ru hU~M/ oM dza ya hU~M/ o pa dza ye hU~M/ oM a dzi ta naM o a pa rA dzitahaM
dga' pa 'di dag lag g.yon du// khu tshur g.yon pas rus grub stsol// 'di yi phyag rgyu nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// laga' dgong pa rab bshad
bya go rims ji lta ba bzhin du/ dum bu ru ni mthu bor dgod// sdigs mdzub la ni rgyal po gnas// rnam rgyal gung mo 'di la'o// mi thub de bzhin ming med la// gzhan
gyis mi thub mthe'u chung la// lag pa'i dbus su yi ge o// dgod bya dang lag pa'i rgyab// rdo rje 'phrang ba'i mthar thug tu// dgodapar bya ba mchog tu bshad/ sbyoradang
rnam par dbye ba yang// phyag rgya kun spyod yongs su bsdu// so sor brtan par bya ba da// sor mo rnams la khyad par du// dbang dang dgug dang rmongs la sogs// rings byed la/
bu/ sogs go rims pa'i// las rnams dag ni thams cad du// sngags pas mnyam par bzhag ste bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'dras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
slaNayang 'dus togshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rjornal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mtshan rnams kyis legs par bstod
pa mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das mnyes par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems ni rdo rje ma// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// dgra bcom 'dod chags bral ba dang// legs bas
kyi 'byung gsa mchog blo gros dag pa ya shes che// thams cad mkhyen pa kun rig mchog/ mchog gi dbang phyug dpa' bo che// thog ma tham med khyab bdag ma 'dres ma 'dris pa
yi dono// shin tu phra ba mchog sbyin rgyal// rdo rjenun chen rnal 'byor na// jo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog mi bskyod pa dang mi zad mgon// chos dbyis gzhan dang gzhan minapa/
rinan 'byung gnas rdo dza mchog/ dbang bskur kun gyi bla ma'i// theg chen che ba'i mchog gi mchog/ dpa' be mchog tudapa' pa'i mchog/ zab cing yangs grwa ba dang// thams
ra byams tshod de bzhin gshegs// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po che// tshad skyob dkar postobs po che// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid che// phul byung phul las phul du byung/ sgyu mar
mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog/ gzi mchog gzi brjid bya mtshungs pa// rgyal ba rgyal ba mchog nyid dang/ legs pa'i rgyal po bdag nyid che// rdo rjesams dpa' sems chen po//
rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu cha/ jo rdzachags pa mda' chen po// rordzalegs pa legs grub mdzad// jo jo rin chen mchog mchog/ rdo rje gzi brjid lags brjod mdzad// rgyal mtshon
chen po ni chen togu0f8b/ jo rdza bzhi d pa logs bzhad mdzad// 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma// shes pa ye shes lags rno mdzad// chos kyi 'khor lo chos chen po// sems dpa'i sgra
ba legs bzhadamadzod// sna tshogs las ni rgyal po che// jo srung b.lags srong mdzad// khro bo chen po gnod sbyin che// rdodzi mtshams sbyor mtshams sbyor mal// phyag 'tshal sangs
rgyas kun khyod la// dang po'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ legs so rdor can rnal 'byor chu// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad g/ sIngapo'i rgyan ces mtshan gsol ba// 'di dag
masacad legs par gsungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems// ye shes snying po shin tums// gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang// smra bya shin turadadaka' ba// sa
rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdo// brjod du med cing yi gi bral/ jo=snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dkyil 'khor 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rgyas pa 'di
yongasasu rdzogs so//da nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang zhus te gshags nas/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha/
ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyugachen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig ste bar gsananas/
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'jug pa la shes rdordzu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de ma thag tubcom ldan 'das ma'ang snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan
'das ro tshornal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'di skad cig nyid la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ya shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to/ zhugs
nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po shes rab yang shas kyi ting nga 'dzin gsal bar mdzad cing brtan par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs pa las 'thon te/
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ulachos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'isems can gyi khams thams cad snanga'adza mdzad na// sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi nang shes
rab dang yo ga rnam par sbyangs te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bkug cing rjes su mnyes par byas nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par gnas te/ rdo rjesams dpa'i ting nge 'dzin legs par
yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas/ mngon bar dbang bskur tagazi brjidadung/ tog dung/ bzhad pa dang/ de dag la sa khas spyar ta mchog gi dbang phyug chen po las rdosums dpa'i ting ngo
'dzin gyis chos rtogs pa la'ang rab tu gnas nas/ napo dang/ rgyudang/ smra ba'i saa dpa' rnams la'ang thugs brtan pa mdzad de mos su dgo nas/ yang bad+ma'is mas dpa'i ting
la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid gzhi mad pa la sbyar nas sna tshogs pa bas kyi bdag po dang/ soms na yongs su smin par byed pa bsrung ba dang/ khro bo dang/ de bzhin gshagA
ba thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba rnam sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su smin pa dang/ phyin gyis brlabs te mar log nas bam ldan 'das kyi thugs
kar rjes su zhugs Mto/ de bzhinag shigs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di tshad du brjod de dae ma'o thag tshor shes rab bdag/ sangs rgyas skyob
pa thamasacad kyi/ shes rab ani tuphrimadasems// sems dpa'i lus su bdag gyur to// drimad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos dang dngos mdanams pyad na// e ma'o sa
(ni bsam med nyid// bdag gi dbang du rnam bar gnas// donas khyung chu soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpa bcoma'adas kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu
drug gi lus su mngon par sprul ta/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yongs su bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rta 'khor kun tu nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor dang/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad sa
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan pa'i chos kyi tshig bka' stsal du gsol/ dmasaM bcom ldan 'das rnam par
snang mdzad kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar soms pa ni legs so legs so// legs par
rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo dzarnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyidan gyis brlabs nas sngags kyi
tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni nang gi lus dang/ phyi'i lus dang/ phyin ng lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dpaldan ba/
dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nga rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la zad pa'i rdzas su

ka lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la mi gnas pa'i rnam pa spyod cing 'jig rtan du gang yang byed par lag pa med do// nang gi tshor ba dang/ phyi'i tshor ba dang/ phyin pagi tshob pa dang/ nangagisams/
dang phyi'i sams dang/ phyi nang gisams dang/ nangagi chos dang/ phyi'i chos dang/ phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta brtson 'grus can shes bzhi dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang
ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sams dang yid mi bad ba rnam par bsalacing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam
par spyod do// chos la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jigartan du'ang dbalen pa med po// rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lus dang/ ngag dang/ soms dang/ chos mnyam pa
nyid kyis gnas so// oM kaM/ a tsa tu ri smi gru basmanA nAhaM// yang dag par sbyong ba bzhi ni sdig to mi dag pa'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyod pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dun pa
skyod cing rtsolal// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// soms kyis rab tu'adzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'dabs so// sdig to mi dag pa'i chos skyes pa rnams spangs pa'i phyir 'dunapa la
sogs pa dang/ dgaba'i chos ma skyes rnams bskyod pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyodado// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// soms kyis rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag pa 'dabs so//
ngag ba'i chos skyes pa rnams 'phal zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang/ yangs par bya ba'i phyir dang/ sgom pa yongs rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do// bdo/
brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// chos rnams thams cad don dam par mi spro dpa dang/ mi spyod pa ma yin pa'i ched du rtogs par

bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyag chen pos 'di bka' stsal to// oM samyaka pra hANasarba ta thA ga tAs mA tA ad+hiSh+ThapaamaNAhU~M/ yang dag par sbyong pa brjod pa zhes bya ba
shas la kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'ji nas ong ba'i 'dabyed dang ldan pa'i rdzas 'phrul gyi rkang pabasgom par bya'o// brtson 'grus dang/
sams dang/ dmyopa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byadadang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dam pa dang/ kun rdzob kyi sgo'i chos MThams cad
sgyu kasgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du 'jug go/ zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thamachod kyi 'khor lo sgyur bas paka' stsal to/ oMrid+d+hi dpa' mo tu la ba bar hU~M/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkapapa'i pha rgol phyin

ba mnyam ba nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dbang po lnga nidod pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po /
[oj]dang shes rab kyi dbang po'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la dbang bskur bsngos pa med pa'i dbang po 'di dag ba ka' stsal to/ kao in+d+ri yA ba bo d+ha pra b+ho i m+madzanAnA
man pa ga ta ya AhU~M/ dbang po mnyam panyid cesakya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//stobs ldanidad pa'i stobs dang/ brtsona'agrus kyi stobs dang/ dran pa'i stobs dang/ ting
pa'i dzin gyi stobs dang/ shes rab kyi stobs so zhes bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa/ stobs thams ca da rtogs pa/ spros pa thams cad bral
ba/ gdod ma nas dag pas 'di bka' stsal pa/ osarba ta thA ga tA ba la arab/ stobs 'a nga la ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi bkol tu phyin pa'o//tshangs pa'igase pa bzhini/
byams pa dang/ snyingadzad ng/ dga' ba dwang/ btang snyoms so// oM prany+tsa bihA d+hin ma ru kaM hUM tuM/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya bshes kyi 'ol tu phyin pa 'di
bka' stsal to// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhigyisarlob pa'o// so so yang dag bar rig pa bzhin spobs bsoso yang dag par rig ba dang/ sa pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang/
doso so yang dag par ga pa dang/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid duso so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'o/
zhes bka' stsal to// o pa tisamI dasu hU~M/ ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// rjes su dran pa drug gang zhin/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/
chos rjes su dran pa dang/ yag 'dun rjes su dran pa dang/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang/ lharjes su dran pa'o// chos thams cad gcig tu rjes su dran
