ba ni chos thams cad don dam pa stong panyid ces bya'o// mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid mad pa rnam par spyod pas mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ting nga 'dzin la dbang sgyur bas bka' stsal to//
oM sarba a nu smiti bud+d+haM saM pa rAdeshi hUM swAhU~M/ rjes su dran pa drug gi shes rab bo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang na na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ sa rnam par 'byed
pa yang dag byang chub yan lag dang/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ dga' ba yang dag byang mu kyi yan lag dang/ shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
dang/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag mnyamapanyid skyo ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya pa rab kyi pha
y+Ya rol tu phyin pa bka' stsal to// oM sarbatAre sgyogs ma su pra tiSh+Thapata d+hu paM/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/ ang dag pa'i rtog pa dang/
yang dag pa'i ngag dang/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang/ yang dag pa'i 'tshog dang/ yang dag pa'i snyol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rgan pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ting nga'adzin to// lam zad
mishes pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po la 'jug legs par so so'ig par thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// oM Ar+ya t+taMg mAn maT/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mnyam/
pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa'o// ti par yin gsum ni/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'o// pal stongapa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gapazhe na/
stong pa'i rnam pa dang/ gsogadang/ gsob kyi rnam pa dang/ rang bzhin med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'dinistong panyid kyi ting nga
'dzin ces brjod do// de la mtshan mched pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhin/ gabala'atshan mar mi byed pa dang/ 'dod pa med pa dang/ shes pa mad pa dang/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang/ rnam par
bral ba'i rnam par sams rtsa gcig pa ste/ 'di'i mtshan ma med pa'i ting ba'adzin cas bya'o// de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzazhiganga'i na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i rnam
pa sems rtsa gcig pa ste/ nganismonapa med pa'i ting 'dzin cas bya'o// chos thams cad rtogs nas smon par mi byed de/ lha'am lha las gzhan gang yang rung ba don du mi gnyer zhing/
gsol ba 'debs par yang mi 'dod pa ste/ dngos po thams cad la ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo yis kyang ngo// shes rab kyi pha tshol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis ti pa//
'dzin gyi sgo gsum nye bar rtogs pan bya'o// so kha sa masarbad+ha/ khaM/ de la stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i
stobs dang/ khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ ba dpo mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ chos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog
pa so sor mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ mngon par M shes pa lnga
mkhyen pa'i stobs so// zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// o dngasha ba
las ma rta thaM/ stobs bcu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad gabazhin/ gzugs man gyis gzugs rnam mthong ba de ni rnam par thar pa
skadang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di rnam par thar ba gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o//
gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyuracang/ snatshogs kyi 'dushes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yasaso zhes te/ nam/
mkha' mtha' yas skye mchapalanye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// da rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas sku mad las yang dag par 'das te//
rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnamo shes mtha' yas skye mched la zhabar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// re rnam po thams cad du rnam shesamatha' yas skye mched las
yang dag bar 'das to/ cung zad ma yod dozhes nung zad mdapo'i skye mched la bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// nga rnam pa thams cad duzhung zad med pa'i smyo
mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'dushes mong 'du shes modamon skyo mchod la zhu bar bosgrubs te gnas pa 'di rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// da rnam pa thams cad 'du shes med 'du shes
mdamin skye mchad las yang dag par 'dus// 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms por 'jug pa la bar bsgrubs ta gnas pa 'dini rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ chos thams car
spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kun sanyon mos pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa/ bsam gtan modatsang bsam gton mad pa ma yin pa/ snyoms par 'jug pa med cing snyoms par
'jug pa yod ma yin pa'i di bka' stsal to// o sa man+ta b+ha drisawab+ha ba bi shud d+ha kaMrAkhaM/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi gabazhin/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs pa'i sadam rgyas so zhes bya par bdag
la dgaspong ngam/ bram za'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skyo dgu'i rtogs gzhan ci'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten chos dang ldan par rgol ba 'gyura'o zhes bya ba'i rgya yang
dag par tshis su ma mthong sta/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag yod pa thob pa dang/ bag tsha ba mang ba thob pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyulog
rlabs bo che'i gnas su dam bca' 'o// 'khor gyi nang dusang ga'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/
gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan pa bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tubaskor bar bya'o// bdag brag l zad ngo zhes dam bcas nas/ de la thag pa 'di rnams yongasasu zad par ma
gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dag sbyongs/ bram ze ma/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshongs pa 'am/ skyo dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rtan na chos dang 'thun par 'as bya ba'i bar du'o//
gang yang bdag gis las chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la bstanan bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i ngas par 'byung ba'i lam du
bshad pa de yis nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ yang dag par sdug bsngal bradapa dang/ yang dag bar sdug bsngal mthar bya par gal 'gyur zhes dag sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/
lha ma/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshog sasu'ang rung ste/ 'jig rtan n chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rdzas su mi mthong pa la sogs pa'i
lhar gyur pa thams cad yongs su spros takharjod par bya'o// mi 'jigs pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma'i mtshad dang ngar 'dzin pa dang/ nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro//
o bor dus ma grub pas A/ saMA// mthar gyis gnas pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi snyoms par 'jugaM pa dgu gang zhin/ 'dod pas dban pa/ sdig to mi dag pa'i chos kyis dben pa//
rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dbyod pa dangabacas pa/ dben palas rgyas pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam ba/kun dang po lam bar bsgrubs ta gnas so// ngo rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par
dpyod pa nye bar zhinas nang yongs su dngas te sems kyi rgyudagacig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes po'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa
gal nye bar bsgrubs te gnasaso// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms su gnas te/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can lus kyis bde ba myongal/
'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa ldan pa'i bde ba la rnamabaradapyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod bsta/ dga' ba medapa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la khyabar bsgrubs ta gnas so// de ba
wA ba'ang sngas/ sdug bsngal ba'angaspapas shing/ yid bad ba dang/ yid m bdang lta nas kyang nub las/ bdaba'ang yod/ sdug bstal ba'ang mad/ btang snyoms pa dang dran pa yongs
su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs gnas so/ da rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'apushes rnams nub par gyur
zla cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas namaM mkha mtha'ams so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas sku mtshal nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// den pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas
se mched las yapadag par 'as rta/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched lanye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// denam pa thams cad pu rnam shesamatha'
mos sku mchad las yang dag par 'das ta/ cung zad ma yodado zhes cung zad med pa'i sku mchadal 'bar bsgrubasata gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nung zad madapa'i skumad ]
las yang dag par 'das te/ 'dubasamapa'i ng shes mdamin skud par bsgrubs tu gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du'adushes med 'du shes mdaminasku mchedalas yang dag par
'ongs te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs tags so// rnam par thar pa brgyad po dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob nas dngos por rtog par mi byed/
dngos bo med par rtog par mi byed/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs so// 'dina mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mnyam pa nyid do// oM a nan/ bi mo/
kA mu khe shum/ dngos po thams cad mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ de la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
sbyin pa'i pha rog tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dung/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi bra rol tu phyin pa pa/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ yo shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs kyipha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thams
cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tuphyin pa dang/ spros pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ yang dag pa'i don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ chos thams cad/
kyi da khon nyid kyi don gyi kha la rtaphyin pa dang/ rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ na po 'bacol tu phyin pa dang/ pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ las kyi la sol tu
phyin pa dang/ chos thams cad manyam pa nyid kyil la tu phyin pa sta/ brtan pa'i rdzasasu rtogs pa'i sbyor bas so// oM sarba pA ra mi tA arla pa ri pu ra Ni/ o pAhUM taM/ thams
da kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sa bcu po gang zhu na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'is dang/ drim mad pa zhes bya ba dang/ [”]'od byed pa zhes
bya ba dang/ 'od 'phro ba zhes bya bdang/ sbyang dka' ba zhes bya ba dang/ mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang/ ring dusong ba zhes bya ba dang/ mi g.yo pa zhes bya ba dang/ legasapa'i
blo gros zhes byas dang/ chos kyi smrane zhes bya ba dang/ sa thams cad don gtsags/ 'di lta ashes kyi don to// yashas kyang cu'adamad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/
yi ga med pa/ don yodapa/ gdod ma nas dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ 'od gsalakha/ brjod pa dang bral pa zhes bya ba'i don to// sa ma'i sho d+ha yisang+gan pa'i pu ra Nipi hU~M/ sa yong
la su sbyong ba zhes khyabashes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcugang zhin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyod pa dang/ gzhon nu'i gyur pa dang/ las
dang bo pa dang/ rnal 'byor spyodab dang/ skya pa nasaskye bar sbyor ba dang ldan ba dang/ bsam pa dang ldan pa dang/ phyir mi ldog pa dang/ dbang bskur ba thob pa dang/ su pa gcig gis/
thogs pa dang/ byang chub soms dpa' rnams kyi rnam bar goms pa dang mi gnas pa dor ba sta/ don dam bar gnas pa gcig yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ltar gnas pasod ba'i/ o sa bya ba
sbyan bi te hU~M/ rnam par gnas pa mang ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa go/ byang chub chub soms dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshol dbang ba dang/ las la dbang ba//
dang yo byadal dbang pa dang/ chos pa la dbang ba dang/ smon lam la dbang bdang/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang pa dang/ skya pa la dbang ba dang/ ya shes la dbang ba dang/ chos
la dbang ba dang/ samasal dbang pa'o// dbang ba dang mi dbang ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba thams cad la dbangal/ dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjes thob pa/ chos
thams cad legs par so sor rtogs pa khyed kyi phyi'i ro// oM sarba ba sha ta tsA/ thams cad la dbang ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'das pa
bco brgyadagabazhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga' 'o// ro mi mnga'// dgos pa nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga' 'o//
dusasnatshogs mi mnga' 'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o/ dun pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi
mngu'ago/ dran pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// shes rab yongs su nyamasapa mi mapa go/ nam par grol ba yongs su nyams
pa mi mapa'o// rnam par grol ba'i ya zhes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// tshangs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ya shes gzigs la 'jugago ma 'os
dus ma chags ma thogs pa'i ma shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chagasam thogs pa'i yongashagagazigs pa 'jug go/ sku'i 'phrin las thamasacud bshas
sngon pu'agro ba sta ya shas kyi rjes su 'brang ngo// gsungagyi 'phrin las thams cad ma shes sngon du 'gro kha sta ye shes kyis su 'brang// thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ya shas sngon
du 'gro ba lha ya shas kyi rjesu 'brang ngo// 'di chos rjes skya ba'i bskya'abro'alags///rgyadapal gtugs shing slob dpon rang bzhi bshes gnyen gyi 'grel pa
dang yang bstan nas zhus dag byas shing/ mi bcos su mi rung ba re re tsam 'grel pa dang bstun nas bcos shing/ zhu thug g.yar khral du blangs nas/ bu ston gyis bgyis pa'o//
dpal rdo rje sams dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de phas bcu rnams ci zhin/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'is dang/ ma med pa zhes bya ba
dang 'od 'phro ba zhes byakha par/ thub par dka' ba'i bya ba dang/ mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang/ ring du song pa zhes bya pa dang/ mi g.yo ba zhes ba dang/ legs pa'i
blo gros zhes bya ba dang/ chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba'o// sa rnams thams cad don gcig bsta/ 'di lta ste/ shes kyi don no// ma shes kyang don dam par ci'ang mdapu/
khyonamongs pa med pa// 'gyur ba med pa/ don yodapa/ gdong ma nas dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal ba/ brjod du mad pa'o zhes pa'i don gang yin pa'o// o b+ha mi
bi sho d+ha ni sarANA ba pA ra Nipit+taM/ sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa banu rnams ci zhi na/
byang chub sems dpa' soms dang po bskyed pa dang/ byis par gyur ba dang/ las dang po pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa dang/ skul bskyod pa dang/ sbyor ba phun sutshogs pa dang/
bsam pa kun sum tshogs pa dang/ phyi ma ldog pa dang/ dbang bskur ba thob pa dang/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag ba ni don dam
par na rnam par gzhag pa dang phrul bste/ rnam par gzhag pa gcig nyid kyi phyi na 'di lta ste/ rnam par gzhag pa mad pa'o// oM sarma bya bas na pig ta/ rnam par/
po gzhag pa mad pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu rnams ci zhi na/ tshe la dbang pa dang/ las la dbang ba dang/ yo byad la dpang
b+hU ba dang/ mos pal dbang ba dang/ smon lam la dbang ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang/ sku bal dbangab dang/ stobs la dbang ba dang/ chos la dbang ba dang/ sams la
nga tshadabang ba'o// dbang rnams thams cad kyang don dam par dbang med pa/ rang bzhin rnam par dben pa/ kun rdzob tu dbang phyag thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa sta/ chos legs
par so sor rtogs panyid kyi phyir ro// oM sarbab shi ta daM hUM hU~M/ dbang thams cad ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po'o// gdol sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
po bco brgyad rnams ci zhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mad pa dang/ ru rtso mod pa dang/ ra kodrwa pa nyams pa med pa dang/ thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mad pa dang/
tha dad pa nyid kyi 'dushes med pa dang/ so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang/ 'dun pa nyams pa mad pa dang/ brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang/ dran pa nyams pa mod
pa dang/ dengang 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang/ shes rab nyams pa med pa dang/ rnam par grol banyams pa med cing rnam par grol ba'i yanas gzigs pa nyams pa med pa dang/
'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang/ ma 'os pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ya shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang/ da ltar gyi jus la ma chags
ma thogs pa'i yo shes grwathigs pa 'jug pa dang/ sku'i 'phrin las thams cad la shes ston du 'gro zhing yang shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad yongashes
sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ya shas sngon du 'gro zhing ya shos kyi rjes su'abrang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni
yul thams cud du dus thams cad kyi tshe thamasacad mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa sta/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir na shes rab yongs su
dag pa'o// o a wa Ni ka bud+d+ha d+harmas ma lngaabI ra khaM/ ma 'dres pa mam pa nyid ces bya pangashasarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/// dalaskyes bu chen po'i mtshan sumanu
rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mtha' 'khor los mtshan nyid de/ 'di'i phyag dang zhabs kyi'athil dag 'khor lo rtsibs stong can lta ba dang bcas bamu khyud dang bcas pa
rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa sta/ zhabs kyi mthil thams cad kyis sa gzhi la rag cing/ de'ang 'di'i
mtho ba ni dman pa dang/ ma' ba ni mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bur dra bas 'brel ba sto/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag dag dung/ 'bas de dag
gsar gyi mdog can gyi ri bo'i 'phrang ba rnams kyis rkang pa brgyad pa bzhin du mdzes pa'o// phyag dang 'bas 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag dang zhabs
ga sa bal 'jam po bzhin dang/ spyas nas zla pa lon pa'i byis pa bzhi du gzhon shA can dang/ kAtsa land ltar 'jam pa/ rig na bad pa'o// bdun mtho bar gyur to// phyag gnyis dag dang/
zhabs gnyis dag dang/ phrag gong dag dang/ mgrin pa'i phyogs gcig dag gisaso// sor mo ring ba ste/ 'di'i zhabs kyi sor mo rnams rim gyis ring po nyid do// zhing pa yangs pas
'di'i rting pa rmazhing zhabs kyi rjes su 'tshams pa yangs par 'gyur ro// sku chazhing drang panying ra/ 'phya bo ma yin zhing 'om pa ma yin/ ma tshang ba ma yin/ 'thas pa ma yin/ legs
par sdus pa rnam pa thams cad pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sku ste/ mtho ba 'di'i srid dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i zhing du 'gyur ro// zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid de/ 'di'i pus mo dpalong bu mthob
pata 'gyur ro// ba spu'i rtse mo gyen du phyogs pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu rnams rtse mo gyen du phyogs par 'gyur zhing/ ba rnams g.yas phyogasu 'khyil ba 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams/
de rnams kyi gsar gyi mdog can gyi sku mdog gsal bar byed do// byin pa'i dgus a nu ya'i lta bu ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dag zum pa'i dgas a mya ya rnams lta bu 'o// phyag
ring ba'an mdzes pasta/ rgyas shing ma btud pa nyid du phyag mthil dag gis rang gi pus mo'i lcapalag pa'o// mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub ste sbubs kyis rab tugamogs la
glang po tsha'i gsang gnas lta bur 'gyur 'o// sku mdog gsar 'dubasta/ 'di'i kha dog gsar lta bur 'gyur ro// pags pa srab pa ste/ shin tu 'jam saM gsangashog ltar 'jam pa'i
pags pa can du 'gyur zhing/ rdul med pa'i na bza'adzin pa'o/ spu re re nas skyes pa ste/ 'ji'i ba spu'i khung bur spu rnams la rir 'gyura'o// smin ma'i dbus na mdzod spu can te/ 'di'i
smin ma dgagi dbus na ras skud 'gas pa lta bu dung bcag pa'i kha dog nagayas phyogs su 'khyil bar 'gyur te mdzod spunyid kyis zhal gsar gyi kha dog lta bu shin tu gsal bor byed po//
sku stod sag lta bu ste/ 'di'i sku stong du yangs pa song ga lta bur 'gyur ro// dpung mgo zlum pa ste/ yongasasu zlum pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur ro// thal gong rgyas pa ste/ 'di'i nye bar rgyas
brgya// par 'gyur zhingagasar shog bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i mgrin ba can no/ an lagasoso rnams su ro rnams myong bar byed do zhes pas na/ robre ba'i mchog dang ldan par da/
rtsa rnams yin pa de rnams kyi mi mchog rlung dang/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kan lasogs pa rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa nyid kyi yi yang dag par gsal ba'o// shing gro d+halta' muzheng gab pa ste/ skyes bu
chen po'i chudang zhing dag mnyam pago/ dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/dbu zlum par 'gyur zhing gtsug tor gdugs lta bu s yas bkab pa gtsug tor yang shin mtho'o// ljags ring bsto/ snyan
gyimatha'i pa dulcags kyi rtsa mos lag par byed zhibadabu sku'i mthar thular yang dpral ba'i mthar ljags kyis khebs pa'o// tshangs pa'i dbyas te/ 'khor stong phrag du ma dbyangs nadu
ji lta ba de ltar phyi lo lu thos shing pa ka la ping ka'i bzhin du lhun pa nyid du 'gyur go/ 'gram pa se ngaga'i lta bu ste/ 'gram pa dag sa ge'i bzhin du zlum paba'agyuralo/ tshems dkar ba ste/
dung dang/ kun dadang/ zla ba'i kha dog nagyi tshoms rnams so/ tshoms mnyam pa skyo/ ha cang dga' ba ma yin/ thob ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin pa'i phyi mo can gyi tshoms rnams su 'gyur ro//

sa tshems thags bzang ba ste/ tshoms rnams par mang ba'o// tshims bzhi btsumanga' bsta/ tshoms 'og tu nyi shu dang/ ste padu tsems te shago/ spyan mthon mthing sta/ spyan dag gi sngon po gang yin pa ngashin

tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ ra mo dmar po rnams s dang ma 'dres pa nyid du phyir la// nga dkar po yin pa de dkar po lo na shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rdzi ma pa'i lta bu ste/ spyan gyi rdzi ma rnams
khyu mchog gi bzhin du thog ma yin pa de rnams 'og khe na dang/ gang stangam yin pa de rnams stong kho nar gnas pa/ ma'adzis pa/ legs par gzholo pa'o// sems can 'gra' zhig rnams kyis de
bzhin gshags ba gsar gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis shel gyi mdog can du mthong ba/'ga' zhig rnams kyis pad+mar ga'i mdog dang/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis an nAla'i kha dog dang
'ga' zhig rnams kyis mu tig dmar po'i kha dog na dang/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis dung dang/kun dang/ zla ba ltar dkarab dang/ 'ga' zhig gis kha dog sna tshogs pa dang/ 'ga' zhig gis nam mkha'i kha

dog dang/ 'ga' zhig gis khru phyed dang panu gsum pa'itshad dang/ srid du dpag tshad 'bum gyi tshad dam dpag tshad bya ba'i tshad dang/ srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa rnams su

snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snabs mos su rgyas par mdzad pa dang/ ji srid dus tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'irtsamatsho rnam par snang

bar byed cing/ chos kyi dbyis kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du// sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi yul gdul bya'i dbang las thams cad snang bar byed cing/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyangs kyisa rnam bar rig par mdzad/
pa dang/ stong gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i bar thams cad kyi 'od dang dbyas kyisasnang bar byas nas/ rnam pa zhig par mdzag bar ng chos dang zang mi dang/

don 'thun pa dang/ donapya ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhims kyis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs shing/ phan btags nas byang chub chen po la rab tu dgod par mdzad do// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyis chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing mnyam pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyimtshan mngon par 'grub par blta bar du'i/ mtshan ma yin pa mngon par 'grub pa nim yin no// byang

chub m nyi med pa nyid kyi phyi'i chos rnams thams cad mnyid med pa ste/'dilta stsa/stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid na// de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mnyam pago/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad ng/ byang chub dang/ chos rnams thams cad kyang mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can/stong nyid kyi mtshan nyid can/ zhi pa'i mtshan can rnams so zhes pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga tapar
la kANas ma ta rnyam ta oM/ mtshan thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes ba kyi bcol tu phyin pa'o/dpa khyad brgyad cu rnams ci'i no/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sen mo zangs kyi

po/ mdog lta bur 'gyur te/ sen mosnyam pa dang/ sen mo mtho ba dang/ sen mo rnams zlum par gyur pa dang/ sor mo rnams rim gyis phra ba dang/ sor mo rnams rgyas ba dang/ rtsa mi mngon pa dang/ rtsa rnams mdud pa med pa
[o ]/dang long bu mi mngon pa dang/ zhabs mi mnyam pa mad par mtshungs pa dang/ glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa dang/ sangaga'i stabs su gshegs pa dang/ g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa
drang po gshegs pa dang/ mdzes par gshegs pa dang/ mi gyis gshog pa dang/ che zhing yangs la yongs su gyur pa'i pus mo'i lha pa can dang mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ gom pa soms pa dang/ sku

rnam par dag pa dang/ sku 'jam pa dang/ sku rnam par dngas pa dang/ sku zhum pa med pa dang/ sku dgu ba medapa dang/ kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba dang/ khyu mchog ltar kun nas rab tu dang ba can dang/ gzigs pa yongs
su rtag cing mngon par 'dod pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang/ dku zlum po dang/ da skabs phyin pa dang/ dku mnos pa dang/sku rka gzhu'i lag bcas lta bu dang/ ltel zab pa dang/ lta ba mi g.yo ba dang/

lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang/ lta ba thogs pa mdapo dang/ yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par dbyes pa dang/ pagrwa pa skyon dang bral ba dang/ gnag bag dang smra bayang pa dang sku brtan pa dang/

phyag shing bal lta bu dang/ phyag angs pa dang/ phyag gi ri mo snum pa dang/ phyaga'i ri mo mi yo ba dang/ mchubim pa lta bu dang/ zhal bcang mi ring ba dang/ mnyan zhing srab la dmar ba'i lcags dngo/ glang po che'i

paro can dang/ snyan cing mnyen pa'i dbyangs dang/ sgra phun sum tshogs pa dang/ dbyangs 'jam pa dang/ shasaM mtho ba dang/ mchab zlum pa dang/ mchab dkar bdapa/mchang na gyis phra ba dang/ spyanagatsong ba dang/ spyan[“]
yang/ spyan mthon mthing dang/ rdzi ma gnag pa dang/ smin ma stag pa dang/ smin ma 'jam pa dang/ spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu dang/ smin tshugs ring ba
dang smin ma'i spu nagapa dang/ smanema'i spu phra ba dang/ smin marjes su'athun pa dang/ kha dog ma nyams pa dang/ sAnam mam pa mad pa dang/ snyan skyon dang bral ba dang/ bang po tham
dam nyams shing skyon dang bral ba dang/ sku yongs su rdzogs dbang mgro la mchog tu gnas pa'i zhal gdong dang dpral pacan dang/ dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang/ dbu skra gzhug pa dang/ dbu skra skug pa
'tshe dang dbu skra 'i pham pa dang/ dbu sku drizhim pa dang/ dadu sku mnyam pa dang/ dbu skra snam pa dang/ dbu ma ma 'khums pa dang/ dbu sku ma 'khrugs pa deng/ dpal be'udang/ bkra
shas dang/ g.yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa dang/ rgyalamtshan yang dag par gnas pa dang/ phyal ba dung lta bu dang/ dbu mchog tumakho ba dang/ gtsug tor yang 'o phags pa dang/ gu
gdugs kyi rnam pa can dang/ kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i yo byad can/ mnyam pa nyid la legs par 'bcu gnas al/ gsal byed dang gsal byed ma yin pa
a mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad gsal byemadapar mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan pal
[n2/ ]legs par rab tu gnas pa/ sa gsum gyi deb byad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad dang dpa byad mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ gnyis su med pa'i//
don la gnas par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams so zhes pa'o/ o a nu bya3nas ma tA su pra tiSh+Thapata badzradz+nyA na AlaM kaM/ dpo byadamanyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
kang nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa thams cad 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor kyi dbang phyug chen po can l legs so zhes bya ba rnams kyis mnyes
par mdzad po// o byang chub sems chen khyod legs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ sas rgyas chan po khyobalegs so// ting 'dzin dbang du 'jug pa yi// ngo
angashes khyod legs so// rdo rjesams dpa' khyod legs so/ dachung pa pang du khyod lags so// shes rab dam pa'i ngang du mar// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// sangs
rgyas snga mas ma gsungs pa'o// donas bcom ldan 'das rdo = rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyag na pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba bzhi'i mngon par
dgas par mdzad do// sangs rgyas khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi sku yi mchog gi mchog/ gdod ma'i sngags kyi don nyid la// jo ya shes stobs chen la// shin tusgrib
mad zhi ba la// rdo chos rnams legs gnas pa// skrag pa chen po'i go 'phang thob// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi lha// gdod nas dag/
pa dpa' bo ma// dbang phyug dam pa mchog gi mchog/ dam chos mchog 'gyur ba mad// bde gshegs da rnams la phyag 'tshol/ zhes pa'o na
lo sku sta aM maM hUM hUM na mo sku ste swAhA/ 'din brjod pa tsam zhig gis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o// zhes pa'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzachon pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dngos
grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor brgyad bar mdzad du gsol/ danas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thamAcad slar yang 'dus ba mdzad nas/ bas ldan
'angs rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid kyis gas thamasamada 'khor lor bskyed par mdzod du gsol/ das
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i gsung gi de ma thag khol/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bos ta bka' stsal/ 'jam
tsham pal de bzhin gshegs rnams thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po nyon cig ces to/ das 'a di las yang dag bshad// byang chub dkyil 'khor bla na med// pordzayang shas gsang pa/
mchog/ sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi'o// dben pa'i sa gzhi nyams dga' ba// ma rtog 'phrongabs rnam brgyan pa/ kun tu sna tshogs cha bzang ba/ kun
tus tshogs sdom pa ni// kun nas sna tshogs bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ri yi mchog gam grongakhyar ni// ma tog 'bras bus rnam brgyan
pa der gnas sngags pas dngos grub mchog dgal te 'dod na yang dag bri// gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas/[– ]ri stangs rnams su kun nas
ni sangs rgyas kun gyi bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ ma mo gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas// dur khrod lha yi gnas su ni// rdo rje
'dzin dpal bya ba rnams/ don dam par ni bsgrub par bya/[“ ]/pad+mo' skyed mos tshal kun dang// chubo 'dus pa rnams su yang// phyag na pad+mayal
byakha da ma pa'i don du bslab par bya// rgyal pa'i pho brang nyams dga' dang/rgyal po'i pho brang nyams dga' dang// rgyal po'i skyed tshal rnams su ni/ rdo rje ni chan de yis ni
gyur pa// rang thams/ de yi phyi chu 'khol po ni// ma gnas pa yi// sgo dang sgro 'tshams pa// sangs rgyas gzugs ban+ta'abar ba yang dag phal
mtsha/ @#// bya ba rnams bsgrub bya/ rtags gcig pa dang ba lang ltas// chu kapa'i dus pa rnams su yang// sna tshogs bya ba thams cad rnams// dam pa'i don
du bsgrub par bya// dpal ldan rdo rjesams dpa' dang// lha rnams gnas mchog kun tu 'o// nam mkha' 'am na phyogs gzhan du// gang du mnyam par bzhag pa des//
rtag por bsod nams mchog gyur pa// bya ba thams cad bslab par bya// phyogs kun manyam nyid gnas dkyil 'khor// shes rab can gyis thig gdab pa// shar lho nub
pa byang rnams kyi// phyogs su dkyil 'khor khrig brgyad po// de yi phyi ru 'khor lo ni// kha dog lnga pa char 'bar ba'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// babs bzhi yis mdzes pas//
sna tshog gos dang ma tog 'phreng// rdzayab sogs kyis rnam brgyan pa// dkyil 'khor kun la gnas pa yi// sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis smras/ dkyil
'khor thams cad bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbusu ni// gal te dngos gru mchog 'dod n// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bri bar bya// shar du
gtsug tor dkar po'i dbus su ni// rdo rje gzi brjid lasog gri/ byang du brtson 'grus chen po ni/ gzi brjid phung po stobs po che// sna tshog rdo rje sogs byas pa// kam pa kun nas bri bar
bya rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi ni// dbang phyug mgon po'i nub phyogs su// gtsug tor rgyal ba brtson 'grus ma/ dzis sogs dam bcas pa// thams cad sngags pas bri bar bya//
galatarengos grub mchog 'dod na// dpal ldan phyogs su 'phags pa gnas// mo mtshams su ni nor 'phrogs so// bden bral du ni rnam rgyal nyid// chung dud bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o// rdo rje
sams dwapa'i sams dpa' cha// sams dpa' kun gyi mdun du ni/zla ba'ikyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// gsal zhing 'bar 'khrigasa'od zer can// mkhas pos dkyil 'khor rnams su ni mchod
pa rnams ni bzhag byas te sgrog mo la sogs mchodapa cha/de bzhin gzugs sgra la sogs dang// bdug pa la sogs gsang chen no//sgo skyong ba ni bzhi yin no//phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnamAsu//
kun tu bzang po la sogs bri// de ltar dkyil 'khor bri bya sta//mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin// de bzhin 'jug ba sogs byas la// sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang
phyug sogs// dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las// sngal rtag pa ji bzhin du// phyi nas de bzhin bri bar bya// bsod nams ldan pos dkyil 'khor rnams// thams cad tshon gyis rab brtag pa//
rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngo bos// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar 'gyur// yang lha'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu grub// cho ga dman dang lhag
pas kyang/ 'grub par 'gyur khaskyonam yig/ gun dusna tshog saskal bzang ba// kun nas sna tshogs 'khor lo can// 'khor lo sgyur ba bdag nyid ma// rin chen bdun gyis mngod pa che// yongs su rdzog
pa'i zla ba ltar/ dkyil 'kho'i bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya// sas rgyas ro 'dzin sogs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad pa'o// phyag na pad+ma bdag nyid rgya'i// pa'i rnam par shes par bya mi

po che yi rinachan rnams// dkyil 'khor sna tshog Ms rnam pa 'o// dkyil 'khor dman zhing dam tshag rnams// dor ba byas pa 'di ni// gsang ba shes pa ma yin na// sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'grub mi 'gyur// de phyir
'bad pa thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad lta ba ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gdon mi za bar rtag tu bya// bla ma la ni yon phul nas//sa su rim pas bsgrub par bya//brtan pa
'am ni g.yo ba yi// rdzas rnams rjesnyad thams cad de//rtsa ba ma tog 'bras busogs// bu mo legs par brgyan byas dang// 'dod pa'i chung ma phul byas nas// slar yang rin gyis bsla
bar bya/ grong dang de bzhin gtsug lag khapa// kun dga' rasogs rgyal srid mchos// gapalasbyin bya cung zad yod// 'tsho ba de ni sbyin par bya// bdag gi dadro bo yongs gtong ba/ sangs
rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o//bla ma la ni yon phul nas//gsang ba dam pa rmad byung ba// mngon par dbang bskur da nas bya// 'dab ma brgyad pa yipa'ong la//slob ma bzhag nas yan lag kum/

phyagany+tsa kun nas bcis myusazhas/khams kun rang bzhin rtsa ba dang// sa bon 'bras bu dud pa yi// bum pa rnams kyisaM dbang bskur te//sangs rgyas 'phrang ba'i dbang bskur las// spyi bo dang ni dpal pa
dang// gzhogs dang de bzhin rgyab tshu yang sangs rgyas rin chen chen po kun/ rtsod pana mchog tu mi 'gyur ro// dpal ldan sas rgyas gtsug nor bu// gdugs dkar steng na gnas pa'o// rgyal srid
kun gyi dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang dudabang bskur bya// dpal kun gyis ni mngon mtho ba// zhes bya'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o// khams kun rang bzhin glang po dang// rtani mchog tu 'bar ba'am// so
go'i gdan gnas dbang bskur ba// dpal gyi sngags ni rjod byecing// dpal gyis mngon mtho nas bya 'am// dam pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ba/ bkra shis sam ni dpal be'u// gang yang bris nas/
dbang bskur bya/ sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rnam rgyal dbang bskur zhes bshad do// tsan dan chud bung ba ma// gzhan gyis mi thub sman blugs la// kun nas dbang bskur ched du ni// rtag

tushas ring can gyis btab// gzhan gyis mi thub dbang bskur mchog/ dkyil 'khor gapag bris byas nas// phyag rgyagang dang gang bkod pa// dar ni dang da brtag bya// da rnams phyag rgya dam par ngashad dbang
gsung chod dusangs rgyas rnams lha da rnams ni yid pu'opa/sman gyi dam pa mchogagyur pa//sas rgyas kun gyis gabashapa/tsan dan dang ni spros dang//ga pur de bzhin gur kum dang/

( ka ru dang lha yi shing/ tsan dan dmar po nyidad pas/saM habya gli de bzhin mchog/ kun nas yAs deb dang// ga ra gats+tsha tshas mchod sbyin// sman gyi dam pa rnams su bshad//lha gnas kun gyi sbyor ba yis sangs rgyas
'tsha mchod pa rab 'jug cing/ dang po rdo rje dbang bskur ba// shes rab thams cad 'ab 'jug byed//nan dam ba'i dam pa ni//gser la sogs kyis thams cad nas//sman kun dang nas 'on kun//'bru rnams thams
da cad bzapon sangs rgyas byin brlabs rnalaM'abyor las//dbang bskur don dub brtag bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byo cho// dbang bskur dam pa 'od 'bar ba'o// sangs rgyas kun nas sangs rgyas 'grus/
zhes pa'o// dpal rdosnying po rgyan gyi rgyud du ngoltar nang pa yongs su rdzogs so///gas gzugs skal bzang mang thos blo 'byor sogs// phun tshogs ldan pa dpal ldan
chos rje yis/ rgyud 'di bsgyur las cung zad m rdzogs pa// yal ldan blo gros brtan pas rdzogs par bsgyur// 'dilotsa ba bu ston kha chos 'gyur bcos pa der snang bas snga gyi 'gyur
dngami 'drab 'i khyadachen po gda' 'o//
